265a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ni ming ji bzhin/ /rab tu gsal bar bshad par bya/ /rim pa dang po'i phyogs bzhi ni/ /phreng bzang ma dang 'dod can ma/ /'jigs ma dang ni thub dka' ma/ /mtshams su thod pas yang dag brgyan/ /rim gnyis gsung gi 'khor lo la/ /bde ba'i ske
265a2(rgyud 'grel): rags can dang ni/ /gzugs can 'byung gnas rnam rgyal ma/ /shar sogs phyogs bzhir g.yon rim gnas/ /thod can ma dang mtshon chen ma/ /rgyud byed ma dang gsod byed ma/ /dbang ldan mtshams sogs g.yas rim bzhugs/ /rim gsum sku yi 'khor
265a3(rgyud 'grel): lo la/ /sgrol byed ma dang 'jigs ma dang/ /lha mo mi pham ma bzhi ni/ /shar phyogs lugs 'jug phyogs bzhir ro/ /dge ma 'dzur byed ma dang ni/ /dus mtshan ma dang grags chen ma/ /dbang ldan mtshams sogs lugs las bzlog /mdzes sdug ma
265a4(rgyud 'grel): dang nor 'dzin ma/ /skal bzang ma dang brags mthong ma/ /shar sogs sgo bzhir yang dag gnas/ /'di lta bu yis dkyil 'khor mchog/ kha dog rnam pa lnga yis brgyan/ /de yi dbus gnas lha mo ni/ /he ru ka la bde ster ma/ /skyil krung byed pa'i gar
265a5(rgyud 'grel): byed ma/ /me yi rus pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /lha mo 'od zer dpag dka' zhing/ /skra ser gyen du 'bar ba ste/ /hUM gi bdag nyid las skyes 'jigs/ /zhal nas khrag gi 'thor byed ma/ /dkar mo nag mo ljang gu ma/ /thams cad khu ba ldan gyur ma'o/ lha
265a6(rgyud 'grel): yi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid bsrungs/ /mdog dang phyag mtshan cha lugs gdan/ /sgrub pa'i thabs bzhin bsgom par bya/ /sngar gsungs sta gon lha rnams ni/ /snying ga nyid nas rab sprul nas/ /dkyil 'khor la ni byin gyis
265a7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs/ /yang ? snying ga'i sa bon gyis/ /ye shes lha rnams dgug byas te/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams byin gyis brlabs/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA lI ni a(rgyud 'grel): khaM graM pruM sh+ruM a(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM phaT/ rtsa yi 'khor lo 'jigs tshul gyis/ /dbang bskur
265b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gdab phun sum tshogs/ /ma lus pa ni 'dir bya'o/ /de nas me tog spos la sogs/ /lha yi grangs dang mnyam par dbul/ /de bzhin gon ni zur res mchod/ rab byung me tog la sogs pa'i/ /bdud rtsi lngas kyang de bzhin mchog /thod pa gdu rtsi
265b2(rgyud 'grel): lngas dkang ba/ /he ru ka yis btung bar bya/ /de yis 'thungs pa tsam gyis ni/ /'gro ba'i bla ma bdag nyid che/ /gtso bo las gzhan tha dad gzugs/ /rnal 'byor ma kun de dang 'dra/ /'dod pa'i yon tan sna tshogs dang/ /tshogs kyi sbyor ba cha ldan
265b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /nam mkha' co ce'i sgras bkang nas/ /bkra shis glu yis bstod bya zhing/ /bzlas pa yis kyang mgu bar bya/ /lto ba'i gnas su sbyin sreg bya/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad ldan du/ /khrag 'thung mkha' dro nyi shu lnga/ /ge sar pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /bdag nyid lha yi
265b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos byas nas/ /sbyin sreg cho ga ldan byas nas/ /ldeb mi dgos pa dngos grub 'gyur/ /bza' dang bca' btung myang ba dang/ /brtul zhugs can gyis ci spyod pa/ /ye shes bdud rtsi lnga nyid du/ /bsgrubs te thams cad spyad par bya/ /bdag nyid lhe ni lha
265b5(rgyud 'grel): yi mchog /bdag nyid lha ni lha dam pa/ /rang gi gzugs la ma chags pas/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs bzhin du shes /bdag nyid sangs rgyas ma lus dang/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun gnas yin te/ /de phyir rtsol ba ma lus kyis/ /bdag nyid he ru ka dpal
265b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod ? khur la skyegs bza' ba dang/ /? dron sha dang nya sha dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs ci 'byor pa/ /thod pa'i nang du legs bzhag ste/ /sbyang sogs rim gyis byin brlabs nas/ /zhing skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /mchod pa'i bya ba rdzogs gyur
265b7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /slob ma gzhug po'i cho ga yis/ /dang po nyid du slob dpon gzhug/ mtshan nyid ldan pa'i slob ma'i tshogs/ /gus byas mdzes pa'i gos gyon te/ /bu sdug de dag rnams kyi ni/ /gdod ba dar gyis g.yogs byas nas/ /gsol ba 'debs pa
266a1(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'gro/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo/ /rnal 'byor gnas la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /thar ba chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /don
266a2(rgyud 'grel): dam smra ba'i seng ge rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ /nyon mongs gcod pa'i don la shin tu mkhas gyur pa/ /srid pa'i nyes brgya bskyed pa'i nyon mongs gcod mdzad pa/ /rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po de nyid grub par mdzod/ /lan gsum du ni gsol ba gdab//
266a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob dpon gyis kye khyod su zhes smra'o/ /slob mas bdag ni rgyal ba'i sras zhes smra'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /bdag gi slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /de nas lho sgor mngon
266a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs nas/ /dkyil 'khor mkha' 'gro tshogs dag la/ /sgo gsum dang bas phyag btsal ba/ /oM na ma ste hUM/ nam mi hUM/ na mo na ma(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ zhes brjod sku gsung thugs kyis ni/ /sgo nas lan gsum sngon 'gro phyag/ oM sarba bI ra yo gi ni pU dzo past+tharbA ya At+ma nAM
266a5(rgyud 'grel): nIrya ta ya mi sarba ta tha ga ta bI ra yo gi ni/ At+ma ma le a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM/ /zhes brjod lus ni thams cad kyi/ /gus pas rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas shar gyi sgor gnas la/ /snying ga'i g.yon du thal mo sbyar/ /oM sarba bI ra yo gi ni/ /pU dzo pas+tha nA ya/ a b+hi She
266a6(rgyud 'grel): ka ya At+ma nAM/ niryA? tA ya mi sarba ta tha ga ta bI ra yo gi ni/ At+ma ka ma d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM/ de rjes byang gi sgor phyogs shing/ /thal mo de nyid dpral bar bzhag/ oM sarba bI ra yo gi naM/ pU dza pra barta nA ya/ At+ma nShaM/ nirya tA ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta bi ra yo
266a7(rgyud 'grel): gi ni At+ma me ma pra b+hi d+ha na maM/ de nas nub kyi sgor 'dug la/ /thal mo de nyid mgor bzhag ste/ /oM sarba bI ra yo gi ni/ /pU dza karma At+ma nI/ nirya? tA ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi ni/ At+ma Arya karma ku ru rAM/ byin gyis brlab phyir phyag bzhi btsal/
266b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas lho sgor 'dug nas kyang/ /las ni bum pa'i chu yis gtor/ /slob ma'i lag pa bzung byas la/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sdom pa mchog /brjod de thams cad sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gdong/ /'di ni sangs
266b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rigs yin te/ /sdom pa rtag par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya ni/ /blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar bgyi/ /byang chub sems gang do rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu shes rab grags/ /slob dpon khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje
266b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par bshad/ /rin chen rigs la rtag tu ni/ /nyin re bzhin nam lan drug tu/ /chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus
266b4(rgyud 'grel): gzung/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba'o/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar gyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus kyi/ /de ltar sdom pa bzung nas ni/ /me tog phreng dang bcas pa yis/ /snying
266b5(rgyud 'grel): gang rdo rje rab bzhag la/ /oM badzra yo ga tsit+ta utwA tA ya mi/ oM su ra ste sa ma ya stoM ho sid+d+hiM badzra ya tha su khaM/ rnal 'byor du ni sems bskyed do/ /yongs su sbyangs pa'i bu sdug de/ /las kun byed pa'i chus gtor la/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya/ /oM A khaM bI ra
266b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ deng khyod dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la dpal he ru ka'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na/
266b7(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i/ /mdun du smra bar mi bya ste/ /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ /he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag bzhugs pa ni/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /rjes su
267a1(rgyud 'grel): mna' chu blud? ba ni/ /tsan dan dang ni ga bur bcas/ /bde 'byung me tog chu dang ldan/ /blo gros brtan pa'i slob ma la/ /mtshan ldan thod par blugs nas ni/ /gzi brjid can gyis 'di skad smra/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na
267a2(rgyud 'grel): sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'gyur/ /oM pany+tsa a mri ta ud ka Tha Tha Tha hUM/ deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi dpal he ru ka nga yin gyi ngas gang 'di byos shig bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya'o/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /khyod mi bde ba ma spangs
267a3(rgyud 'grel): par dus byas nas dmyal bar gyur ta re/ de rjes slob ma'i gtso bo yis/ /dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad kyis ni byin rlobs la/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor ma/ /bdag la ye shes dbab du gsol/ /sngar gsungs rgyan ldan bla ma yis/ /gzi lda
267a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyings bcas slob ma la/ mi 'chi bcu phyed ro ras dang/ /byi brun gu gul nag po dang/ /grir shi glang khrag tshil chen bcas/ /rang skra dang bcas zhib mor brdungs/ /pad+ma'i snod du rab bzhag nas/ /dur khrod yi dags mes gdungs la/ /gnyis med sngags
267a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis gcun par bya/ /dril bu'i sgra ni rab bsgrags nas/ /rang nyid 'od kyis mkha' 'gro gzhug /gal te 'bab par ma gyur na/ /slob ma'i snying gar nyi ma la/ /sangs rgyas thod pa yum bcas shing/ /yungs kar tsam gyi skur bsams la/ /de yi gsang dang mkha' bskyod par
267a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dmar pos lus kun yang/ /ros gang gcig gyur sngags bzlas shing/ /bdug dang bsam gtan cho ga yis/ /skad cig nyid la dpa' bo dang/ /mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas snying la 'jug /oM tiSh+Tha mahA kro d+ha a be sha hUM/ oM sh+rI he ru kA ya/ bidma he birya rA dzA ya d+ha? bi
267a7(rgyud 'grel): he swAhA/ /mkha' 'gro bskul bas nges par 'bab/ /lce la a ni dmar bsams nas/ /gsungs shig rdo rje dge mi dge /sku gsung thugs la phebs gyur nas/ /brtan pa'i gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /'dir ni bsod nams ji lta bu/ /lha rnams rigs kyi rim bzhin
267b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni dngos grub gang yin pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin shog/ pra tIts+tsha dang badzra ho/ /dkyil 'khor du ni me tog dor/ gang rnyed de yi rigs yin te/ /dbugs sogs mchan ma shes byas la /slar yang slob ma'i mgo la bcing/ /sha mig dag pa'i ltas kyi phyir/ ci mthong
267b2(rgyud 'grel): dri ba'i cho ga bya/ /de nas lag pa nas bzung ste/ /mig phyed dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /phye bas thams cad mthong 'gyur te/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /oM badzra nai tra ya a pa ha ra phaT laM h+rI/
267b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /nga ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rigs skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /'gro don phun sum tshogs kun dang/ /dngos grub kun mkhyen mngon du 'gyur/ dam tshig thams cad bskyang pa dang//
267b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/ /lha yi sku mdog ji bzhin dang/ /mtshan ma la sogs de bzhin du/ /slob ma rnams la bstan par bya/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i dkyil stengs nas/ /gnyis su med par legs 'khyud pa'i/ /dngos po
267b5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rang bzhin can/ /dngos grub ma lus stsol ba po/ /khrag 'thung che la pu khyod ltos/ /sna tshogs sde mas gtsor mdzad pa'i/ /phreng bzang ma sogs lha mo lnga/ /thod pa bzhi por bcas pa'i yi/ /rab zab thugs kyi 'khor lo dang/ /dge ba'i ske rags can la
267b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /gsung gi rnam dag 'khor lo dang/ /sgrol byed mkha' 'gro ma la sogs/ /rnam dag sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma can/ /mdzes sdug la sogs lha mo bzhi/ /gzugs sogs dag pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /lha rnams de nyid mtshan ma yin/
267b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob ma blo ldan gyis/ /zla ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /yon gyi mchog chen phul nas su/ /dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab/ /he ru ka dpal dbang sgrub ba/ /'gro ba skyob cing gzi brjid can/ /de ltar yon tan 'byung gnas sogs/ /de bzhin
268a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag la der gsol cig /dpa' bo chen pos mi ldog pa'i/ /dbang bskur ba ni bdag la gsol/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyi/ /'jug sgo lho yi phyogs su ni/ /bdag nyid he ru ka dpal sems/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris stengs su//
268a2(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i khri ni bsham bya ste/ /sna tshogs mdzes pa'i stan bting la/ /gnyis med blo ldan der bzhag ste/ /he ru ka dpal sprul par bya/ /gdugs dkar stengs du phub nas kyang/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma chogs kyis/ /bkra shis sgra yis legs gang ba/ /rol mo snyan
268a3(rgyud 'grel): dang glu dbyangs rnams/ /nam mkha' ca co yis bkang ste/ /dbang bskur bar ni 'dong pa yin/ /de la bar chod zhi ba'i phyir/ /yungs kar rnal 'byor pa yis kyang/ /bzlas brjod cho ga bzhin byas la/ /gsang sngags brjod nas brdegs par bya/ /de 'og lag gnyis 'dab
268a4(rgyud 'grel): rtse yis/ /bum pa rnams bteg sngags pa yis/ /lus nang rtogs gyur dkyil 'khor la/ /cho ga'i tshul gyis dbang bskur bya/ /rnam rgyal la sogs bum pa'i chu/ /lhag ma med par bsdu byas la/ /glu blang dril bu la sogs brdung/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma lus kun//
268a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms la thams cad dbang bskur ro/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /khams gsum pa yi gnas las byung/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag 'tsha ba/ /chu yis dbang bskur spyin par bya/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes/ /brjod de rang snying 'od las byung/ /rig pa'i lha
268a6(rgyud 'grel): mo rdzu 'phrul can/ /bdud rtsi chu yi bkru bar bya/ /dbu rgyan rin chen rgyu las byung/ /dar dpyangs bcings pa dbang bskur te/ /thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yis/ /rin chen dam pa'i dbu rgyan dang/ /dar dbyangs dbang
268a7(rgyud 'grel): bskur sbyin bar bya/ /oM badzra pa ti ka badzra? a ra li ho/ /rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa/ /de nyid ldan pa byin brlabs nas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas/ /di ring khyod la dbang bskur bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /shin tu grub phyir rdo rje zung//
268b1(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra a d+hi ba ti stwaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ lag tu byin la dbang bskur bya/ /thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po bdag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ shes rab dbyangs kyi rjer 'gror bshad/ /khyod
268b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzheng/ /de dus dril bu'i sgra bsgrags la/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' rnams/ /srid pa'i dam pa byed par shog/ oM shI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti stwaM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tiSh+Tha pI ra
268b3(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya/ /dril bu g.yon du sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyung/ /g.yon bsnyams pa dang spros gnon 'chang/ gnyis med gnyis med rnal 'byor bdag/ phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs/ /byin rlabs che ldan sngags kyis ni/ /sngags kyi dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /oM sh+ri he ru ka
268b4(rgyud 'grel): a d+hi bo ti stwaM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ h+rI he ru ka nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ sh+rI yi sgra dang bcas pa yis/ /ming gi dbang bskur byin par bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /he ru ka dpal phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ he ru ka dpal brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM si ta thA
268b5(rgyud 'grel): ga ta maM d+hya badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e ? ? ? ? i hUM ha ha ha ho/ /'dis ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so/ /kha TwAM Da ma ru bzangs bcas/ /byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur bya/ /he ru ka dpal kha TwAM ga rnal 'byor ma ni Da ma ru/ /rdo rje kha TwAM rdo rjer bcas/ /dril bu sil sil sgra sgrogs shing/ /tshangs

268b7(rgyud 'grel): dril bu sde/ /rnal 'byor ba yi dngos grub sgrub/ /de nas ci dkar sgrub par gyis/ shAkya thub par bsgom byas la/ /lag g.yon gyis ni chos gos mdza' g.yas kyi mi 'jigs phyag rgyab gnas/ /slob ma la ni lung bstan bya/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che/ /'khor lo ma lus rnam
269a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing/ /he ru ka dpal lur bstan bzhin/ /mgrin gcig tu ni thams cad kyis/ /'di lta rang yis lung bstan te/ /he ru ka dpal de bzhin gshegs/ /dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams la bton/ /shI he ru ka nA ma sarba ta tha ka ta tiShtha
269a2(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+hi sa ma ya stwaM b+hu ra b+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): de tshe he ru ka dpal dang/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang bla mar bcas/ /mgrin cig lung ston bsam par bya/ /rdo rjes dbugs dbyung sbyin pa ni/ /gang chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ /mthong ba dang na bcug pa yis/ /sdig pa kun la grol 'gyur bar//
269a3(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni shin tu de ring gnas/ /dbang ni bskur btsam gyis kyang/ /slob ma yon tan bdag por 'gyur/ /slob dpon nying kyi bde ba yis/ /brtan dang g.yo kun dam tshig yin/ /sems ngag tho rangs du langs te/ /bza' dang bsrung ba la sogs pa'i/ /sdom pa'i bdag nyid can
269a4(rgyud 'grel): srung ngo/ /lus dang srog la mi lto bar/ /dam tshig dang ni sdom bsrungs/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /rtag tu bzlas la gzhol bar byos/ /gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /dgun zla 'bring po nas brtsams te/ /zla ba re re bsrung ba ni
269a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med pa'i 'khor lor gnas/ /tshes bcu dus su ma chod par bya/ /sha dang chang sogs gang ci'ang rung/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs/ /he ru ka sogs rab tu mchod/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/ /'khor ba dag kyang
269a6(rgyud 'grel): yong mi spang/ /mya ngan 'das la dga' mi 'gro/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun la/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya bzhon pas tshon cha dang/ /mtshan ma 'gom bar mi bya'o/ /dam tshig rab bsrungs bsod nams kyis/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /bud med
269a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mthong ba na/ /g.yon nas lan gsum bskor byas la/ /sbyi bos phyag ni byas nas kyang/ /lan gsum bar du gsol ba gang ba/ /bdag gis ma khyod bu yin te/ /ji srid byang chub 'gyur bar du/ /byang chub yan lag du ma las/ /byung ba'i rang gi 'o mas
269b1(rgyud 'grel): skyongs/ /gnyis med ye shes sbyod ldan pa'i/ /bslab pa blar ba sngon 'gro bas/ /tshangs par spyod pa shin tu bsrung/ /dam tshig de la rtag gnas te/ de sngon 'gro ba'i gsang ba yin/ /spyod dang grol ba'i gnas 'dod pa'i/ /yid la 'dod pa kun 'grub 'gyur/ /gtso pos ji
269b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bdag gi bgyid par 'tshal/ /de ltar yongs smin slob ma la/ /gsang ba'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya/ /dper na bu tsha med pa'i khyim/ /shi ma thag tu stong par 'gyur/ /de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni/ /ye shes kun gyis ston pa nyid/ /dbang
269b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog thog 'dod slob ma yis/ /sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom/ /sna tshogs rol mo mchog gsungs dang/ /dra zhim lnga dang me tog spos/ /'di dag la sogs bla ma mchod/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil bde bzhin khrus/ /glu yis mchod pa rnams mang bas/ /sangs
269b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin che/ /'di dag gis ni bla ma mchod/ /mtshod ldan pa'i bu mo yang/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa dbul bar bya/ /de nas yang dag ba bshad pa/ /dbang dus cho ga ji bzhin du/ /slob ma dang brtan gang zhig gis/ /shes rab ma la gsol ba 'debs//
269b5(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim pa yi dngos po yis/ /maN+Dal rnam pa lnga byas te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis brgyan byas pa/ /bla ma che la gsol ba 'debs/ /shin tu dri med sems kyis ni/ /de nas 'dir ni gsol ba 'debs/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba dag /dpung nyen khyod kyis
269b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgral du gsol/ /bdag ni rtsol chung skal dman zhing/ /sangs rgyas chos ni rnam par spangs/ /kye kye ston pa bla ma che/ /mgon po khyod kyis brtse bar mdzod/ /de nas slob dpon chen ldan par/ /lha yi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ /sngar gsung cho ga bzhin du ni/ /chu
269b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs dbang rnams bskur bar bya/ /gsang ba'i go 'phang 'di brjod bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgyar rab gsungs pa/ /yid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/ /gang gis lus kun brtan byed pa/ /de ni phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /slob ma la ni ra brjod nas/ /bdag nyid rig pa lhan
270a1(rgyud 'grel): cig tu/ /yid dang rjes mthun bza' dang bca' / /btung ba la sogs rjes spyad cing/ /kha la sogs par ga bur gyis/ /dri zhim mchog tu bsgos pa las/ /yid la 'phrog pa'i bgod pa dang/ /sgeg dang rol sogs sngar byas te//
270a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms 'jug pas/ /bde dga' rgya mtsho byung gyur pas/ /zhal du bza' ba'i rjes mchog bstab/ /rdzas de rnams ni gsol ba dang/ /yid ni tshim zhing thugs dgyes phyir/ /a ti su kha zhes brjod do/ /khams gsum thabs dang
270a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab gcig/ bde chen gnyis med ye shes gsal/ /slob ma nus dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de ltar dbang mchog bskur byas pas/ /mgon po sa bcu dang mnyam 'gyur/ /de nas gsang dbang thob gyur pa'i/ /slob ma bzang la bla ma yis/ /shes rab la brten
270a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi/ /dbang bskur bzang ba sbyin pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po'i phyi rol tu/ /sngar bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs bsgoms la/ /de yi dbus gnas bla ma ni/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /me tog la sogs mchod pa dang/ /chang la
270a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i dga' ston gyis/ /mchod cing bstod pas mnyes byas la/ /yon mchog dam pa phul nas ni/ /bla ma che la gsol 'debs pa/ /bla ma lha mo bgyes mthong nas/ /tshig 'di dag ni smra bar byed/ /rnam par rtog pa mang po yis/ /g.yogs
270a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bag chags rab ldan pa/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis skyob par mdzod/ /grags chen snying rje ldan pa yis/ /lha mo nges ni zhi bar mdzod/ /gsol ba btab rjes bla ma che/ /rang gi rnal 'byor rdzogs byas nas/ /dpa' bo 
270a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par mthong nas ni/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo las ni 'dzag /'dzag pa de las rnal 'byor ma/ /rnam mang brtse ba cher ldan pa/ /bder gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs ma/ /sna tshogs brgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sna tshogs pa yin bza' man bas/ /gzugs ni lang tsho
270b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhon pas brgyan/ /lo ni bcu dang gnyis lon pa/ /phyag g.yas byang chub sems gang ba'i/ /bum pa a mra'i lcug bcas rnams/ /zhal ni rab bzhad dang ba yis/ /he ru ka ni rgyal gyur cig /rgyal bar gyur cig ces smras pas/ /chu sogs bum pa gsang ba dag/
270b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur rjes su shes rab kyi dbang ni rab tu bskur bar bya/ /dper na pi wang spyod kun tshogs/ /rgyu dang bral na brdung mi rung/ /de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni/ /sngags dang bsam gtan 'grub mi 'gyur/ /lo bcu gnyis pa'i bu mo ni/ /tshul khrims
270b3(rgyud 'grel): ma nyams chags chung bas/ /thong dang ldan zhing grags chen mo/ /nad med snying rje dang ldan pa/ sems can don la cig nan tan/ /rgod cing pad+ma'i spyan dang ldan/ /zla ba'i cha 'dra gdong mdzes ma/ /mu cor mi smra brtan zhing dul/ /shes rab pad+ma'i nang dbus/ /
270b4(rgyud 'grel): dpag tshad bye ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /sum rtse gdag pa'i bdag nyid lus/ /'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus gnas pa/ /mkhas pas slob ma gsang dbang bskur/ /gal te byang chub bla med 'dod/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bya ba min/ /
270b5(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams gshig ba tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa chen po skye bar 'gyur/ /de nas rdul tshon tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin lha rnams dag mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang/ /de bzhin pad+ma ral gri nyid/ /byas nas slar yang 'chang byed pa/ /skyes bu tha shal dmyal bar
270b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro/ /gang gis sangs rgyas spyan 'dren zhing/ /gang gis gshegs su gsol ba yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' byon pa dang/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa rnams/ /gang na'ang bzhugs pa ma yin te/ /dri ma med cing dag pa'i lus/ /gang gis spyan drangs gshegs su
270b7(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /de nyid kyis na brtag med pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag bya/ /mdzes pa'i phyag rgya byin brlabs nas/ /slob ma bzang ldan de la gtang/ /gang gis shes rab ma mnyes pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni mchod/ /'di nyid la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs//
271a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang dngos grub gtso bo dang/ /snying rje ldan pa gzhan gang zhig/ mkha' 'gro ma kun de la bzhugs/ /gsang ba phyi yi lnga dang ni/ /bdun dang bcu bzhir bshad pa dang/ /gnyis ka gcig tu 'dus pa'o/ /gsang ba'i de nyid bshad par bya/ /de 'og
271a2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma stan bzang la/ /thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas/ /dga' ba la sogs bskyed byas nas/ /rnal 'byor dam pa mtshon par bya/ /gan du dbang po 'gags gyur pa/ /bdag rtog rang bzhin nyams pa ste/ /kye de lhan cig skyes gyur pa/ /bla ma'i zhal snga
271a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar zhus/ /lhan cig skyes pa rtogs gyur pa/ /gsang ba'i de nyid bshad par bya/ /gang zhig 'char dus tshe na dbang po dang/ /yul mnyam nus gyur de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis snying sbas su sad pa/ /phyis ni mngon dga' rgyal ba'i mdzes
271a4(rgyud 'grel): sku gcig/ rmongs pa gang zhig dbang med par/ /bdag ni dbang bskur zhes smras pa/ /ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/ /slob mar bcas te dmyal bar 'gro/ /slob ma legs par ldan pa dang/ /rtse ldan sems gzhan med pa yi/ /gser ni 'bum phrag
271a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug dang/ /sa gzhi yul 'khor ldan ma dang/ /glang po bud med dam pa dang/ /ral gri 'khor lo rta dang ni/ /yongs 'dren skyes bu rin chen rnams/ /spyor dang ldan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /der ni bla mar dbul bar bya/ /der ni rgyan rnams thams cad dang/ lhab
271a6(rgyud 'grel): lhub brgyan rnams dbul bar bya/ /dad pa brtan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya/ /sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs btung/ /de yi mdun du dbul bar bya/ /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang/ /rmongs gang ma rungs las byed dang/ /skye ba dman
271a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur 'gro ba rnams/ /rdul tshon mthong bas grol bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu mngon zhugs pas/ /gtsang ma'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /shin tu sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/ /skye 'dir dngos grub ma thob kyang/ /skye gzhan srid par dngos grub
271b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /dbang bskur yang dag sbyin ldan ni/ /skye dang skye bar dngos grub 'gyur/ /de yi skye ba bdun la ni/ /ma bsgrubs par ni dngos grub thob/ /gang yang bsgom pa dang ldan zhing/ /gal te dam tshig sdom la gnas/ /skye 'dir las dbang gang ma grub/ /re zhig dam
271b2(rgyud 'grel): tshig nyams pa la/ /dngos grub thob pa lta zhog gi/ /mi yi skye ba'ang rnyed par dka' / /gang yang bla ma brgyud pa yi/ /sgrub pa po yis 'grub snyam dgongs/ /rdo rje dril 'dzin slob ma'i mgor/ /bla mas gdugs phub bkra shis brjod/ /lan gsum dkyil 'khor bskor
271b3(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /shar nas phyag byas sa la ni/ /bde gshegs rnal 'byor ma tshogs la/ /bza' btung la sogs dga' ba yis/ /rol pa phul la smon lam gdab/ /de nas ci bder gshegs su gsol/ /tshon rtsi la sogs dngos po kun/ /tho rangs dus su bsdu byas la/ /
271b4(rgyud 'grel): gser sogs bum pa'i nang du ni/ /bcug nas chu bo chen por dor/ /bum pa thams cad bsdu nas kyang/ /chu bo che la bkru bar bya/ de nas bdud rtsi lnga sogs dang/ /sbyar ba'i sa ni dbyug par bya/ /de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ni/ /me yi phrin las tshul bzhin du/ /bdag dang
271b5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i tshogs rnams la/ /sdig pa zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ /rigs mthun mdza' sdug bcas pa rnams/ /snod ldan skye bo 'dus pa kun/ /bkra shis glu dang rdo rje dril/ /mkha' 'gro mnyes phyir rol par bya/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud 'di ru/ /dum pa'i dbang ni
271b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal mod kyang/ /gsang ba mdzod sogs rjes 'brangs nas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bdag gis byas/ /dge ba 'di yis 'gro ba rnams/ /bsgribs pa'i tshogs dag spangs byas nas/ /ye shes ldan pa'i sa gnas su/ /mi ldog par ni 'gro bar shog /dpal sangs rgyas
271b7(rgyud 'grel): thod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa gsal ba zhes bya ba dngos grub kyi mchog brnyes pa'i slob dpon sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //ga ya d+ha ra dang/ gyi rdo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur pa'o// //
272a1(rgyud 'grel): ri gi A ra li'i sgrub thabs bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ ri gya ra l+li sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ ri gi A ra li'i sgrub thabs/ /dpal he ru ka rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po re zhig sngags pas yid du 'ong ba'i gnas 'ga' zhig tu bde ba'i stan la
272a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dug ste/ /rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i hUM yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis nam mkha' i phyogs su gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams bltas nas yang dag par mchod nas kyang/ sdig ba bshags pa la sogs pa byas te/ tshangs
272a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgom par bya'o// yaM las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan pa/ raM las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan pa baM las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan pa laM
272a4(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan pa/ de'i sten du re ba yongs su gyur pa'i chos 'byung/ de'i dbus su gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i hUM yig las skyes pa rdo rje rdo rje'i ra ba dang rdo rje'i gur gyi rang
272a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin can gyi sa bzhi rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /hUM yig las skyes pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i ze 'bru'i dbus su/ ri rab kyi rtse mor sna tshogs rdo rje las skyes pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la dbyangs bcu drug nyis 'gyur du gyur pa yongs su gyur par zla ba'i dkyil
272a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ka la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i gi ngang hUM yig las skyes pa'i lcags kyu dang rdo rje de yongs su gyur pa'i ri gi A ri lar bsam par bya'o/ nag po spyan gsum pa phyag gnyis zhags pa dang lcags kyus lho mo ri gi la 'khyud pa phyag
272a7(rgyud 'grel): drug ? ? pa/ g.yas kyi phyag gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang cing te'u bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi phyag gnyis gyis thod pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams pa/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab la 'khyud pa/ g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis 'jigs byed mnan pa/ re gi'i zhabs kyis shing la
272b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzeg pa bzhin gis pa/ phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa/ thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs pa'o/ /siM seng ge ma ljang gu/ kAM 'dod pa'i 'khril shing ma ser mo/ /aM e ma bde ba ma kha dog dmar mo/ /shaM 'tshe byed mnag mo/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo sngon po la'o/ /de'i grwa bzhir dur khrod
272b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i thod pa bzhi'o/ /g+haM drag mo/ ljing khu ba tAM(rgyud 'grel): rnon po ma ser mo/ /mAM sgyu ma chen mo dmar mo/ /uM uM chud gnag mo/ /gsung gi 'khor lo dmar po la'o/ /grwa bzhir nye ba'i dur khrod rnam par dag pa'i thod pa bzhi'o/ /dze ce spyang ma ljang gu/ /h+rI ma ha ma ser mo/ /rta
272b3(rgyud 'grel): mgrin ma dmar mo/ /kAM glang chen rgyal mtshan ma nag mo/ /sku'i 'khor lo la ste/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su lugs dang mthun pas dgod do/ /'di dag thams cad gcer mo skra gyen du grol ba/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis kyi g.yas na gri gug/ g.yon na thod pa bsnams pa'i
272b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag gis gar byed pa'o/ /rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i hUM yig dang rdo rje las skyes pa'i ye shes sems pa'o/ /de'i snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i hUM yig 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam pas dang/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dzA na tsa kraM dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba su bo Sho me b+ha
272b5(rgyud 'grel): ba/ sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha e hya hi/ b+ha ga ba hi ri'i gi swAha/ dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa 'dis bkug nas h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig gis rab tu bcug ste haM yig gis bcings la/ gaM yig gis mnyes par bya'o/ /mnyes par byas nas/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ zhes pa 'dis spyi bo dang/ mgrin pa dang/ snying
272b6(rgyud 'grel): ga dang/ lte ba dang/ gsang gnas su byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /sbyi bo dang/ mchan khung dag dang/ lte ba dang/ kha dang/ mig dang/ rkang pa'i mthil dang/ gsang gnas su ha hA hi hI hu hU he hai 'dis zhags pa'i phyag rgyas yan lag la dgod par bya'o/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgya zhes pa
272b7(rgyud 'grel): ni mthe chung dag phan tshun lcags kyu'i rnams sa? gung mo gnyis dang mthe bong? ? nas mthe bong gis btsing bar bya'o/ /zhags pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'i sdig mdzub mthe bong gis btsir bar bya'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' i thugs kar gnas bzhir hUM yig lcags kyu'i rnam ba'i 'od zer gyis 
273a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par bskul nas/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta rA ki ni a nu ga tA ma tyaM/ a b+hi She kaM da dan+tu zhes pa 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i ngo bo bdud rtsi lnga'i bum pa lnga rnams kyis gtor bar bya ste/ 'dis
273a2(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams la dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta tha ga ta DA kI nI/ a b+hi She ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes nga rgyal bya'o/ /snying po'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /oM A ra l+li shhya sh+yo(rgyud 'grel): sh+yo(rgyud 'grel): sh+yo(rgyud 'grel): ha ha ha sa sa sa/ u dAn+ta du gdon par nye ba'i snying po gnyis ni ha ha ha hUM hUM hUM
273a3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags ni/ oM A ra l+li ri gi poM poM poM b+hyo swAhA/ oM shaDga ti dza satwa rnaM a kA ro mu khaM/ sarba d+harmmA NaM A dya nutpan+tu twA ta hUM swAhA/ 'di ni gtor ma'i sngags so// //ri gi a ra l+li'i sgrubs rdzogs so// //shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub
273a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ rgya dpe ji lta ba bzhin du bsgyur ba'o// (//dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgrub thabs bzhugs//) //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gi dzA ba la sham+ba ra tan+t+ra rta da ro DI bA nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam
273a5(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor nga mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba mchog gi rgyud kyi don rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan rigs sku ye shes kun gyi bdag nyid rin po che/ /thams cad 'byung gnas gnyen gyur la 'dres las mdzad nyi ma'i
273a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od/ /gnyis med rdo rje 'chang ba las byung brgya rtsa nyi shu brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor las spros grangs med rigs kyi lha rnams rgyal gyur cig /rgyud rgyal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor mkha' 'gro rgyu ma yi/ /dngos po de nyid gsal byed dgongs mdzad rnam ston
273a7(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'dug la/ /mtshon byed rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis legs pa'i don bsdus bcu la gzhung/ /phyi ma rtog bsdus la sogs gsung gi tshogs rnam rgyal gyur cig /dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs 'dzin rjes 'gro rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag /sprul pas don mdzad gsang
273b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgo 'byed 'dzam gling nyi ma rgyal/ /nyid mtshungs dbyer med dgongs pa'i tshogs dgrol sangs rgyas gnyis par grags/ /mgon mchog brgyud pa rnams la phyag 'tshal dgra yi tshogs las rgyal gyur cig /bstan pa'i snying po dri med rgyud rnams kun gyi rtsa ba'i rgyal/ /yan lag lnga
273b2(rgyud 'grel): yi tshul ldan rgya mtsho las byung rin po che/ /tshig zur du ma'i sgron spar chos rtags phyag rgya bzhis bsgrubs te/ /bla ma'i gzhung bzhin 'gro la phan phyir rab tu bshad par bya/ /rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang/ /bskal pa bzang po'i thog mar rab sprul nas/ /snod bcud brtan  
273b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yo dngos po dag bya'i phyir/ /thugs rjes sprul ba'i dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad/ /skal ldan rjes 'jug lha tshogs bzung bya'i phyir/ /sngon 'byung ston pa'i dgongs mdzad rjes mthun par/ /mtshon bya'i rgyud don gsal bar bstan dgongs nas/ /ri rab rtse mor dkyil
273b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnam sprul zhing/ /dang po'i rgyud chen la sogs rim bzhin du/ /dge ba'i rnal 'byor la sogs rim bzhin bshad/ /gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs skal ldan gyis/ /rgyal pa'i thugs kyi dgongs pa rgya mtsho'i bcud/ /rgyas 'bring bsdus pa'i sgo nas dbye
273b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad cing/ /dgongs don so so'i las gzhung mthun pa bzhin/ /legs bsdus mtshon byed tshig gi gzhung bgod de/ /rgyal ba'i dgongs don yun ring gnas pa'i thabs/ /sprul sku nyi mas 'dzam gling gsal mdzad nas/ /sde snod gsum gyis 'dzam gling 'dul ba'i dus/
273b6(rgyud 'grel): blo dman 'phags pa'i lam la bkod byas kyang/ /rang gi de nyid nges don gsal ma mthong/ /ma 'ongs blo mchog grol bar bya ba'i phyir/ /sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mchog /dgongs pa'i dbang gis rmongs la 'dul ba'i tshul/ /dkyil 'khor
273b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul ba'i 'khor lo rab snang mdzad/ /mgon po rnams kyi rjes su bslab bya ste/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor gzhung/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rims kyis bsgrub don gsal/ /gdul bya dag pa'i tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad/ /yun rings
274a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i theg pa gnas bya'i phyir/ /sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sme khrod rgyal po la/ /gsang ba dam pa'i man ngag rab dkrol zhing/ /rnal 'byor don phyir rab tu gdams pa mdzad/ /sprul pa'i sku 'das phyi ma'i dus zhig tshe/ /rgyal ba'i bka' gsang
274a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzam gling gnas su shar/ /rgyal po'i khab tu spyan drangs mchod byas te/ /dga' zhing gus bstod legs bltas brda ma mjal/ /thugs rje'i 'brel shugs gsang sngags 'dzin par grags/ /dam par bzung ste glegs bam gzigs par zhus/ /sgyu 'phrul
274a3(rgyud 'grel): thig le stong pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhung/ /grub thob lhag pa'i lha yis lung bstan mdzad/ /rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung lugs sna tshogs mdza' / /dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag ji bzhin pa/ /mi 'gal legs par bsdus shing rab bkrol te/ /'grel dang bsdus
274a4(rgyud 'grel): don sgrub thabs mang du bstan/ /rgyal ba kun gyis rgyud mang bshad mdzad cing/ /rjes mthun rnam par bshad pas 'di ci dgos/ /dam pa'i gzhung lugs rnam bkod rtogs dka' i don/ /rgya che'i don mang tshig nyung bsdus pa dang/ /cung zhig gsal bar
274a5(rgyud 'grel): byas te dam pa'i gzhung/ /'di la nyes pa'i skyon sogs ci zhig yod/ /snyigs ma lnga dus nyon mongs rlabs 'khrugs pa/ /tshe thung brtson zhan rang gi grub mdza' can/ /las rnams kun la 'jug cing don med pa/ /rjes gzung phyir bkar yi gsang don dgrol//
274a6(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig dgos 'grel yan lag ma tshang ba/ /de ni legs par brtsams pa ma yin te/ /gang zhig bshad pa'i yan lag zur nyams pa/ /des ni rgyud don gsal bar ston mi nus/ /gang zhig lta sgom spyod pa rmongs pa la/ /des ni yang dag bdan don
274a7(rgyud 'grel): mi mthong ste/ /gang zhig lam gnyis sgrub pa'i yan lag bral/ /des ni legs bshad 'bras bu 'grub mi 'gyur/ /brjod bya nam mkha' i mdza' dang mnyam par bzhugs/ /bskal pa bzang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' dpal/ /thabs dang shes rab bde ba
274b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i sku/ /sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde/ /rgyud don ston pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul/ /sku gsum gnyis med rtog pa ngo bor bzhugs/ /brjod pa gzhung tshogs tshig gi tshogs rnams te/ /rtsa rgyud chen po'i don tshogs rnams bsdus pa/ /phyi ma'i phyi ma phyi ma
274b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs kyis/ /gsal bar ston pa'i rtog par bcu bdag nyid/ /rgyud bzhi'i gzhung tshad khri las brgyad stong lhag /bshad rgyud la sogs grangs kyi 'bum sder grags/ /de ltar bstan kyang las su bya ba la/ /dgos med skyes bu 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ /las
274b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsdus bsgrub bya ba gang yang rung/ /bstan bcos la sogs bshad pa'i rgyud dag la/ /ji srid dgos pa'i gtan tshigs ma smras par/ /de srid skyes bu gang zhig 'jug par byed/ /dgos pa bdag gzhan dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing/ /de nyid
274b4(rgyud 'grel): lam zhugs 'jig rten las bsgrub pa'o/ /yang dgos phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ste/ /tshogs gnyis thabs shes las byung 'bras bu'o/ /'brel pa dang po mtshon bya mtshon byed tshul/ /gnyis pa rgyu 'bras thabs dang thabs byung tshul/ /khyad par dgos don rgya mtsho'i 'khrugs
274b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dra la/ /srub thabs yan lag tshang bas bdud rtsi bton/ /rin chen snod bzang legs bcas 'gro la spel/ /nad mang zug rngu rab sel bde la bkod/ /yan lag dpe don nyes pa'i skyon bsal zhing/ /lung dang man ngag gtan tshigs mthun pas sgrub/ /dpe yi 'thad pa gnas
274b6(rgyud 'grel): skabs dbye bas bdun/ /don tshogs bshad pa'i yan lag rnam pa lnga/ /nyes pa'i skyon tshogs rnam pa brgyad du bstan/ /rgyud lung mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i rjes 'gro rnams/ /man ngag sbas pa gsum 'byin brdas dgrol zhing/ /gtan tshigs khyad par tshad mas legs bsgrubs
274b7(rgyud 'grel): to/ /shin tu brtag dga' nor? bu rin chen gzugs/ /yan lag kun gyi sgo nas gtan la dbab/ /de dag rnal 'byor don snad gsal byed pa/ /rnal 'byor tshig gis rnam par dgrol bya ste/ /mu stegs sogs spas gsang pa'i brda don ni/ /sgra tshad rtog ge'i sgo nas shes pa
275a1(rgyud 'grel): min/ /de ltar dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud las kyang/ /gsang sngags rgyud don shin tu rtogs dka' ba/ /bshad rgyud cha mthun sogs kyis bsgrub byas te/ /de nyid brgyud pa'i gdams ngag legs btsal bas/ /nges pa'i klong bskyed thag bcad rtogs par bya/ /de don
275a2(rgyud 'grel): ma 'ongs 'gro ba blo ldan la/ /sgrub thabs bsdus don 'grel sogs 'thad pa yis/ /legs brtsams rnam par bsdu byas nga yi bka' / /yun ring gnas phyir gus par gzung bar gyis/ /zhes pas rtogs dka' bshad gsal 'gal ba gang/ /gzhan yang rjes su 'jug pa
275a3(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba'i phyir/ /tshig gi thigs pas don gyi rgya mtsho gsal/ /de nyid rab tu sbyar pa'i sgra bzhin du/ /rnam par bshad pa 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ /de ni sgo nas 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /tshags med chung ngus chen po'i don 'grub ste/ /nor bu rin chen legs par
275a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i bzhin/ /dang ba'i dad pas rab brtson blang bar gyis/ /bsdus pa'i don ni rnam pa gnyis te/ /mtshon byed mtshon bya rgyud kyi sgo nas so/ /re zhig tshig gi rjes su dpyad bya ste/ /ces pa phyogs gcig bsdus pa'i rgyud 'di la/ /dang po gleng gzhi 'grel tshul gleng
275a5(rgyud 'grel): bslang don/ /mchan gyi sgo nas rgyud don mdor bsdus shing/ /yongs su shes bya'i dngos po 'bring du bstan/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u gsum rnam par bsdus/ /gnyis pa lta ba spyi yi mtshan nyid dang/ /rtogs thabs gtan tshigs spyod lam bzhi yi chos/ /gzhi lam 'bras
275a6(rgyud 'grel): bu kun gyi phan yon te/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bzhi pa bsdus pa yin/ /gsum pa grub pa spyi yi mtshan nyid dang/ /don dang thabs dang khyad par phan yon te/ /thun mong mchog gi dbye ba gnyis su bstan/ /des ni lnga pa'i tshig don bsdus pa'o/ /bzhi pas spyod pa spyi yi mtshan
275a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang/ /gang zag bzhi yi sgo nas bdag gi don/ /gzhan gyi don dang 'bras bu phan yon can/ /rjes 'jug spyod pas lam gyi chos yin la/ /mthar phyin rgyal ba'i mdzad bcas 'bras buAng bstan/ /drug pa'i tshig don rnam par bsdus pa'o/ /lnga pas rdor sems rnam
275b1(rgyud 'grel): snang he ru ka /gar dbang nyi ma rta mchog rol pa yis/ /dbugs dbyung rdub pa bsdus pa'i sgo rnams nas/ /khyad par gleng gzhi sngon byung dgongs mdzad dang/ /rjes 'jug ting 'dzin nyams su blang pa'i thabs/ /rtogs pa drug gi tshig don bsdus te bstan/ /drug pas tshogs
275b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bshad par zhal pa zhes zhing/ /lha yi mtshan nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'khor rjes su 'gro /slob ma'i bya ba phrin las 'bras bu bsdu/ /zhar la rten gyi mtshan nyid dam tshig dbang/ /bcu gsum pa yi tshig don bsdus pa yin/ /bdun pas
275b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan mdor bstan 'dod pa yi/ /phun tshogs dkyil 'khor cho ga 'jug pa'i las/ /dbang bskur rdzas kyi mtshan ma so so'i rgya/ /rjes 'jug zhar la 'phros tshogs bsdus pa yin/ /brgyad pa mchod pa mdor bstan rgyas pa'i lam/ /phyag 'tshal phyag rgya'i
275b4(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas 'chod pa dang/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas mchod pa ste/ /rtog pa kun gyi cho ga'i yan lag yin/ /dgu pa phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa bdun tshogs/ /bsgrub bya'i cho ga kun gyi yan lag yin/ /dang po phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab pa/ /ting 'dzin sgrub pa kun gyi yan lag
275b5(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /gnyis pa dam tshig phyag rgyas brtan bya pa/ /dam tshig ting 'dzin phrin las yan lag yin/ /gsum pa bdag sogs byin gyis brlab pa ste/ /ting 'dzin dam tshig dbang gi yan lag yin/ /bzhi pa sbyor ba bzhi yi sngon 'gro ba/ /lta ba ting 'dzin sgrub pa'i
275b6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag yin/ /lnga pa sbyor ba sna tshogs bya ba ste/ /tshogs dang phrin las spyod pa'i lan lag go /drug pa bzhin gyi 'gyur bas gnas bya ba/ /mchod bstod bsgrub pa phrin las yan lag go /bdun pa so so'i 'dzum pa'i cha lugs rgya/ /mchod bstod spyod pa'i rim pa'i
275b7(rgyud 'grel): yan lag go /brgyad pa so so'i lta stangs 'gyur ba'i spyan/ /sgrub pa phrin las kun gyi yan lag go /dgu pa lce la chos kyi snying po'i tshogs/ /rgyas gdab bzlas brjod cho ga'i yan lag go /bcu pa glu 'gyur skad kyi bye brag ste/ /mchod cing bstod pa'i las kyi bye
276a1(rgyud 'grel): brag go /bcu gcig so so'i las bzhi bya ba dag /mchod bstod phrin las rtsom pa'i yan lag go /bcu gnyis gar thabs sna tshogs las bya ba/ /sgrub pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i yan lag go /bcu gsum rdo rje glu yi bye brag rnams/ /mchod
276a2(rgyud 'grel): cing gsol 'debs bskul ba'i yan lag go /bcu bzhi mchod pa lnga yi rdzas bsham pa/ /tshogs bsag gzugs brnyan bsgrub pa'i yan lag go /bco lnga mgron mnyes bar chang zhi pa'i las/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub tshogs phrin las yan lag go /bcu drug lha
276a3(rgyud 'grel): dang slob ma dbab bskur ba/ /ting 'dzin dbang bskur ba yi yan lag go /bcu bdun dngos grub shis bar bya ba'i las/ /sgrubs tshogs bdag don phrin las yan lag go /bco brgyad yi ge'i mtshan mas mnyes bya ba/ /tshogs bsrung bsgrub pa dbang gi yan lag go /
276a4(rgyud 'grel): bcu dgu rnal 'byor don rtags mtshon pa ste/ /dbang dang dam tshig tshogs sgrub spyod pa yin/ /nyi shu zag? med mngon shes sgrub pa'i thabs/ /sgrub pa phrin las dkyil 'khor mtshan rtags so/ /nyi shu gcig ba sra sre yo ga'i ltas/ /sgrub pa phrin las dbang gi yan
276a5(rgyud 'grel): lag go /nyi shu gnyis pa bdag gzhan bsrung ba'i las/ /sgrub pa'i phrin las rtsom pa'i yan lag go /nyi shu gsum bzhi lnga dang drug pa ni/ /phrin las phyogs gcig dag pa'i yan lag yin/ /nyi shu bdun pa dngos grub las dbang byed/ /tshogs dang sgrub
276a6(rgyud 'grel): mthun gyi yan lag go /rtog pa bcu bzhi pa nas bzhi bcu'i bar/ /rtog pa nyi shu rtsa bdun bsdus pa yin/ /bcu pa bsdus don 'bras bu phan yon de/ /bshad par dam bca' don bzhin bshad pa la/ /sbyor ldan gar phyi phyag rgya dgrol ba dang/ /dkyil 'khor bsgom
276a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don bzhin sgrub pa dang/ /phan yon 'bras bu yon tan mdzad par bcas/ /rang nyid mchod cing phyag rgyas gdab pa'i thabs/ /dgyes shing yi rang mngon par bstod pa ste/ /mdza' ma rtog pa gnyis dag bsdus pa'o/ /'brel tshul gleng gzhi rgyu ste thog mar bstan//
276b1(rgyud 'grel): gleng bslang rkyen te de yi rjes la'o/ /rtogs sla'i don du mdor bsdus 'bring du byas/ /rgyud don ston pa gnyis med brjod bya'i tshul/ /lta ba phan yon shes bya gzhi yi chos/ /lnga pa'i khyad par gleng gzhi dag dang 'brel/ /de yi don bzhin sgrub pas gsum pa ste/ /de dang rjes mthun spyod
276b2(rgyud 'grel): pas bzhi pa'o/ /dgongs mdzad dang mthun rjes su dpyad dgos pas/ /ting nge 'dzin par lnga pa byung ba yin/ /sngon 'gro tshogs dbang dam tshig brten pas drug /de yang gzugs brnyan la brten bdun pa'o/ /kun gyi yan lag mchod pa'i las yin brgyad/ /phyag rgya nyi shu bdun gyi la
276b3(rgyud 'grel): skongs dgu/ /de ltar lam la spyod pa byas pa'i mthus/ /mthar phyin 'bras bu la sogs bcu pas bstan/ /mtshon bya don gyi 'brel tshul rnam pa gnyis/ /bdag don sgrub dang gzhan don spyod pa'o/ /gang zhig sngon 'gro phun sum tshogs ldan pas/ /shes bya dngos dngos gnas
276b4(rgyud 'grel): lha shes byas ma/? gnas mchog phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan par/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor dbang dang dam tshig dang/ /ting 'dzin phrin las spyod pa'i bye brag dang/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i rim pa dag /bdag gzhan don gyi dbye ba'i rnam grangs kyis/ /rim pa gnyis su
276b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar? zhing ?? ?/ /lam gnyis nyams su blangs shing goms byas pa/ /'bras bu mdzad bcas yon tan snang ba yin/ /khyung chen mkha' lding spyi rgya rlabs kyis bcad/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po mi 'khor don la 'bebs/ /seng+ge mchod pas snor mtshams 'phen sdud shes/ /rus
276b6(rgyud 'grel): sbal ? 'gro ba yan lag 'bru la dbab/ /rna bu brag gnas ma mtshim 'tsham par bstan/ /bya lag gzan snyog gces ka dgongs pa 'dzin/ /rin chen sgon nas tshig zur du ma spar/ /dpe don mthun pas le mtshams gtan la dbab/ /zab dang rgya chen don gyi bye bye brag la/ /thun mong
276b7(rgyud 'grel): khyad par mtshan nyid gsang sngags /dman pa dbyibs tshogs gsang sngags don gyi gzhung/ /mthar thug chos kyi don du shes par bya/ /nyes pa'i skyon tshogs zhar? la bshad pa ste/ /rgyud lung mi 'gal mthun gsal nges shes bskyed/ /man ngag tshig don yi ge sbas pa
277a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byin/ /gtan tshigs brgal lam sgro 'dogs gcod par byed// //de la spyir theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi rgyud mdza' dag bsdu na/ /mtshon bya don dang/ mtshon byed tshig go /dang po ni rgyud dang thabs dang/ 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid
277a2(rgyud 'grel): can no/ /de dag kyang 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa dang/ zag pa med pa'i smin pa dang/ grol ba'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i lam la spyod pa dang/ bdag gzhan la snang ba'i sku dang ye shes yon tan mdzad pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gnyis
277a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshig ni bya ba'i rgyud dang/ /spyod pa'i rgyud dang/ rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud do/ /de la bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gsum gyis phye ste/ dang po rgyud kyi rnam grangs bco brgyad du gsungs pa las/ 'di nyid sku'i rgyud thams cad kyi gzhi dang
277a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa bar gyur pa ste de dag gi mtshan nyid dang dbye ba rgyas par ni dpal phreng ba dam pa'i 'grel par bstan pas 'dir spro bar mi bya'o// //da ni rgyud kyi don la 'jug par bya ste/ mtshon bya'i don ji lta ba bzhin mtshon pa'i sgo nas rnam par bshad pa
277a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /dang por phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu ma tshogs na gzhi med de ston pa la sogs pa gleng gzhi'i don bstan pa'i phyir gsungs te/ sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad
277a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs zhes so/ /gzhan dag na re/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu dag ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas khyed rnams kyis dam pa'i chos bsdu bar bya ste/ bka' thams cad kyi dang por 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na
277a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa la sogs pa'i gleng gzhi rgyas pa dang/ zhabs su yi rang zhing bstod pa thogs shig ces gsungs pa la/ /'dir bsdus pa po gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje ma smos pa ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rgyu ni gnyis te/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dgongs mdzad rgya
277b1(rgyud 'grel): cher slob pa'i rim pa rtsa ba'i rgyud rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis par rgyas par gsungs pa dang/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i rang bzhin du rtag tu bzhugs te/ bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs zhes pa dang/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi zhes
277b2(rgyud 'grel): pas gsal lo/ /des na rgyud gzhan las ni gleng gzhi dang brjod bya so so bstan la/ 'dir ni gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas rigs drug gi mtshan gyi don gyis gleng gzhi bstan te de nyid ni brjod bya'i don du gnas so/ /'o na yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos por
277b3(rgyud 'grel): khyad par med pas logs su bzhag mi dgos so zhe na de ltar yin yang gzhan yang cha 'thun pa'am/ thog mar rgyu bkod pa'i tshul gyis rgyud bsdus pa'o/ /de la lung gzhan dang sgo mthun pa'i tshul du ni/ /ston pa dang/ gnas dang/ 'khor dang/ sdud pa dang/ dus so//
277b4(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje dang pad+ma dang rin po che dang rgya gram kun gyi bdag nyid dam pa thams cad kyis 'byung
277b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig rgya chen pos ston pa'i rang bzhin gyi de kho na nyid dang/ mtshan nyid kyi tshogs dang/ yon tan gyi snang ba dang/ phrin las rgya chen po'i sgo nas gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa dang/ 'phrul pa'i zhing khams dang/ bshad pa'i
277b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang/ de nyid las mi gzhan par 'phrul pa dang/ tha dang rang rgyud pa'i 'khor phal po che dang/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sdud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs dang/ gsung gi sdud pa po byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang/ 'phrul pa dang
277b7(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i dus rnam pa gnyis kyis mtshan nyid rgya cher bstan to/ /rtog pa bdun las kyang/ gzhung gzhan mi 'gal bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /ston pa gnas dang 'khor tshogs dang/ /sdud pa dus kyi bye brag gis/ /thun mong gleng gzhi rnam par bstan zhes so// //gsang
278a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags khyad par gyi don du sangs rgyas drug gi mtshan gyi sgo nas phun sum tshogs pa'i don ston te/ rtog pa bsdus pa las/ sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun dngos ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas phyir rnam par mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po/ /ye
278a2(rgyud 'grel): shes rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyir/ /gsang ba khrag 'thung zhes bya ste/ /phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i lha/ /mchog ni pad+ma 'dzin rgyal po/ /dam tshig dam pa shes ldan byed/ /dgyes pa nyi ma dam pa ste/ /sbyin pa la sogs mchog 'grub 'gyur/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu
278a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /rdo rje rta mchog las nyid bdag /ces pa dang/ rtog pa bdun pa las kyang/ sangs rgyas drug gi mtshan gyis ni/ /khyad par gleng gzhi'i don gsal byed ces so/ /de yang rnam par snang zhing ye shes gsal ba'i bdag nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i sems
278a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mdzad pa khyad par gyi las kyis phun sum tshogs pa gnyis mnga' bas sangs rgyas kun gyis dngos nyid do/ /de nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi bye brag ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ bde ba chen po'i sku mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ste/ don rtags gnyis kyi sgo nas rdo rje sems
278a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ni bde ba'i mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /yi ge gsum gyis rnam thar gyi sgo gsum ston cing/ de mtshon par byed pa ni b+ha ga gru gsum pa gsang ba'i dbyibs so/ /de nyid chags pa'i mdza' thams cad dang bral zhing/ chags pa chen po'i bdag nyid rtog pa'i dri ma
278a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bral zhing dag par byed pas na mchog tu gyur pa ste/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi rang bzhin no/ /bde ba byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid dgyes pa'i longs spyod thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas su gyur pa yon tan gyi bkod pa ste nyi ma'o/ /rta mchog ni phrin las kun gyi
278a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid de/ 'khor thams cad dang/ sdud pa po'i bdag nyid dang/ dus kun tu rang gi mtshan nyid dang/ gdul bya'i don du rtag tu bzhugs pa'o/ /gsang sngags kyi g.yo pa'i rten dang/ gsang ba'i brten pa gnyis su med par gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i rang
278b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin te sems dpa' o/ /de nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin rlung lnga'i dngos por gzhan gyis mi shigs pa'i las mdzad pas rdo rje lta bur gnas shing/ rang gi de kho na nyid nyams su myong ba'i sems dpa' chen po bde pa'i ngos rgyas pas/ de ni zag pa med pa'i lam ste mchog tu
278b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'o/ /gsang ba'i don sngags gsum gyi rnam pa 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i sgo nas 'phro 'dus las mdzad de/ mchog tu gyur pa'i rtsa gsum dgang zhing bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dgyes pas na chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid du rtag tu bzhugs so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun
278b3(rgyud 'grel): pa las/ /gnyis med ye shes sems dpa' che/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag g.yo ba lnga/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen rgyal/ /zag pa med pa'i lam mchog gnas/ /gsang ba sngags gsum 'byung 'jug gnas/ /mchog gyur rtsa gsum bde chen dgyes/ /kun gyi bdag nyid de bzhin
278b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /chos rnams thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dbyibs kyi sgo nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i mtshon bya sems dpa' i rang bzhin de nyid/ 'byung lnga 'khor lo'i rnam par sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos por zhugs te/ rdo rje sems dpa' i
278b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i yi ge'i rnam pa dang/ bde ba chen po gnyis su med pa'i mchog tha dang med cing/ gsang ba'i gnas rdo rje dbyings ma'i phyag rgya dang/ rin po che 'bar ba ka ta sbyar bas rlung dang me'i rkyen gyis bde ba'i mchog gi bskul te skad cig ma bzhi las dga' ba bcu
278b6(rgyud 'grel): drug tu 'phel bas dgyes shing tshim nas/ chos thams cad snang stong gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo la bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab ste/ sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas bdag nyid du rtag tu bzhugs so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ gnyis med sems dpa' 
278b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mchog/ 'byung khams 'khor lo'i rnam par gnas/ /yi ge gnyis med bde chen mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin nyid/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya rab sbyor nas/ /bde mchog rkyen gyis bskul bya ste/ /dga' bzhi bcu drug gnas spro zhing/ /thams cad
279a1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po'i sku/ /zhes so/ /chos kyi tshul du sems dpa' rang byung gi ye shes chen po rtog pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba de nyid ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos nyid do/ /de yang yul dang yul can gnyis su med pa'i tshul du bde ba chen po'i skur
279a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs shing/ /zag pa med pa'i ye shes las grub pas 'bral ba med do/ /chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid sku nyams su bstan pa'o/ /de'i don dngos po kun la gnas kyang rtog pa'i dri mas bsgrib cing rang gsad du gnas la/ /mtshan nyid kyi theg pas
279a3(rgyud 'grel): dka' ba spyad kyang ma rtogs pas snang ba shin tu lkog tu gyur pa lta bur gnas so/ /de la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi lam pa dag ni sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i 'bras bu mchog dang ldan zhing/ bde ba chen po'i ros dgyes te chos thams cad
279a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag nyid du rtag tu bzhugs pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /snang ba nyid na stong pa'i dngos/ de nyid bde ba chen po yis/ /de nyid sems dpa' sangs rgyas dngos/ /de nyid chos rnams kun gyi dbyings/ /bde chen rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /snang khyab
279a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba'i tshul du bzhugs zhes so/ /de dag ni brjod bya'i don dang de 'byung ba'i rgyu gnyi ga yin te/ gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa'o// //gzhan yang rkyen med par ni rgyu tshogs pas kyang mi 'byung ste/ /'bri ka ta'i me tog gi 'bras bu bzhin no/ /de
279a6(rgyud 'grel): nas sangs rgyas gnyis kyi mtshan gyi sgo nas gleng bslad ba'i don le'u gnyis pa bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ gcig pu rab tu tsha ba'i lha zhes pa ste/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i phyi nang gi dngos po dag las rang gi de kho na
279a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid don dam pa dang/ kun rdzob kyi chos grag cing/ rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang rang gi de kho na nyid don dam pa dang/ kun rdzob kyi chos ston to/ /de'i phyir gsungs te/ de nas sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang
279b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i byin brlabs las/ 'od zer gyi snang bas stong gsum la sogs pa gnas gsal bar byas te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs rnams bskul zhing/ rgyud yongs su dag pa'i 'gro ba thams cad bsdus nas/ de dag mdun du dkyil
279b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi rim pa sna tshogs sprul zhing 'khod pa las/ nyid kyi mthus 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i brtan g.yo dang/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang sprul pa'i tshogs rnams kyis dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba
279b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi don/ /bden pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid ston te/ gzugs kyi 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang/ sgra'i 'phrul pa sna tshogs snang ba mdzad do/ /de'i tshe 'khor gyi tshogs rnams rtogs pa skyes te/ sna tshogs rab tu bkod pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs dang/
279b4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rnam par sgyur ba'i bstod pas gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor mnyes par mdzad nas lan mang du bskor bas 'dud cing phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yang dang yang du gsol ba btab
279b5(rgyud 'grel): cing gleng bslang ngo zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig don rgya cher gsungs so/ /tshig gi don ni 'di ni nye pa mngon sum pa'i tshig ste snang srid kyi dngos po'i snang ba dag go/ /de nyid dbyings skye ba med pa stong pa nyid las rang byung ste yon tan gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung ba chen po lnga dang
279b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba lnga dang phung po lnga la sogs pa so so'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa dang spyi'i rnam pa'i sgo nas mi mthun pa'i mtshan rtog gnas su dag pa'i bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas drug gi spyod yul du snang ba'o/ /de nyid gsal bar byed pa'i rang byung gi ye shes chen po gnyis can
279b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i snang stong zung du 'jug pa'i tshul bde ba chen po'i sku gcig pu ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid de dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa'o/ /de las rnam par 'phrul pa'i thugs rje chen po rab tu che ba'i lha dag ni so so rigs kyi/
280a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mdzad pa'i tshul du phun sum tshogs par bzhugs so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /'di dang stong nyid rang byung ba/ /snang srid chos rnams bcom ldan 'das/ gnyis med ye shes gcig pu las/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs che ba'i lha/ /byin
280a2(rgyud 'grel): rlabs sprul pa'i sgra yis ni/ /rgyud don re nyid gleng slong mdzad/ /ces so/ /des ni zab pa dang rgya che ba'i don phyogs gcig tu bstan to/ /khyad par gyi dbang du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs
280a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'phrul pa po ste/ 'di ni rang byung gi ye shes chen po'i snang ba las grub pas bdud bzhi bcom zhing dbang phyug brgyad dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das chen po gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid gcig pu'i ngo bor gnas shing yon tan gyi rnam pas rab tu phye ba'i lhar
280a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku/ /kun bdag rang nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /gnyis med ye shes gcig pu'i dngos/ /rnam 'phrul rab tu che ba'i lha zhes so/ /sngags dang dbyibs kyi sgo nas rnam par rgyal ba'i rlung zhub de
280a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang bcas pa 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das te rlung rnam pa bcu dang rtsa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas kyi rtog pa 'joms shing rang bzhin bde ba chen po gcig pu'i ngo bor bzhugs pas rab tu che ba'i lha'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ sngags tshogs dbyings
280a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag rgya yis/ /'byung 'jug gnas pa'i byang chub sems/ /gnyis med rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /bde chen rab tu che ba'i lha/ /zhes pa dang/ yang dngos po de nyid la brten te/ dkyil 'khor rab sprul sgyu ma'i tshogs/ /sngags dang dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid kyis//
280a7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi de nyid rab ston phyir/ /don de nyid kyi sgo nas ni/ /don de nyid ni gsal bar byed/ /brda yis gleng slong rkyen du mdzad ces so/ /de dag ni gleng bslang ba'i don mdor bstan pa'i bshad pa'o/ /de ltar rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las byung ba ni mtshon byed rgyud do/ /des bsgrub
280b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba ni gzhi dang lam gyi chos te de las byung ba ni sku drug lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /de'i phyir mtshon cha mdza' dag ni 'bras bu'i tshul du gnas skabs kyis gnas so/ /des na rgyud dang ston pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po mdor bstan
280b2(rgyud 'grel): cing/ rtog pa gsum pa'i don bsdu ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces te/ de ltar tshig drug po des ni 'og gi gzhung rnam par bsdus pa'o/ /de da phyogs bcur gnas shing dus gsum gyis bsdus pa'i rang
280b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyi sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ chos can dang chos nyid gnyis su med pa'i dang du mnyam par sbyor la/ rtogs pa'i rgyal pa rnams ni phun sum tshogs pa kun gyi bdag nyid de/ ye shes chen pos chos nyid las gnas shing thugs rje chen pos sems can gyi
280b4(rgyud 'grel): don la mnyam par sbyor ro/ /mkha' 'gro rnam pa lnga'i sgo nas rang rang gi de nyid las gnas shing/ sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis gdul bya'i don dang mthun par sprul cing/ theg pa'i rim pa tha dad pa'i sgo nas/ sems can gyi khams dag theg pa thun mong gi lam
280b5(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang/ khyad par gyi lam gnyis kyis nges par legs pa'i bde ba mchog /sku dang ye shes yon tan mdzad pa dang bcas pa'i gnas la 'jog par mdzad pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje 'dzin mchog bde chen sku//
280b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i chos rnams ma lus dang/ /thams cad sku gsum mnyam sbyor zhing/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /sna tshogs sku gsung thugs kyi las/ /rnam 'phrul bstan pas 'dul mdzad de/ /bde chen 'bras bur bcas pa'i lam /zhes so// khyad par
280b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbang du sangs rgyas kyi sgo nas mtshan med kyi ting nge a' dzin dang/ thams cad kyi sgo nas mtshan bcas dang 'phrin las dang chos 'khor dang/ mnyam sbyor gyi sgo nas sgrub pa la sogs pa ndang/ mkha' 'gro'i sgo nas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ sgyu ma'i? ?
281a1(rgyud 'grel): nas lta ba dang/ spyod pa dang/ bde mchog gi sgo nas dbang bstan to/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rtog pa sum cu rtsa bzhi pa las/ sangs rgyas la sogs mtshan gyis grangs/ /tshig drug rnam par bstan pa gang/ /gzhir gyur ji ltar gnas pa dang//
281a2(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshogs dang/ /'bras bu mdzad bcas bsdus pa ste/ /mtshon bya'i de nyid gcig pa las/ /khyad par sgra yi tshig lam gyis/ /brda don nges pa'i gtan tshigs bstan ces so/ /sngags kyi tshul gyis srog dang rtsol ba gnyis su med cing rtog pa'i
281a3(rgyud 'grel): dri ma dag pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid rtsol ba lnga nas nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i bar du spro zhing/ gnas bcu nas bye ba bzhi 'bum du bsdus te/ dngos po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la mnyam par sbyor nas nyams su myong ba'i khyad par gyis/ srog rtsol sngags
281a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnam pas mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i rang bzhin a ba d+hU tIr zhugs te/ bde ba chen po'i ye shes zag pa med pa'i mchog tu gnas so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ srog rtsol gnyis med sangs rgyas sku/ /dri med 'khor bcas gnas sbyor zhing/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i
281a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'phrul gyis/ /bde chen a ba d+hU tIr zhugs/ /zag pa med pa'i ye shes mchog /chos kun de las gzhan ma yin zhes so/ /dbyibs kyi tshul gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i byang sems 'khor lo'i gnas la bzhugs pa'i snang ba las/ 'khor lo'i 'dab
281a6(rgyud 'grel): ma dang ye shes thams cad du bskor zhing/ thabs dang shes rab me rlung sgrub pa'i rkyen gyis mnyam sbyor te/ kun rdzob byang chub sems 'bebs pa dang/ gzung ba dang/ slar gyen du bzlog pas/ dga' ba'i rim pa 'khor lo'i gnas su skye ste/ lugs su 'byung ba
281a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lugs las bzlog pa'i rnam pas mkha' 'gro'i tshul du zag pa med pa'i byang sems sgyu ma bde mchog tu gnas pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ bde chen lhan skyes 'khor lo'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun tu 'khor lo'i tshul/ /thabs shes sbyor ba'i
281b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems/ /'gyur bzlog zag med bde cho ga sku/ /chos kyi tshul gyis rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /gnyis med ye shes sangs rgyas che/ /dngos sogs thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul gyis/ /chos rnams bde ba chen po'i dbyings zhes so/ /des ni rgyud kyi
281b2(rgyud 'grel): don mdor bstan pa'o/ /de dag ni dpe bdun dang yan lag lnga la sogs pas thun mong du bstan to// //da ni yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po 'bring du bstan te/ de yang dang po gcig pu'i sgo nas ye shes kyi de kho na nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ chags med chags dang bral ba
281b3(rgyud 'grel): min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/ /zhes la sngags kyi dbang du srog dang rtsol ba'i rnam pas 'byung gi rim pa la spro bsdu'i chags pa dang/ de rnam par spangs pa'i dga' bde dang/ /mdza' thams cad spangs pa'i dbu ma dag gang gi yang rnam par mi dmigs te/ de
281b4(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid gsum gyi sgo nas rab tu sbyangs nas bde ba chen po'i de bzhin blta bar bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i rim pa la/ /chags pa chags bral dbu ma dag /kun spyod mdza' las rnam grol ba/ /bde ba chen po blta bar bya zhes so//
281b5(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi sgo nas lhan cig skyes pa'i chu rgyun rang gi gnas su bsdam pa dang/ gzhan gyi gnas su gtong ba dang/ shas cig bzung zhing shas chig gtong ba'i rnam par mi dmigs te/ rdo rje dbyings ma dang rin po che 'bar ba ka ta'i mtshams su de kho na nyid kyi ye shes bltas nas
281b6(rgyud 'grel): ma zin pa zin pa la sogs pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gsal ba dang/ slar gyen du drangs te/ lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas la bzhag par bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ bde ba'i byang chub sems tshogs rgyun/ /chags pa chags bral dbu ma dngos/ /zhen
281b7(rgyud 'grel): chags mdza' las 'das pa yis/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i snyoms 'jug gnas zhes so/ /chos su/ dbang po'i snang ba rab 'bring gsum gyi rnam pa mdza' dag gang la yang/ so so'i skye bo'i rtog pa dang/ nyan thos kyi rtog pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i rtog pa gang
282a1(rgyud 'grel): yang mi dmigs te chags pa gnyis dang bral pa'i tshul gyis chags pa gnyis la longs spyod pa'o/ /de'i dus na chos thams cad dang? byung gi ye shes chen po'i snang ba la dngos po dang blo'i chos su med de/ snang ba'i chos thabs ni rang gi rang bzhin dang/ ngo bo'i
282a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis stong pa nyid du gnas la de la bde ba chen po'i rgyas thebs pas zag pa med pa'i sku cir yang snang zhing srid pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ chags dang chags bral tshul spyod cing/ /dbu ma'i rtog pas 'ching 'gyur te/ /gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i
282a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /snang ba nyid na stong pa'i dbyings/ /stong pa nyid na snang ba yin/ /dbang gi drug gi yul la rol/ /chos rnams mngon sum bde chen po/ /gzugs sogs rab 'bring tha ma med/ /snang stong bde ba'i rgyas btab pas/ /dmigs pa kun las rnam par grol zhes so
282a4(rgyud 'grel): da ni dmigs pa'i yul de nyid kyi sgo nas 'di ni rang byung zhes pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgyu/ /'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog ces so/ /sngags kyi tshul du srog dang rtsol ba dag ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i tshul du gnas la/ /
282a5(rgyud 'grel): de las ni dngos po'i 'phrul pa thams cad snang bas bud med lta bu'o/ /des thams cad kyi don mtshon zhing mtshan bar byed pas na sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ste/ 'di ni gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa gnyis can dang bral zhing theg pa mchog tu gnas pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las
282a6(rgyud 'grel): srog rtsol gnyis med las byung ba'i/ /dngos kun de bzhin nyid kyi dbyibs/ /bud med sgyu ma'i phyag rgya mchog /'di ni theg pa'i rnam grol chos/ /zhes so/ /dbyibs kyi tshul du las kyi phyag rgya las byung zhing/ dngos po'i de kho na nyid ston par mdzad pas sgyu ma'i phyag
282a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya ste/ 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i don gsal bar byed pas phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin theg pa'i mchog go /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ bud med sgyu ma'i phyag rgya yis/ /dga' bde sgyu ma 'joms par byed/ /chos kyi phyag rgya goms pa'i mthus/ /phyag rgya chen po
282b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar 'gyur zhes so/ /chos kyi dbang du yum kun tu bzang mo phyag rgya chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid la bde ba'i phyag rgyas rol pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid la gnas so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ gzugs sogs chos rnams
282b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med pa/ /bud med kun gyi phyag rgya yin/ /zhes so/ /de dag ni lta ba'i mtshan nyid chos thams cad ji ltar gnas shing/ de rnal 'byor pas rtogs par bya ba'i thabs te/ zab pa'i sgo nas rnam par phye bas rgya che ba'i tshogs kyis ni ma yin no/ /'dis ni le'u gnyis
282b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stod lta ba rnam par bsdus pa ste/ khyud chen ldings pa'i dpes? bstan to/ /da ni sgyu ma'i sgo nas spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir/ /sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas/ /bud med sgyu ma khyad par rje/ /ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis/ /rang bzhin gyis ni des grub pa'o/ /zhes pas ni lta spyod zung du 'brel ba'i gtan ni?? te
282b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas gzhi'i mtshan nyid ni dngos rtogs kyi sangs rgyas gnyis las gyis kyang sgyu ma'i khongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /de la chos thams cad gtan la dbab par byed pa ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma dang/ de'i rjes su dpag pa'o/ /de yang mngon sum ni gsal bar snang pa/ rjes su drang?
282b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni lkog tu gyur pa ste yid dpyod kyi shes pa'o/ /'dir sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad dag ni mngon sum du snang la/ de'i rjes su gcig dang du bral dang/ mu bzhi skye 'gog la sogs pas gzhal nas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin med par 'dod pa ni mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'i gzhung yin
282b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ des ni chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bde ba chen po'i sku sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid can rtogs shing mthong par mi 'gyur bas nges pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni nam kyang bgrod pa ma yin no/ /'dir ni gsang ba'i theg pa 'di'i gzhung gis mngon sum gyis mtshon byed gzhan las?
282b7(rgyud 'grel): khyad par du gyur pa grol lam thabs kyi sgo nas dang/ chags lam shes rab kyi sgo nas dang/ gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sgo nas bud med sgyu ma'i dga' ba nyams su myongs pas/ bde ba chen po'i ngos rgyas pa ni khyad bar che ste/ de nyid rgyu rgyan 'bras bu'i tshul
283a1(rgyud 'grel): du ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dang/ rang bzhin gyis de ltar grub pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rang gi rang bzhin rtogs dka' ba/ /grol chags gnyis med phyag rgya che/ /bud med gsum la rten pa'i mthus/ /mngon sum bde ba nyams su myong/ /de don lta ba'i yul dam
283a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /ting 'dzin spyod pa'i bya ba'ang de/ /bsgrub cing 'bras bu sgyu ma'i tshul/ /de nyid nges pa'i sangs rgyas sku/ /zhes so/ /de'i 'bras bu'i tshul ni/ 'jig rten gsum 'dir bud med 'dis/ /gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur/ /zhes te/ 'jig rten 'dir yang yon tan thams cad
283a3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub cing/ /gzhan du che ba'i yon tan gyi rnam grangs bdag nyid chen po gus par byed pa'o/ /gang zag rnam pa bzhi'i gnas skabs kyi bye brag gis rgya chen po'i spyod pa dang/ mchog tu gyur pa'i tshul dang/ 'bring dang dman pa'i las zab mor ston pa dang shin
283a4(rgyud 'grel): tu yang zab mo'i tshul du gnas pa/ dbang po yul la dga' bar longs spyod pa'i phyir/ rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis/ /ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes te/ gang zag las dang po pas ni rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya gang rnyed pa btsal zhing
283a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor thabs drug cu rtsa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug par bya'o/ /ye shes la cung zhig dbang bas ni bde ba'i ye shes ma skyes kyi bar du snyoms 'jug la gnas shing de nyid gzung bar bya'o/ /ye shes la yang dag par dbang bas ni rang nyid kyi phyag rgya mthong zhing
283a6(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i sems skyes pa tsam gyi bde ba chen po'i skur gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /shin tu rnam par grol ba'i gang zag gis ni dbang po drug gi yul kun gyis zag pa med pa'i lam du 'gyur ro/ /de nas lta ba gnyis med kyi don bsgoms pas nyams su blang zhing
283a7(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gnyis kyi grogs su ni spyod pa bya ste/ bza' ba dang btung ba dang bgo ba dang gnas ma la dang/ las su bya ba'i 'jig rten na smod cing ngan pa'i las dag spyod pas 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /gang zag bzhi yi bye brag gis/ /rnyed
283b1(rgyud 'grel): rang bde bar dga' kun spyod/ /rgya chen mchog gyur 'bring dman pa/ /zab mo shin tu zab mo'i tshul/ /dpe yi lhan skyes bde ba yis/ /bde chen lhan cig skyes bde rgyas/ /de phyir spyod pa las gnas pas/ /yang dag ye shes rnyed par 'gyur zhes so/ /'o na 'ching bar byed pa nyid kyis
283b2(rgyud 'grel): grol lam zhe na/ rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur nas/ bud med kun gyi sgyu mas 'grub/ /ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes brdar bstan to zhes te/ khyad par gyi don du stong pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pas tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzlog ste/ rang gi ngo
283b3(rgyud 'grel): bo yongs su bsgyur nas lha'i sku gsung thugs bud med nyi shu'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i sgyu mas 'grub pa'o/ /des na ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di nyid mkha' 'gro'i brda'o/ /zab mo'i dbang du bzang tog gi rnam pa de nyid kyang rang gi ngo bor bsgyur te/ bud med gsum gyi
283b4(rgyud 'grel): sgyu mas 'grub pas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /des na ngo mtshar sgyu ma zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ skyes bu drug gis zin pa las/ /dug gis de nyid shes pas grol zhes so/ /'di ni lta spyod zung du
283b5(rgyud 'grel): 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid las shas cher spyod la bstan pas/ le'u bzhi pa rnam par bsdus te rna bu brag la gnas pa'i dpes bstan to/ /da ni mkha' 'gro'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ DA ki ni nam mkhar 'gro ma zhes/ khams las mngon
283b6(rgyud 'grel): du brtags pa ste/ nam mkha' kun tu spyod grub pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags zhes te/ kun tu 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can gyi rgya che ba'i sgo gnyis nas thugs rje chen po'i mdzad spyod rnam pa mdza' yas pas gdul bya'i don bya ba'i phyir/ sku gsum gnyis su med
283b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid las rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston cing/ ye shes kyi 'khor los 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa dang/ phyis 'jug pa po rnams rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i rim pa dang/ gzugs brnyan gyi
284a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dag ni mkha' 'gro nam mkhar 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid can dag gzugs brnyan las bsgrub cing gsal bar bya ste phyi nang gi 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i dngos po dag ni rigs kyi dkyil 'khor drug gi bdag nyid
284a2(rgyud 'grel): du gnas shing khyad de las khyad par gyi las rtson pa'i don du rdul tshon dang/ rten dang yum gyi phyag rgyas mngon du brtags te nam mkha' spyod pa'i las mdza' dag 'grub par byed do/ /des na sna tshogs su 'grub pas mkha' 'gro ma zhes grags so/ /de yang rtsa
284a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyud las/ kun tu 'gro pas rab tu gnas/ /sngon byung dkyil 'khor rtogs dka' ba/ /gsal mdzad rjes su bya ba'i tshogs/ /gzugs brnyan phyi nang 'byung tshogs las/ /nye bar mtshon byed dkyil 'khor gsum/ /mkha' 'gro'i brda yis rab tu
284a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad ces gsungs so/ /zab pa'i sgo nas ye shes chen pos chos nyid kyi ngang du 'gro bar byed de/ thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i bud med gsum gyi khams las mngon du brtags pas/ thabs kyi sgo nas dang/ shes rab kyi sgo
284a5(rgyud 'grel): nas dang/ gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas dang/ gnyis su med pa'i sgyu ma bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bu la kun tu spyod pas 'grub ste/ mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags so/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mkha' 'gro ma yi brda yis ni//
284a6(rgyud 'grel): zab mo'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'byed/ /ces pa dang/ rtog pa bdun pa las kyang/ thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa'i/ /bud med gsum gyi khams las ni/ /gnyis med sgyu ma bde chen po/ /nam mkha' lta bur gnas 'gyur te
284a7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma yi phyag rgya yis/ /gzugs brnyan la rten ye shes gsal/ /zhes so/ /de ltar zab pa dang rgya che ba'i sgo nas bstan pa dag 'jug bsdu ba'i phyir/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yis/ /thams cad ma lus bde mchog gi /sangs rgyas
284b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags shes te/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ma lus pa dag /phyag rgya gnyis kyi bdag nyid du snang ba la de dag thams cad ma lus pa yang/ gnyis su med pa bde ba chen po'i sku'i rnam
284b2(rgyud 'grel): pa can no/ /de'i dus na blos btags pa'i mtshan ma dang/ dngos po'i chos thams cad gnyis su med pa sgyu ma'i gzugs can te/ de la ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma zhes brdar grags te/ 'di nyid kyi le'u dgu pa las kyang//
284b3(rgyud 'grel): Di zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma'i khams gsum 'dir ni rnam par brtag /nam mkha' 'gro ba'i phyag rgya dag /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /kun tu sna tshogs phyag rgya ni/ /thams cad nam mkhar 'gro ba ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma
284b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes rab tu grags/ /sgyu ma'i gar dbang grub pa ni/ /a ra li zhes rab tu grags/ /mkha' 'gro ma yang a ra li/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o zhes so/ /ci ste na med pa cig gzugs brnyan gyis thob par byed dam zhes na/ de ni nam mkhar 'gro ma zhes/ /sangs rgyas
284b5(rgyud 'grel): khams las rnam par brtags/ /kun tu 'gro bar grub pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag mkha' 'gro ma'o zhes te/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo bde mchog sgyu ma'i lta bu las/ 'gro ba rang rang gi rtog pas bsgribs te gnyis can gyi chos sna tshogs
284b6(rgyud 'grel): la spyod kyang/ de kho na'i rang bzhin la g.yo zhing bslab pa med de rang gi mtshan nyid la gnas pa'o/ /de yang gnas skabs kyi bye brag gis ye nas lhun gyis grub cing gnas pa ni rgyu/ de la dmigs shing spyod pa ni/ gsal bar nyams su myong ba ni 'bras bu ste
284b7(rgyud 'grel): yul dang yul can dbyer med pa'i rnam pas rtag tu gnas pa'i chos kyi sku'o/ /de las kun tu 'gro ba ni gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis so/ /de dag bde ba chen po'i sgyu ma'i rnam par grub pa ni mthar phyin pa'i sku zhes bya'o/ /des ni sangs rgyas kun bdag mkha' 'gro ma
285a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de gsal bar ston pas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /thams cad sku dang ye shes snang/ de nyid rang bzhin ngo bos gsang/ /sangs rgyas khams las rnam brtags te/ /kun tu 'gro ba grub pa'i tshul/ /gzugs brnyan
285a2(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis nyams myong ba/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /zhes so/ /'dis ni dkyil 'khor kun gyi mtshan nyid las khyad par du gzugs brnyan gyi rim pa ste/ le'u bdun pa'i phyogs gcig bsdus pas ngang pa'i rgyal po 'phur ba'i dpes bstan to/ /da ni bde
285a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgo nas/ dbang bstan pa'i phyir/ sham zhes bya ba bde bar bshad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog yin/ /sgyu ma thams cad rab sbyor ba/ /mchog tu bde bas bde ba'i mchog /ces te/ sham+ba ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pas gtan tshigs tshangs pa'i sgra sbyar ba bzhin du/
285a4(rgyud 'grel): sgo gsum gyi dri ma 'khru zhing bde ba bskyed de nus pa khyad par can bskyed cing skad cig ma'i rnam pas rgyud yongs su smin nas grol ba'i lam la sbyor zhing/ rten khyad par can du 'gyur te/ yon tan dang phrin las kun gyi bdag nyid can du 'gyur ba'o/ /des na dbang dang po'i
285a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas skabs su sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i phyi ma'i bum pa dang/ yab yum sbyor ba las byung pa'i bde ba chen pos 'od du zhu ba'i chu rgyun/ nang gi bum pa mchog tu gyur pas dbang bskur ba dang/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis shes rab kyi sgyu ma dang mnyam
285a6(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor ba'i 'debs dbang bskur ba dang/ rang nyid kyis las kyi phyag rgya la brten te bla ma'i gdams ngag bzhin mchog tu bde ba'i ye shes bskyed pa dang/ bde ba'i mchog zag pa med pa'i ye shes bskyed nas/ chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la gnas pa'i
285a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang ngo/ /de ltar dbang tha ma gnyis rang la skye yang gdams ngag gi stobs kyis byung bas bskur ba'i dbang ngo/ /de yang rtig pa bdun pa las/ bde mchog ces bya'i sgra yis ni/ /sgo gsum dag byed dbang gi lam/ /bzhi po bskur pa'i thabs dag gis/ /bde chen gsal
285b1(rgyud 'grel): ba bsgrub pa'i mtshig /kun gyi bde mchog dang po ste/ /sgyu ma'i rab sbyor gnyis pa yin/ /mchog tu bde ba gsum pa yin/ /bde pa'i mchog 'gyur bzhi pa'o/ /zhes so/ /'dis ni dbang gi rim pa ngon mdor bsdus te/ le'u drug pa dang bdun pa rang dgu pa'i phyag rgya
