285b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug pa bsdus pas/ seng+ge dang rna bu'i dpes bstan te/ /da ni sangs rgyas kyi sgo nas mtshan med kyi sgom pa bstan pa'i phyir/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos por bdag
285b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te zhes te/ thabs kyi sgo nas dang/ shes rab kyi sgo nas dang/ gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas yul kun tu dus kun nas dbang pa'i snang ba thams cad ni rig pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid gnas skabs kun tu mi 'gyur bar/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med
285b4(rgyud 'grel): par zhal sbyor ba gsum gyi tshul du sangs rgyas la sogs bstan g.yo'i dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid du gnas par bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ yul dus kun tu ma nyams blos/ /sangs rgyas ting 'dzin bsgom bar bya/ /sngags dbyibs chos kyi phyag rgya
285b5(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /brtan g.yo kun gyi dngos por bsgom zhes so/ /de nyid bsgom pa'i rim pa ni/ /slob dpon sangs rgyas gnyis pas sgrub pa'i thabs su rgyud kyi dum bu bsdebs nas bkod pa las shes par 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan te/ zab pa'i
285b6(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas dbye zhing le'u lnga pa'i phyogs gcig dang/ dgu pa'i sbyor ba'i phyag rgya bsdu zhing bya lag gis dpos bstan to// //da ni thams cad kyi sgo nas mtshan bcas kyi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir/ sems dang sems dpa' i ting 'dzin dang/ /byang chub
285b7(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa sna tshogs nyid/ /de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal/ /de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin zhes so// de las bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ dang por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing rang nyid dbang dang dam tshig tu ldan pas/ 'gro ba
286a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi don bya ba'i bsam pas gnas te/ stong pa nyid dang lha'i skur bsgom pa dang/ sgo gsum nus pa bskyed pa'i phyir byin brlabs pa dang/ bdag dang 'gro ba sbyar zhing gsal bar bya ba dang/ dbang po bsam zhing 'phags pa la tshogs
286a2(rgyud 'grel): bsag pa dang/ sems can la tshogs bsag pa dang/ bsrung ba'i 'khor los bgegs tshar gcad cing slar bsrung ba dang/ gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rten gyi ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgoms nas sbyor ba'i don bsam par bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' i sku 'phrul
286a3(rgyud 'grel): dga' i tshul du gnas pa las/ dbus kyi gdan thog tu byon nas rnam thar sgo bzhi'i snyoms 'jug la gnas pa las/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslang nas mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i sgo nas sku yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dang po
286a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyings dang ye shes zab pa dang rgya che ba'i mtshan ma nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor ni/ sems dang sems pa'i ting 'dzin te byang chub kyi sems rang thugs rje chen po'i rtags so/ /de la gnas pa'i A li bcu drug dang/ kA li'i bzhi bcu 'phro zhing 'du bas
286a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang dpe byad mi ldan pa dang/ mi gsal ba dag grub par mdzad nas/ nyi zla'i dkyil du g.yas g.yon gyi phreng bas mtshan ma ni byang chub sbyod pas sems can skyong ba'o/ /de la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bum par hUM gis mtshan zhing 'od zer lnga'i tshogs 'phro ba ni
286a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs nyid do/ /de las byung ba'i rigs drug gi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdud bzhi dang/ de'i rigs kyi phyogs rnams bcom nas sku gsung thugs bsdu zhing rang gi gnas su zhugs pas rdo rje chen por gyur to/ /de las rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i skur gyur
286a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni byang chub kyi sems lnga'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi sku yin no/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ zla ba sems kyi rang bzhin te/ nyi ma sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /A li kA lis las gnyis tshogs/ /byang chub spyod pas sems can skyong/ /rdo rje kha dog sna
286b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'od/ /'phro 'dus bdud dang bdud las rgyal/ /byang sems ye shes ldan pa yi/ /rgyu yi mgon po sangs rgyas mchog /ces pa dang/ rtog pa bsdus pa las kyang/ ting 'dzin las kyi khyad par ni/ sems brtan nyid kyis sems dpa' ste/ /sems dpa' i
286b2(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin bsgom pa'o/ /rnam par shes la sems dpa' gnas/ /rdo rje nyid yin rdo rje las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba'o/ /zhes so/ /rim pa rgyas par ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dbus kyi pad+ma'i gdan dag la/ /dpal mchog dang po bzhugs mdzad de/ /chos kun
286b3(rgyud 'grel): stong nyid mtshan ma dbral/? /smon lam rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas kyang/ /'gog pa'i rang bzhin la gnas la/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bskul mdzad de/ /mngon byang lnga'i rdzogs skur gyur/ /rang sems zla ba'i dkyil
286b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la/ /a yig bcu drug gnas pa la/ /thugs rje chen po shar byed pa'i/ /nyi dkyil ga yig sum cu bzhi/ /lce rtsa can bzhi mi gsal gnyis/ /skar ma'i gzugs 'dra bsgom par bya/ /de dag 'gro zhing 'dus pa yis/ /tshogs gnyis mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs//
286b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dang po gnyis ston cing/ /byang chub sems gnyis mtshan nyid do/ /gsum pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /dkar gsal dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan/ /bum par hUM mtshan rnams gsal pa/ /tshogs gnyis 'bras bu yongs rdzogs rtags/ /kha dog lnga yi snang
286b6(rgyud 'grel): ba las/ /rigs drug dkyil 'khor bsam byas pas/ /rang gi gnas rnams sbyor mdzad cing/ /dkyil 'khor so so 'khor bcas pa/ /slar 'dus sku gsung thugs zhugs pas/ /rdo rje 'od bcas chen por gyur/ /ye shes par ma gnyis ston cing/ /byang chub
286b7(rgyud 'grel): sems gnyis mtshan nyid do/ /lnga mchog rdzogs pa'i las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i skur bzhengs te/ /ye shes byang sems lnga pa las/ /phyag rgya chen po gsal ba yin zhes so/ /da ni 'bras bu'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas dag bskyed par bya pa'i phyir/ rdo rje rdo rje
287a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin nyid dang/ /de bzhin padmo padmo 'chang/ /nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang/ /de dag gi yang rigs yin no zhes te/ /rgyu'i rdo rje sems dpa' las/ /phyung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ /he ru ka gnyis ni rdo rje rigs so/ /gar gyi dbang phyug dang rta
287a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gnyis ni pad+ma'i rigs so/ /ci las kyi rigs pad+mar 'gyur ram zhe na/ phyag na pad+ma 'dzin pa dang/ rta'i skad dang bcas pa'o/ /rnam snang dang nyi ma'i gnyis ni rin po che rigs te sku dang yon tan rin po che'i tshogs la longs spyod par mdzad pa'o/ /de
287a3(rgyud 'grel): dag gi rigs ni 'khor gyi lha mo rnams te/ sbyor ba'i rjes su sbyor ba dang shin tu sbyor ba dang sbyor ba chen pos sangs rgyas rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba bsgom par bya zhes pa'o/ /'di dag ni gsang sngags khyad par gyi don du bshad pa ste/
287a4(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i dpes bsgrub cing/ le'u lnga pa'i phyogs gcig dang dgu pa'i cha shas bsdus pa'o/ /da ni rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid kun rdzob kyi rnam par dang/ thams cad kyi khongs su phrin las bsdu ba'i phyir/ de nyid 'dod chags
287a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags bral// 'dod pa dang ni grol ba'ang yin/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang/ /'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i/ /gnas pa thams cad de nyid do/ /zhes pa 'dod chags ni rigs drug gis
287a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams so/ /de dang bral ba ni theg pa 'og ma pa'i lam la zhugs pa'i dman pa'i rigs can no/ /'dod pa ni longs spyod lnga yis myos pa'o/ /grol pa ni de yang ma chags pa'o/ /de dag gi rang bzhin yin pa dang/ /yang rang rgyud pa dag 'dul ba'i
287a7(rgyud 'grel): don du sprul pa'i gzugs su gnas pa'o/ /des na rdo rje 'chang chen pos ni srid pa dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin du bzhugs pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ skyon med brtag pa gtan du ni/ /'dod chags thams cad rjes chags phyir/ /de nyid gsang ba bcom ldan
287b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che zhes so/ /yang srid pa phyogs gcig gi don du/ /dus gsum gyi rnam pas bsdus shing rgyu rkyen 'bras bu'i srid pa'i chos kun gyi bdag nyid de/ 'jig rten gyi gnas mchog tu gyur pa'i tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang brgya byin gyi ngo bor
287b2(rgyud 'grel): yang bzhugs so/ /'jig rten gsum ni sa 'og sa stengs bla ste/ de'i bdag po ni myos byed dang/ rgyal bar byed pa dang sbrang rtsir byed pa'o/ /khams gsum ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med kyis bsdus pa'i rnam pa'o/ /des na sna tshogs tha dad cing dbang po drug gi
287b3(rgyud 'grel): yul du gyur ba'i snod ba cung kyi dngos por gnas pa thams cad de nyid do/ /de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ /dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir/ /'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /kun grub zag med bde ba ni/ /bde chen rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku zhes pa dang
287b4(rgyud 'grel): yang/ 'jig rten gsum bdag mdza' yas phyir/ /'dul mdzad srid gsum mchog gsum dang/ /thams cad nyid phyir dkon mchog gsum/ /'jig rten gsum bdag khams gsum yin/ /zhes pa dang/ yang sems can bsod nams cher 'phags phyir/ /mi
287b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yo thams cad kho na'i bdag? /'du byed sems kyis g.yo ba ste/ /'du byed thams cad kho na'i phyir/ /zhes pa dang/ yang/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang/ /gang phyir sems cad 'dul mdzad pa/ /des na kun tu bzang po ste/ /byang chub sbyor bas gzhan skyong mdzad
287b6(rgyud 'grel): ces so/ /theg pa thun mong gi dbang du bshad pa'o/ /khyad par gyi don du ni/ rtog pa bdun pa las/ grol par mdzad pas zhi ba ste/ 'dod pa'i tshogs grub rgyas pa yin/ 'dod chags tshul gnas dbang gi las/ /chags bral drag pos sang bar mdzad/ /dus gsum
287b7(rgyud 'grel): sku gsum rtog bzhugs shing/ /srid gsum sku gsum thugs su ngag /mchog gsum theg pas 'gro 'dul zhing/ /lam gsum mdzad pas gzhan rgyud sel/ /sa gsum gnas dga' rab tu gnon/ /mdzad pa'i tshogs 'phrul dag mdzad cing/ /sna tshogs phrin las
288a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu spyod/ /ces pa dang/ yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dbang gi 'dod pa'i don chags shing/ /drag pos chags bral bsad par mdzad/ /yon tan tshogs rgyas 'dod pa'i las/ /zhi ba'i rab tu grol byed pa'o/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /dbyibs kyi sgo
288a2(rgyud 'grel): nas gsang ba'i phrin las ni/ /rtog pa 'dun pa las ni/ 'dod pa dga' ba'i rnam pa can/ /'dod chags rjes su dga' ba'i tshul/ /chags bral dga' mdza' bral ba'i dngos/ /rnam grol lhan cig skyes pa'o zhes pa dang/ yang dus gsum dag tu 'bebs gzungs bzlog /srid
288a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum yi ges rtsa gsum 'gengs/ /mchog gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang/ /'jig rten khams rnams gsal bar byas/ /sna tshogs gnas pa'i chos rnams kun/ /bde ba che las gzhan ma yin/ /zhes so/ /de dag gi mjug bsdu zhing gtan tshigs su/ /'gro ba
288a4(rgyud 'grel): dag gi ma lus kun/ /thams cad du ni 'di 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs pa mdza' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa/ /dngos po thams cad de yin te/ /rgya che ba'i tshul gnyis dang/ dbyibs kyi tshul gyis chos
288a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad de nyid rnam par gnas par kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin no/ /de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ /rtag tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdong nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /byang chub sems nyid nges pa'o/ /zhes so/ /'dis
288a6(rgyud 'grel): le'u dgu pa'i phyag rgya shas cher bsdus ta nor bu rin po che dang gser dge'i dpes bstan to/ /da ni rtog pa mngon du 'gyur ba'i kun rdzob dang/ mnyam sbyor gyi don gyis tshogs 'khor bsdu ba'i phyir/ nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje
288a7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog go /zhes chos can gyi dngos pos gang du khyab par chos nyid kyi rang bzhin de dag thams cad dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ dper na til gyi zhing?
288b1(rgyud 'grel): bu bzhin no/ /de ltar don gnyis kyi tshul du bzhugs pa'i dpa' rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid ni de bzhin du gshegs pa'i ngang tshul can no/ /gang zhe na dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba mchog gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo las bsgrub
288b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing/ /lha mo kun gyi bde ba bskyed ces so// //'dis ni le'u drug pa bsdus te rna bu dang seng ge'i
288b3(rgyud 'grel): dpes bstan to/ /de ni mnyam sbyor gyi sgo nas grub pa la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med par/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob 'gyur ba zhes te/ mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'i gzhung du
288b4(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa grangs med par dka' ba spyad cing tshogs bsags pas lam rnam pa lnga mthar phyin nas/ drang ba'i don gyis sangs rgyas 'grub par 'dod pa des ni/ nges pa'i 'bras bu rnyed pa ma yin te/ rang gi de kho na nyid ma shes pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mthong bar
288b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis kyi don shes pas/ cho ga gang dag gis bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi yi sgo nas/ tshe 'di nyid la thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub cing/ mchog gi dngos grub kyi lam la sbyor bar byed pa dang/ yang tshe
288b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dis mchog gi dngos grub rig 'dzin 'thob ste/ des na/ de ni bdag gis brtag par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag bde ba'i mchog /bdag nyid shin tu sgrub pa las/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog go zhes so/ /de yang lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas
288b7(rgyud 'grel): brtags par bya ste/ rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa dang/ de nyid bde ba chen po'i ye shes rang gi mtshan nyid bsgrubs pas de'i rnam pa gsal zhing nyams su myong ngo/ /de yang rgyud las/ mtshan nyid theg dman lam zhugs pas/ /yang
289a1(rgyud 'grel): dag sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur/ /bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi gnas don/ /rab gsum theg pa'i byang chub 'grub ces so/ /'dis ni sgrub pa'i le'u gsum pa bsdus te/ ngang pa dang seng ge'i dpes bstan to/ /da ni lha dang gnyis su lta pa dgag
289a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems/ /lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te/ /lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye/ /zhes te/ gang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par ston pa de la rnal 'byor te/ rtog pa bdun pa las/
289a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul zhing/ /shes rab dbyings su sbyor sgrub pas/ /rnal 'byor gsal bar mtshon pa ste/ /gnyis med phyag rgyas de nyid ston zhes pa dang/ yang/ shes rab dbyings las byung ba yi/ /sbyor ba zhi la legs gnas pa/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' i
289a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid de/ /dus kun tu ni rnam par spyod/ /ces pa dang/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang/ /thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa/ /rnal 'byor zhes bya bar bshad/ /shes rab rang bzhin med pa ste/ /mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul thabs yin no/ /zhes so/ /de la
289a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i sgrub pa po la ni rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o/ /gang zhig de dang mi ldan pa'i 'jug pa po dag ma yin pa'i sems kyis bdag dang lha gnyis su lha zhing dmigs par byed de/ rten gyi gzugs brnyan las rnal 'byor 'byung zhing skye bar 'dod pas ni 'grub par mi 'gyur ro//
289a6(rgyud 'grel): de yang glang po rab 'phogs dang sgyu 'phrul dra ba dag las/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang/ /sangs rgyas rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pas/ /sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig ces pa dang/ 'di dag gzhan las kyang rgya cher
289a7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so/ /de ni sgrub pa'i zhar la spros pa'o/ /de ni mnyam sbyor gyi sgo nas dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir/ yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa/ /lha la dmigs par byed pa dag /rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor ba/ /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes te/ chos
289b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs shing de'i don la gnas pas gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas thun mong dang khyad par dam tshig rang gi bdag nyid dang sbyor zhing/ mi 'gyur dam par gnas na 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ zab cing rgya che'i chos dag gi /yang dag
289b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog sems rnal 'byor gnas/ /dam tshig lha gnyis rab sbyor bas/ rang gi rang bzhin gsal 'grub 'gyur zhes so/ /'dis ni le'u drug pa dang bdun pa'i dam tshig bsdus te/ khyung dang rna bu'i dpes bshad do/ /da ni de'i zhar la theg pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir/ /
289b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan lugs la sogs pa la/ /rnal 'byor 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /byang chub sems la rab brtson na/ /de las rnal 'byor lhar 'gyur ro/ /zhes te/ gong du lha dang gnyis su lta ba dgag ste/ /gang zhig nang rang gi ting 'dzin la dmigs pas ni theg pa 'og
289b4(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams las khyad par du 'gyur ba'o/ /de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ bsam 'das rgya chen zab pa ni/ /dngos grub thams cad zad med bde/ /kun gyi dri ma med pa ni/ /byang chub sems bsag brtan pa yin/ /zhes pa dang/ yang sems de kho na bdud nyid de/ /sems
289b5(rgyud 'grel): de kho na de bzhin gshegs/ /rang sems 'dul ba'i don du ni/ /bdag nyid bdud las rgyal ba yin/ /zhes pa dang/ yang rang sems so sor rig pa ni/ /byang chub sems mchog rdo rje yin/ /de nyid de las de sangs rgyas/ /rang byin brlabs mchog bsgom phyir ro/ /'dis
289b6(rgyud 'grel): ni dbu zhabs kyi theg pa rnam par 'byed pa ste/ khyung dang bya lag gi dpes bshad do/ /de ni phan yon gyi che ba bstan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems 'di rdo rje ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /de bas thams cad bdag sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur//
289b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes te/ zab? pa dang rgya che ba'i sgo nas byang chub kyi sems rnam pa bzhi po 'di ni rdo rje lta bu ste/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin no/ /de lta bas na lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa la sogs pa'i don rnams shes shing nyams su blangs na sbyor ba stobs kyis thob par
290a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ lta spyod ting 'dzin sgrub pa dang/ /dkyil 'khor dbang bskur dam tshig tshogs/ /phrin las thams cad bdag sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur zhes pa dang/ rtog pa bsdus pa las kyang/ gang gi rtog pa mchog 'di
290a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub par byed pa la/ /bdud nyid nye bar mi 'gro mi brtan nyid kyang yin/ /rtog pa'i tshogs bcas bdag gis gzhom mdzad de/ /myur ba mchog gi mchog nyid 'grub phyir brten par mi byed do/ /gang gis bdag gi snying po bdag la rtag tu 'grub byed ni/ /mchog chen dngos grub dang ni
290a3(rgyud 'grel): rtag par bde chen dang/ /chags dang shin tu dga' dang brtan dang rgyas/ /yig chen dang ni brtan par bdag gis 'gyur bar byed/ /ces so/ /des ni le'u gnyis pa'i smad dang le'u so so'i khyad par gyi phan yon bsdus te/ ru sbal gyi dpes bshad do/ /da ni mnyam sbyor gyi sgo nas
290a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu phrin las dang bcas pa bstan pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin no/ /de bas bdag nyid lhar sbyor bas/ /bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /zhes te/ 'brel pa'i tshul du 'jug bsdus pa'i phyir/ /cho ga dang po gnyis
290a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni gzhi'i mtshan nyid bstan te/ dngos rtogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ kun rdzob kyi rnam pa dang/ dpa' bo byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i sku ni chos thams cad kyi gnas lugs yin pas rgyal ba'i dgongs pa'o/ /de nyid tshul gsum
290a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis rtogs par byas nas/ de'i rjes su tshig gnyis kyis ni lam gyi yan lag ting nge 'dzin la sogs pas bdag nyid ltar sbyor zhing bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nyid goms shing mngon du gyur pa'i 'bras bu ni/ de yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /dpa' bo rnams kyang thams cad dang
290a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes te/ nges pa'i don rdo rje theg pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad dang/ dpa' bo 'khor gyi sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa'i tshogs dang/ rigs 'dzin
290b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi bye brag bzhin du gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dag bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis tshe 'di la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang/ dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyis bsgrubs pas ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par yang gsal bar
290b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /de yang 'og nas 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin zhes pa dang/ rtog pa bdun pa las/ tshe 'dis rigs 'dzin thob byed cing/ /de gnas rim bzhin goms pa'i mthus/ /nges pa'i don gyi sangs rgyas che/ /bde chen sku gsum gnyis mang 'grub ces so/ /des ni
290b3(rgyud 'grel): le'u bcu pa bsdus te rin po che'i dpes bstan to/ /de ltar gsungs pa de dag kyang sdud pa po'i rang dga' i tshig ma yin te/ yid ches pa'i khungs/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so zhes te/ sngon byung 'phrul pa'i 'khor los dus rnam pa
290b4(rgyud 'grel): drug du gdul bya'i rgyud grol bar mdzad nas/ rjes su 'jug pa po dag gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ ri rab kyi rtse mor sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyud bshad pa'o/ /dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las
290b5(rgyud 'grel): de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rtag pa ste dang po'o zhes pa la/ gdul bya rgyas pa la dga' ba rnams kyi don to/ /ston pa'i dgongs mdzad rgya chen po'i tshul du rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po gsungs nas/ /yang bsdus pa la dga' ba
290b6(rgyud 'grel): dang rtog pas 'dra ba rnam par bcad pa'i don du/ rdo rje'i tshig dgongs pa du ma dang ldan pa brda'i don gyis rnam par bshad pa bsdus pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni shes par bya ba dang/ nyams su blangs pa dang/ 'bras bu mthong ba'i de kho na nyid gsum bya
290b7(rgyud 'grel): don snang zhing gsal bar mdzad pa dang/ dam pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul la 'jug pa'i thabs gsal zhing/ rgyas 'debs pa'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa de nyid la rtog pa zhes bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ shes bya lam sgrub 'bras bu'i chos/
291a1(rgyud 'grel): bden gnyis mtshungs med de nyid gsum/ /snang gsal dam pa rnams kyi yul/ /phyag rgya rtog pa'i ngang tshul ces zhes pa dang/ rtog pa bsdus pa las/ rnam par mi rtog chos dag las/ /sems can don du yongs su rtog /des na rtog pa zhes
291a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro zhes so// le'u dang po'i don rnam par bshad pa'o// //gang zhig dmigs pa med pa stong phrag gis ni lam du 'jug cing rin po che brtag par mi nus la/ de nyid kyi bstan bcos dang phan yon mi shes pa dag kyang
291a3(rgyud 'grel): de la 'jug cing phrad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dang rang gi rang bzhin ma rtogs pa dag gis ni yang dag pa'i don mi mthong zhing/ so so'i phan yon mi shes pas na ci'i phyir 'jug par byed/ de'i phyir le'u gnyis par shes par bya/ bzhi lta
291a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bye brag dang/ de'i zhar la phan yon bstan to/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ phyogs rnams ma lus rnams brtags shing/ rang bzhin ngo bo las grol pa/ /rags pa'i dri ma kun spyod de/ /rnam grol phra ba'i lta rmongs 'gyur/ /kye ma'o rang nyid ma mthong ba/ /gzhan
291a5(rgyud 'grel): gang mthong zhing shes par 'gyur zhes so/ /de las dang po lta ba spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ /'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /thabs dang shes
291a6(rgyud 'grel): rab gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid bde ba chen po'i sku 'di ni rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid can te/ gnyis can du rtog pa'i mtshan ma bdud la sogs pa'i tshogs rnams rang gi ngang gis bcom zhing/ legs pa'i yon tan gyi bkod pa thams cad la mnga' brnyes
291a7(rgyud 'grel): pas/ yon tan gyi bye brag gzhan na med de rang bzhin lhun gyi grub pa dang/ rtogs pas mngon du gyur pa'i tshul du bzhugs shing/ don rtogs gnyis kyi tshul gyis rdo rje sems dpa' thog ma dang tha ma med par bzhugs shing/ sku gsung thugs las 'das
291b1(rgyud 'grel): te rang de kho na nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje la gnas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i ngang tshul la gnas so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ sems dpa' gdong ma tha ma med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu
291b2(rgyud 'grel): bzang po kun gyi bdag /rdo rje snying po gtso ba'i gtso/ /gdong ma tha ma med phyir yang/ /dam pa'i dang po zhes 'dod de/ /'khor lo kun gyi gtso phyir na/ dam pa dam pa'i dbang phyug yin zhes na/ sangs rgyas gnyis kyi tshul du bzhugs so/ /de yang kun rdzob phyogs gcig gi sgo
291b3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ rtog pa bdun pa las/ sku mdog mtshan dang dpe byad dang/ /yon tan ma 'gags gsal snang zhing/ dkyil 'khor dbang la sogs par ldan/ /gsung thugs phrin las gsal bar snang/ /zhes pa dang/ yang dus gsum sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i/ /mgon rnams/ bde
291b4(rgyud 'grel): chen gnas bzhugs te/ /gsal ba'i stobs dang mi 'jigs tshogs/ /bdag gzhan gnyis med sna tshogs snang zhes so/ /de dag gi don dam pa ni stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis gnas pa dmigs pa'i mtshan ma thams cad las dben pa zhi ba chen pa'i dbyings so/ /spyi'i
291b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid ni gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i sku'o/ /de ltar gnas skabs kyi dbang du na bden pa gsum du bshad cing/ rang gi mtshan nyid la gang du yang ma phye'o/ /des na thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi/ /thams cad ma lus
291b6(rgyud 'grel): bde mchog gi /zhes te gong du gsungs so/ /don de nyid lta bas thag chod nas bsgom pas nyams su blangs nas 'grub pa'i phyir/ rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor na/ /dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub ces te/ phyag rgya gsum gyi sgo nas gnyis su med par sbyor na//
291b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gyur pa'i don phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam pa dag 'grub par 'gyur te/ rang gi de kho na nyid las shar ba'i phyir ro/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /thams cad bde chen rdo rje sems/ /ma 'gags rol pa phyag rgya'i sku/ /kun rdzob snang zhing dngos med pa/ /don
292a1(rgyud 'grel): dam las 'da' sgyu ma'i dbyings/ /rang bzhin gsal bar sbyor byas pas/ /dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub ces so/ /de nyid rtogs par bya ba'i thabs ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che/ /gang  
292a2(rgyud 'grel): zhig la dang por sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba ni dbyings ye shes kyi 'brel tshul te le'u dgu pa las/ thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /thams cad sgyu ma
292a3(rgyud 'grel): lta bu ste/ /ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du/ /mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur/ /dmigs su yod pa ma yin te/ /de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul zhes pa dang yang yod pa ma yin med pa min/ /dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas
292a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o/ /zhes so/ /don de dag rnal 'byor dam pa'i mtshan nyid de/ dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no/ /de yang thabs kyi sgo nas dang/ /shes rab kyi sgo nas dang/ gnyis su med pa'i
292a5(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas rtogs par bya ba ste/ de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ thabs kyi sgo nas bde ba che/ /thig le phra mo las 'das shing/ /rlung gi gnas la gnas mi mdzad/ /gsang sngags kyi dmigs bral ba'o/ /shes rab las la brten pa'i mthus/ /'khor
292a6(rgyud 'grel): lo'i byang chub 'bebs? dang gzung/ /rang gi gnas sam gzhan du spro/ /rtsa sogs dman pa dbyibs las 'das/ /gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i dang/ /snang ba nyid ni stong pa ste/ /stong pa nyid ni snang ba yin/ /dbang po drug gi yul la rol zhes so/ /de'i
292a7(rgyud 'grel): gtan tshigs ni/ bde bas bde ba nyid kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas bde ba kun 'thob bo/ /zhes te/ rgyu bde ba'i sgo nas lam bde bar sgrub ste/ 'bras bu bde ba chen po'i skur 'grub pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ chos rnams mngon sum bde
292b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po/ /gzugs brnyan rab 'bring tha ma med/ /snang stong bde ba'i rgyas btab pas/ /dmigs pa kun las rnam par grol zhes te/ mngon sum du chos thams cad la bde stong gnyis su med pa'i rgyas gdab pa'o/ /'dis ni rtogs pa'i yon tan yang bstan to/
292b2(rgyud 'grel): da ni lus ngag gi dka' ba spyad mi dgos par bstan te/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen po/ /'di la khrus dang bsdam mi dgos/ /dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos/ /rang gi rtog pas bcings pa'i bram ze dang/
292b3(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos la sogs pa'i khrus dang bza' bsrung gi spyod pa dang/ sdom pa dang sbyang ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi dka' thub dang/ me lnga brten pa dang dbyig gu gsum pa dang khye'u dka' thug dang ba lang gi dka' thub dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pas lam
292b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa ltar dka' ba spyang mi dgos te gnyis med kyi don la gnas na spyod lam kun gyis tshogs gnyis rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /des na dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang/ /bde ba dang ni dga' bas 'grub/ /de bas ji ltar 'dod spyad cing/ /kun za de bzhin thams cad
292b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod/ /spyod pa ci dgar 'dod par byed/ /g.yo pa dag kyang ci dgar byed/ /gang la thog pa 'og ma pa'i gzhung du spyod pa'i rim pa dag ched du gnyer zhing dgag pa med de/ bram ze dang mu tig la sogs pas dben pa'i spyod pa gang yang rung bas sems bde ba dang/ lus
292b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i sgo nas 'grub ste/ des na sdig pa ma sbyangs pas kyang mnyam pa'i don bsgrubs na 'grub par 'og nas gsungs so/ /de nyid rtog pa bdun pa las kyang/ /gang la ji ltar spyod kyang rung/ /gnyis med bde chen grogs su 'gyur zhes so/ /de yang gang zag las dang por
292b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /ye shes la cung zad dbang ba dang/ yang dag par dbang ba dang/ shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sgo nas shes par bya'o/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin sems can gyi don du 'gyur na kha na ma tho ba med par ngan pa'i las la sbyad kyang nyes par mi 'gyur zhing/ kun zas 
293a1(rgyud 'grel): te dam zas bcu'i rnam pa dag /gnyis su med pa'i don dang ldan pas longs spyad pas dngos grub 'grub pa'i yan lag tu 'gro ba'o/ /de bzhin thams cad ni thun mong dang khyad par gyi dam tshig ma lus pa'i tshogs so/ /de bzhin du lus
293a2(rgyud 'grel): ngag gi sgo nas spyod pa ci dga' dang/ sems kyi sgo nas g.yo ba ci dga' ste dgag pa dang sgrub pa med do/ /des ni theg pa dman pa dang/ so so'i skye bo'i mdza' bkag par 'gyur ro/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang/ sngags pa seng+ge bzhin du rgyu/ /'di la
293a3(rgyud 'grel): mi bya ba dag dang/ /mi bza' ba ni gang yang med/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis brgyan cis so/ /de ltar na chos thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du gnas pa las/ ma rtogs pa'i sems can kha cig 'khrul pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal
293a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang brgyad kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu de nyid la spyod de/ de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ rang gi rang bzhin ma rtogs shing/ /gzhan du 'khrul pa'i 'gro ba dag /yul drug rang rgyud brtags pa yis/ /sna tshogs gnyis kyi chos su snang/ /mi mthun bde
293a5(rgyud 'grel): sdug gnas la spyod/ /chos brgyad mtshan mas g.yengs gyur cing/ /nyon mongs yan lag dang bcas pas/ 'gro drug gnas rnams so sor snang/ /sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad kyis gdungs/ /las kyis 'brel pas dngos la chags/ zhes so//
293a6(rgyud 'grel): yang log par blo gros 'khrul pa'i gang zag kha cig mu stegs kyi lam dang nyan thos kyi lam dang byang chub sems dpa' i lam la spyod de/ rang gi de kho na nyid las nyams shing bde ba chen po'i ro ma myong bar gnas te/ de nyid la snying rje chen pos
293a7(rgyud 'grel): gzung bar bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ kye ma log par rtogs pa yi/ /kha cig lam ngan log zhugs pa/ /rgyu las 'khrul dang lam las 'khrul/ /'bras bu'i dngos las 'khrul gyur dag /'jig rten 'dir yang sdug bsngal te/ /khyi dang
293b1(rgyud 'grel): ba lang dbyu gu gsum/ /me lnga sogs kyis lus gdungs te/ /tshe zad ngan song gsum du 'gro /rigs ngan dman pa'i lam zhugs pas/ /bde 'dod de nyid lam las gol/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung shes spong 'dod/ /phyir zhing sdug bsngal kun 'byung gnas//
293b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gog lam mngon par sgom byed kyang/ /'phags pa'i lam la rgyab kyi phyogs/ /kye ma'o yang dag bden lags gzhan/ /'khrul pa'i bden pa bzhi ru brtags/ /rkyen rtogs dgra bcom sa 'dod pas/ /rten 'brel la spyod de nyid spong/ /nyon mongs las
293b3(rgyud 'grel): dang sdug bsngal gyis/ /rang bzhin rmongs pas de spyod pa/ /de nyid mtshan mas 'khrul 'gyur te/ /thams cad ma rig las byung ba/ /de nyid rgyu gzhan gang las byung/ /thams cad rang byung ye shes yin/ /kye ma'o dgra bcom sa 'dod pas/ /rgyun
293b4(rgyud 'grel): zhugs lan cig 'ong ba dang/ /mi ldog spyod sogs dka' ba yis/ /dgra bcom lam zhugs grol mi 'gyur/ /yang dag bden pa'i don med par/ /kun tu btags par gnyis 'dzin pa/ /bskal pa mang por dka' spyad kyang/ /yang dag sangs rgyas thob mi
293b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /kye ma'o nges don ma rnyed pas/ /lam gzhan g.yengs pas tshi? tshad de/ /gyang kyi nor bzhin kun tu tshol/ /sku gsum 'bras bu skye mi 'gyur/ /kye ma 'di dag snying re rje/ /bde chen gnas las 'di ltar gyur/ /sdug bsngal 'di gzhan gang las byung/
293b6(rgyud 'grel): nam zhig rang gi de nyid mthong/ /nam zhig rang byung ye shes 'char/ /nam zhig bde ba chen pos brgyan zhes so/ /'o na de dag gis thog pa chen po'i lam du zhugs na mi 'grub bam zhe na/ gang zhig rang gi lta ba rnam par gtong zhes shes rab dang snying
293b7(rgyud 'grel): rjes gzhi gzung nas byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas ni 'jug tu rung zhing 'grub par 'gyur te/ langs pa dang ni 'dug pa dang/ /'chag gam ji ltar gnas kyang rung/ /rgod dam rab tu smra yang rung/ /gang na ji ltar gnas kyang rung zhes te/ /de yang rtog pa
294a1(rgyud 'grel): bdun pa las/ skye bo gzung 'dzin rags pa'i rgyun/ /rtog pa langs pas kun tu 'khor/ /mu stegs spyod bcas 'gro byed cing/ /sdug bsngal rmongs tshogs sdug bsngal bsgrub/ /yul drug 'gog cing gnas byed pa'i/ /blo dman gol ba'i lam
294a2(rgyud 'grel): la zhe na/ ji ltar gnas pa'i rang rgyal ba/ /gcig tshugs mang pos dgra bcom lam/ /rgod pa'i sgo nas bram ze'i smrang/ /smra byed byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /de dag rtog gnas lam ldog cing/ /'di don spyod pas 'grub par 'gyur zhes so/ /'o na de dag gis
294a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ma bsags gzugs brnyan du ma bsgrubs par 'grub bam zhe na/ dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing/ /sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa'ang rung/ /rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor na/ /bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /thog mar bla ma dam pa la brten te//
294a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang thob cing dam tshig dang ldan pas/ gdams ngag la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mngon du byas na bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor lam brten pa dang/ sngon du sdig pa'i las spyad pas kyang rang gi lha gnyis su med pa'i
294a5(rgyud 'grel): don dang sbyar na lus ngag gi tshogs ma bsags kyang 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /da ni lta ba rtogs pa'i phan yon gyis 'jug bsdu ba'i phyir/ de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /thams cad 'grub par byed pas na/ /ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis/ /nyes
294a6(rgyud 'grel): dag tu yongs mi 'gyur zhes te/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ lta ba mchog la 'jug sbyor ba'i/ /sku drug lhun grub rnal 'byor pas/ /dngos bcas chos tshogs rnam grol rgyar/ /thams cad rab tu 'grub byed cing/ /ngan pa'i spyod pa rnam dag chos/ /'grub byed
294a7(rgyud 'grel): nyes par yong mi 'gyur/ /rma bya'i gzi mdangs gsal ba ltar/ /rang bzhin ngo bos rnam par dag ces so/ /de dag ni lta ba rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o/ /nga ni de'i zhar la lam dang 'bras bu'i phan yon bstan te/ de yang so so'i gnas
294b1(rgyud 'grel): skabs su ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid yin la/ 'dir ni shes par bya ba'i yul bsdu ba dang/ yon tan gyi sgo nas 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ dang por mchog gi bsgrub par bya ba'i sgo nas ni/ bskal pa bye bar mi thob pa/ /sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad de/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga gang
294b2(rgyud 'grel): dag gis/ /bsgrubs na kun tu 'thob 'gyur pa/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i dngos grub gang zhig /sku drug lhun gyis grub pa de nyid ni nges pa'i don gyi sangs rgyas dam pa ste/ theg pa dman pas bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig rgyu rkyen
294b3(rgyud 'grel): ma shes pas ni 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i thabs dang bral ba'o/ /thabs khyad par can gyis sgo nas bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i phyag rgya'i tshogs dkyil 'khor gang yang rung bar bsgrubs na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang las zhe na/ bdag nyid
294b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub par byed pa'i mchog /de ni bdag gis brtag par bya zhes te/ /yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas sku gsum mam drug gi bdag nyid de ni rang gi mtshan nyid de/ nam zhig ye shes kyis gsal bar byas na rang gi rgyud la skye zhing 'grub ste de ni rang gi rgyud
294b5(rgyud 'grel): las brtag par bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi yi don/ /sangs rgyas dam pa 'grub byed pa/ /de nyid phyag rgya'i cho ga yis/ /rang nyid dkyil 'khor bdag por blta/ /rigs 'dzin lam gyi bye brag las/ /mchog gi dngos
294b6(rgyud 'grel): grub skye bar 'gyur zhes so/ /thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i sgo nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor ba/ /cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur ba yis shes te/ /mchog gi dngos grub la sbyor bar
294b7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i yan lag tu 'jig rten gyi las tshogs dang thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya ste/ gzhi rten sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor zhing/ le'u dgu pa'i bsrung ba'i cho ga la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i las rnams dang las gzhan
295a1(rgyud 'grel): dag ni gnod par byed pa'i 'byung po gsal zhing bsrung ba dang byin gyis brlab pa dang ldan pas rten dang rdzas kyi sgo nas cha lugs ji bzhin du rang rang gi las dang mthun par bsgyur ro/ /des ci zhig sgrub tsa na/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya'i
295a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag /bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur zhes te/ 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba phal pa la yod pa'i stobs dang rang rang gi las rnams dang/ thun mong du lha'i rgyal po dang klu'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i rgyud la mnga' ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ rin po
295a3(rgyud 'grel): che sna bdun dang/ chu la mi 'bying bar 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' la sgas bzhin 'dzeg pa dang/ ri brag la thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang/ sa 'og gi gter dang gser 'gyur gyi rtsi dang/ bum pa bzang po dang ral gri dang ril bu dang mig sman dang bcud kyis
295a4(rgyud 'grel): len dang rkang 'gyogs la sogs pa'i las/ rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u lnga pa las gsungs pa'i thams cad sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag nyid thun mong gi dngos grub rnams/ sngon du sdig pa can gyi gang zag tshogs ma bsags shing yun ring du ma sbyangs pas
295a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'grub par 'gyur na gzhan gyis lta mos kyang ci dgos zhes pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur byas te/ /las tshogs dngos grub mang po dag /thams cad sna tshogs phyag rgya yi/ /lam gyi grogs su bsgrub par bya zhes so//
295a6(rgyud 'grel): de dag gis ni le'u gsum pa'i sgrub pa'i phan yon bstan to// //mtshan bcas kyi tshogs dang rang bzhin med pa'i rtse gcig pas ni de nyid gsal bas/ rgya 'di grub pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob/ /shin tu byin gyis
295a7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur zhes te/ phyag rgya gnyis kyi sgo nas goms par bsgoms pas phyag rgya gnyis kyi rnam pa gsal ba ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de las phyag rgya bzhi dang sngags dang phyag rgya gzhan dag dang rang
295b1(rgyud 'grel): gi de kho na nyid byin gyis brlab cing sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ /ting 'dzin la sogs rnam bzhi yis/ /gang zhig bskyed pa yong bsgom na/ /bsgoms na thams cad bdag nyid du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur//
295b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i byin gyis brlabs sbyor yang/ /rang byin brlabs 'di grub mchog ste/ /de nyid nyin re grub pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'thob po zhes so/ /de'i gtan tshigs ni/ sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par
295b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar gnas pa'i ngo bo la rang gi rig pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya gnyis kyi tshul du sbyor bas/ phyogs dus kyi dkyil 'khor
295b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /des ni bdag gi rgyud la sku dang ye shes gsal zhing grub par bstan to/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bde chen sgyu ma'i sangs rgyas la/ /rang gi ye shes kyis 'jug cing/ /phyag rgya gnyis kyi snyoms 'jug gis/ /dkyil 'khor
295b5(rgyud 'grel): kun dang skal mnyam 'gyur zhes so/ /des ni le'u lnga pa'i rjes 'jug gi bya ba dang/ dgu pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i bsgoms pa'i rim pa'i don ston par byed do/ /gang dag lam du 'jug pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi gnas te/ gang gis ldan
295b6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di mthong zhing/ /rnam pa kun tu mchod byed la/ /de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang/ /mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ /dang por ni kun tu 'gro ba'i tshig yin te/ /skye bo gang yang rung ba zhig gi gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor mthong zhing/ sku gsung
295b7(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa gsum po 'dir bzhugs te/ mthong zhing rnam pa kun tu mchod na/ de yis sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i/ /dkyil 'khor
296a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong zhing mchod byas pas/ /bsod nams rtag pa ci 'dra ba/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor de bzhin no zhes so/ /'dis ni le'u bdun pa'i phyogs gcig mtshon par byed do/ /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi zab pa dang rgya che ba 'grub ste/ 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la
296a2(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor ngag tu ma zhugs pa'ang/ /bden pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ /der rten sa'i 'khor lo rigs kyi sangs rgyas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs pa thams cad dga' ba'i bzhin gyis bltas nas/
296a3(rgyud 'grel): reg bya'i bde ba sbyor te bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gi sgo nas/ mthong ba dang reg pa'i mtshan mas 'grub par gyur te/ sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa dag kyang bden pa chos nyid kyi dngos grub mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ bsod
296a4(rgyud 'grel): nams dkyil 'khor mthong byas shing/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor reg pa yis/ /tshogs kyi dga' bde'i sgo nas ni/ /bden pa ye shes skye bar 'gyur zhes so/ /des ni le'u drug pa'i don phyogs gcig mtshon par byed do/ /smin zhing rgyud gsum gyi dri ma dag par byed pas/ mthong ba dang
296a5(rgyud 'grel): ni reg pa dang/ /thos pa dang ni dran pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad 'grub ces te/ dbang rnam pa bzhi po dag slob ma'i rgyud la bsgo ste/ sdig pa dang dri ma'i tshogs ba ni dgrol zhing dngos grub rnam pa bzhi thob par mdzad do//
296a6(rgyud 'grel): de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /phyi yi rgyan sogs mthong mdzad cing/ /lha yi chu yis dag par byed/ /nang gi dbang bskur reg pa yis/ /smin pa'i lam la rab tu gnas/ /gsang ba'i don bshad thos byas pas/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i gnas la sbyod/ /de don nyams myong dran pa'i
296a7(rgyud 'grel): mthus/ /ngar gi ye shes rnam par grol/ /sdig pa'i dri ma bzhi dag cing/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub bzhi thob 'gyur zhes so/ /'dis ni le'u drug pa dang bdun pa dang dgu pa'i phyogs gcig mtshon par byed do/ /gnas pa dang 'jug pa'i sgo nas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ 'di dang
296b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rnal 'byor thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /bud med dag kyang rnam grol zhing/ /sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /snang ba dang sred pas bsdus pa'i brtan g.yo'i dngos po thams cad dang dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun gyi rang
296b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin la thun mong dang khyad par gyi dam tshig gnyis kyi sgo nas sbyor na lus dman zhing shes rab dang snying stobs zhan pa'i bud med dag kyang grol na gzhan lta ci smos zhes pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig gzung/ /rtag tu lha dang bla ma mchod/ /chos rnams
296b3(rgyud 'grel): kun la mnyam sbyor bas/ /bud med dman pa grol bar 'gyur/ /zhes te/ kyang gi don blta bar bya'o/ /de ni le'u drug pa la sogs pa'i don phyogs gcig mtshon par byed do/ /legs pa'i lam dang 'bras bu mdzad pas don spyod de/ kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rtag
296b4(rgyud 'grel): par thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dngos grub pa/ /de yi bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhes te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don du dus kun tu 'am gzhan yang gnas skabs kun nas phrin las thams cad de/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang bsrung pa dang gso ba dang gnod pa dang
296b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang dgug pa dang/ dbye ba dang drag po dang rengs pa dang rmongs pa dang 'dzums pa dang bskrad pa dang/ 'khrugs pa la sogs pa'i las rnams ni bdag nyid sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i rigs pas brtsam par bya ste/ rtag par dus thams cad du spyod na phrin las kyi sgo nas
296b6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ kun tu kun nas spyod pa'i las/ /phrin las nyi shu la sogs stobs/ /sbyor bcas rol pa'i brtul zhugs mchog /sangs rgyas kun gzugs mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /'dis ni le'u dgu pa'i smad nas las
296b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams bsdus so/ /chos kun gyi yan lag tu mnyes pa'i las kyis 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di ni bdag nyid kun gnas pa'i/ /mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyis/ /bkod pa'i rab 'byam mchog dag gis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par mdzad ces pas
297a1(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rab tu sbyangs pas rang gi de kho na nyid gsal te/ phyogs dus kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gnas shing/ mchod pa thams cad sprul par mdzad pas/ 'dus byas kyi rdzas las byung ba
297a2(rgyud 'grel): ma yin te/ rang nyid kyi ye shes las byung ba'i phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod sprin lta bu thams cad kyis/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs pa'i brtan g.yo'i dngos po thams cad bkod pa ram 'byam mchog tu gsungs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi
297a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas mchod par mdzad do/ /de nyid kyi yon tan gyi thams cad bdag nyid sbyor mchod dpal/ rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te/ /bde ba'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /chos thams
297a4(rgyud 'grel): cad la tshul rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas sbyor zhing/ /dbang po drug gi snang ba mdza' dag 'khor gsum dag pas rol zhing mchod na dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i mchog gi dngos grub zag pa med pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bde ba'i mchog
297a5(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /rang las byung ba'i mchod pa yis/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya/ /thams cad bdag nyid sbyor ba'i mthus/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen 'grub ces so/ /chos nyid dngos po'i rang bzhin gsal
297a6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'grub pa'i grogs ni tshul dang mthun pa'i spyod pas de nyid 'bras bu 'grub par byed de/ rnal 'byor thams cad nyer spyor mdzad/ /dpal ni bzhi 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur zhes pa ni mdor bstan pa ste/ rnal 'byor dang/ thams cad dang nye bar sbyor
297a7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang dpal bzhi 'gyur ro/ /de nyid rgyas par dang po spyod pa'i rim pa ni don gsum gyis bsdus pa ste/ rnal 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /de yi nye par sbyod pa yin/ /khams gsum ma lus thams cad do//
297b1(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las rgyal zhing/ rang gi yon tan gyi bkod pa sna tshogs snang bar mdzad pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid do/ /de ni rnal 'byor chen po ste tshul rnam
297b2(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis kyi sgo nas khams gsum ma lus pa thams cad la nye bar sbyor ba'o/ /de yang gang zag bzhi'i sgo nas rgya che ba'i spyod pa gnyis dang zab pa'i sgo gsum nas 'jug par byed do/ /tshul ni/ rnal 'byor kun gyi longs spyod kyis/ /ji ltar bde bar bsten byed
297b3(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya/ /rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi bde ba dag/ bdag nyid kun tu myang byed na/ /shin tu sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ni ting nge 'dzin brten pa'i
297b4(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas dus dang gnas skabs la lar don du 'gyur na spyod cing/ de las gzhan pa dag ni dgag ste tshul dang mthun pa'i sbyor pas 'dod pa'i longs spyod drug la ji ltar ba de bar bsten cing bslab par bya'o/ /ye shes la cung zad dbang bas ni rang nyid lha'i rnal
297b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor dang mi 'bral bar bde ba ni ye shes gzung ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid las byung ba'i dpa' i lhan cig skyes pa'i don gyi bde ba spel te/ mchod par bya'o/ /ye shes la yang dag par dbang bas ni rnal 'byor gyi bde ba rjes su sbyor ba'i mchod pas/ dkyil 'khor
297b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi lta mnyes par bya ba dang/ 'gro ba sbyang ba dang/ rnal 'byor sbyang ba la sogs pas rang gi de kho na nyid gsal bar nyams su blang ngo/ /shin tu rnam par grol bas ni dbang po drug gi snang ba mdza' dag la bdag nyid kyis kun tu myang zhing/ lha'i dkyil 'khor rgyas
297b7(rgyud 'grel): par gsal bar yongs spyad de/ de'i dus na de nyid kyi rnam pa la bde ba chen po'i sku gsal bar byed do/ /yun ring du goms pa'i mthus ni 'bras bu mngon du gyur pa yin no/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /de bzhin nyid gnas gsal byed pa/ /de grogs spyod
298a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa ste/ /gang zag bzhi'i bye brag gis/ /'jug ba'i cho ga don bzhin bstan/ /las dang po yis dpyad bya ba/ /longs spyod kun la ci bder gnas/ /de rjes lha'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag gzhan gzung pa'i don phyir spyod/ /gsum pas mnyes
298a2(rgyud 'grel): shing dag byed de/ /rnal 'byor gsal bas bde chen rgyas/ /dbang po yul dum kun tu spyod/ /rnam grol ye shes zag pa med ces so/ /gsal pa nyams su myong ba'i nus pa mngon sum du gsal ba las ni sku drug lhun gyis grub par gnas par 'gyur te/
298a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis/ /ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dpal chen dang/ /lang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub/ /mdor bstan pa yi dpal bzhi 'gyur zhes pa'i don yin te/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum gyis bsdus pa'i
298a4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan gyi tshogs kun dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te/ de'i rnam par spyod pa'i tshul gyis mthus 'chi ba med pa'i bdud rtsis bde ba chen po'i dpal bzhi 'gyur 'grub pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dpal
298a5(rgyud 'grel): yangs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don du 'gyur pa dang/ sku gsum rtag pa'i rnam pa thog ma dang tha ma med par gnas shing 'gro ba'i don spyod pa dang/ nyid kyi sku la mtshan dang dpe byad stobs dang/
298a6(rgyud 'grel): mi 'jigs pa dbang dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa lang tsho mnga' ba dang/ nyon mongs pa'i tshogs dang/ gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa'i sdug bsngal spangs te bde ba'i mchog 'grub pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dpal tshe
298a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /lang tsho nad med bde mchog gi /mchod pa kun gyi gnas 'jug cing/ /bdag dang gzhan don rol par mdzad/ /de yang gnas skabs lan re tsam du gnas sam zhe na/ kun tu kun nas thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro
298b1(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma bde pa'i mchog /rtag tu de ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /dus kun tu gnas skabs kun nas rnam pa thams cad du yon tan gyi mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /chags pa kun gyi tshul bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku/ /rtag
298b2(rgyud 'grel): tu bdag gi gnas gzung 'jug cing/ /'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs/ /rang gi ngo bo gsal ba'i mthus/ /dgongs pa rgyud la snang ba yin zhes so/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu sbyor pa ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang de dang mthun pa'i lam dang
298b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu'i sgo nas so// //le'u gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //gang zhig snying rje chen po'i sgo nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don mthar dbyung bar 'dod pa bdag gis ni sgrub pa gnyis kyi las la sbyar bar bya'o/ /ci mchog tu gyur pa'i lam lag yin pas
298b4(rgyud 'grel): zhar la skyes te logs su bzhag mi dgos so/ /zhe na rten gyi sgo nas yun ring su dka' ba ma spyad pa rnams kyis ni dang por mthun mong gi lam gyi bzhi gzung dgos te/ de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sgrub pa'i dngos grub las la sbyor/ /mchog gi phyag rgya grub pa
298b5(rgyud 'grel): las/ /bdag gzhan don gyi bya ba yi/ /'bras bu phun sum tshogs gyur yang/ /las dang po pa yis spyad bya ba/ /thun mongs dngos grub sgo nas yin/ /bsgrubs pas yon tan 'phel 'gyur zhing/ /bsgrubs pas las la sbyor par byed/ /yun rings bla ma mnyes
298b6(rgyud 'grel): byas shing/ /cho ga'i yan lag tshogs pas brtsam/ /blo dman dang brtson med pa dang/ byang sems snying rje shes rab bral/ /the tshom rtog pas bslus pa dag/ yun rings bsgrubs kyang 'grub mi 'gyur zhes so/ /de la spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ /'di ni rnal 'byor bcom
298b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ /nye ba mngon sum du gnas pa'i bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i thabs rtog pa gnyis
299a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dra ba 'joms shing yon tan gyi snang ba gnyis dang ldan par byed pa 'di ni brjod bya'i don ji bzhin par mtshon ba'i thabs dam ba ste/ gnyis med pa'i bdag nyid can no/ /ci 'dra ba zhig na dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i sku drug lhun gyis
299a2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i bdag nyid de la sbyor bar byed pa'i lam yan lag dang bcas pa'i tshul can te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /de nyid ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam bar sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i ngang tshul can no/ /de'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ lam mchog
299a3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhis/ /rang nyid 'dod pa'i las la sbyor/ /thabs kyi sgo nas 'jug pa'i mthus/ /bcom ldan de ni gsal bar byed ces so/ /brjod bya'i don 'bras bu gang la dmigs te sgrub pa rtson zhe na/ sku drug ye shes drug rigs drug gi
299a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas la sbyor zhing de dang mthun pa'i mdzad pas yul drug las kyang sgo nas rnam par dag pa'i phrin las kyi rang gi ngang la sbyor ro/ /dang po dbang phyug bde ba sgo nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rnal 'byor pa/ /dpal ldan rang gi dam tshig bde/ /sangs rgyas
299a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che/ /rgyu 'bras dbyer med kyi tshul gyis stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i sku rnam par dag pa las byung ba'i rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po gang yin pa de
299a6(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ste rgyu'i mtshan nyid can no/ /de la 'jug pa'i lam dag ni/ rnal 'byor pa'i sgra can te/ sh+rI'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang ldan zhing de dang sbyor ba'i bde ba las byung ba'i don ni dam tshig gi bde ba'o/ /de nyid 'grub par byed pa ni
299a7(rgyud 'grel): khyad bar gyi tshul dang sngags dang dbyibs dang chos kyi sgo nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba chen po'i don sgrub pa ste/ de'i tshul du gzhan dag la yang rgya cher sbyar ro/ /gnyis pa bde ba chen po ni/
299b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor pa'i mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ phyag rgya bde ba chen po kun/ /so so'i rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi/ /rang bzhin stong pa chen po'i sku las snang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ni/ sangs
299b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po las snang ba ste/ sbyor ba'i rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs su 'phrul zhing/ mtshan dang mthun pa'i las kyis kun tu 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can rang gi las rnam par bsags pa las byung ba'i mthu nyid kyis chos tham
299b3(rgyud 'grel): cad phyag rgya bde ba chen po'i rnam par rjes su 'grub par mdzad do/ /bde ba mos pa'i sgo nas/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba'i/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /rnal 'byor bde ba mos pa kun/ /so so'i rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur/ /ye shes kyi sku las
299b4(rgyud 'grel): me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i yis khro bar mdzad pa dpal he ru ka na rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs la snang ba ste/ gsal ba'i 'od zer gyis zag pa med pa'i ye shes spel zhing/
299b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas bcos rnam pa gnyis kyi mthus dregs byed kyi tshogs thams cad zhi bar mdzad cing/ rnal 'byor dam pa'i mtshan nyid bde ba mos pa'i tshul gyis so so'i rjes su 'grub par byed pa'o/ /bde ba mos pa'i dngos grub kyi sgo nas/ /dpal rdo rje sems
299b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sbyor ba'i/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /bde ba mos pa'i dngos grub kun/ /so so'i rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur/ /chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis snang ba'i gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid rnam par dag pa
299b7(rgyud 'grel): sgro sogs dang bkud? 'debs kyi mdza' gcod par mdzad ba'i dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gsung gi bdag nyid do/ thabs dang shes rab kyi de kho na nyid la 'khrul zhing pad+ma'i rigs kyi phrin las kyi mthu nyid kyis thams cad dag
300a1(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad de bde ba mos pa'i dngos grub kyi sgo nas so so'i rjes su 'grub par mdzad pa'o/ /bde ba mos pa'i dbang phyug ni/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba'i/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /bde ba mos pa'i dbang phyug kun/ /so so'i rjes su
300a2(rgyud 'grel): rab 'grub 'gyur/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin so so'i kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes las snang ba'i dpal rdo rje nyi ma ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i yon tan gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ mtshan dang mthun pa'i mdzad pas kun tu khyab par
300a3(rgyud 'grel): gdal cing rnam par bkod pa las byung ba'i mthus kun tu brgyan te bde ba mos pa'i dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mkha' dbyings mdza' yas ni/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpar sbyor pa'i/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /nam mkha' i dbyings kyi mthas klas
300a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /bud med mchog rnams skyes par 'gyur/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin sprul pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rta mchog rol pa ste/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phrin las kyi bdag nyid sbyor ba'i mthu las snang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas chos thams
300a5(rgyud 'grel): cad dag par bya ba dang/ dregs byed kyis tshogs 'dul pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' dbyings kyis mthas klas pas tshad dang mnyam par dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo rnams 'phrul par mdzad pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas drug gi tshul gyis ni/ /de nyid dkyil
300a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor don ston mdzad/ /ye shes sku yi rnam grangs dang/ /rigs dang mdzad pa'i phrin las tshogs/ /sbyor ba mthu yis thams cad du/ /dbang phyug bde ba la sogs 'grub/ /so so'i rjes su 'grub mdzad cing/ /rang gi de nyid gnas la sbyor/ /zhes so/ /ci gnyis su
300a7(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i rang bzhin la so sor bzhag ce na/ lam pa'i dbang du byas te gnas skabs kyi bye brag gis dbye ba'o/ /ci ye shes kyi bye brag gzhan dang mi mthun par bstan ce na/ sku'i dbang du dgongs pa dang/ ye shes kyi dbang du dgongs pa dang/ rigs kyi
300b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang du dgongs pa dang/ phrin las kyi dbang du dgongs pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las rnam par snang mdzad stong nyid sku/ /ye shes chen po he ru ka /gnyis med mnyam pa gar dbang phyug/ longs spyod rdzogs sku nyi ma ste/ /sprul pa'i sgo nas rta mchog ston/ bde chen rdo rje sems
300b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i sku/ /sangs rgyas drug gi rang bzhin no/ /gnyis med lhun gyis grub pa'i sku zhes pa dang/ yang rigs kyi sgo nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad mchog /thub pa chen po'i don bzhin bstan/ /rdo rje 'dul ba he ru ka/ khro rnams khro pa'i mchog gis so//
300b3(rgyud 'grel): dag mdzad pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ chags bral chags pa'i tshul gyis zhugs/ /rin chen rigs drug nyi ma mchog/ mkha' las rin chen char chen 'bebs/ /las kun mdzad nyid rta mchog ste/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo bskor/ /rigs rnams kun gyi bdag
300b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni/ /drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen mchog ces pa dang/ /ye shes ni rtog pa bsdus pa las/ /me long khrag 'thung rgyal po ste/ /mnyam pa nyid la gar dbang mchog/ so sor kun rtog nyi ma yin/ /bya ba la ni rta mchog ste/ /chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas ni/
300b5(rgyud 'grel): thub chen rnam par snang mdzad do/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ni/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /zhes so/ /phrin las ni rtog pa bdun pa las/ /zhi 'gog mya ngan 'das zhen rnams/ /'dul mdzad rnam snang srid gnas bzhugs/ /zhe sdang du dra sogs
300b6(rgyud 'grel): ? phyir/ /drag gi pho he ru ka dang ldan/ /gti mug sgro bskur mdza' bral mdzad/ /dag pa'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma dbang/ /srid zhen las chags 'jungs pa rnams/ /'dul mdzad nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /le lo dar rgyal phrag dog sogs/ /mthu yis
300b7(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa'i rta mchog dpal/ /nyon mongs spyi yi lam gnas pa/ /dbugs 'byin rdo rje sems dpa' i sku/ /zhes pa the tshom med do/ /bsgrub pa'i thabs ni de dag nyams su blang ba ste/ /bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan pas
301a1(rgyud 'grel): rig ma la brten te nyams su blang ba'o/ /las dang po pa'i dbang du 'od kyi reg ma la brten te/ sgrub pa ni/ de yis dam tshig de byung ba/ /sdug pa'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang/ /shin tu sbyor dang sbyor chen po/ /thams cad bdag nyid dam
301a2(rgyud 'grel): tshig mchog/ /sbyor ba'i yan lag bzhi ni sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba dang shin tu sbyor ba dang sbyor ba chen po'o/ /ye shes rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems pa rnam pa lnga mtshon par byed pa ni mngon par byang chub pa lnga ste de'i dam tshig go/
301a3(rgyud 'grel): de las byung ba rgyu'i ni rdo rje 'chang chen po dang/ de dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtso bo drug go /de'i rjes su ye shes kyi yul rigs dang mthun pa'i yum 'od kyi snang ba la myu gu la grib ma 'khor ba'i tshul du bskyed/ rgyan dang cha lugs dang/ mtshan ma'i
301a4(rgyud 'grel): bye brag gis sku gsal bar grub nas/ dbang skur zhing byin gyis brlab pa ni yid du sdug pa'i dam tshig go /phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pas rol pa mdzad cing/ byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer gyis dkyil 'khor mchod pa ni bdag rjes su 'brang
301a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ste rjes su sbyor ba'o/ /de la 'od zer gyis 'gro ba sbyang ba dang/ rnal 'byor sbyang ba dang/ rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni shin tu sbyor ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas pa rnams kyi skye mched drug dang gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab cing
301a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'i 'bras bu bsam pa ni sbyor ba chen po ste/ /de ltar snod bcud kyi dngos po thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid du bsgoms zhing de la gnas pa ni dam tshig gi mchog go /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ ye shes tsam
301a7(rgyud 'grel): la snyoms 'jug pa/ /?? pa zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /yum ldan byin brlabs rol pas mchod/ /gzhug pa rjes su sbyor ba'o/ /dag mdzad dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas/ /'phro 'du shin tu sbyor ba yin/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur
301b1(rgyud 'grel): las rdzogs pa/ /sbyor ba chen po zhes bya zhes so/ /tshul dang yon tan ni gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa/ lhan cig spyod pa'i rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma mchog tu 'bar/ /'di ltar tshogs kyi sgrub pa dang//
301b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i bsgrub pa dang/ rdzas kyi bsgrub pa dang/ sman gyi bsgrub pa dang/ mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa dang/ rigs 'dzin bsgrub pa dang/ phyag rgya chen po'i bsgrub pa dag la ni/ rigs 'du dang/ dkyil 'khor rim bzhin pa dang/ dkyil 'khor
301b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa dang/ dpa' bo gcig pas bsnyan sgrub bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug par bya'o/ /des ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i mthu dang gzi brjid mchog tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtog par bdun pa
301b4(rgyud 'grel): las/ /dang po'i las can rnal 'byor pas/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags te/ /'od kyi rig ma la brten nas/ /sbyor pa bzhi dang ldan pas 'grub/ /bsnyen dang nye bar bsnyen pa dang/ /sgrub dang sgrub chen tshul bzhin pa/ /bsnyen pa
301b5(rgyud 'grel): las la 'jug pa ste/ /nye bsnyen gcig bzhin spyod pa'o/ /lhan cig spyod pa sgrub pa'i las/ /rjes spyod sgrub chen 'bras bu'i mchog ces pa dang/ yang bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi sgo nas/ sgrub pa rnam bdun las la 'jug /tshogs sgrub phyag rgya'i
301b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa dang/ /rdzas dang sman dang mngon shes dang/ /rigs 'dzin sgrub pa phyag rgya che/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i lam dag gam/ /dkyil 'khor drug gam gcig pa 'am/ /dpa' bo gcig las 'jug par bya/ /zhes so/ /gang zag mchog tu gyur
301b7(rgyud 'grel): pas ni/ /dbang po yul dus kyi spyod pa la brten te sgrub pa'i phyir/ thams cad dga' ba ma lus pa'i/ phyag rgya thams cad bde ba che/ /rtag pa dam pa lha mo yi/ /rgyal mos mchod pa thams cad mchog /na rig phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang/ phyi'i
302a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang po yul dus kyi rnam pa thams cad yab yum thabs dang shes rab kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bsgom zhing/ dbang po drug yul la 'jug pa'i tshul/ /gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad pas dga' ba ma lus pa ste zag pa
302a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i bde ba chen po 'phel zhing/ phyag rgya thams cad kyang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no/ /de nyid rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pas rtag pa dam pa ste/ thams cad mnyes par mdzad pas na mchod pa'i mchog go /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las
302a3(rgyud 'grel): yul drug phyag rgya rnam 'phrul ba/ /thams cad gnyis med rol pa'i yum/ /zhes pa dang/ yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang /gzugs phung? chos dbyings ye shes che/ /mig la sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /rnam gsum gzugs dang rol mdzad de
302a4(rgyud 'grel): brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnams par 'phrul/ /tshor ba kun rtog ye shes che/ /rna ba rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /rnam gsum sgra dang rol mdzad de/ /brtan g.yo dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /'du shes mnyam nyid ye shes che/ /lce la pad+ma gar dbang rgyal/ /
302a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam gsum ro dang rol mdzad de/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /'du byed bya ba grub pa'i las/ /sna la rtag mchog rol pa ste/ /rnam gsum dri dang rol mdzad cing/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /rnam shes me long
302a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes che/ /yid la rdo rje he ru ka /rnam gsum chos dang rol mdzad de// brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul zhes so/ /des ni bde ba chen po'i sku yon tan gyi rtsal ma 'gags pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sbyor bar byed do/ /ye shes
302a7(rgyud 'grel): la cung zad dbang ba dang yang dag par dbang bas ni phyag rgya'i rig ma la brten te bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ sh+rI rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba dang/ /thams cad lha mor 'dus pa ni/ /ma lus bskal pa bzang po kun/ /bde ba so sor rjes su 'grub
302b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa dang nye bar bsnyen pas gsal bar byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor ba dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba'i tshul bzhin du/ rigs kyi phyag rgya mo dag byin gyis brlab cing rol pa brtsams te/ sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po'i rim bas longs spyod na/
302b2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid kyis ni dngos grub ma lus pa kun gyi skal pa bzang po kun so sor rjes su 'grub pa'o// //de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ gang zag 'bring pos sbyang bya ba/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/ /rang gi cha lugs gsal ba yis/ /sgrub pa so sor rjes su
302b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub ces so /phyag rgya la rol pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' che ba'i lha/ /bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas phyag rgya dang rol pa'i tshul du spyod pa'o/ /ji ltar zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang lha mo thams cad snyoms
302b4(rgyud 'grel): par 'jug pa ste/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i/ /lha mo bde ba chen mo kun/ /thams cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos/ /sdig med stobs kyis mngon mthon du gang zhig thugs byams pa dang snying rje'i chu yis brlan zhing byang chub kyi sems kyi rol
302b5(rgyud 'grel): chags pa'i rnal 'byor bas ni/ sdig pa byed pa'i mngon mthon du phyag rgya mo thams cad bkug ste long spyod pas zag bcas kyi bde ba la brten te/ zag pa med pa'i bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang bdag nyid gcig pu 'am/ /zhen phan tshun du ni rab dga' 
302b6(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed/ /chags pa'i ros dbyes pa chen po'i bde ba bskyed de 'gro ba'i dpes nye bar sgrub bo/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /phyag rgya rol pa'i snyoms 'jug gis/ /phyogs bcu dkyil 'khor mnyes mdzad cing/ /lha
302b7(rgyud 'grel): mo'i tshogs rnams ma lus pa/ /shes rab dbyings la bzhugs byas nas/ /rab tu dga' ba de'i mchod pa yis/ /skyes bu'i tshul gyis longs spyod do/ /zhes so/ /de las byung ba'i sgrub pa byang chub sems kyi mchod pa ni/ /dbang po kun las byung ba yi/ /mchod
303a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi/ /bkod pa rab 'byams tshogs rnams kyis/ /thams cad bdag nyid mchod par byed/ /lus gzungs rnam pa bdun las khyab pa'i brten pa ni lhan cig skyes pa ste/ dbang po rnam pa lnga la gnas shing so
303a2(rgyud 'grel): so'i las thams cad la 'jug pas gsal ba'i bdag nyid rlung rnam pa bcu dang/ phyogs gcig tu rgyu zhing srog gnas pa'i rten byed de/ rtsa gsum nas ba spu bye ba bzhi 'bum gyi bar du 'phro zhing 'du ba'o/ /de las byung ba'i mtshon par
303a3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems kun tu spro zhing rang gi dkyil 'khor mchod par byed pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i rten mdzad ba/ dbang po kun las byung ba yin/ /byang chub sems sogs bde ba'i rgyun/ /ba spu kun gyi
303a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas spro/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes pa dang/ /'gro ba'i don la sbyor bar mdzad ces so/ /sgrub pa'i yan lag bzhi'i thog ma dang bar dang dngos grub blang ba'i dus su ni las dang mthun pa'i dbang sbyin par bya ste/ rnal 'byor bde ba
303a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gyis/ /dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba/ /rin chen tshogs rnams thams cad kyis/ /rab tu myong bar dbang bskur 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yi bde ba ni/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i don rtags gnyis kyi bde ba dang ldan pa ste/ des
303a6(rgyud 'grel): na dri ma'i tshogs thams cad 'khrud par byed cing/ /b+ha ga dang ling ga mtshan ma las nges par byed pas rin po che'i tshogs dan ldan te/ spyi bo dang lce steng dang snying ga la sogs pa'i dbang po dang nyams su myong ba'i sgo nas bde ba'i ye shes kyi rgyas
303a7(rgyud 'grel): shing myong ba'i tshul du dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /zag pa med pa'i dga' bde yi/ /ro myang bde chen gnas la zhugs/ /de rtags dbang bskur las byung ba/ /zhu bde gnyis kyi chu bo'i rgyun/ /rin chen tshogs kun gyis
303b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pas/ /rang gi ye shes gnas la sbyor/ /dbang bskur gsang ba bla na med/ /gnas kun dag byed 'bras tshogs bskyed ces te/ /'dis ni gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ tshogs kyi 'khor los slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i bye brag tu yang shes par bya'o/ /sbyor ba
303b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas lha mo la sogs pa'i longs spyod rnams la spyad pa'i phyir/ lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la/ /ci bde bar ni bsten bya ba/ /gang zag bzhi'i sgo nas 'od kyi rig ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya mo dang longs spyod kyi tshogs la dus dang rtogs pa'i
303b3(rgyud 'grel): bye brag dang khams dang grogs la sogs pa'i sgo nas ci bde bar bsten par bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la/ /dus la sogs pa'i bye brag gis/ /bdag gzhan don du 'gyur ba'i las/ /ci bde bar ni bsten par bya zhes so//
303b4(rgyud 'grel): de yang sbyor ba bzhi'i rnam pa gsal bas nyams su blang ste/ dang po'i sbyor ba ni/ bdag nyid che ba'i lhar sbyor bas/ /bdag la bdag gis rab tu mchod/ /mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lngas rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i skur gyur pa ni che ba'i lha ste sangs rgyas kun
303b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag nyid do/ 1 /de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar sbyor zhing/ /rgyan chas dang cha lugs dang dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pas bdag gis mchod pa'o/ /rjes su sbyor ba ni/ rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yi/ /rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing/ /rigs
303b6(rgyud 'grel): dang mthun pa'i yum bskyed pa ni/ /dper na 'od kyi snang ba dang ldan pa'i dus su myu gu la gring ma skye ba bzhin ye shes kyi snang ba chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par 'phrul te/ dbang bskur ba dang byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro bas/ brda
303b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas bskul zhing rol pa mdzad de/ rnal 'byor thams cad kyi don la bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas shing/ rjes su sbyor ba'i mchod pa'i rgyal ba mnyes pa dang 'gro ba dag par mdzad do/ /shin tu sbyor ba ni/ kun la myang bar byed pas na/ shin tu sbyor ba
304a1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur/ 'od kyi bde bas phyi'i mtshan ma sbyangs nas gsang ba'i gnas su brten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o/ /sbyod ba chen po ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi ra sa ya na'i bde ba yis/ rdo rje sems dpa' i
304a2(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'grub cing/ /lang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub/ /skye mched drug byin gyis brlab pa dang/ /gnas bzhi byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ /dbu rgyan gyi byin gyis mtshan ma dang/ /lha mo'i bum pas dbang bskur zhing khrus byas te/ byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun
304a3(rgyud 'grel): ra sa ya na'i bde ba des dpal bzhi 'gyur 'grub pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /bsnyen sgrub yan lag rnam bzhi yis/ /'bras bu nyams su blang bar bya/ /sbyor ba bzhi'i rim pa yis/ /de yi la la rab tu sbyor zhes so/ /sku gsung thugs
304a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sbyor thabs kyi sgo nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen dang /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che/ /rten gyi bye brag bzhin du zab pa dang rgya che ba'i rim pa la sbyor ba bsgrub par
304a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de yang khyad par gyi don du sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsum mchod cing bsgrub par bya ba ste/ sku'i sgo nas ni rnam par snang mdzad dang rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /gsung gi sgo nas pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang rta mchog rol pa'o/ /thugs kyi sgo nas rdo rje
304a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa dang he ru ka'o/ /sngags kyi 'jug gnas pa'i 'phros 'dus yi ge gsum gyi de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa'o/ /dbyings kyi ni rtsa rnam pa gsum dang 'khor lo bzhi'i sgo nas sku gsung thugs kyi gnas sbyang zhing mchod spang? pa'o/ /
304a7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyis ni gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin la sbyor ba'i thabs bde ba chen po'i don mtshon par byed pa ste/ gzugs snang ba dang/ sgra grag pa dang/ sems kyi rtog pa dag de nyid kyi sgo nas bde ba chen po'i ye shes zag med pa'i lam mtshon
304b1(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /de nyid spyod pas 'jug bya ste/ /bsnyen sgrub bzhi yi bye brag gis/ lam gyi 'bras bu bde ba 'grub ces pa dang/ yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis/ /rlung
304b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gnas la dpal mdzad cing/ /bcom ldan kun tu khyab mdzad de/ /rang gi ye shes rnam grol ba'o/ /zhes pa dang yang/ sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa gsum gyis/ /'khor lo'i bde chen dga' ba skyed/ /mgon po rab tu bzhengs nas ni/ /phyogs rnams kun
304b3(rgyud 'grel): tu gzigs mdzad de/ /zhes pa dang/ yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /snang srid mgon po zag pa med/ /rnam par grol ba grol pa'i sku/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rtog pa'i tshogs/ /sgyu ma lhun grub phyag rgyas 'debs zhes te/ lam de dag gi sgo nas ni rigs kyi dkyil
304b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gsal bar 'gyur/ /rigs drug gi sbyor thabs kyi sgo nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /'jig rten dbang po kun gyi gtso/ /rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
304b5(rgyud 'grel): te sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'dzin pa'i rgyal po'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni khro bo'i tshul du he ru ka ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /rigs drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid do/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug
304b6(rgyud 'grel): gis 'gro ba thams cad la spyan ras gzigs pas 'jig rten dbang po ste/ gsung gi rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi mas rgyal srid rin po che'i tshogs la dbang sgyur zhing/ rin po che'i tshogs thams cad las 'byung
304b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'o/ /rta mchog gis ni 'jig rten gyi lha chen po rnams kyi gtso bo mdzad de/ phrin las rnams bzhi'i tshul gyis lha mo rnams kyi gtso bor bzhugs pa'o/ /de dag kyang rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du gang zag
305a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa la dga' ba rnams kyis spros pa'i tshul du sgrub cing nye bar sbyor ba dang/ dkyil 'khor drug po dag bsnyen sgrub kyi rim pa phye ste bsgrub cing sbyor ba dang/ dkyil 'khor gcig gi dbang du sgrub cing sbyor ba'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud las/
305a2(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa'i yan lag rnam bdun du/ /gsal bar nye bar sbyor byas te/ /rjes mthun 'jug pa'i tshul bzhi yis/ /las spyod nye bsnyen zhes bya'o/ /snga ma las ni gnas bsgyur nas/ /rigs mthun gzugs kyis bsgrub par bya/ /lam mthar 'bras bu
305a3(rgyud 'grel): las sbyor bas/ /sgrub chen dngos grub tshul bzhin snang/ /zhes so/ /de'i phan yon ni/ de dag dang ni dga' spyad na/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding/ /lha mo kun gyi grub chen po/ /'khor lo sgyur ba rab tu 'grub/ /sbyor ba dang ldan pas sgrub pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i phun sum
305a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa bzhi la sogs pa bya ba'i yan lag rnams dang bsnyen bsgrub bzhi'i rim pas rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor nyams su blang zhing sbyor bas/ de dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu skye 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding ba dang lha mo chen po'i dngos grub chen po'i
305a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sgyur ba rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas le'u gnyis pa las/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor ba/ /cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur ba yis/ /thams
305a6(rgyud 'grel): cad sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag /bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur zhes pas dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi tshul du sbyor bas dga' zhing longs spyod na/ 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub dang thun mong gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu de nyid sgrub pa'i
305a7(rgyud 'grel): yan lag tu rtsom mam zhe na/ de la brten nas mchog kun kyang tshe 'di nyid la thob par byed de/ bskal pa bye bar mi thob pa/ /sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad de/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis/ bsgrubs na kun tu 'thob 'gyur ba/ /bdag nyid sgrub par byed
305b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog /de ni bdag gis brtag par bya zhes gsungs so/ /dngos grub 'di las gzhan gong na med pa'i phyir/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde mos pa/ /de las rgya chen mchog gzhan med/ /chos can gyi
305b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos po sna tshogs dang/ /chos nyid kyi rnam pa dag mnyam pa dang/ /mi mnyam pas bsdus pa'i nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa dag gi nang na dngos grub kyi dbang phyug ni sku drug lhun gyi grub pa ste/ de nyid la bde bar mos shing gsal bar byas pa las lhan cig rgya che ba'i 'bras bu
305b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan med pa'o/ /de dag thams cad kyang tshe 'di la 'grub par bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen nges/ /'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni/ rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub pa'i/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde mos pa/ /chos dbyings mnyam
305b4(rgyud 'grel): dang mi mnyam pa'i/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i/ /dam pa rgya chen gang yang med/ /dbang phyug kun gyis bde mos pa/ /rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang/ /lam phun sum tshogs pa'i tshul gyis/ /tshe 'di la rigs 'dzin gyi 'bras bu 'thob cing des ni dngos grub kyi
305b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog skye bar byed pa ste/ /mos pa spyod pa'i rigs 'dzin dang/ /las la sbyor pa'i rigs 'dzin dang/ /lam la sbyor ba'i rigs 'dzin dang/ /lam smin pa'i rigs 'dzin dang/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin dang/ /bya ba mthar phyin pa'i rigs 'dzin dang/ /tshul gyis
305b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyi spyod pa spyad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'ong dang/ padmo spyan dang/ yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs chen gyi sa dang/ rdo rje 'chang ba dang/ ye shes bla ma'i sa dang/ bde ba chen po'i sa rnams rims pa bzhin du sbyangs shing cig car thob pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i
305b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las/ /bsnyen bsgrub bzhi yi rim pa yis/ /'dod pa'i don la rab sbyor zhing/ /de dag dang ni dga' spyad na/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba yis/ /gtso bo gang yang rung pa 'gyur/ /tshe 'dis rigs 'dzin 'thob cing/ /des na bde ba chen po
306a1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub ces pa dang/ yang/ rigs 'dzin rnam pa bdun gyis ni/ /ngang gi ye shes gnas sbyor zhing/ /gsang sngags mthun pa'i khyad par gyis/ /mos pa'i blo dang don mthun ston/ /rnam grol zag med sangs rgyas la/ /mthar phyin 'di'i thob par byed/
306a2(rgyud 'grel): kun tu 'od dang padmo spyan/ /yi ge 'khor lo rdo rje 'chang/ /ye shes bla ma'i sa non nas/ /zag med rtag tu bde bas bzhugs shes pa dang/ rtog pa bdun pa las kyang/ sangs rgyas tshe 'dis bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sku gsum sa la goms par bya zhes so/ /de nyid gtan
306a3(rgyud 'grel): tshigs nges par bstan pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bde/ /'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni/ /rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub med ces gsungs so/ /lha mo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog
306a4(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes te/ sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/ bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas mnyam par sbyor ba/ dngos grub rnam pa gnyis kyi skal ba dang ldan pa de'i bdag nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gsal bar byed pa'i gnas
306a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtog pa ces pa'i le'u gsum pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o// //gang zhig de kho na nyid kyi don shes pas/ de nyid nyam su blang zhing bsgom pa dang/ bsgrub pas gsal bar bya'o/ /de'i grogs ni spyod pa'i rim pa ste/ yang gang zag bzhi'i sgo nas
306a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug par bya'o/ /de'i phyir rtsa pa'i rgyud las/ rang bzhin gnas pa'i shes byed thabs/ /bsgom zhing sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /grogs mchog spyod pa'i rim pa ste/ /gang zag bzhi yi tshul gyis 'jug ces so/ /dang po spyod pa spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ /'di ni rnal
306a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bcom ldan nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ snang ba sring pas bsdus pa'i brtan g.yo'i dngos po 'di dag ye shes rang byung ba'i mtshan nyid la snang ba ste/
306b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab rnam par 'phrul pa ngang gi de kho na nyid dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das nyid du bzhugs pa'o/ /de'i sku drug lhun gyis grub pa ni ngo bo las so gzhan du g.yo ba rdul tsam yang med pa ste/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad kyis spyod par mi nus pas na de la ni
306b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' dang bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i tha snyad sna tshogs su grags te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid do/ /de dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas sgo gsum nas bya ba'i las thams cad gsang sngags kyi don bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad dang
