306b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par sbyor ba/ mkha' 'gro bde ba'i tshul bzhin du spyod do/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las rang gi ye shes de nyid mthong/ /rang gi cha lugs rnam gsal bas/ /de nyid spyod dang mthun pa'i las/ /rnal 'byor ba yis dor mi bya/ /ngang tshul 'di la gnas pa yi/ /blo ldan de nyid
306b4(rgyud 'grel): skal ba bzang zhes so/ /dang po gang zag gsum gyi thun mong gi spyod pa phyogs gcig tu bstan ba ni/ lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing/ /skal ba bzang po mchog 'dod pa/ /yang dag sbyor pa'i bde myong ba/ /'dod chags ther zug brtan pa can/ /las dang po bas ni rigs
306b5(rgyud 'grel): drug gi dbye bas rnam par phye ste thabs dang shes rab drug cu rtsa bzhi'i sgo nas lha mo kun dang sbyor zhing dbang bskur ba dang/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang bsgrub pa'i mchod pa dang/ srog rtsol gzung ba'i don du skal pa bzang po mchog gi 'dod pa la longs spyod de/ yang
306b6(rgyud 'grel): dag par sbyor ba'i bde ba'i chu rgyun dbab pa dang bskyil pa dang slar gyen du bzlog pa'i bde ba myong nas/ chags pa gnyis dang bral ba'i tshul du chags pa gnyis la longs spyod cing/ ther zug tu brtan par gnas so/ /ye shes la cung zhing dbang ba dang/ ye shes la yang
306b7(rgyud 'grel): dag par dbang bas ni/ don gong ma'i tshul gyis las kyi phyag rgya la brten te/ bde ba'i ye shes ma skyes kyi bar du bde ba gzung ba dang/ thabs dang shes rab mthong zhing dmigs pa tsam gyi skal pa bzang po'i mchog tu gyur pa dang/ zhu bde rnam pa gnyis las skyes
307a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don rang gis gnas thams cad nas bsdus shing thams cad du spros pa dang/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod gzhan dag kyang tshul bzhin du rang gi phyag rgya la longs spyod cing yang dag par sbyor ba'i bde ba chen
307a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i sku ther zug tu brtan pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ thabs dang shes rab spyod pa'i sgo/ /'jug pa'i las kyi blo gros mchog /rten gyi rim pas legs sbyor zhing/ /'dod chags chen po bstan par gnas/ /
307a3(rgyud 'grel): dang pos gnas skabs tshul rig rnyed/ /bdag dang 'gro ba'i las la sbyor/ /gnyis pas de nyid mthong gyur te/ /gsum pa dran pa'i yan lag bskyed/ /lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing/ /skal bzang sbyor bde la gnas mchog
307a4(rgyud 'grel): ces so/ /mchog tu gyur pa bzhi pa'i spyod pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang/ /dbyangs dang dri dang ro dag dang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi reg bya'i mchog /rang gi spyad par de spyod do/ /dbang po drug gi yul du//
307a5(rgyud 'grel): spyad pa dag gi dngos rtogs kyi mtshan ma dag ni ye shes snang ba yin te/ gang zhig gnyis su med pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag gis de dag lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du longs spyod na/ bde ba chen po'i
307a6(rgyud 'grel): sku gsal bar byed pa'i zag pa med pa'i ye shes 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam 'byung/ /de dang de yi ngo bo nyid/ /mnyam par shes pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /thams
307a7(rgyud 'grel): cad sangs rgyas rang bzhin snang/ /mig la rnam par snang mdzad mgon/ /rna ba rdo rje nyi ma rgyal/ /sna ni rta mchog nyid yin te/ /kha ni pad+ma gar dbang phyug /yid la rdo rje he ru ka /lus ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'o/ /de ltar yang
307b1(rgyud 'grel): dag sbyor ldan pa'i/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis spyad/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba yin/ /kun za kun byed de bzhin gnas/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de kho na nyid grub par 'gyur zhes so/ /yang las dang po pas ni
307b2(rgyud 'grel): thun mong gi sgo nas bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub pa/ /gzungs dang sa rnams de bzhin du/ /dga' bar spyod na lha dang mi'i/ /bskal bzang bud med smos ci dgos/ /mtshan nyid kyi theg pa dang thun mong
307b3(rgyud 'grel): gi sgo nas tshogs bsags cing lam spyad ste 'bras bu mngon du bya'o/ /de nyid gang zhe na/ drang ba'i sangs rgyas sa bcu pa'i rgyud la gnas pa dag ni yon tan gyi rnam pa gzung ba'o/ /lam ni sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/
307b4(rgyud 'grel): bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs dang/ stobs dang/ smon lam dang/ ye shes kyi rnam par bsdus pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'o/ /des ni mthun pa'i 'bras
307b5(rgyud 'grel): bu so sor 'grub pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo bzhi dang sa bcu rnams dga' bar sbyor ba'i mthus/ skad cig la 'grub par byed do/ /lha dang mi'i bud med la sogs pa ni smos kyang ci dgos so/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /
307b6(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i las can rnal 'byor pas/ /rgyu rkyen lam dang 'bras bu dang/ /rgya chen thun mong spyod pas spyad/ /thams cad cig car rdzogs pa'i tshul zhes so/ /de yang mtshan nyid kyi theg pa ltar yun ring du dka' ba spyad
307b7(rgyud 'grel): pas 'grub pa ni ma yin te/ skad cig ma gcig la rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /phan yon ni/ lha'i dngos grub dka' ba dang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /skal pa chen po bde myong ba/ /so so'i rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur/ /
308a1(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i sgo nas rjes sgrub ste/ /dman pa'i dngos grub 'jig rten phal pa dag gis 'grub par dka' ba dang/ mchog gi dngos grub sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bde chen rdo rje sems dpa' skal pa bzang po'i dngos grub dag thabs
308a2(rgyud 'grel): so so'i sgo nas rjes su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /spyad par bya ba'i thabs ni dngos po thams cad ni rigs kyi gtso bo gang yin pa'i yab yum du dmigs la/ rang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar gsal bas bsgrub cing longs spyod par bya ste/
308a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thams cad las byung ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal/ /skal pa bzang po'i longs spyod kun/ /rang gi spyod par de spyod do/ /'dir dang po'i tshig ni snyan la snyog go /rten dang rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu mdzad pa'i dngos grub
308a4(rgyud 'grel): gang yang rung ba dag la longs spyod pa'o/ /da yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ skal pa bzang po'i sbyor mthu las/ /dngos grub bcu drug 'bras bzang dpal/ /bsnyen sgrub bcu drug gnas las skyes/ /dngos grub thams cad las byung ba//
308a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin skal bzang longs spyod mchog /bcu drug rten gyi bye brag gis/ /mtshan nyid rim pa gnas bzhin du/ /rang gi spyad par de spyod do/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rigs kun bdag /'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis brgyan//
308a6(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug sa la spyod pa'i mthus/ /chos rnams ma lus bde bar spyod ces so/ /dang por rten bcu drug ni gang zag bzhi'i dbye bas bye ste/ las dang po pas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dgongs pa nas gzung ste/ sbyor ba'i bar du gsal
308a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /rjes su sbyor ba'i bar du gsal ba dang/ shin tu sbyor ba'i bar du gsal ba dang/ sbyor ba chen po'i bar du gsal ba'o/ /ye shes la cung zhig dbang bas ni yang gong ma'i gnas nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang/ mdun
308b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang/ gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang/ phyag rgya bzhi'i 'phro 'du la dmigs pa'i bya ba'o/ /ye shes la yang dag par dbang bas ni bzlas brjod dang thig le dang phra mo dang rnam pa dag la rigs kyis sam/
308b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang sku gsung thugs 'phro 'du dang bzhi po gsal ba'i rnam pas so/ /shin tu rnam par grol bas ni dbang po yul dus thams cad dkyil 'khor rags pa'i rnam pa dang/ cha phra ba'i rnam pa dang/ snod stong gnyis med du gsal
308b3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /de ltar rten gyi sgo nas phye ba'i lam bcu drug des ni/ rigs 'dzin rnam pa bdun yang bsdus so/ /gsal bar gyur ba ni rtags lnga po mthar phyin pa'o/ /yang rgyud la las ni rtags lnga'i sgo
308b4(rgyud 'grel): nas gang zag bzhi dbye zhing bstan na 'dir ni gsal bar bshad pa med do/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /bcu drug rten gyi mtshan nyid kyis/ de gsal la ma grangs bcu drug ste/ /rigs 'dzin gnas mchog tu bskyed nas/ /rgyal pa'i zhing
308b5(rgyud 'grel): khams drug la sbyor zhes pa dang yang/ /sbyor ba bzhi'i bye brag las/ /las dang po yi ting 'dzin bsgrub/ /dmigs pa bzhi yi tshul gyis su/ /cung zhig ye shes dbang ba rnyed/ /yan lag bzhi yi 'phro 'du las/ /ye shes
308b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' gnas mchog gsal/ /rags phra stong nyid bde ba'i rgyas/ /shin tu rnam par grol ba yin zhes so/ /bsnyen sgrub bcu drug ni rigs kyi lha/ /gang yang rung ba gcig la dmigs pa'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi dang/ rigs kyi dkyil
308b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bar yang rung ba gcig la dmigs pa'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi dang/ rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bsgoms pa'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi dang/ rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa'i bsnyen sgrub yan lag 
309a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /mngon byang sbyor ba'i sku bskyed de/ /rigs rgyan gsal ba bsnyen pa'i las/ /'od ces myu gu'i grib ma bzhin/ /grogs gsal nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin/ /byin brlabs dbang
309a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur bskul mdzad cing/ /sbyor ba bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems tshogs kun 'byung gnas/ /las tshogs sgrub pa chen po'i tshul zhes pa dang/ yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms shing/
309a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyes mdzad bzlas pa gnyis kyi las/ /rdzogs pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bsnyen/ /bsnyen pa gsal bas nye bsnyen yin/ /phrin las yan lag kun ldan pas/ /'dod don sgrub pa'i las sbyor zhing/ /'bras bu shes pa'i las dag
309a4(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /dngos grub sgrub pa las chen tshul/ /zhes pa dang/ yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa/ /thugs rje che dang ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor/ /zhi ba'i mchod pas mnyes pa dag /
309a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen ba'i don du de dag gis/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin blta/ /phrin las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor las/ /nye bar bsnyen pa goms byas nas/ /snga ma las ni gnas bsgyur te/ /sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam/ /
309a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub chen po blang ba'i phyir/ /bskal pa'i me dpung 'khrigs pa bzhin/ /mtshan ma brtan po mthong ba na/ /sgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya zhes pa dang/ /yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /bsnyen bsgrub yan lag rnam bzhi'i tshul//
309a7(rgyud 'grel): rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang/ /ye shes tshogs kyi 'khor lo yis/ /rigs kyis 'khor lo rabs mdzes pa/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i las kyis sgrub ces te/ bsod nams
309b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs la bsdus pa dang/ rgyas pas bsnyen pa dang nye ba'i bsnyen pa ye shes kyi tshogs bsdus pa dang/ rgyas bas sgrub de dang sgrub pa chen po'o/ /dngos grub bcu drug ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /ral gri mig sman rkang 'gyogs shugs/ /bum pa ril bu
309b2(rgyud 'grel): gser 'gyur rtsi/ /bdud rtsi bcud len rigs 'dzin mo/ thun mong las mchog dngos grub yin/ /bkra shis dngos grub bzang po ni/ /kun tu sku gsung yon tan thugs/ /'gro zhing khyab mdzad dpal gyi gzhi/ /mi 'jigs stobs mchog rgyal
309b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i tshul zhes so/ /sa bcu drug ni yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rigs 'dzin rgyal po tshul dag gis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rjes mthun gus/ /theg pa thun mongs spangs te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor zhing/ /sa mchog bcu
309b4(rgyud 'grel): drug gnon mdzad de/ /rang gi bde chen gnas la bzhugs zhes so/ /ci skabs 'dir de dag bstan par mdzad ce na/ spyod pa dang lta ba dang bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i grogs kyi yan lag ste/ des ni tshig gis zor yang pa'i gnas su bsdu ba'i
309b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir gsungs pa yin no/ /de las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste de la ni skal ba bzang po zhes bya'o/ /de nyid kyi yon tan gyi snang ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyang/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i rnal
309b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas rang gi sbyad par spyod do/ /de ltar bdag gi don du rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan dag la'ang sbyor zhing btsun mo dang dngos grub la sogs pa dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje can gyi grub mchog dang/ /'jig rten dbang po mchog gi dpal/ /
309b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dag pa'i bde dam pa/ /phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed/ /dpal he ru ka rdo rje'i rigs las khro bo chen po'i skur snang pa'i yum kro d+hi shwa ri ma dang ye shes byin rlabs rnams bkug cing bdag gir nye bar longs spyod pa dang/ dpal
310a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ni 'jig rten dbang po dang/ de'i yum mchog dpal na bza' dkar mo dang/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi yum bde dam sangs rgyas spyan ma 'gug pa'o/ /yang gsungs pa/
310a2(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum dag na ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas rgyal srid chen po kun/ /rtsal gyi stobs kyi mngon mthon du/ /phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed/ /dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i rgyud la mnga' ba'i che ba'i yon tan dang/ khams gsum gyi rgyal
310a3(rgyud 'grel): srid dang/ yum mA ma kI dag phrogs pas nye bar spyod par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po/ /mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag /kun nas phrogs te bde spyod na/ /longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /dpal rta
310a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi che ba'i yon tan dang ye shes dang/ yum sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen mo dang mchog gi dbang phyug ma bkug ste longs spyod do/ /de dag ni bdag gi don du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i longs spyod pa ste sngags dbyibs
310a5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyis don bzhin shes par bya'o/ /nga ni 'jig rten pa la longs spyad pa'i tshul gyi gzhan don bya ba'i phyir/ mthu chen las ni bkra shis brtan/ /'phrog las grub dang dran las dga' / /mngon mthon stobs kyis
310a6(rgyud 'grel): grogs nas kyang/ /de ni dad la sbyin par byed/ /lam pa'i dbang du bsgrub pa'o mthu yis/ 'jig rten pa'i lha chen po dag gis chung ma sngar bsdus nas bdag gi spyod pa dang/ 'gro ba gzhan la sbyin par mdzad pa'o/ de yang
310a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum gyi drag po dang/ phrag mo'i tshogs thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i lha chen po rnams yin la/ de dag gi slob dpon ni khyab 'jug yin te mthu chen po dang/ de'i chung ma bkra shis brtan ma'i dbang phyug ma sngags
310b1(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyi nus pas bkug pa dang/ dbang phyug chen po mahA de ba skye 'gro thams cad kyis mdangs 'phreg par mdzad pa'i chung ma dka' bzlog grub pa tho bkug pa dang/ 'dod pa'i lha dran pa'i dga' rab dbang phyug gis chung ma dpal ldan phreng ba ma
310b2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba mo bkug pa'o/ /de la mngon mthon gyi stobs kyis 'phrog pa'i rim pa ni 'di ltar yin te/ gang zhig snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis byang chub mchog tu sems skyed cing pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa rlabs po che'i sgo nas/ rang gi dam tshig skyong zhing
310b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la phan pa'i don du yang brtsam par bya ste/ lha chen po'i mtshan ma yod pa'i gnas su phun sum tshogs pa bzhi dang ldan pas/ sgo gsum byin gyis brlabs pas rigs kyi lhar sgom zhing/ bdag dang 'gro ba sbyangs pa dang gsal bar bya ba dang/
310b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang po bsam pa dang/ 'phags pa la yan lag bcus mnyes par bya ba dang/ tshad med pa'i 'jug pa dang/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang/ bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rten gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ mdun
310b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs nas bzlas brjod la sogs pa'i mtshan rtags gsal ba dang/ khyab 'jug gyi dkyil 'khor bri ste ba'i rnam lnga la legs par sbyar bas byugs pa'i 'dab ma brgyad kyis mtshan pa'i dkyil
310b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sngon po la me tog sngon po bkram zhing mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'i rdzas dang/ mchod pa thams cad kyi gtor ma'i phyag rgya shes pa'i rdzas rnams dang/ khyad par du lce dpog dkar po bdun sbyor du byas pa 'am spyan ras gzigs kyi ril bu dang
310b7(rgyud 'grel): ru sbal gyi snod du gi wang dang mdar gsum sbyar ba'i rgun chad dang/ g.yos sna dgu las sbyar ba'i gtor ma brtsam par bya'o/ /der rten gyi 'khor lo khyab 'jug gi sngags kyis bskor ba dang/ ba so'i mchod rten du sbyor zhing me tog sngon po dang/ bdug pa la
311a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas bkad ba'i rin po che'i snod dam kham phor gyi nang du bzhag nas/ rang gi sa bon dang sngags kyis skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dgug gzhug dang mchod pa'i las kyis mnyes par byas te/ rang gi sngags kyis brtan par
311a2(rgyud 'grel): byas na mtshan ma mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis me tog sbyin par byed de gnas pa las/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan zhing mchod nas sngags dang phyag rgyas zil gyis gnon cing mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ste/ snod kha sbyar ras
311a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon pos dkri par bya'o/ /yang lha mo gnyis bkra shis ma'i rten gyi 'khor lo'i sngags kyis brgyan pa gur gum gyis byugs te/ rin po che'i snod du me tog dkar pos bkad nas rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug par bya'o/ /sngags 'bum
311a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis me tog gi char 'bebs shing sgra sang sang sgrogs te/ gsang sngags 'bum gyis ni gzugs ston par byed do/ /de nyid zil gyis mnan cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan par byas la/ dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlab pa byas na dga' ba'i
311a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha mos sgrub pa po la a las zhes rjod cing rin po che sbyin par byed re mdun du gnas so/ /de la bka' sgo pa byas pas bdag gis dbang du 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i las 'grub par byed do/ /des ni sngags kyi tshul gyis
311a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug cing rang gi lha chen po lha yang gsol bar byed de 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bran bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lha chen po'i gzhan chung ma la sogs pa dbang du byed do/ /rgya cher rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan
311a7(rgyud 'grel): 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor ba yis/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams sbyor zhing/ /bsgom bzlas cho ga gsal ba yis/ /dngos grub dbang phyug bde ba'i mchog /bzung zhing gzhan la sbyin par byed/ /mngon mthon stobs kyi sbyor ba yis//
311b1(rgyud 'grel): mthu chen la sogs rmongs mdzad cing/ /'ongs sbyor tshogs dang chung ma dag /bdag gis spyod cing gzhan la sbyin/ /sgrub pa'i gnas mchog nyams dga' zhing/ /lha chen mtshan pa'i gnas yod pas/ /'bras bu me tog ljon pa'i tshal/ /chu bo'i dogs su
311b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya ba/ /phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan pas/ /rdzas dang sa bzhi cho ga brtsam/ /dkyil 'khor sngon po gru bzhi la/ /sgo bzhi phreng ba khyams dang bcas/ /'bras bu pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /me tog sngon pos mngon par brgyan/ /sna tshogs mchod
311b3(rgyud 'grel): gtor nyer sbyar zhing/ /khyad par mchod pa dgram par bya/ /'khor lo ras la legs bris pas/ /rtse brgyad mu khyud nyis rim mdzes/ /gi wang sna ma'i khu ba dang/ /rims dang ren de'i rdzas bzhi'i yis/ /dbus dang rtse mo mu 'khyud byug /
311b4(rgyud 'grel): khru gang tshad du bca' bar bya/ /dbus su haM maM he raM bek+Sha/ shar du ma no ri bsum/ lho ru bruM k+Sha kruM ta ta Da/ nub tu suM bag Shan tsa ra/ byang du ni ran d+haM me ha/ /mtshams su klung d+haM ru baM si/ /u thA shu Ta khaM b+ha be ta Ta/ na mo sarba su ga ta k+Sha/ /mdza' 
311b5(rgyud 'grel): lnga lnga yi mtshan ma bri/ /dbyangs rang gsal byed mu khyud la/ /khams kyi rgyud las grub pa yin/ /gnod mdzes me tog lnga ldan par/ /ba so'i mtshan ma 'khor lor bcas/ /legs bzhag bdug pa'i dri sbyor bsag /rdo rje sems sogs
311b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yi/ /mthu chen 'khor bcas dgug bya ste/ /dam tshig rdzas kyis mnyes pa dag /sngags dang phyag rgyas brtan par bya/ /sde mtshan dgu yi gsang sngags la/ /oM dang swAhA thog mthar sbyin/ /rtse gcig gsal ba'i bzas brjod kyis/ /rim
311b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dgug sogs las la sbyar/ /des ni mtshan ma 'jigs tshul ston/ /nag po drag chen khros pa'i tshul/ /'khor lo rtse gsum mda' dang gzhu/ /sgra sgrogs mkha' la 'phyo ba las/ /rdo rje brjod gnod phyag rgyas bcing/ /mdun nas me tog sbyin par byed/ /zil gnon dam tshig
312a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bstan/ /mchod cing dam tshig bsgrag par bya/ /rang gi gnas su phyin pa las/ /slar nyid mnan cing phyag rgyas bsdams/ /yul dang phye ste rin chen sgrom/ /mchod rten ras sngon dag gis dgag /oM aM b+hu ba ga ta
312a2(rgyud 'grel): na ra ya ni dza dzA/ /dam tshig sngags kyis bskul byas nas/ /'khor lo'i mtshan ma bri bar bya/ /snga ma bzhin du brtsams pa las/ /gur gum bzang pos byug par bya/ /dbus su de bi sid+d+hi dza/ /phyogs mtshams mu khyud sngags mthun bri/ /
312a3(rgyud 'grel): gnod mdzes me tog dkar pos dgad/ /oM dang swA hA mdzes brgyan pa'i/ /rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug /gsang sngags 'bum gyi grangs tshangs pas/ /mkha' las me tog char pa 'bebs/ /sgra skar sna tshogs sgrogs par
312a4(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /'bum tsho gnyis kyis ma sdug gzugs/ /gsum gyis legs pa'i gzugs ston 'gyur/ /gzugs 'dzin bkra shis padmo'i mdog /dmar gsal rtse gsum pad+ma 'dzin/ /zil gnon dam tshig phyag rgya bstan/ /dbang bskur
312a5(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab par bya/ /dga' ba'i bzhin mdangs rgyas pa yis/ /sgrub pa po la slar smras pa/ /ngo mtshar chen po a la la/ /lag gi rin chen sbyin par byed/ /mdun nas bsgo ba dbang bskor te/ /'dod pa'i las rnams grub par
312a6(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /sngags kyis sbyor ba mthu nyid kyis/ /gsang sngags dkyil 'khor 'jug par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya dgrol ba'i cho ga yis/ /mthu chen lha la gsol 'debs shing/ /slar yang 'khor bcas tshogs pa yis/ /bran bzhin 'dod
312a7(rgyud 'grel): pa kun grub mdzad/ /oM haM tsakra na ya ra ni bsdu? kampa la d+ha ha ru pa hUM phaT swAhA/ oM na mo pi mu sam de pi kaM pa la rad nan hUM smri ta ya phaT swAhA/ /'khor lo rtse gsum phyag rgya che/ /sgrub pa'i las la sbyor bar 'gyur/ /dbang phyug
312b1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba gnas mdzad pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rnal 'byor pas/ dkyil 'khor sngo gnag gru gsum la/ /dbus su dri shul mtshan mas brgyan/ bru bzhi sgo dang mtshams su bcas/ /pad+ma me 'od phreng bas bskor/ /mchod pa'i rgyan rnams thams
312b2(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis/ /sna tshogs nye bar mdzes byas te/ /nyi ma mu tig sgron ma'i rdzas/ /rul sbal snod du gzhag steng grab/ /dri sna lnga'i bdug pa dang/ /dri sna bdun pa'i ril bu dag /bdud rtsi gi wang mar dkar dang/ /nya phyis snod bcas bzhag par bya//
312b3(rgyud 'grel): gro ga la sogs las bris pa'i/ /'khor lo rtse gsum mtshan ma can/ /lte ba rtsibs brgyad mu khyud gnyis/ /sor tshad bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /dbus su kaM shI shwa ra ya/ shar du ma hA de ba ho/ nub tu ba ri su tha g+ha/ lho ru par+Na sha ba ri/
312b4(rgyud 'grel): byang du hUM phaT taT thu muM/ /mtshams su lam pa b+huM g+huM hUM dza/ pra mo sa ra b+hinDa ya/ ni nur rat+ta gri ha ra/ hUM mthar swA hA thog mar oM/ mu khyud ye shes lnga bcu can/ /rin chen snod mdzas sbrang rtsi can/ /me tog dri bcas bzhag bya ste//
312b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya sngags kyis lha chen dpal/ /dgug gzhug 'khor lo la gnas bya/ /dbang phyug chen po drag po'i gzugs/ /rin chen nyi zla'i snyan cha phreng/ /sngon skya rab 'jigs thod pa thogs/ /mig gsum ral pa'i mtshan ma can/ /tri
312b6(rgyud 'grel): shul dgra sta ral gri dang/ /thong pa sha khrag bkang ba 'dzin/ /'khor bcas sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra/ sum 'bum sngags kyis gzugs ston 'gyur/ /dam tshig zil gnon phyag rgya sngags/ /las kyis rjes su mthas pas
312b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub/ /gnod brjid sngags kyis brgyal mdzad nas/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis rmongs par 'gyur/ /lha mo ljang skya thod pa thogs/ rgyan phreng na ra'i mtshan ma can/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs dga' mdzad nas/ /snyoms 'jug
313a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i tshul du gnas/ /lha mos chags pas yid g.yos te/ /sgrub pa po la slar gsol ba/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub ci gzhed pa/ /myur bar skangs te bran du bgyi/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa
313a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dir/ /bde ba'i ye shes bstan du gsol/ /phyag rgya'i grol ba'i las rnams kyis/ /dbang phyug chen pos bslang byas nas/ /dbang bskur dam tshig rab sbyor mthus/ /bde ba'i ye shes bskyed par mdzad/ /gtso bo bde chen a la la//
313a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsum mchog a la la/ /bdag cag ngo mtshar bde skyed mdzad/ /ci 'dod dgos pa bsgrub par bgyi/ /oM na mo bi tsar Ni mahA bde ba/ /ma hA ru kaM pa la hi ha ha ha ha hUM phaT swAhA/ /tri shul phyag rgya sngags bcas kyis/ /las rnams kun
313a4(rgyud 'grel): la sbyor bar byed/ /sna tshogs gnas kyis brgyan dga' bar/ /sna tshogs lha mo'i tshogs 'phrul zhing/ /me tog dmar pos nyes mdzes par/ /dkyil 'khor dmar po bri bar bya/ /dbus su mda' yis mtshan phreng mdzes/ /bar khyams sgo dang
313a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bri/ /gang ba'i bum pa rgyan tshogs tshad/ /rin chen snying po can nang du/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo bzhugs par bya/ /rtse brgyad mda' yas mtshan byas pa'i/ /lte ba mu khyud phreng ba can/ /sor mo bcu drug ras la bri/ /dbus su d+haM
313a6(rgyud 'grel): haM hUM hUM hUM/ shar du pheM phaT pheT tad+dwa /lho ru sid+d+hi gre ta su/ nub tu raM ta ma h+ri hi/ byang du g+ha g+ha sar rdung/ mtshams su hu hu la he/ ? ga te shtsar ru ka maM bok+ta tra ta ta ra/ ha(rgyud 'grel): sde lnga lnga phyogs dang mtshams/ /mu khyud dbyangs dang gsal byed
313a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM haM(rgyud 'grel): sngags sbyor bas/ /lha chen phyag rgya gsal bar dbab/ /ser skya rin chen rgyan phreng mdzes/ /snang ba'i mda''dzin myos pa'i dpung/ /drag mo gnas rgyal rin chen skyes/ /'dod pa'i gnas la longs spyod 'phrul/
313b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags rgyal pos bskur mdzad nas/ /sum 'bum grangs kyi gzugs ston 'gyur/ /aM d+haM kA ma de ba ru lu b+hyo na mo b+hyo/ /ha ri stsanya rag+haM saM b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo hUM phaT swAhA/ mda' yis phyag rgya sngags bcas mthus/ /rang gi las la bskul bar
313b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rab tu nyer sbyor nas/ /'dod pa'i las rnams gnas 'jug ste/ /mchod pa'i kun gyis brgyan pa'i gnas/ /der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam bya ste/ /gru bzhi dbang chen dbyibs 'dra ba/ /rdo rjes mtshan ma gser gyi mdog /
313b3(rgyud 'grel): dbus su pad mtshan mu khyud can/ /bar khyams sgo nas bcas par bri/ /rtse brgyad 'khor lo mu khyud kyi/ /'phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa la/ /oM i id sarba/ shar du phra ma bri shaM ru/ lha ru shAn+ti nA ga hUM/ nub tu hUM phaT bri gu taM/ byang du
313b4(rgyud 'grel): trig mu raM su/ mtshan su brem ze ku mu ra/ /ga tra ru gaM laM ba saM/ /ba ra ba ra saM ba ra/ /phaT kyi mthar thug sde dgu pa'o/ /gnas rer lnga lnga bri bar bya/ /ma khyud yi ge lnga bcus mtshan/ /'khor lor rtse mor brgyan pa bri/ /gur kum dri
313b5(rgyud 'grel): bzang ma bsgos pa'i snod/ /rin chen rgyan gyis spras pa ru/ /'khor lo 'bras kar sngags bcas bzhugs/ /rang sngags phyag rgya dgug cing gzhug /zil gnon dam tshig phyag rgya bstan/ /mchod cing las la bskul bar bya/ /zhib gser
313b6(rgyud 'grel): mdog gdong bzhi ba/ /rgyan mdzes 'khor lo'i phreng ba 'dzin/ /gsang stags sum 'bum grangs kyis ni/ /rnam pa gsum gyi tags ston 'gyur/ /rmongs shing brgyal bar byas nas ni/ /lha mo dbang du bsdu bar bya/ /mtshangs? pa rin
313b7(rgyud 'grel): chen phreng ba 'dzin/ /mdzes pa kun gzugs gser gyi mdog /dbang bskur byin brlabs rol par mdzad/ /lus bskyod dga' ba de'i ye shes rgyas/ /oM pra ma ni g+ha ta pa ra h+ra ni d+ha ya/ oM A hUM hUM phaT swA hAM/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya
314a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags bcas mthus/ /las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed/ /bzang po kun spyod rnal 'byor gyis/ /sa stengs rgyal po'i gnas bsdad phyir/ /dkyil 'khor dkar po rgyan ldan par/ /me tog dkar po gtor bar
314a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /dbus su pad+ma rdo rje gsum/ /ma khyud par khyams sgo bcas bar/ /'khor lo'i rtse mo brgyad dag la/ /rtse gsum rdo rjes mtshan pa ni/ /ras la sor tshud bcu bzhi pa/ /rams dang lhang tsher bsres pas bri/ /dbus su a a bi
314a3(rgyud 'grel): ma le/ /shar du in+d+ra b+hi ha ho/ /lho ru bruM suM a a am/ /nub tu tsaN+Da shwa ri twaM/ byang du he he rung ta no/ /mtshams su na mo she ka lu/ /he ha mu ni taM/ Tra Tra ba ra sa mo ba ra hUM/ hUM gi mthu can gnas dgur dgram/ /mu khyud gnyis la
314a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal byed dbyangs/ /rgun 'brum la sogs me tog gis/ /dus gsum du ni mchod byas te/ /gsang sngags rgyal pos gzhug byas nas/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas brten par bya/ /dbang po gangs ri mig stong po/ /rdo rje rtse
314a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum rgyan phreng mtshan/ /sum 'bum sngags kyis las sbyor zhing/ /lha mo kun dang rol bar mdzad/ /oM in+d+ra ye sad+ga ma nu rak+Sha a'in+d+ra b+h+ruM g+he ta TU ha ma ha ra no phaT swAhA/ /rdo rje rtse gsum sngags kyi mthus /ci 'dod dngos grub
314a6(rgyud 'grel): thob par mdzad/ /gang zhig bzlas dang sgrub pa dang/ /bsgom zhing gzung bar ma byas kyang/ /phyag rgya 'chang ba'i yon tan gyi/ /tshad bzung ba ni nus ma yin/ /bsrung dang rgyas sogs lam rnams la/ /dbus mthar lha dang bsrung
314a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang/ /yi ge brgya ba ming sngags spel/ /khyim du legs par mchod byas na/ /bu 'dod pas ni bu rnyed cing/ /dpal 'dod pas ni dpal thob 'gyur/ /tshe dang bar mdzod rgyas pa dang/ /nad med rtag tu bde bar 'gyur zhes
314b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs te/ de ltar lha chen po'i tshogs rnams dbang du mdzad nas bran bzhin du 'gyur te/ bdag gis 'dod pa thams cad skod zhing de nyid las dag pa'i rnal 'byor bas gzhan la yang sbyin par mdzad do/ /yang 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal
314b2(rgyud 'grel): srid ma lus pa rnams la longs spyod pa'i phyir/ ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid/ /'jig rten dbang phyug kun dang bcas/ /mngon 'thon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang/ /de ni dad la sbyin par byed/ /'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa na
314b3(rgyud 'grel): yod pa'i rgyal srid lha'i rgyal po dang klu'i rgyal po dang/ mi'i 'khor lo sgyur ba dang/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po la sogs pa'i yon tan rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ rang gi las las grub pa'i rdzas dag kyang bsdu bar mdzad na gzhan ni lta ci smos so//
314b4(rgyud 'grel): de las rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor ba yin/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ /bzlas bsgom cho ga rdzogs mdzad cing/ /'jig rten bkod pa nyams dga' bar/ /phun
314b5(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs pa'i dgos pa 'grub/ /rin chen bum pa bzang po mdzes/ /cha rigs nyi shu rtsa bdun ldan/ /dkyil 'khor re'u mig dgu ba yis/ /gnas dgur mchod pa'i rgyan bcas dag ma/ /bsnyen bsgrub bzhi'i rim pa yis/ /rang
314b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs lha yi gsang sngags la/ /sbyor ba spel te brjod byas na/ /'bum tshogs gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /na ma artha sid+d+ha g+ha ha na lo tsa ni ma ma sid+d+hi ku ru ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa dgu yis/ /las la sbyor
314b7(rgyud 'grel): zhing dngos grub brang/ /bum pa bzang sogs las rnams kun/ /'di yis 'grub par the tshom med/ /ces so/ /de ltar na las chen po dag kyang 'grub na gzhan ni lta ci smos te/ tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen gyi/ /cho ga gi dbang phyug
315a1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa dag /kun nas phrogs te myur sbyin na/ /longs su spyod gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /khams gsum kun gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang/ /lha rnams kyi slob dpon 'jug sel dang/ /'dod khams kyi bdag po
315a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug chen po dang/ /sa steng gi bdag po sbyin bdag gi mchog ste dbang po dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdag po dga' rab dbang phyug dam pa'o/ /'dod par byed pa'i 'bras bu ni mchog gi las la sbyong ba ste/ de yis mi
315a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin ci yang med/ /sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun/ /mi bya ba ni gang yang med/ /sbyin pa dang ni byed pa 'ang yin/ /de kho na nyid kyi don la gnas shing bsnyen bsgrub kyi yan lag ldan pa'i spyod pa 'dis ni/ rnam par grol ba'i 'bras
315a4(rgyud 'grel): bu skyed cing thams cad 'grub po/ /mchog gi dngos grub kyi don du thams cad la longs spyad de gzhan la yang sbyin par bya zhes pa'o/ /ji ltar de dag 'grub bam zhe na/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang/ /phyogs nas kyang
315a5(rgyud 'grel): ni sbyin byed na/ /las mchog dag ni rab 'byam dang/ /dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /'jig rten pa'i lha klu mthu bo chi dang/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ /rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems
315a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dag gis kyang 'grub par mi nus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan las byung pa dag rnal 'byor pas 'grub par byed de/ ci de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin shes pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ zag
315a7(rgyud 'grel): med ye shes las byung ba'i/ /bde ba chen po'i gnas sbyor ba/ /de yis mi 'grub gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dka' ba min/ /rang nyid byang chub sems sbyor bas/ /rang gi rang bzhin 'grub phyir ro/ /de yang 'jig
315b1(rgyud 'grel): rten pa dad 'das pa yis/ /lta mdan so so'i rgyud 'grub min zhes so/ /de dag spyod pa'i phan yon bdag gi don du/ /dngos grub mchog ni gdon mi za/ /sde rnams thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /gang zhig 'dod pas bya ba'i 'bras bu las mchog
315b2(rgyud 'grel): tu gyur pa de ni bde ba chen po'i sku las byung ba dag go /ji ltar na lam dang 'bras bu thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa'i ste/ nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan zag pa med pa'i ye shes la snang bas mi mthun pa'i bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa 'dul
315b3(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad pas so/ /de yang gzhan gyi don du ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po/ /'khor lo sgyur ba rab tu 'grub/ /de nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /dpal ldan dngos grub mthar phyir rgyal/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rgyas pa'i
315b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad cing/ /bya ba thams cad ma lus grub ces so/ /tshul ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che/ /rnam par 'phrul
315b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rab tu 'jug /le'u gnyis pa'i lta ba'i ron bzhin du shes shing rtogs par byas nas lnga pa'i sgo nas yid ches par 'jug cing gsol bar gyur pas/ gsum pas phyag rgya chen po'i lam sgrub cing/ /bzhi pa'i de'i don du spyod
315b6(rgyud 'grel): na/ sku drug lhun gyis grub kyi snang ba las byung ba'i sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul chen po ni/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po drug la sogs par 'phrul cing/ de la dgugs dbyung ba grangs med par snang ba'i sgo nas sems
315b7(rgyud 'grel): can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /gzhan yang mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis sems can gyi don spyod pa la/ /mtshan nyid kyi theg pa la slob pas 'dul ba'i lam dag gi phyir la lar byang chub sems chen pos/ la lar spyod dang mthun par
316a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro /zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs te/ gang zhig dus la lar thugs rje chen pos gzhi gzung ste/ byang chub mchog tu thugs rin po che rnam pa gnyis bskyed cing sbyangs pa dang/ dus la lang
316a2(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams kyi tshogs mang pos gzhi gzung ste/ lam rnam pa lnga spyad pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang/ dus la lar dga' ldan gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 
316a3(rgyud 'grel): dam pa tog dkar gyur nas lha rnams las mngon par mtho ba'i gnas su bzhugs te/ 'od zer spro zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa ston par mdzad pa/ dus la lar sngon gyi smon lam dang/ 'phral gyi
316a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen po mtshungs pa'i dbang gis phyogs bcu na bskul ba'i sgra gcan nas nyid kyi sku glang po che'i gzugs kyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen po'i lhums su zhugs nas 'khor rnams la chos ston pa dang/ dus la lar yum la
316a5(rgyud 'grel): rab lum pa'i tshal du yum gyi mchan khung g.yas pa'i sgo dral te mun rum nas glog 'gyur pa bzhin du bltam ste phyogs bzhir gom sna pa bdun bdun por ba dang/ gzhon nu rol rtsed mdzad pa la sogs pas 'jig rten gyi bya ba
316a6(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin par mdzad pa dang/ dus la lar khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste dka' ba spyod pa dang dus la lar byang chub kyi shing drung du rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par sgribs pa'i dri ma thams cad dag ste tshogs
316a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa dang/ dus la lar bdud bzhi'i tshogs bcom zhing rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang/ dus la lar gdul bya'i rgyud dang mthun pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rim gyis bskor bar mdzad pa dang/
316b1(rgyud 'grel): dus la lar mu stegs kyi ston pa drug la sogs pa rnams thabs mkhas pa'i mdzad spyod kyis tshang bcad pa dang/ dus la lar sprul pa'i sku mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul gyis gdul bya le lo can gzung ba dang/ chos thams cad 'dus
316b2(rgyud 'grel): byas kyi tshul du bstan pa'o/ /gzhan yang sprul pa'i dbang du byas na cig car sdong gsum gyi 'jig rten rnams la thugs rje chen po'i mdzad pas don spyod do/ /yul la lar sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa
316b3(rgyud 'grel): nas gzung ste/ yul la lar mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul gyis don mdzad pa'o/ /de dag gi don ni rgya che ba'i sde snod dag las rgyas par gsungs so/ /gang zag dbang po khyad par du gyur pa dag la gsang sngags kyi theg pas don spyod do//
316b4(rgyud 'grel): skus 'dul ba rnams la ni/ la lar 'jig rten sum rgyal ba grub pa kun gyi dbang phyug nyid/ dus la lar dang yul la lar sems can gyi don du ji ltar 'gyur ba bzhin du sku bstan te/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ la lar zhi la tshangs pa'i
316b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs/ /la lar drag po gshin rje'i tshul/ /la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin/ /la lar dus mdza' i me ltar 'bar/ /la lar skye dgu'i mgon mdzad cing/ /la lar skye dgu 'joms par mdzad/ /la lar dkyil 'khor grangs
316b6(rgyud 'grel): med tshogs/ /la lar dpa' bo gcig par snang/ /la lar snod bcud bkod mdzad cing/ /la lar snod bcud stongs par byed/ /la lar zhi khro'i gzugs spong zhing/ /la lar dkyil 'khor sdud par mdzad ces te gdul bya'i tshogs
316b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi sgo nas don bzhin du dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'o/ /gang zhig gsung gi theg pas 'dul ba dag la ni/ /la lar rtog pa thams cad mchog /grub pa'i dbang phyug bla na med/ /phung po dang
317a1(rgyud 'grel): khams dang skye mched kyi bye brag ji lta ba bzhin du/ drang ba dang des pa'i don gnyis las brtsams te theg pa rim pa mang du spros shing gsungs so/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ lta dman byas pa 'dren don du/ /
317a2(rgyud 'grel): rtog ba dman pa'i lam bstan te/ /gnas ngan dka' sbyar zhen pa'i shugs 'khor ba'i ngan song gnas mi mthong/ /rtog pa'i sgrib tshogs gnas mdza' yis/ /rnam grol ye shes mthong mi 'gyur/ /cung zhig rnam grol las gzung
317a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /shes rab snying rje gnas mos pa'o/ /grol mdzad theg pa mdza' las sgo/ /rnam thar sa la rab sbyor mdzad/ /bya dang spyod pa la mos pa/ /gsang sngags don spyod theg chen mchog /rang gi ye shes gnas 'jug cing/ /sngags
317a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar rgya chen lhar sbyor ba/ /'jig rten bya ba rab grub ste/ /bdags pa'i 'bras bu gyis mthar phyir/ /rab sbyangs shes rab blo mchog la/ /gsang ba zab mo'i tshul bstan te/ /rang gi bde chen dbang phyug mchog /sna tshogs
317a5(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa grol bar snang/ zhes so/ /yang mdzad pa rgya chen po'i sgo nas/ /de la sogs pa mdza' yas mchog /sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis/ /'dul pa'i thabs su nges pa'i gar/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'i dgyes shing rol//
317a6(rgyud 'grel): mngon du nyams su myong bas grub pa'i yon tan gyi mdzad pa mdza' yas pa'i sgo nas gzhan du spyod de /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po chen po'i sku de nyid la/ /sku gsung gshegs pa'i gsungs rab la log bar spyad bas dregs byed
317a7(rgyud 'grel): sde can chung ma nyi shu dang bcas par byung ngo/ /de la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i spyi'i lam pa dag gdul ba'i don du ston pa chen po'i ye shes kyi snang ba rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid rdo rje
317b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i cha lugs kyis lha mo nyi shu'i tshogs dang bcas par rnam par 'phrul te snang ngo/ /de dag gi gleng bzhi rgyas par ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las rgya cher bstan to/ /'dir ni cung zhig tsam gsungs pa'i don bshad par bya ste/ dang po sku
317b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ye shes kyi mtshan nyid ni/ 'di'i rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /nye bar mngon sum bar snang ba'i dbang
317b3(rgyud 'grel): po drug gi spyod yul 'di dag rang byung gi ye shes chen po'i snang ba yin te/ de nyid la rang gi ye shes chen pos rnam par sbyor bas rtogs pa sngon du gyur nas che ba'i yon tan thams cad la mnga' brnyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
317b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i skur snang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin no/ /de nyid kyi tshul gyi ci zhig ce na/ gang zhig sangs rgyas gnyis kyi rnam pa'i sgo nas thams cad la mnyam par sbyor zhing mkha' 'gro rgyu ma bde ba'i dang
317b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul can no/ /sa ma yo ga'i sgras thams cad mtshon pa'i byings can te/ sende ba'i sgra bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro'i rnam pas gnas skabs lngar 'jug par byed de/ ye shes shugs kyis mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis
317b6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ grub pas mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ rang bzhin gyis mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ las kyis mkha' la 'gro ba ste/ de dag thams cad kyang bde ba mchog gi rang bzhin no/ /de las sku rnam pa drug gi tshul du snang ste/
317b7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar/ /chos thams cad dbyings skye ba med pa rang gi mtshan nyid yang dag pa'i rnam par gnas pa de nyid ji bzhin pa'i ngo bor shes par bya ste/ shes rab rnam pa
318a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi sgo nas rtogs shing grub pa la gnyis su med pa'i don gyis gcig pu nyid du gnas pa'o/ /de nyid las rang nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan mi zad pa'i snang ba dang/ gzhan gyi rgyud la snang ba'i don grub pa'i
318a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul du/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sku rnam pa gnyis kyi snang ba sna tshogs kyi rnam par sbyar ro/ /de'i sku drug lhun gyi grub pa'i mtshan nyid de bsdus pa'i don gyi gnyis su med pa'i sku dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i sku dang/ bde ba chen
318a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i sku dang gsum duAng sbyar te/ de dag sku gsum spyi'i mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /sku dang ye shes gnas sbyor ro/ /rnal 'byor chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /
318a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yid/ /zhes pa dang/ rtog pa bdun pa las kyang/ yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid/ /sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa/ /rnal 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bde
318a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes so/ /da ni ston pa'i mdzad pa las dgongs pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir ro/ rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad la/ /grub pa'i dam pa mchog gi mchog /gzhi las 'khrul pa'i 'gro ba dag dang/ /lam las 'khrul pa'i mu stegs pa/ /
318a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i rtog pa'i lta ba'i ri bo lnga dang/ ri bo drug dang/ ri bo nyi shu dang/ ri bo drug cu rtsa gnyis dang/ ri bo bcu gnyis dang/ ri bo bzhi dang/ ri bo bcu drug dang/ ri bo gnyis kyis mtshan ma de dag gnyen pa'i rtog pas
318a7(rgyud 'grel): bcom zhing/ de las rten te 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub dang/ thun mong gi dngos grub kyi sgo nas mchog gi dngos grub kyi lam la sbyor ba'i phyir/ grub pa dam pa mchog gam/ mchog gi mchog bstan par mdzad do/ /de yang rtsa ba'i
318b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las/ /rtog pa de nyid gzhom pa'i phyir/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang/ /sna tshogs rgyud don gsungs mdzad cing/ /mchog gi dngos grub mchog thugs yon tan phrin las kyis 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs rnam par grol pas
318b2(rgyud 'grel): nges pa'i don bstan cing spyod par mdzad do/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang/ /sna tshogs las byung phrin las kyis/ /'dul ba'i thabs su nges pa'i gar/ /thams cad don la rnam par grol/ zhes so/ /gang
318b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid la bdag don lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul ni/ dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /bstan pa dbang phyug chen po'i bdag /gzugs dang tshe dang kha dog stobs/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin/ /lam
318b4(rgyud 'grel): la rnam par spyod pa'i mthus/ /dngos grub chen po'i mchog 'grub ste/ /rtag tu rang gi rgyud la gnas pa'i dbang phyug brgyad dang/ /dpal bzhi 'gyur 'grub pa'o/ /de'i yon tan gzhan yang/ 'gro ba dag gis bsnyen bya zhing/ /de
318b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod/ /lha mo kun gyis dpal ldan mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dngos grub thob pa 'di la/ khams gsum gyi skye 'gro kun
318b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i sgo nas bsnyen bkur byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis ni mchod par mdzad cing lha mo kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur te/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin no/ /gzhan yang 'bras bu yon tan dang bcas pa'i sgo nas
318b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan don mthar phyin pa'i tshul ni/ sems can khams ni du ma dag /ma lus par phyag rgyas 'debs/ /lha dang byang chub dka' ba rnams/ /brtan par sems can dag la sbyin/ /rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i phung po'i tshogs
319a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan zhing/ byed pa med la rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos can dag ni sems can gyi khams so/ /de dag la lus pa rnams la sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyas 'debs shing lha'i dngos grub
319a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bla na med pa'i byang chub dag brtan par sems can la sbyin par mdzad do/ /ci dus lan re tsam du 'am zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis/ /sems can kun gyi don byed cing/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yis/ /
319a3(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas/ /sku drug gi 'phrul pa de nyid kyi sgo nas sems can kun gyi don mdzad cing/ /gcig tsam gyi don mdzad pa'i/ phyir yang bskal pa'i bar du gnas pa'o/ /de dag ni lam gyi sgo nas rnal
319a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa'i mdzad spyod dang/ mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu'i mdzad pas sems can gyi don bya ba'i rim pa bstan te/ de nas khyad par du le'u drug pa dang/ le'u bcu pa'i don yang 'grel to/ /de dag bsdus pa'i tshul du
319a5(rgyud 'grel): le'u yi mtshan nyid sna tshogs thams cad kyi skal pa bzang po mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ste/ dpal dam tshig gi rtog pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rnal 'byor pas spyod pa dang sgrub pa'i las sna tshogs spyod zhing longs spyod pas na
319a6(rgyud 'grel): skal pa bzang po'o/ /de nyid 'bras bu'i mchog la longs spyod pas na mchog gi dngos grub ste/ lha mo'i dkyil 'khor dang mi 'byed pa'i dam tshig la longs spyod pa'o/ /le'u bzhi pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o/ /gang dag gi
319a7(rgyud 'grel): don du gang gis glang ltar byung zhing gang zhig bshad pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ sngon byung ston pa'i dgongs mdzad dang/ khyad par gyi gling gzhi yis yid tshed par bya ba dang/ rjes su 'jug pa'i bya bas don nyams su blangs pa'i
319b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ le'u lnga pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa gsungs so/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /cho 'phrul bkod pa'i gleng gzhi yis/ /'jug pa po rnams yid ches mdzad/ /rjes mthun bsgrub par bya ba'i chos/ /ting 'dzin ye shes gnas la
319b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor/ /mtshan bcas mtshan med rim pa bzhin/ /khyad par mngon sum gsang gsum sku/ zhes so/ /de yang cho 'phrul bkod pa'i gleng gzhi ni bskal pa bzang po rgyan gyi dus su/ sangs rgyas dpal sde bzang po'i bstan pa la dge
319b3(rgyud 'grel): slong grol ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis de bzhin la sbyor/ /zhes so/ /de yang thugs rje skye ba'i yul dang mthun par sbrul pa'i tshul ni/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yis/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang/ /
319b4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /de dag gdul bya sems can gyi/ /rnam par rtog pa mdza' yas te/ /gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug nas gzung ste/ grangs med pa'i bar du gnas pas/ de dag 'dul
319b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing bde ba la dkod pa'i phyir/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las sna tshogs kyi sgo nas las kyi sbyor ba so sor bstan cing/ dge slong grong ba'i rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa spyi'i lam la gnas pa dag 'dul ba'i
319b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir mdzad do/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ nyon mongs rnam par rtog pa'i chogs/ /gcig nas gzung ste grangs med par/ /spyi yi lam pa gdul don du/ /rigs bdag sku la sna tshogs ston/ /cho ga sna tshogs bye brag gis/ /bde
319b7(rgyud 'grel): chen rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas/ /zhes so/ /'o na thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dang po ji ltar zhe na/ bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul bas/ /sems can kun don rnam sprul na/ /myur du shin tu
320a1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur/ /de yang sku'i sgo nas 'phrul pa dang/ /ye shes kyi sgo nas 'phrul pa dang/ /rigs kyi sgo nas 'phrul pa dang/ gdul bya'i sgo nas 'phrul pa dang/ de dag thams cad mthun pa'i sgo nas 'phrul
320a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ mi mthun pa'i sgo nas 'phrul pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid las/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul mdzad/ /sku dang ye shes rigs dang ni/ /phrin las mthun dang mi mthun tshogs/ /dkyil
320a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gcig la'ang sna tshogs skur/ /rnam 'phrul rang gi bya ba yis/ /sems can kun don rnam 'phrul zhing/ /zag med ye shes de bzhin nyid ces so/ /de dag gis ni dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul zhing don mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid
320a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i/ /de ni rjes 'jug gi dbang du byas te le'u gnyis pas nas 'byung ba bzhin du shes pas de nyid kyi don la 'jug cing sgrub pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i rim pa yis tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la spyod pa bya ste/
320a5(rgyud 'grel): dang po rab 'bring gi dus su ni/ nyin re 'am yang na zla re 'am/ yang na de bzhin lo re ni/ ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang/ /sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o/ /dang por rdo rje sems dpa' i gsang ba'i don rnam par
320a6(rgyud 'grel): dkod ba las gsungs pa bzhin du/ 'gro ba thams cad snying rje chen po'i blos dmigs te/ bdag dang gzhan sgrol ba dam bcas nas lus ngag yid gsum sbyor zhing nas mthu bskyed de/ sgo gsum byin gyis rlab cing gsal
320a7(rgyud 'grel): bar byas nas 'phags pa la tshogs bsag pa dang/ sems can la tshogs bsag pa dang/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang/ gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rten gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dmigs pa
320b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin rjes su 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor la sogs pas dus rab 'bring tha ma gsum gyi sgo nas phyag rgya'i rig ma byin gyis brlob bar bya ste/ gnyis su med pa'i bde bas 'phags pa mchod cing sems can gyi don byas
320b2(rgyud 'grel): nas bde ba'i ye shes gzung bar bya'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ g.yon phyogs gnas las tshul bzhin du/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar/ /gar mkhan tshul 'dra sgyu ma'i rgya/ /de yang 'ja' tshon gzhin du gsal/ /'dod
320b3(rgyud 'grel): chags ye shes gsal ba'i phyir/ /'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /thim pas rgyal mor byin brlabs nas/ /ye shes dam tshig chen po yis/ /bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon te/ /padmo rin chen ldan byas nas/ /dbyings
320b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi bde chen byung ba na/ /rang rig ye shes de la 'od/ /ji bzhin mkha' la gsal ba dag /dri med nyi ma'i 'od pas 'tsher/ /byang chub sems de kun tu dag /khams gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang/ /ma lus nye bar khyab byas nas/ /
320b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod bar bya ba rab tu mnyes/ /'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzung/ /de dag dngos grub chen po las ji ltar 'dod po'i nan tan bya zhes pa/ /de la tshogs bsags pa'i brten ni/ /khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang/
320b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin srog dang rtsa las byung/ /rang gi lha yi cha lugs su/ /sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bya/ /dang po rgya chen po las khyad par gyi sgo nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa po dag gis dmigs pa'i don gsal zhing
320b7(rgyud 'grel): grub par bya ba'i phyir/ gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa rin po che'i khams las byas pa 'am/ srog chags rgyu las byung pa rA dang bso dang rus pa las byas pa 'am/ rtsi shing gi rgyu las byung ba 'am/ rang gi lha'i cha
321a1(rgyud 'grel): lugs dang mthun pa'i sku dang/ phyag mtshan dang rgyan la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bya zhes pa'o/ /yang zab mo'i dbang du byas te/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas rlung
321a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gsum dang 'khor lo bzhi dang dbang po drug gi snang ba de dag ni khams kyi ngo bo yin la/ de la yi ge rnam pa gsum gyi 'phro 'du dang/ dbang po yul dus kyi 'phro 'du dag ni srog rtsa las byung ba'o/ /de ltar thabs dang shes
321a3(rgyud 'grel): rab gnyis su med pa'i rang gi lha'i cha lugs su/ bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /zhes so/ /de nyid la 'jug pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bsten pa/ sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis/ /slob ma'i
321a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kun de dang der/ /mchod pa byas nas de sgrub po/ /rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor gang yang rung bar dbang dang dam tshig thob pa'i lha de nyid lhag pa'i lha ste/ de'i dkyil 'khor la ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal bar gnas shing/ sna
321a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis phyag rgya las 'phrul pa'i mchod pa tshogs rnams kyis dkyil 'khor mchod de bsgrub par bya'o/ /de dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sgo nas tshogs bsag cing bsgrub par bya ba bstan te/ des ni
321a6(rgyud 'grel): le'u drug pa dang gsum pa'i don yang 'grel to/ /de yang rtog pa bdun ba las rang gi ting nge 'dzin gsal ba yis/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsam te/ /de nyid sgrub pa'i las kyis ni/ /bde chen mtshan ma med pa'i sku zhes so/
321a7(rgyud 'grel): da ni rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor de nyid las rang gi dkyil 'khor dang mthun pa'i rgya chen por sprul pa'i tshul bstan te/ de las gzhan yang rtog pa kun gyi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul ba/ /ci rig pa ni sprul byas pa'i/ /
321b1(rgyud 'grel): gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad dang/ rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud thams cad dang 'di las rnam par skros te/ thams cad kyi spyi'i bdag nyid du gnas pa dang/ yang khyad par du rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
321b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po drug gi bdag nyid du gnas pa dang/ de las kyang khyad par du rang nyid kyi rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi dang/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu dang/ rim pa bzhin du bstan pa'i
321b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor nyi shu dang/ rgya cher sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa drug gi byung tshul bsgrub bar bya ba'i rim pa dang bcas par rtsa ba'i rgyud las rgya cher bstan te/ 'dir ni bsdus pa tsam 'ba' zhig gi lo rgyus bshad par
321b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor sna tshogs su snang ba yang sangs dbyung gi mtshan nyid do/ /des na/ sems dpa' sems dpa' i snang ba ste/ de nyid ni sangs rgyas drug gi dbyugs dbyung gi mtshan nyid do/ /des na/ sems dpa' 
321b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi mdos/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'dod chags chen po'i sgo nas nyon mongs pa spyi'i lam la gnas pa dag /rdo rje 'chang
321b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po nyid kyis 'dul bar mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ste sangs rgyas drug gi rnam pa can no/ /de dag gi rang bzhin ni/ 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ rtag pa dam pa brtan pa ste/ /rtag tu da
321b7(rgyud 'grel): ltar byung ba bzhin/ /ngo bo nyid ni 'da' bar dka' / /sku drug lhun grub kyi sangs rgyas 'di nyid ni rnal 'byor chen po'i mtshan nyid can te bcom ldan 'das so/ /de nyid rtag tu rang gi rang bzhin gyis gnas shing/ 'gro ba'i
322a1(rgyud 'grel): don du bzhugs te bde pa chen po'i sku ni rang bzhin gyis ma 'gags par bde ba chen po rtag pa chen po'i dbyings su gnas pa dang gnyis su med pa'i sku ni gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnam par rtag
322a2(rgyud 'grel): par gnas pa de/ ngo bo nyid kyi skus ni thams cad la khyab pa'i tshul gyis rtag par gnas pa dang/ ye shes kyi skus ni gsal ba rtse gcig pa dang bcas pas rtag par gnas pa dang/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni yon
322a3(rgyud 'grel): tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rten gyi sgo nas rtag par gnas pa dang/ sprul pa'i sku ni rgyun mi chad par 'byung ba'i sgo nas rtag par gnas pa'o/ /des na rtag par dag pa brtan pa'o/ /de ltar sku drug gi rnam pa'i tshul gyis
322a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pas na dam pa bstan pa'o/ /de nyid mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhugs pas na rtag tu de ltar byung ba bzhin du/ mi 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid du gnas pas 'da' dga' ba'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /
322a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /sku drug lhun grub rtag pa las/ /rang bzhin ngo bo la gnas te/ dus gsum 'gyur med par bzhugs zhes so/ /de nyid kyis thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas gdul bya'i don mdzad pa'i
322a6(rgyud 'grel): tshul ni/ cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la/ /las kyi spyod pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /'dul ba'i phyir ni byas pa yin/ /gang zag bsdus pa la dga' ba dang/ /shin tu yang rgyas pa la dga' ba
322a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ cho ga sna tshogs kyi sgo nas lha bsgom pa mi 'dra ba dang/ sngags dang phyag rgya mi 'dra ba dang sgrub pa'i rim pa dang/ phrin las kyi rim pa mi 'dra ba'i las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs bstan te/ de dag ni sangs rgyas
322b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i skus kun rdzob tu 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyir byas pa yin no/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ /ji lta ji ltar 'dul gyur pa/ /de lta de ltar 'gro ba la/ /'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis/ /sems can
322b2(rgyud 'grel): don la rab tu sbyor zhes so/ /da ni phan yon bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ kun gyis dngos por 'di 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ phyi nang snod bcud kyi dngos po 'di dag rten dang
322b3(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin te/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin no/ /gzhan dag ni go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs dbyung ba'i rnam par bshad pa'o/ /da ni chags pa'i
322b4(rgyud 'grel): mdza' dang bral ba ni zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la bzhugs pa rnams dang/ blo chung zhing shes rab gzhan pa'i skye 'gro mdza' dag dang bskal pa gzung dka' ba'i dus su sangs rgyas stobs mchog seng+ge'i
322b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa la/ dge slong bzod pa can zhes bya ba byung ste/ des yang dag pa'i don phyin ci log tu spyod pa'i dbang gis drag po mun pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs dang bcas par byung ngo/ /de dag 'dul pa'i don du
322b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid las sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo snang zhing dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ /de ltar byung ba'i dus ni/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ bdag nyid chen po rtog pa yi/ /
322b7(rgyud 'grel): gdul bya dang gdul byed gnyis ka'i don du gsungs te/ 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa gzung ka'i dus su sangs rgyas stobs mchog seng+ge'i bstan pa la/ drag po'i mun pa'i tshogs can byung ba'i gnyen por/ sangs rgyas rnam
323a1(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor sngon du byung zhes pa'o/ /rgyu gang las byung zhe na/ bdag nyid chen por rtag pa'i lta ba 'dzin pas 'khor ba dag la sku gsung thugs rtag pa'i sgo nas don mdzad do/ /de las spyi'i
323a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba/ /rkyen gang gis byung ba zhe na/ /don log par spyod pa dang/ log par rtogs pa rnam pa gnyis kyi sgo nas so/ /tshul ni nyon
323a3(rgyud 'grel): mongs pa spyi dang khyad par gyi lam la gnas pa'i 'gro ba'i tshul dang de 'joms par byed pa gnyen po'i tshul lo/ /yang thugs rje skye ba'i yul de nyid ji lta bu zhe na/ de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ shin tu stong pa nyid la rtsom/ /
323a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas/ /'gags shing yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /bskal pa gzung dka' i tshe na sems can snying stobs chung ba dang/ shes rab zhan pa dang/ dbang po dman pa dag las kyi dbang gis phyogs gcig tu  
323a5(rgyud 'grel): smin nas zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas rang gi don bsgrub pa'i phyir/ rgyu'i sgo nas shin tu stong pa nyid kyi lta ba la rtsom pa dang/ lam gyi sgo nas 'gog pa'i cho nyid la sbyor bas 'bras bu'i sgo nas 'gags
323a6(rgyud 'grel): shing yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ phung po lhag med kyi tshul du 'khor ba'i dngos po thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa'o/ /de la thugs rje chen po skyes pa'i tshul ni/ rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan
323a7(rgyud 'grel): 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa kun tu bskyed/ /'khor ba las grol bar 'dod pas lta ba dman pa de dag rnam par sbyang ba'i don du dpal rdo rje sems
323b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' nyid kyi sku'i rnam par 'phrul pa las chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gsum pa dang/ rnam par gyur pa'i
323b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bcu dang/ rim pa bzhin du bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu dang/ rgya cher sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa drug dang/ bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor lnga bcu rtsa brgyad de spyi'i grangs kyi dkyil 'khor bdun brgya bcu
323b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum la rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil 'khor bdun cu rtsa gcig /rnam par snang mdzad dang/ he ru ka dang/ pad+ma gang gyi dbang phyug dang/ rdo rje nyi ma rnams la ni/ mtshungs par dkyil 'khor po rgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad du shes par byas la/ rta
323b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog rol pa la ni dkyil 'khor rgya sum cur shes par bya ste/ de dag gi grangs dang dbye ba rgya cher bstan pa ni rtsi ba'i rgyud kyi le'u bdun pa dang/ brgyad pa dang/ dgu pa dang/ bcu pa dang/ bcu gcig pa dang/ bcu gnyis pa dang/
323b5(rgyud 'grel): drug pa las bstan te/ 'dir ni cung zhig bsdus pa'i rgyud yin pas de dag spro bar mi bya'o/ /des na sangs rgyas sprul pa kun tu bskyed ces bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas par brtan pa de dag las/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad
323b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor gang gi gnyen por byung zhe na/ de nyid 'gags pa'i gnyen por ro/ /de nyid tshul ji ltar zhe na/ zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bsgrub pa'o/ /de dag par bya ba'i phyir de kho na nyid kyi don bstan ste stong pa
323b7(rgyud 'grel): ma yin mi stong min/ dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te/ mu stegs kyis brtags pa nyi tshe ba la sogs pa'i lta ba bsgrub pa'i stong pa dang/ nyan thos kyis brtags pa'i gang zag gis stong zhing zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mdza' la gnas
324a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ mdo sde pas brtags pa'i rgyu 'bras kyi mdza' chad pas bsgrubs pa'i rang gi lta bas rnam par dben pa'i chad lta ba dang/ rang rgyal bas bsgrubs pa'i ma rig pa bkag nas chos kyi khams  
324a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyogs gcig bdag med pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid du 'dod pa dag ni don bzhin du gnas pa ma yin te/ thun mong gi mngon sum pa dbang po drug gi yul du snang ba dang/ khyad par gyi mngon sum gsal bar nyams su myong pa dang
324a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gal ba'i phyir ro/ /'o na stong pa nyid chad par lta ba la sogs pa'i lta ba bkag pas rtag par ther zur bar gnas pa zhig gam zhe na/ de nyid ni so so'i skye bo'i rtog pa'i lta ba ste gzung 'dzin gyi rnam pas gnyis su btags
324a4(rgyud 'grel): pa la spyod pa'o/ /de'i phyir sku drug lhun gyis grub par ngo bo de yod par bden pas stong pa ma yin la/ de nyid rtog pa'i mdza' dang bral ba'i mi stong pa yang ma yin zhes pa'o/ /'o na mdza' rnam pa gnyis dang bral ba'i lta pas
324a5(rgyud 'grel): dbu ma'i don bsgrubs te/ byang chub sems dpa' i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa la spyod dam zhe na/ de yang zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshigs las byung ba bya ba'i don du kun gyis ni rang gi de nyid gsal bar byed pa
324a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ lus ngag gi spyod ba rnam par bsgrubs pa las byung ba bsod nams kyi tshogs bsag pa'i yan lag de dag ni gzhan gyis bskyed pa grogs su 'gyur pa'o/ /ye shes kyi tshogs kyi tshogs de ni yang rang gi rang bzhin gsal
324a7(rgyud 'grel): bar ston par sgo nas mthong ba zhig na/ 'dir ni de mthong ba'i thabs med de/ mu bzhi skye 'gog dang gcig dang du bral la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag ni rjes su dpag pa'i sgo nas gsal bar byed de/ de nyid ni yid dpyod
324b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon sum sgyu ma'i dpe rgyad la dag las te/ de tsam gyi sgo nas ni nyams su myong ba'i don med par bde ba chen po'i sku mtshon par mi nus so/ /de yang bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis
324b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon zhing rang gi mtshan nyid thabs la brten pa dang/ shes rab la brten pa dang/ phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i sgo nas gsal bar nyams su myong ba'i yid ches pa'i phyir ro/ /yang gang zhig mdza' las bltos nas/ dbus
324b3(rgyud 'grel): grub pa las mdza' ma grub pa'i phyir dbus kyang 'grub pa med de/ thams cad rang byung gi ye shes chen po'i snang ba gnyis su med pa'i bde bas khyab par gnas pa'i phyir/ dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/ /de nyid gsal bar
324b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i phyir/ shes rab pha rol phyir sbyor ba/ /thabs kyis snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams/ /de bas de nyid snying rje'i thabs/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal/ /chos thams cad ji ltar sangs rgyas pa'i don la phyag rgya gsum
324b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi sgo nas pha rol tu phyin par sbyor te/ bde ba chen po'i sku dang gnyis su med pa las thabs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul ba'i sku snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid can rnam par ston pa'o/ /de bas na de nyid la snying rje chen po'i
324b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i don te/ sku gsum gnyis med kyi tshul du gsal ba'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ lta dman rnams kyi stong nyid dang/ /brtags pa'i ri bo
324b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhon pa'i phyir/ /chos kun dbu ma tsam sgo nas/ /de 'jug don phyir bstan par mdzad/ /drang ba'i lam la spyod byas pas/ /nges pa'i 'bras bu rnyed mi 'gyur/ /phyag rgya gsum la sbyor ba'i mthus/ /lhun grub snang gsal rang bzhin
325a1(rgyud 'grel): med/ /shes rab pha rol phyin don las/ /thugs rje thabs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal/ /zhes so/ /'o na don de nyid ston par mi mdzad cing dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i rim pa dang/ sna tshogs bshad pa'i bye
325a2(rgyud 'grel): brag rtog pa sna tshogs bstan pa ci las dgongs zhe na/ 'jug pa po'i gang zag dbang po dang khams kyi bye brag sna tshogs pa rnams tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa las bzlog ste/ rtog pa'i sgo nas mi rtog pa'i don bstan pa'i
325a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams la/ /sems can don du yongs rtags la/ /rnam par mi rtog la mos pas/ /thams cad rtog pas brtag par bya/ /de yang tshig dang pos ni rang bzhin bstan to/ /tshig gnyis pas ni dgongs pa'i
325a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid bstan to/ /gsum pas ni lam la gzhug par bstan to/ /bzhi pas ni gnyen po'i nges tshig bstan te/ de dag ci'i bstan zhe na/ rtog pa zhes pa'i nges tshig tu sbyar ro/ /de'i don ni/ rtog pa bdun pa las bstan te
325a5(rgyud 'grel): gong du bshad zin to/ /da ni dkyil 'khor thams cad du lha mnyes par bya ba'i phyir bstod pa'i glu gsungs pa las dang por yon tan brjod pa ni/ brag cha yi ni sgra 'dra ba/ chos kyi tshig tu de 'gyur te/ de las thugs rje chen
325a6(rgyud 'grel): po yi/ /yon tan yang dag rgyas pa glu/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams la/ /nyid kyi yon tan gyi sgo nas tshigs su bcas pa dag brag cha'i rnam pa bzhin du/ sgra sgra mthar stong pa gzung zhing 'dzin pa med pas/ chos kyi de nyid dam tshig
325a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum ston pa'i tshig tu de 'gyur te/ de nyid las de kho na nyid mtshon par byed pa'i theg pa chen po'i glu yang dag pa'i yon tan thams cad rgyas par byed pa 'di ltar dmigs pa chen po dang/ lte ba chen po dang/ sgrub pa
325b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang/ phrin las chen po dang/ 'bras bu chen pos gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i don rjod par byed pa'o/ /des ni sgra'i mtshan nyid dang/ don gyi mtshan nyid bstan to/ /des gang zhig la bstod ce na/ dus gsum pa yi dam
325b2(rgyud 'grel): tshig gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bstod/ /mi 'da' ba' i don gyis na dam tshig ste/ /dus gsum du mi 'gyur zhing rtag par bzhugs pa'i sku gsum gnyis med kyi sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
325b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid du gyur pa la bstod pa'o/ /de la dang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las byung ba/ sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas don mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos kyang thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad par ston pa'i
325b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir mnyam med mi g.yo mnyem nyid mchog gi chos nyid can/ thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad/ yon tan mdza' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i
325b5(rgyud 'grel): me tog chos can/ 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad ni don chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi sku ste/ yon tan thams cad byung ba'i rten gnas su gyur pa'o/ /de nyid kyi rab bzhin gyi sgo nas ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba/ gsal pa'i
325b6(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas ni ye shes kyi sku zhes bya ste/ de gnyis gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas ni chos kyi sku'o/ /de la ni mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa gang gis kyang g.yo bar mi nus pas mnyam med mi g.yo zhes bya'o/ /'di ltar snang ba'i longs
325b7(rgyud 'grel): spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pas brgyan pa la ni mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can zhes so/ /sprul pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa dang mtshan dang mi ldan pa'i rnam pas thugs
326a1(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad sna tshogs kyi sgo nas sel bar mdzad pa dang/ yon tan mdza' yas pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'gro ba la sbyin par mdzad pa'o/ /de ltar na sku drug po
326a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag ni dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i chos mchog can no/ /nga ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sgo nas mchod pa'i dpe dang
326a3(rgyud 'grel): bral bar bstan pa'i phyir/ yon tan shin tu phro pa'i cha la 'ang tshad med de/ dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang sgrun du yod pa min/ dngos grub mdza' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba'i rnams/ /sems can khams la dngos grub mchog? rnams
326a4(rgyud 'grel): nges par stsol/ bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa ni ye shes rnam pa drug gi bdag nyid de/ de dag ni shin tu phra zhing rtogs par dka' bas na tshad gzung du med de/ dpe ni nam mkha' i khams kyi khyab ba tsam gyis kyang
326a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrun du yod pa ma yin pas na/ dngos grub mdza' yas pa 'byung ba'i gnas su gyur ba'o/ /de lta bu chos gang yang mtshungs shing mnyam pa med pa'i dpe dang bral ba de las sems can gyi don du dngos grub kyi mchog bde bar
326a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i sku dang ye shes mi bslu bar sbyin pa mdzad do/ /rin po che'i rigs mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snang bas smon lam dang thugs rje chen po'i sgo nas snang ba ni/ rtag tu dri ma
326a7(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i thugs rje shugs las byung/ smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mdza' yas pa/ thugs rje chen po bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang/ bskal pa mang por dka' ba sbyang
326b1(rgyud 'grel): nas sgrib pa'i tshogs thams cad bsal zhing/ tshogs bsags pa'i mthus thugs rje chen po dang ldan par gyur pa dang/ lam sbyang ba'i dus su sems can gyi khams la dmigs te smon lam rgya chen po btab pa'i mthus de dang mthun pa'i
326b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa gdul bya'i rgyud la snang ste phrin las mdza' yas pas 'gro ba'i don sgrub pa la brtson te/ yon tan gyi ngo bor sbyor bas thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang ba'o/ /yang pad+ma'i rigs so so kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes kyi
326b3(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyis don dam pa'i dngos grub mchog mtshon pa'i phyir/ tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa bsnyes gyur kyang/ khams gsum rnams la dngos
326b4(rgyud 'grel): grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi/ /thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur/ /lam mchog tu gyur ba la zhugs pa'i nus pa'i mthus 'bras bu mchog tu gyur pa brnyes te/ rang gi mdzad pa mthar phyin te bzhugs kyang 'gro
326b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don du thugs rje chen po dri ma med pas gzigs te don mdzad pa'o/ /yang las kyi rigs bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin las kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dngos grub myur bar ston pa la sogs pa'i phyir/ e ma ho shin tu bzang
326b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan/ /mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang nas go 'phang mchog brnyes pas/ /khams gsum rnams la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ /mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa/ /dam tshig mchog
326b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ /thar pa mchog tu gyur pa'i lam gyi nang na mchog tu gyur pa ni 'di nyid kyi sgo nas te mchog tu gyur pa'i 'bras bu skye ba gcig gis rab tu sbyor zhing brnyes par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /des na ngo
327a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshar du gyur ba ste shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan pa'i don to/ /'bras bu'i mdzad pa yon tan dang bcas par de nyid las snang bar bstan te/ khams gsum gyi skye 'gro thams cad la yang dngos
327a2(rgyud 'grel): grub kyi mchog stsol bas byang chub chen po'i lam la sbyor bar byed cing/ dus rnam pa gsum dag tu sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyis/ ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa'i rnam pa kun mkhyen te thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pas dam
327a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig gsum gyi dngos grub bdag la gsol zhes pa'o/ /de ltar bstod pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yang dag yon tan rgya chen te/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs
327a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ bstod pa'i rgyal pa 'dis ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku dang ye shes kyi rigs la sogs pa'i yon tan rgya chen po brjod par byed pa ste/ lan cig tsam brjod pas kyang sangs
327a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub par byed na/ rang nyid rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bsgoms shing/ don bzhin du bsam pa dang ldan pas dam tshig gsum gyi sgo nas brjod nas smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa'o/ /'bru'i don ni sla
327a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam bshad do/ /de dag ni ston pa'i dgongs mdzad yon tan gyi bstod pa dang bcas pas bstan pa'o/ /nga ni rjes 'jug gi dbang du byas te bsgom pa'i bsgrub pa las byung pa'i dngos grub kyi tshul bstan te/ sku ni lta bas mi ngoms
327a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ thams cad bdag nyid bstan nas kyang/ /legs so zhes ni grub pa yi/ /mchog rnams kun ni rab sbyin mdzad/ /rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa lta bas mi ngoms pa'i yon tan gyi cho gas
327b1(rgyud 'grel): bstan te/ legs so zhes pa la sogs pa'i gsung sgrogs shing lung ston pa dang dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nyid tshul ji ltar zhe na/ thams cad bdag nyid grub dga' dang/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /sangs
327b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas grub pa'i mchog kun dang/ /rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad/ /'jig rten pa'i thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad kyi bdag nyid ji ltar grub pa dga' ba bzhin du 'byung zhing/ bsam pa'i las thams cad rdzogs par
327b3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa dang/ mchog gi dngos grub sangs rgyas kyi sku dang/ thugs bde ba chen po'i ye shes rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad pa'o/ /de dag gis ni 'bras bu la bros pa bskyed pa'i tshul du rjes su 'jug pa po'i gang zag gis
327b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhung bzhin du bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub thob pa'i yon tan bstan pa'o/ /da ni nyams su blang ba'i thabs bstan te/ de nas de yi sgrub pa dang/ shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub dag /gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la/ /dngos grub shin tu
327b5(rgyud 'grel): rtag thob bshad/ /de nas thung ngu'i sgra de ma thag tu 'gyur la ring po'i sgras bkra shis kyi tshig tu 'gyur te/ de ma thag tu sgrub pa'i bkra shis kyi don to/ /dngos grub rnam pa gnyis las byung ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /de 'grub par byed
327b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs ni bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi la sogs pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /des ni srid pa 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub la sbyor bar byed pa'o/ /bsnyen sgrub kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i cho ga ni/ rdo rje se gol gtogs pa
327b7(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /thal mo legs par sbyar ba yis/ /thal mo lan gsum rnam par bdab/ /sbyor ba dang ldan pas lce lag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i tshul gyis/ rdo rje se gol lam gsum
328a1(rgyud 'grel): gtogs shing badzra sa mA ya dza'i sngags brjod pas ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnams bsdus shing/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i dus su dgyes pa'i thal mo lan gsum du brdab cing badzra tu Sh+ya ho zhes
328a2(rgyud 'grel): pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gshegs su gsol pa'o/ /de ltar ye shes kyi lha rnams gshegs pa'i rjes la dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dag kyang rim pa bzhin du bdag la bsdus te/ de nyid kyang nA da'i tshul du spos me
328a3(rgyud 'grel): yal ba ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i de bzhin nyid la bzhag par bya'o/ /de las slar rigs kyi lhar bsgom nas/ dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs te/ go cha go chings kyis bsrungs shing thun mtshams kyi mdza' ldang bar
328a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba de nyid kyi spyod lam ni/ dbang po gang dang gang las gyur/ de dag de yi ngo bor bya/ rnal 'byor pa rang nyid spyod lam rnam pa bzhir ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams par bya'o/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis mtshan bcas
328a5(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshan med kyi sgo nas dbang po drug gi snang ba dag /thabs dang shes rab yab yum gyi sku dang/ dbyings dang ye shes zung du 'brel ba'i tshul gyis mnyam par sbyor ba gnas par bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mig la sangs
328a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa dang/ yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ dbang po yul du snang ba dag bde ba'i ye shes rnam par spyod/ /mtshan ma bcas mtshan med pa yi/ /rim pa gnyis kyi sgo nas 'jug /rang gi ye shes
328a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas sbyor zhing/ /mtshan rtog kun las rnam par grol zhes so/ /da ni sgom bzlas kyi cho ga bstan pa'i phyir/ shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing/ /ji ltar mos pa'i chags pa dang/ /sha
328b1(rgyud 'grel): ta pa la sogs pa yis/ /ci nas yongs su mi skyo bar/ /rtag tu tshad med bzlas par bya/ /mtshan bcas dang mtshan med rim pa gnyis kyi sgo nas mnyam par bzhag cing/ de nyid la sbyor ba'i dngos rtogs kyi sangs rgyas gnyis kyi sgo nas
328b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par sbyor te/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba'i sgo nas ji ltar mos pa'i glu dang sil snyan dang bro gar gyi phyag chas chags pa'i tshul du mngon par spyod cing/ shaT pa'i glu dang sha ta dza ko ha'i glu dang/ tso sha pany+tsa ma'i glu
328b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni ri dan+ta ka'i glu dang/ ri ta si ta'i glu dang/ sur+Na pi pi ra'i glu rnams blangs te/ thun mtshams kyi bar skabs dag tu bzlas brjod gnyis sam thig le gnyis saM pra mo gnyis sam rnam dag gnyis kyi rnam pa gang yang rung ba dag ji srid mi skyo
328b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bar du byas te/ rtags rnam pa lnga mi gsal gyi bar du rtag tu gnas par bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsgom dang bzlas sogs cho ga yi/ /mtshan rtags gsal bar ma gyur pa/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor gnas te
328b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal par bya zhes so/ /de nyid nyams su blang ba'i rim pa rgyas par ni/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi gsal ba'i don rnam par bkod pa las shes par bya'o/ /de nyid kun tu mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir/
328b6(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bkug nas thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas bsgoms pas/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas kun tu dngos grub pa/ /rab tu mthong zhing dngos grub 'thob/ /dus dang rnam pa thams cad du bdag nyid
328b7(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par bsgoms nas/ dngos grub rab dang 'bring thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas bsgoms pas/ / 
329a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun dang phrad par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /de dag nyams su blangs pa'i phan yon ni nges pa'i theg pa'i gzhung du spyad pa spyod pa po dag gis nges pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ dpa' bo dang
329a2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rigs 'dzin pa'i gnas rnams tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gcig gsungs pa yin no/ /da ni rjes su bstod pa'i phan yon bstan
329a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan bsngags pa rgya che ba/ bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog 'di lan cig glur blangs pas/ zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsung pa yin te/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sku dang/ ye
329a4(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi rigs dang mtshan ma'i sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya chen por ston par byed pa'i glu 'di lan cig tsam blangs pas kyang dngos grub mi zad pa'i bde ba 'thob pa dang/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing de bzhin
329a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa dang/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pas sems can gyi rgyun rnam par grol bar mdzad do/ /dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbugs dbyung ba'i don rnam par bshad pa'o/ /da ni
329a6(rgyud 'grel): gdul bya zhe sdang la spyod pa dag gi rgyu'i lam pa dang/ rkyen gyi lam pa dang/ 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid can dag thun mong dang khyad par gyi don du rnam par gdul ba'i phyir thugs rnam par mi rtog pa me long lta bu'i ye shes la
329a7(rgyud 'grel): snang ba/ rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor du bstan te dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /de
329b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dang por ni dus bstan te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa drug 'dzin gyi dus su sangs rgyas dpa' bo'i zla ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo/ /de'i bstan pa la slob dpon chos kyi 'khor lo la slob ma dge sbyong nag po zhes bya ba zhig
329b2(rgyud 'grel): yod de/ des yang dag pa'i don phyin ci log tu spyad pa'i dbang gis ngan song gsum du skyes shing/ de las thar nas bdud ma trang ru tra zhes bya bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gsum po 'jig par byed cing sgrub pa po dang/ lha la sogs
329b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed do/ /de 'dul ba'i gnyen por dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor sngon du byung zhes pa'o/ /rgyu gang las zhe na/ rtag pa ther zug pa'i sgo nas 'khrul par spyad pas ni ru tra nag po byung la/ sku gsum
329b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa'i ngo bo las ni dpal he ru ka'i ngo bo byung ba'o/ /de yang spyi yi mtshan nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba zhes pas/ gdul bya dang gdul byed gnyis ka la sbyar bar bya'o/ /yan
329b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje skye ba'i yul du tra'i mtshan nyid ni/ de tshe sems can thams cad ni shin tu khro gtum gdug par 'gyur/ shin tu khro gtum gdug pa yis/ /'o 'dod 'bod par ltung bar 'gyur/ rgyu'i lam la gnas nas nyon mongs pa
329b6(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang gi sgo nas log par spyad pa'i dbang gis/ thun mong gi lam dang/ khyad par gyi lam pa dag lus shin tu khro ba dang/ ngag shin tu gtum pa dang/ yid shin tu gdug pa'i dbang gi 'o 'dod 'bod pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar
