329b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur to/ /de las thar nas snga ma'i rgyu rkyen 'bras bu rags pa'i rnam pa zad cing rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i mthus/ bdud ma trang ru tra de nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ de nas 'phos nas sems can de/ bag chags kyis ni
330a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nas sbyor bas/ shin tu gdug pa chen por 'gyur/ blo ni bdud kyis byin brlabs nas/ drag po'i las rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis drag po'i gzugs su byung ste/ yang drag po'i las kyi myos par
330a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas gdug pa chen po'i sbyor bas sems can la 'tshe bar byed do/ /ji lta bu'i rnam pa'i sgo nas zhe na/ rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang/ phra men ma dang gnod sbyin gdon/ /bdud dang rnam par log 'dren nyid/ /shin tu
330a3(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa chen por 'gyur/ /kha blangs ngan pa las byung ba'i sbyor bas sems can gyi tshe 'phrog rmongs par byed pa'i rims nyin gcig pa dang/ nyin gnyis pa nas bzung ste/ sna tshogs pa'i bar du snang ba dang/ dri rlabs
330a4(rgyud 'grel): ngan pa las byung ba gdug pa'i sbyor ba lta ba dang reg pas gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa dang/ rin po che'i tshul gyis gzhan slu bar byed do/ rnam par 'joms pa dang phra men gyi sbyor sngags dang/ lus kyi sprul pa sna tshogs par
330a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba dang/ gzhan yang gnod sbyin pho mo dang/ bdud dang log 'dren la sogs pa'i gdug pa chen po'i tshogs rnams myur du dbyung zhing gnas thams cad du khyab par byed pa'o/ /de'i las ni/ gnas gsum po ni 'jig
330a6(rgyud 'grel): byed cing/ /sgrub po rnams la yang za/ /lha la sogs pa'ang 'pho bar byed/ /bstan pa dag kyang 'jig byed ces pa'o/ /de ltar spyod pa'i las kyis 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams rim pa bzhin du skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul
330a7(rgyud 'grel): bstan te/ de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha/ tshangs pa'i drung du nye bar dong tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te/ ri rab kyi rtse mo na gnas pa'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang bcas pa rnams tshangs
330b1(rgyud 'grel): pa la skyabs su dong ngo/ /tshangs pa nyid kyang skyabs mdzad par mi nus te/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha/ rnams khyab 'jug chen po'i drung du nye bar dong ngo/ /de dag gis kyang skyabs mdzad par mi nus te/ lha chen po mig gsum pa la
330b2(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su dong ngo/ /de dag gis kyang skyabs mdzad par mi nus te/ rdo rje 'chang chen po la skyabs su gsol lo zhes pa dang/ de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ de nas ru tra de nyid kyis mkha' 'gro dang/ phra men gyi tshogs chen po bsdus
330b3(rgyud 'grel): te sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rbod stong byed cing/ sngon gyi las las grub pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs dang drag po'i gsang sngags kyis rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams bcom nas sa steng gyi ya thog tu song ste/ rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal na
330b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzangs na yang rgol bar brtsams so zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig rgya cher gsungs so/ /yang rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor bas sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir/ de
330b5(rgyud 'grel): nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor ba yis/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas rdo rje se gol gyi sgras sangs rgyas thams cad
330b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdu bar mdzad de/ dpung pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du bsnol te/ rdo rje se gol gtogs pa'i sgras thams cad snyan gsan dbang ba ni/ ci se gol gcig tsam gtogs pa'i sgras sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar nus
330b7(rgyud 'grel): sam zhe na/ sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba las byung ba yin pas khyad par gyi mthu dang ldan te/ de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas/ 'khor dang 'khor lo'i tshogs bcas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs gyur na/ gzhan lha mos
331a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang ci zhig dgos zhes gsungs pa yin te de ltar spyan drangs te dkyil 'khor rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar til gyi gang bu til 'brus bcer ba bzhin du bzhugs pa'i tshul du
331a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i phyir/ rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyis til 'bru bzhin du rgyas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang de dag gis gdan 'dzom chen
331a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i bka' bgros mdzad nas/ thugs rje chen po bstan par dgongs te/ shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yi/ /khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ /ru tra
331a4(rgyud 'grel): nag po la sogs pa'i khro bo'i gzugs can de dag la zhi ba'i skus 'dul bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab dbyings kyi mtshan nyid dang/ thabs snying rje chen po'i rgyu las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dul ba'i
331a5(rgyud 'grel): rkyen gyis 'bras bu'i khro bo yi dkyil 'khor du snang bar mdzad pa'o/ /'o na zhi ba'i skus mi 'dul ba khro bo'i skus 'dus kyang cang 'dul bar nus sam zhe na/ khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang/ /'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na/ /
331a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis/ /khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos/ /nyon mongs pa rang ka mar 'dzin cing spyod pa'i khro bo rang rgyud pa dag gis kyang sa 'og sa stengs bla yi 'jig rten gsum dag kyang sreg par nus na/
331a7(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang chen po'i skus ni bcas bcos rnam pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis khro bo'i cha lugs su bsgyur te/ khams gsum ma lus pa rnams kyang skad cig
331b1(rgyud 'grel): tsam la sregs par byed pa ni smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa'o/ /de dag gis ni sngon byung ston pa'i dgongs mdzad gsang ba bla na med pa'i tshul bstan te/ rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas kyang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i
331b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas su de bzhin du bslab par bya'o/ /da ni sngon byung gi mtshan nyid dang rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pas bya ba dag thun mong du bstan pa lam dang por lha bskyed pa'o/ /de nas sna yi rtsa mo la/ /yid ni yang dag brtan par gzung/ /sna yi
331b3(rgyud 'grel): dbugs ring dro ba las/ /rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung/ /gnas skabs gsum gyi bye brag gis/ /phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi sna'i rtse mo la yid rtse gcig pa brtan pa'i rnam pa yang dag par gzung ste/ yi ge hUM ring po che ga drag can
331b4(rgyud 'grel): drod rnam pa gsum dang bcas pa las bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen pos thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'i phyag rgyas dpal he ru ka'i sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor dbyung bar bya'o/ /da ni 'bras bu mdzad
331b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid las dang por gtso bo cha lugs bstan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje khro bor gyur nas phyung/ /dpal rdo rje chen po he ru ka /'bar bas thal bar rab tu 'jigs/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor
331b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las rdo rje khro bo chen po'i skur bsgyur zhing phyung ngo/ /de nyid ji ltar zhe na/ yon tan gyi dpal dang ldan zhing sku gsung thugs gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje chen pos mi mthun pa'i phyogs
331b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bcom zhing/ rnam thar sgo gsum gyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /dgyes chags phrin las kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa don ye shes lnga'i mtshan nyid las/ 'bar ba chen po'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyis thams cad bsregs shing brlag
332a1(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad pa'o/ /gzhan yang mdog dang 'od zer la sogs pa'i sgo nas/ sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i dang/ /'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag /dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra/ /thugs ye shes rnam pa
332a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang ldan pas/ /rin po che bai DUrya sngon po'i kha dog la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar bas chags pa gnyis dang ma bral ba'i rtags mtshon pa snod kyi 'jig rten 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe/ me la sogs pa'i sna
332a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'joms pa bzhin du grag po'i skur gnas te/ dur khrod kyi me dang 'dra ba'o/ /gzhan yang khro bo'i cha lugs dang rgyan chas kyi rnam par brjid pa ni/ 'bar ba chen po skra 'bar ba/ /thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can//
332a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag /dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs/ /khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa/ /zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang/ /smin ma khro gnyen bcas par bsgyur/ /'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas
332a5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /dpal chen po'i sku la rang nyid kyi yon tan snang ba las grub cing/ gzhan 'dul ba'i don du byung ba'i rngom brjid sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ khro rtag drug cu rtsa gcig dang/ gar rnam pa dgu'i mtshan mas
332a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan te/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i sgra gyen du brdzes shing/ spyan mig nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'bar ba las 'od 'phro ba/ thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa dbu rgyan rgyan chas sna tshogs kyis mtshan pa/ dur khrod kyi
332a7(rgyud 'grel): chas chen po brgyad kyis brgyan pas 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag cing/ dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs pa'i zhal bzhi khro ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis sna tshogs par 'gyur zhing/ drag po dang/ rmongs
332b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ chags pa dang/ zhi ba'i tshul du rab tu gnas la/ smin ma'i rtse mo gyen du bteg cing dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi gnas la stobs bcu'i sgo nas khro gnyer bcu yis brjid pa/ 'bar ba'i gar thabs rnam pa bzhis
332b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyod cing gnas pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ khrag 'thung 'thing nag 'jigs pa'i zhal/ 'bar ba chen po'i 'od zer can/ /zhal yas zhi ba'i rang bzhin dkar/ /dbus ma mthing nag drag po'i zhal/ /g.yon pa rmongs byed ser po ste/ /
332b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan cha chags mdzad dmar po'o/ /smin mtshams khro gnyer glog bzhin 'gyur/ /spyan dmar mche gtsigs 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /dbu skra sma ra ser nag mdzes/ /spu rnams rdo rje gyen du 'khyil/ /sgeg po dpa' bo 'jigs su rung/ /rgod
332b4(rgyud 'grel): dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed/ /snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gar thabs can/ /zhes so/ /gtso bo'i phrin las kyi mdzad pa ni/ /gu lang dbang chen nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas/ /gnas gsum
332b5(rgyud 'grel): dag ni 'bar byas nas/ /thal mo bzhin du rab tu bshig /dbang phyug chen po gu lang gi gzugs kyis 'dod chags kyi lam la gnas pa dang/ lha'i dbang po sa steng kyi dbang po ste/ nga rgyal gyi lam la gnas pa dang/ rab dga' dbang phyug
332b6(rgyud 'grel): gis thams cad gsal bas nyi zla zhes grags pa phrag dog la gnas pa dang/ khyab 'jug khro bas gshin rje lta bu zhe sdang la gnas pa dang/ tshangs pa gti mug gi lam pa dag bcom ste/ gnas gsum po'i tshogs rnams sreg cing
332b7(rgyud 'grel): thal ba bzhin du/ zhig bar mdzad do/ /ci gong du 'di dag phyogs re 'dul ba'i don du bstan pa las 'dir kun 'dul bar mdzad ce na/ shas che ba'i dbang du dgongs pa dang gcig gi chas las byung ba'i phyir ro/ /yang phyag mtshan
333a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi sgo nas/ rdo rje rdo rje kha TwAM ga /dril bu'i sgra ni bsil ba yis/ /thams cad phab nas slar yang ni/ /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /'dir ni phyag dang po gnyis kyi mtshan ma smos te/ lhag
333a2(rgyud 'grel): ma dag ni le'u dgu pa'i gnas skabs nas ston to/ /de dag gsal bar ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las bstan te/ g.yas g.yon dang pos rdo rje dang/ /rdo rje kha TwAM dril bur bcas/ /de 'og gnyis kyis 'jigs byed kyi/ /pags pa rlung
333a3(rgyud 'grel): gi tshul gyis bskor/ /gsum pa gnyis na mda' dang gzhu/ /g.yas kyi bzhi pas dung khrag 'dzin/ /g.yon gyi bzhi pas thod pa bzung/ /snying chen pos bkang pa'o/ /zhes so/ /yang gnas skabs la lar ni/ /zhal gcig
333a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi pa la sogs pa'i rnam pas snang bar mdzad de/ de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ la lar zhal gcig phyag bzhi pas/ /g.yas gnyis rdo rje dung khrag 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis thod pa zhags par bcas/ /rdo rje kha TwAM se
333a5(rgyud 'grel): ra pa kha/ /la lar rdo rje band+ha dmar/ /kha TwAM ga la rgyab brten bcas/ /zhes so/ /de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen po las byung ba'i he ru ka de nyid sku mdog dang zhal la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang/ phrin las dang/ phyag mtshan gyi rnam
333a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dag gsal bar bstan pa'i rjes la/ cha lugs dang rgyan chas kyi bdag nyid/ dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs/ zhes pa'i don ni/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ glang chen stag gi pags pa yis/ /stong smad sku yin bza' bnabs//
333a7(rgyud 'grel): klu rgyal thod pa'i phreng ba yis/ /sku yi gnas brgyad rnam spras shing/ /lha chen dpa' bo g.yang bzhi dag /tsham dam chen po'i na bzar gsol/ /sku la thal bas byugs pa las/ /khrag dang zhag gi ri mos mtshan/ /phyag rgya
333b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga yis mtshan pa las/ /snyan gong nyi zla rin chen phreng/ /zhes so/ /de ltar 'bar ba chen po'i sku 'jigs pa'i cha lugs rnam par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis/ bdud dregs byed dang lha chen po'i tshogs thams cad dbang du byas te drag po'i
333b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs btul nas/ sha khrag rus pa kun gsol zhing 'khor ba na gnas pa dag kyang brgyal bar mdzad do/ /de ltar thal bar gyur pa dag /thugs rje chen po'i mi gtong zhing rnam par shes pa slar gzung bar mdzad de 'tsho bar byas so/ /ci
333b3(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba sna tshogs kyi las grub par byed/ /gong du lha chen po rnams kyis rnam par bstan cing/ yang de nyid dang mi 'dra ba'i rnam pa gzhan ston pa dang/ yang de dag gi skyabs mdzad ce na/ 'gal ba med de de'i rang bzhin du gnas pa dang/
333b4(rgyud 'grel): de 'dul ba'i rnam pa dang mthun par 'phrul pa dang/ de gzhan gyis nyen pa'i sdug bsngal la skad cig tsam gyis bde bar gnas pa'i skyabs mdzad pa dang/ yang de dang de nyid gnyis ka rnam par grol zhing byang chub chen po gnas su
333b5(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa la nyes pa'i skyon ci zhig yod/ che ba'i yon tan gyi khyad par las snang ba'i mtshan ma'o/ /de yang shes rab dang bral ba'i thabs mi srid de 'od dang bcas pa'i myu gu las grib ma skye ba'i tshul du yum bskyed cing las la gzhug
333b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ de yi 'bar ba'i nyi ma las/ /phyung ba'i grib ma mi bzad pa/ /skyed nas ma lus bdud la sogs/ /bdug pa rnams kyi khrag za nus/ /de yang de'i don yang/ rtsa rgyud las/ rang nyid ngo bo las byung ba'i/ /kro ti shwo ri 'jo sgeg
333b7(rgyud 'grel): stabs/ /sku mdog sngo skya nam mkha' i lus/ /se ral kha yi tshul dag tu/ /kha TwAM ga la rgyab brten bcas/ /lag pa g.yon pas thod pa thogs/ /g.yas pas ba dan gsum pa'i phyag /rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis mtshan/ /phyung nas byin
334a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab mdzad de/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par gyur/ /dregs byed bdud la sogs pa yi/ /'byung po thams cad rmongs mdzad de/ /gdugs pa'i tshogs kyi sha khrag dang/ /ma lus yud tsam gcig la
334a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /zhes so/ /de dag kyang ston pa'i dgongs mdzad kyi dbang du ni de kho na ltar snang ba yin la/ rjes su 'jug pa'i dbang du ni sbyor ba'i yan lag dang/ rjes su sbyor ba'i yan lag gis rgyas par bsgom par bya'o/ /da ni shin
334a3(rgyud 'grel): tu sbyor ba'i rim pas 'khor bskyed pa'i phyir/ rgyal po de ni de dag dang/ lhan cig dur khrod rnam par rol/ /thams cad rdo rjer mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yis/ /dpal he ru ka ni tshes bdun gyi bdag
334a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang ldan pas rgyal po chen po lta bu'o/ /'khor gyi lha mo dag ni de nyid kyi sku dang ye shes dang yon tan gyi snang ba las byung bas/ de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas shing dur khrod brgyad du rnam par rol lo/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na/
334a5(rgyud 'grel): gau rI la sogs pa'i ma mo brgyad dang/ mda''dzin ma la sogs pa'i phrin las kyi lha mo bzhi dang/ me tog ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi dang/ rta mgrin 'thang mtho ma la sogs pa'i sgo ma bzhi ste/ lha mo nyi shu
334a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i ngo bor mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i tshogs dang bcas pa'o/ /de dag gi phrin las ci zhig mdzad ce na/ shin tu gdug cing khro drag po'i/ /sems can khams
334a7(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam sbyangs nas/ /dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing khams su/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod/ /bdud ma traM ma ru tra la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa/ /spyi dang khyad par gyi lam la gnas pa dag gi sems can gyi khams rnams
334b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par sbyang zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pa'o/ /de yang ji ltar zhe na/ dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing la sbyor ba ste dpal he ru kas ni zhe sdang las skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa spyi'i lam pa dag gdul bar mdzad pa dang/ lha mo gau
334b2(rgyud 'grel): rIs zhi ba'i sgo nas thugs kyis phrin las kyis sems can zhe sdang gi khams la gnas pa dag /rnam par sbyangs zhing rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams su/ me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyi byang
334b3(rgyud 'grel): chub la rab tu 'god pa'o/ /lha mo gzhan yang des 'dra ste tsau rI mas nga rgyal gyi lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyangs pa dang/ phra mo has 'dod chags kyi lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang/ be ta lIs phrag dog gi lam la gnas pa rnam
334b4(rgyud 'grel): par sbyang ba dang/ puk+ka sIs gti mug gi lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang/ tsaN+Da lIs nyon mongs pa spyi'i lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang/ g+hasma rIs log par lta ba la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang/ sma shAs ni the tshom
334b5(rgyud 'grel): dang yid gnyis kyi rnam par rtog pa dag sbyor bar mdzad pa'o/ /yang mdzad pa rgya chen po'i sgo nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir/ rdo rje 'dod khro la sogs kyis/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi mdza' 
334b6(rgyud 'grel): klas? pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs/ /dpal he ru ka la khro bo chen po bcus bskor ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor dang khro bo re res rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor grangs med pa'i rnam par spros te sems
334b7(rgyud 'grel): can gyi rgyud sbyang bar mdzad pa'o/ /rjes su sgrub pa'i rim pa ni dpal he ru ka'i gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa las shes par bya'o/ /dpal he ru ka'i dbugs dbyung ba'i don rnam par bshad pa'o/ /da ni gti mug gi rgyu dang
335a1(rgyud 'grel): rkyen dang 'bras bu'i lam la nyon mongs pa spyi dang khyad par gyi mtshan nyid rtag chad kyi mdza' can log par lta ba la gnas pa rnams 'dul ba'i don du mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la snang zhing/ de
335a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung pad+ma'i rigs dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyis don mdzad pa'i tshul bstan pa'i phyir dang por dgongs mdzad kyi dus bstan te/ 'das pa'i dus bstan te/ 'das
335a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ bdag nyid chen po stan? pa yi/ 'das pa'i tshe bskal pa bcud ldan gyi dus su sangs rgyas pad+ma'i dpal 'jig rten du byung ngo/ /de'i bstan pa la dge slong rgyal ba'i mchog ces bya bas bka' i don phyin ci
335a4(rgyud 'grel): log tu spyad de/ rtag chag gyi mdza' la gnas shing/ log pa'i lta ba dang ldan pas ngan song rnam pa gsum du 'khor zhing sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo/ /de las thar nas dregs byed mdza' la gnas pa zhes bya ba nyon mongs
335a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lam la zhen cing rang gi lta ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de 'dul ba'i gnyen por rdo rje 'chang chen po'i nyid kyi sku las pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rnam par 'phrul pa'i gar thabs dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnam par
335a6(rgyud 'grel): byung ngo/ /ci zhig las zhe na/ rang gi lta ba rtag par 'dzin pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis ni gdul bya'i rnam pa thun mong dang/ khyad par gyi tshogs snang zhing/ sku gsum rtag pa'i sgo nas 'dul byed kyi bde bar gshegs pa
335a7(rgyud 'grel): byung ngo/ /de nas 'dul bya 'dul byed spyi'i mtshan nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ 'gro ba'i don ni mngon byung ba/ bka' i don phyin ci log tu spyad pa'i dus thugs rje chen po skye ba'i yul 'gro ba'i tshul du
335b1(rgyud 'grel): sngon byung ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab ji bzhin par spyad par mthus thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid de dang mthun pa 'phrul pa'o/ /de la thugs rje skye ba'i yul gyi mtshan nyid ni/ de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /
335b2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu log par lta bar gyur/ /shin tu lta ba ngan pa yis/ /'o dod 'bod pa chen por lhung/ /bskal pa bcud ldan gyis dus kyi tshe de nyid na las kyi dbang gis skye 'gro ma lus pa thams cad nyon mongs pa'i lam la gnas shing log par lta
335b3(rgyud 'grel): bas kun tu rmongs te/ rtag chad kyis mdza' la gnas pa dang/ de dag gi nang nas kyang dge slong rgyal ba mchog dang/ de'i rjes su 'brang ba dag ste de dag gi rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu'i rnam pa dag gzigs pa'o/ /de dag gi
335b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyen por thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid ji ltar skyes pa ni/ rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /byang chub sems ni rnam sbyang phyir/ /padmo chags par sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje chos su gnas par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'chang chen po
335b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis gsung gi rnam par 'phrul pa ni pad+ma'i rigs te/ gang zhig rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo las gzhan 'dul ba'i thabs su rdo rje chos su snang ste/ ji ltar zhe na rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /sku mdog dkar la
335b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar zhad chags/ /zhal mang brgya byed phyag gis mdzes/ /g.yas kyi pad+ma rdo rje dang/ /'khor lo rin chen dbyug sogs kyis/ /mtshan zhing g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis/ /pad+ma rkyang pa'i sdong po 'dzin/ /mtshan sogs dpe
335b7(rgyud 'grel): byad bzang pos mdzes/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od zer 'phro/ /rin chen la sogs rgyan phreng tshogs/ /dar gyi gos rgyan cod pan sbyangs/ /bkra shis skyil krung legs bzhugs shing/ /bsnyems bcas chags pa'i tshul du gzigs
336a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes so/ /de yang rjes su 'jug pa'i dbang du ni/ pad+ma chags par sbyor ba'i tshul yang/ rtog pa bdun pa las/ byin brlabs rigs kyi dbu rgyan gyis/ /rgyu yi mgon po rdo rje 'chang/ /dpal ldan pad+ma
336a2(rgyud 'grel): gar dbang phyug /cha lugs mtshan ma rgyan gsal 'gyur zhes so/ /ci skabs 'dir sangs rgyas snang ba mdza' yas la rdo rje chos la sogs pa ming gyi bye brag mi mthun pa 'dogs she na/ de ni rang bzhin gyi bye brag chos shes
336a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba phrin las kyi sgo nas spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba dang/ phrin las sna tshogs kyi 'bras bu'i sgo nas pad+ma gar gyis dbang phyug ces so/ /de nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid ni/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ /
336a4(rgyud 'grel): chags pa'i nyes pas mi gsal/ /de bzhin bag chags khams gsum gyi/ /nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par dag /dper na pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /'dam rdzab las skyes shing de dag gi dri mas ma gos pa bzhin du/ gsung pad+ma'i
336a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pa las byung ba'i sku 'di yang khams gsum gyi nyes pa'i bag chags las rnam par grol ba'o/ /des na chags pa rnam pa gnyis dang ma bral ba'i tshul gyis
336a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod cing gnas pas na rdo rje chos zhes bya'o/ /de yang thabs ('di rnying ma'i sgyu 'phrul sde brgyad kyi gcig yin no//) kyi zhags pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las pad+ma 'dam bral skams 'thas rul/ /de ltar 'khor ba spangs spyod min/ /mdza' gnyis
336a7(rgyud 'grel): las grol rnam spyod pa/ /kun tu snang ba mdza' yas sku/ /gsar ba theg chen bla med gzhung/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor rnam gsal ston zhes so/ /de nyid kyi phrin las kyi mtshan nyid ni/ 'di ni kun tu gzigs pas na/ /rgyal
336b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'ang dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur/ /dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /gdul bya'i las ji lta ba bzhin du dbang po skye mched kyi bye brag cher gzigs nas/ mthun pa'i sku gsung thugs
336b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi phrin las kyi gzhan gyi don mdzad par dgongs nas/ nyid kyi yon tan rnam par bkod pas bdud rnam pa bzhi bcom zhing/ dbang phyug brgyad dang ldan pas thugs rje chen po rtsa gcig pa dang ldan te/ dus dang rnam pa thams cad
336b3(rgyud 'grel): du kun tu gzigs par mdzad pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pa'o/ /de'i tshul ni 'dod chags thams cad dag pas na/ mchog sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log rtog
336b4(rgyud 'grel): pa las byung ba'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams la/ la las de nyid la spyod pas grol bar 'dod pa dang/ la las spangs pas grol bar 'dod pa dang/ la las sbyangs pas grol bar 'dod pa ni/ rnam par dag pa ma
336b5(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ de dag ma spangs par dag pa'i rang bzhin du mkhyen pa ni gsang ba bla na med pa'i don te/ de nyid la spyod pa'i sgo nas dngos grub mchog sbyin zhing dam pa grub par mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das so/ /yang phrin las sna
336b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi 'bras bu'i sgo nas/ 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis/ /sna tshogs pa ni 'dul bar mos/ /kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang rgyal/ /padmo gar gyi dbang phyug gyur/ /'gro ba'i tshul du 'dul ba'i don du gzugs kyi cha
336b7(rgyud 'grel): lugs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhal phyag mang po dang/ sku las snang ba'i gzugs brnyan mang por ston pa'o/ /de yang le'u dgu pa las/ gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /yongs su bsgyur zhing gar byas pas/ /padmo'i mtshan
337a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog padmor byas/ /phyag ni brgya rnams 'khor lo skor zhes pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dzin/ zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /des na gang zhig kun
337a2(rgyud 'grel): tu gzigs pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /de ltar phrin las sna tshogs kyi ngo bo de gang las byung zhing ji lta bu zhe na/ padmo sgyu ma rgyal po mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde chen mchog /des dbyings dang ye
337a3(rgyud 'grel): shes gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo thabs dang shes rab las byung ba de nyid ni sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can no/ /de nyid kyi snang ba pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni mkha' 'gro sgyu ma mchog go /yang phrin las
337a4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyi sgo nas mdzad pa rgya chen po bstan pa'i phyir/ dpal pad+ma gar dbang la sogs pa/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha' i dbyings kyis mthas klas pas/ /sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs/ /gang zhig
337a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lha ba sna tshogs kyi rtog pa la spyod pa'i 'gro ba ni grangs med do/ de dag gi don du sngon byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ rjes 'jug gi sgrub pa'i rim pa mang por bstan zhing gsungs te/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa
337a6(rgyud 'grel): grangs mang du snang ba dag kyang dpal ldan pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug yab yum gyi snang ba yin te/ de nyid kyang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i byin brlabs las byung ba'o/ /de lta bu'i skus skye 'gro ji snyed du rnam par sbyod zhing/ sgo gzhan gyi
337a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pas/ sems can gyi khams ni rnam par sbyad bar mdzad do/ /de dag rnal 'byor pas nyams su blangs pa'i rim pa ni dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa las
337b1(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o/ /dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /da ni srid cing zhen pa dang gdug cing rnam pa'i shin tu 'jungs par gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa spyi dang khyad par gyi 'gro ba dag rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ so
337b2(rgyud 'grel): sor rtog pa'i ye shes las snang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che'i rigs dpal rdo rje nyi mas dbugs dbyung ba'i tshul bstan te/ de las dang po dgongs mdzad kyi dus ni/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung
337b3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ bskal pa mi gnas pa'i dus dus su sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo/ /de'i bstan pa la dge slong 'byor pa can zhes bya bas bka' i don log par spyad de/ nyon
337b4(rgyud 'grel): mongs pa'i chu bos g.yengs nas ngan song rnam pa gsum du 'khor zhing/ de las thar nas dregs byed 'jungs ba can zhes bya bar skyes so/ /rgyu gang las zhe na/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa las so/ /de yang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ /de
337b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /gdul bya dang gdul byed kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de bstan pa'i don log par spyad pa dang ji bzhin par spyad pa'i dbang gis las dang thugs rje 'brel par gyur
337b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de la thugs rje skye ba'i yul gyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na/ de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ shin tu gdug cing bskam par 'gyur/ ces pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs so/ /bskal pa mi gnas
337b7(rgyud 'grel): pa de nyid kyi tshe na bdud dang bdud kyi rnams kyis blo bslad pa'i 'gro ba thun mong dang/ khyad par gyi tshogs rnams lus shin tu gdug cing dag shin tu brkam pa dang sems shin tu 'jungs par gyur pas/ yi dags gshin
338a1(rgyud 'grel): rje'i dmyal bar lhung zhing yun rings du gnas so/ /de nyid las zad pa'i dbang gis grol nas mi'i gnas su shin tu dbul zhing phongs pa dang/ bkrem zhing skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te/
338a2(rgyud 'grel): phan tshun gcig gis gcig gsod par byed do/ /de'i las zad nas yi dags kyi srin po dregs byed 'jungs pa can zhes bya bar gyur nas/ skye 'gro thams cad kyi tshe srog 'phrog cing 'jig rten gyi khams phung bar byas so/ /
338a3(rgyud 'grel): de 'dul ba'i gnyen por thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ shin tu gdug pa sbyang pa'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /dam pa'i don gyi nor chen po/ /rdo rje nyi ma byung bar gyur/ /gzhan gyis
338a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba'i dregs byed kyi tshogs sde dang bcas pa de dag sgo kun tu sbyang pa'i phyir/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zag pa med pa'i yon tan gyi rin po che'i tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa'i sku dpal rdo rje nyi ma byung
338a5(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur to/ /de nyid ji lta bu zhe na/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gser gyi ri la nyi shar bzhin/ /zhal bzhi phyag bzhi rnam mdzes pa/ /g.yas na mda' dang ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon gzhu nyid dkyil rdo rjes mtshan/ /'od kyi dkyil
338a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sna lngas bskor/ /'dzum bcas g.yon gyi gyen du bteg ces pa dang/ /yang zhi bas mi 'dul pa la khro bo'i skur yang snang ste/ /la lar cung zhig khros pa las/ /phyi ru dmar po'i mdangs ldan sku/ /zhabs gnyis
338a7(rgyud 'grel): skyil krung legs bzhugs shing/ /snga ma'i rgyan gyis mdzes byas pa'o/ /zhes te/ de lta bu'i sku yum dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdangs dang ldan pa 'gro ba'i don du phyung bar
338b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o/ /da ni rang bzhin gyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' i snying po thams cad phyogs/ /kun gyi re ba yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /mkha' la rin chen thams cad 'bebs/ /gang zhig
338b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dang yon tan dang phrin las kyi rnam pa dag dang ldan pa de nyid la ni de dang mthun pa'i mtshan brtags de bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan nyid la nam mkha' i snying po dang/ rdo rje rin chen dang/ /rdo
338b3(rgyud 'grel): rje nyi ma dang/ 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes grags so/ /de nyid kyis dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo nyid dang/ gter gyi re ba rdzogs par mdzad pa dang/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzugs can dang/ mchod pa rnam par 'phrul pa
338b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i tshul du lha mo dag gi rnam par 'phrul pas nam mkha' i snying po bzhin du gnas thams cad du khyab par mdzad cing phyogs kun gyi re ba dag ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do/ /ji lta bu'i
338b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pas zhe na/ btsun mo rin po che dang/ dmag mi rin po che dang/ rta rgyal rin po che dang/ glang po rin po dang/ 'khor lo rin po che dang/ nor bu rin po che la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams nam mkha' las char bzhin 'bebs
338b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de lta bu zhi bas mi 'dul ba dag la khro bo bsgyur zhing phrin las lhag pa'i sgo nas don mdzad pa'i phyir/ shin tu gdug cing khro ba la/ zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te shes rab thabs kyi nyi mas ni/ rab tu gdud pa
338b7(rgyud 'grel): kun sgrub pas/ /'jungs par yi dags kyi srin po gshin rje'i tshogs dang bcas pa de dag ni thabs gzhan gyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur te/ mthun pa'i gnyen pos khro bo'i sku bstan cing nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid dang bcas pa'i
339a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas 'gro ba'i gdung ba thams cad gcod cing skems par mdzad pa'o/ /de yang ji ltar zhe na/ bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang/ /dbrog pas kyang ni khyad par du//
339a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bar byas nas gnas gsum gyi/ /nor gyi tshogs kun sdud par byed/ /mnga' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha la la dag /'khrul 'khor la sogs pa la brten te 'phang zhing dge ba'i las la bzung ba dang/ 'khor lo la sogs
339a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshon cha dag la gab pas 'phang zhing/ sdig pa'i las spyod pa dag las bzlog pa dang/ zhags pa la sogs pa yis slar yang drangs te mthu dang rdzu 'phrul thams cad dbrog pa dang khyad par gyi phrin las kyis mi mthun
339a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgol ba thams cad bcom zhing khams gsum las rgyal par byas te/ nor gyi tshogs rnams sdud par mdzad pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las rdo rje nyi ma rgyal chen pos/ /rang gi 'od kyi snang ba'i tshogs/ /phyogs
339a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun tu gsal mdzad cing/ /rab tu gdung ba sel bar mdzad/ /dge ba'i bya ba la gzung cing/ /mi dge lam las zlog pa dang/ /yon tan thams cad 'phrog mdzad de/ /khams gsum kun las rgyal bar mdzad/ /
339a6(rgyud 'grel): slar nyid yon tan che ba'i mthus/ /de 'dod kun la sbyin par mdzad ces so/ /da ni phrin las rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid bstan te/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs kyi/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha' dbyings
339a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi mdza' klas pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rab tu bkrol/ /gang zhig 'jig rten gsum 'joms pa'i mthu dang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya ste/ de nyid rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /de las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mi 'dra ba rnam pa
339b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa ste/ khyad par gyi phrin las ji lta ba'i rnam pas mthar phyin pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de dag ni sngon byung ba'i dgongs mdzad bstan te/ de dang rjes su 'jug pa'i sgo nas rjes su 'jug pa'i bya ba'i
339b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang ste/ 'di ni thun mong du bstan pa yin no/ /de dag gi sgrub pa'i rim pa ni dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i gsang pa'i don rnam par bkod pa las shes par bya'o/ /dpal rdo rje nyi ma dbugs dbyung ba'i don rnam par bshad pa'o/ /
339b3(rgyud 'grel): da ni sems can phrag dog gi lam la gnas shing rang gi lta bas bsnyems pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa/ le lo'i las can yang dag pa'i lam la ma gus pa'i lha chen po dregs byed kyi tshogs la sogs pa'i spyi'i lam pa rnams
339b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ khyad par dregs byed sna tshogs 'phrul pa can sde dang bcas pa dag 'dul ba'i phyir/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi snad ba can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las rgya chen po'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal
339b5(rgyud 'grel): rta mchog rol pa'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i tshul bstan te/ dang por dgongs mdzad kyi dus ni/ 'das pa'i dus ni sngon byung pa/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /bskal pa gzi chen snang ba zhes bya ba'i dus su sangs rgyas rnga
339b6(rgyud 'grel): sgra zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo/ /de'i bstan pa la dge snyen zla ba zhes bya bas bka' i don log par spyad de ngan song gsum du yun ring du 'khor ro/ /de las thar nas dregs byed sna tshogs 'phrul pa can zhes bya ba chung ma'i
339b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dang bcas par byung nas/ lha chen po dag gi nyon mongs pa skyed par byed do/ /de 'dul ba'i gnyen por rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyis sku las rta mchog rol pa'i dkyil 'khor sngon byung zhes pa'o/ /rgyu gang las zhe na/
340a1(rgyud 'grel): mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i sgo nas brtag pa gnyis las so/ /de dag gi spyi'i tshul ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /bka' i don phyin ci log tu spyad pa'i
340a2(rgyud 'grel): rkyen dang/ /ji bzhin par rtog pa'i mthus/ gdul bya gdul byed gnyis kyi mtshan nyid 'gro ba'i tshul du byung zhes so/ /de la thugs rje skye ba'i yul gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /brtson 'grus
340a3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu chung bar gyur/ /shin tu brtson 'grus chung ba yi/ /mnar med pa yi dmyal bar lhung/ /bskal pa gzi chen snang ba'i dus de nyid na sems can thams cad le lo dang snyoms las kyi dbang gis rang nyid brtson 'grus
340a4(rgyud 'grel): dang bral zhing/ /brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dag la yang smod par byed do/ /de'i rgyus ngan song la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong zhing de las grol nas dregs byed sna tshogs 'phrul pa la sogs pa'i tshogs su
340a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o/ /de dag gdul ba'i gnyen por thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid ni/ rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /drag shul sbyor ba'i tshul dag du/ /rta mchog dpal ni byung
340a6(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur/ /pha rol gnon pa'i mthu rtsal dang ldan pa'i rta mchog dpal gyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bstan te/ de yang tshul ji ltar zhe na/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /de bzhin zhabs kyang rnam
340a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi/ /zhal rnams dmar dang nag po dang/ /dkar zhing rta mgo ljang khu ston/ /sku yi kha dog ljang khu dang/ /phyag rnams dmar la zhabs nag po/ /g.yas pas ba dan gsum pa sgrengs/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ral gri
340b1(rgyud 'grel): mda'/ /g.yon pa khu tshur sna tshogs dang/ /mdung dang dbyug pa gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas pas gru gsum dpal mo mnan/ /gnyis pas grol ma dga' ma'o/ /g.yon pas mig gsum khyab 'jug dang/ /gnyis pas
340b2(rgyud 'grel): changs pa dga' rab gnon/ /khro rtags drug cu rtsa gcig dang/ /'bar ba chen po'i rgyan gyis mdzes shes so/ /da ni mdzad pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas ngo 'thon du las sbyod pa'i phyir/ thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ /
340b3(rgyud 'grel): sdig byed stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis/ /shin tu gdug cing khro gtum pa'o/ /sems can rnam pa mang po'i khams/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig /gang zhig byams dang snying
340b4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i chus brlan zhing 'gro ba thams cad bu gcig pa ltar dgongs pas/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhe sdang gis gsang ba dang/ gti mug gis dman pa'i rtog pa dang bral te/ sdig pa med pa'i mthu rdzu 'phrul gyi
340b5(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis ngo 'thon du las mdzad cing/ dregs byed sna tshogs 'phrul pa la sogs pa pha rol pa dag gnod pa la sogs pa'i mthu ta dang rtsal gyis bsgral zhing/ sha khrag kun stsol ba dang/ lha chen po dag gis so
340b6(rgyud 'grel): so'i nga rgal zhi bar byas te/ gti mug gis mchog tu gyur pa tshangs pa dang/ 'dod chags can gyi mchog tu gyur pa dbang phyug chen po dang/ zhe sdang can gyi mchog tu gyur pa khyab 'jug dang/ nga rgyal can gyi
340b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gyur pa brgya byin dang/ phrag dog can gyi mchog tu gyur pa dga' rab dbang phyug rnams 'khor g.yog sde ris dad bcas pa rgyal bar mdzad do/ /yang mthun pa'i spyod pas thams cad gdul pa'i phyir/ byi ba
341a1(rgyud 'grel): rkun po chom pa yis/ /thams cad rnam par sbyor bar byed/ /brid pa dang ni sgyu dag dang/ /ngo 'thon stobs kyis de bzhin du/ /dgra cha lnga yis brgal nas ni/ /de tshe 'jig rten gsum las rgyal//
341a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas skabs la lar byi thabs kyi tshul gyis gzhan gyi chung ma la spyod cing 'jig rten gsum las rgyal bar byed pa dang/ yang gnas skabs la lar rkun po'i tshul du yon tan la sogs pa'i snod du nor gyi rnam pa sdu
341a3(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad pa dang/ chom po'i tshul du mngon sum du 'phrog pa dang/ dor thabs kyi tshul du brid pa dang/ mig 'phrul gyi tshul du sgyu ma la spyad pas 'gro ba thams cad rnam par sbyor zhing/ sgra lnga yis brgal nas
341a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum las rgyal bar byed pa'o/ /de la dgra cha lnga ni le'u dgu pa'i phyag rgya nyi shu pa las bshad de 'khrul 'khor gyi 'phangs ma 'phangs dang/ de bzhin lag pas 'phangs pa dang/ 'phangs nas
341a5(rgyud 'grel): slad du bzung ba dang/ stobs su 'gyed pa lnga yin te/ /rang byung rnams kyi dgra cha'i dpyad/ /phyag rgya lnga la rab tu gnas zhes so/ /de lta bu'i mdzad pa de phyogs gcig pa yin nam zhe na/ skye 'gro rnams dang
341a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba rnams/ /mdza' dag gtul nas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skye ba gnas bzhi'i tshul du snang ba dag ni skye 'gro'i gnas so/ /de las byung ba'i 'gro ba ris drug gi sems can rnams so/ /de dag mdza' 
341a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ma lus par bsdus shing rtog pa mdza' dag rnams btul zhing/ rang rang gi 'bras bu grub par byas pa'o/ /de nyid kyi tshul ni/ gdul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /rang gi rgyal srid rtag tu
341b1(rgyud 'grel): skyong/ /g.yem pa rnams la g.yem par 'gyur/ /khro ba rnams la khro ba'i mchog /zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog /drag shul can la drag pos gnon/ /gang zhig 'dod chags kyi lam la zhen pa rnams 'dul ba'i don du ni zhal dbus ma dmar po
341b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ khro ba zhe sdang gi rgyud la gnas pa rnams 'dul ba'i don du ni g.yon ba nag por bstan pa dang/ zhi ba gti mug gi lam la gnas pa 'dul ba'i don du ni g.yas pa dkar por ston pa dang/ nga rgyal dang phrag dog gi lam la gnas pa drag shul
341b3(rgyud 'grel): can rnams 'dul ba'i don du ni rta mgo ljang gu khro gnyer can du bstan pa'o/ /da ni lha chen po rnams zhabs kyis mnan nas chung ma rnams lngar bsdus pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa las/ dbang phyug dam ba ma hA de ba 'dod pa'i
341b4(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod thams cad la mnga' mdzad pa de nyid zhabs kyis mnan nas/ lha mo dka' thub bzlog ma lha chen po'i mig nas sprul pa mo 'gugs shing longs spyod pa dang/ khyab 'jug 'khor lo nag po mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog dang ldan
341b5(rgyud 'grel): pa mnan cing lha mo rug mi ma snying las sprul pa mo bkug ste longs spyod pa dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa mnan te lha mo sgron ma zhib mo sbyor ba las byung ba dgug cing longs spyod pa dang/ 'dod pa'i lha dga' rab dbang phyug
341b6(rgyud 'grel): gnan nas mdangs las sprul pa'i lha mo dga' sdugs ma'i dbang phyug ma dgugs shing longs spyod pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa dgu pa las/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon dbang phyug gnon/ sbyor chen hu lu
341b7(rgyud 'grel): hu lu mig gsum pa la gsum drug drongs/ zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /da ni phrin las kun gyi bdag nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir/ tshig rkang pa drug gsungs pa las/ phrin las thams cad mthar phyin par mdzad pa ni
342a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rta mchog gi sgo nas te/ de nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin yin zhes pa'o/ /de dag gi phrin las bya ba'i thabs ni/ thabs dang rtsal gyis bsgrub pa yis/ /drag shul sbyor bas bsgrubs nas ni//
342a2(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum rgyal srid ma lus pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa des thob nas/ /byang chub sems ni mdza' yas mchog /drag shul sbyor bas sgrub par byed/ /rta mchog ni las khyad par gyi dkyil 'khor te/ /zhi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas rnam
342a3(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas pa dang/ dbang gi dus su pad+ma gar gyis dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas pa dang/ rgyas pa'i dus su rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas pa dang/ drag
342a4(rgyud 'grel): po'i dus su dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas pa dang/ rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi dus su dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas pas na/ phrin las thams cad kyi bdag nyid can
342a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ khams gsum gyi rgyal srid ma lus pa dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang thob par byed cing/ byang chub kyi sems mdza' yas pa dag drag shul gyi sbyor bas sgrub par byed pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las/ haM las
342a6(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i rta mchog ni/ /kun gyi spyi la rol pa'o/ /zhes pa dang/ rtog pa bsdus pa las kyang/ /dkyil 'khor gang gi dbus la ni/ /rta mchog 'di ni bzhag byas nas/ /de nyid de yis dkyil 'khor te/ /yul 'khor thams
342a7(rgyud 'grel): cad 'dul ba'o/ /zhes so/ /de yang rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas spyod par mdzad/ /'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i go 'phang la dgongs par mdzad pas na/ thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du//
342b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsal gyi pha rol gnon pa yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de dag gi mdzad pa'i phan yon ni/ /lha yi dngos grub bka' ba dang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /go 'phang mchog ni rtag pa dang//
342b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas/ /dang por rang gi don du dngos grub thob pa'i tshul ni/ /thun mong gi dngos grub mchog /brgyad la sogs pa lha'i dngos grub grub par dka' ba dag dang/ mchog gi dngos grub sangs rgyas kyi byang
342b3(rgyud 'grel): chub bde ba chen po yi sku grag pa med pa'i go 'phang mchog tu gyur pa/ rtag par gnas pa dag rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob par 'gyur pa'o/ /yang gzhan gyi don du/ sems can khams ni ma lus dag /ma lus par ni rgyas
342b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dabs shing/ /'chi med byang chub dka' ba dang/ /sems can rnams la brtan pa sbyin/ /rigs rnam pa drug gi phrin las rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyag rgya bzhis rgyas 'debs shing/ rang rang gi rigs kyi byang chub la rab tu sbyor zhing
342b5(rgyud 'grel): brtan par mdzad pa'o/ /de ltar mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rta mchog rnam par 'phrul pa yis/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yis/ /bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas/ /sems can kun gyi don yang byed/ /rigs kyi phrin las ji ltar
342b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dul bas rtag tu sems can gyi don la gnas pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /da ni mdzad pa rgya chen po'i sgo nas/ de ltar rta mchog dpal la sogs/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyis mdza' klas pa'i/ sems
342b7(rgyud 'grel): can khams rnams rab tu bsgrubs/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rigs gcig las rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'khor lo mi mthun pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas sku gsung thugs kyi rtog pa bla na med pa'i tshul gyis/ nam mkha' i
343a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyis mthas klas par spros zhing/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pas nyams su blangs zhing sgrub pa'i rim pa ni dpal rta mchog gi gsang pa'i don rnam par bkod pa'i las shes
343a2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /dpal rta mchog gi dbugs dbyung ba'i don rnam par bshad pa'o/ /gzhan yang dbugs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rgya chen po'i 'gro ba mdza' dag ni don mdzad pa'i tshul ni rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las rgya cher bstan te rigs
343a3(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa'i thun mong gi dkyil 'khor dang/ so so'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang/ de las byung pa'i dkyil 'khor mang por bstan pa bsdu pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs pa las/ dang por dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ji
343a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar byung zhing de nyid spro pa'i gnas dang gdul bya 'dul gyi lo rgyus dag ni/ de la sogs pa mdza' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi mdza' klas pa'i/ /rang byung rnams kyi gtam gyi gtam/ /
343a5(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig sku dang ye shes thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi gnas/ da ni rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid de/ thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' chen po de nyid kyi ye shes dang/ rigs kyi bye brag las snang
343a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mgon po sangs rgyas drug go /de re re las kyang rigs dang ye shes las snang zhing yon tan dang phrin las kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i dkyil 'khor lo mdza' yas par byung zhing/ sangs rgyas dang sems can gyi gnas
343a7(rgyud 'grel): su chos can dang chos nyid kyis gar khyab pa'i mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dag tu rnam par spros shing nam mkha' i dbyings kyi mdza' klas bar khyab cing rgyas so/ /de yang gdul bya'i ris so so'i las kyis bsgrubs pa dag
343b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i gnyen por rang byung gi 'phrul pa dag ji ltar snang ba ni/ gtam gyi lo rgyus sna tshogs kyis mtshon pa de nyid/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa dag bsdus te bshad pa/ dang por dregs byed sde chen la sogs pa'i gdul bya
343b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi don du/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor ji ltar snang ba ni/ sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid kyis sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs par bzhugs
343b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ bsnyems tshul gyis rab tu gnod pa'i 'od zer spros shing/ sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthus rang nyid dang cha lugs 'dra ba'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi sku rnam pa gnyis phyung ngo/ /oM ma hA su kha
343b4(rgyud 'grel): badzra satwA a(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): su ra ta stwaM/ nyid kyi sku bde ba chen po'i sku la longs spyod cing/ dgyes pa'i 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi cho 'phrul yan lag bdun rnam par bkod pas dregs byed kyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'jigs par
343b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ de dag gi gtso bo chen po'i nga rgyal gzhom zhing gnyen po'i tshul du bzhugs so/ /yang 'khor gyi dregs byed gzhan rnam par 'joms pa'i bkod pa'i yan lag bdun rnam par bstan cing/ shes rab kyi snang ba mo yum
343b6(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang mo dang gnyis su med pa'i rol pa las 'khor gyi lha mo nyi shu rnam par spros shing/ de dang mthun pa'i gdul bya de nyid rab tu gzhom par mdzad do/ /de yang me long lta bu'i ye shes las snang ba'i thugs rdo rje'i rigs thams
343b7(rgyud 'grel): cad gcig tu 'dus pa'i lha mo dpal bde mchog ma'i sku phyung zhing rang gi gsang sngags kyi rnam par spros so/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): badzra dri Sh+Ti sa ma ke maT/ dur khrod kyi mun pa mo'i gnas sbyang zhing rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su gnas te
344a1(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i phrin las kyis gzhan dag rnams kyang phrin las rgya chen po la rnam par sbyor zhing/ rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis su med par mdzad do 'di nyid kyi tshul gyis ni lha mo gzhan dag la yang
344a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs dang ye shes dang/ mdzad pa'i phrin las dang/ 'dul bya dang/ 'dul byed kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ltar so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yon tan rin po che'i rigs las snang ba'i lha mo/
344a3(rgyud 'grel): e ma he bde ba mo phyung ste/ hUM badzra kI li kI li hUM zhes pas rin chen dpal 'phrog ma 'dul bar mdzad do/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las snang ba'i gsung pad+ma'i rigs thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa lha mo snang mdzad ma'i sku
344a4(rgyud 'grel): phyung ste/ baM badzri Ni sma ra ra Ta zhes pas pad+mas lus kun tu klubs pa mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin phrin las las kyi rigs thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa'i lha mo slong ma mo phyung zhing/ ho badzra kA
344a5(rgyud 'grel): me shwa ri twAM zhes pas gnas 'joms drag po 'dul bar mdzad do/ /de dag ni ye shes rnam pa bzhi'i snang ba yin te/ rigs rnam pa bzhi'i bde bar gshegs pa'o/ /yang rigs kyi yum rnam pa bzhi las sprul pa'i
344a6(rgyud 'grel): lha mo gzhan yas phyung ste/ oM aM ma d+hu badzri g+huM g+huM zhes pas lha mo sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' i gzugs 'dzin ma 'dul bar mdzad do/ /oM badzra me b+he gu lu gu lu bruM chos kyi 'khor lo mas sde 'dzin drag mos
344a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dul bar mdzad do/ /oM ma he shwa ra Ta badzri oM oM zhes pas khams gsum rnam par rgyal mas gsum sgrub sdig byed ma'i tshogs 'dul bar byed do/ /oM khaM badzra she shaM raM hUM hUM zhes bas lha mo 'dod pa'i lcug ma mos yid myur gzugs
344b1(rgyud 'grel): can mo 'dul par mdzad do/ /de dag ni rtsa ba'i dogs byed kyi tshogs rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul bar mdzad pa'i gleng gzhi'o/ /yang phyi dkyil 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro ma dag ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro mas 'dul bar mdzad pa'i rdo rje
344b2(rgyud 'grel): gling bu ma phyung ste/ oM he ra ti badzra pi lI si ni tri Ta zhes pas 'phrug sgra rab tu 'byin ba mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje pi wang ma phyung ste he ra ti badzra gI te te te zhes pas rgyud gsum gyi drag mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje rnga chen ma phyung ste he ra ti
344b3(rgyud 'grel): badzra hAM sya ha ha baM zhes pas ming tshig kun ldan ma 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje rdza rnga ma phyung ste he ra ti badzra nE? She? pa be pa ?dzaM zhes bas sgra skad drag mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje me tog ma phyung ste/ oM badzra puShpe zhes pas 'dod pa'i gzugs
344b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin ma 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje spos med ma phyung ste oM badzra d+hU pa zhes pas rtse gsum dri ldan ma 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje mar me ma phyung ste oM badzra A lo ke zhes pas glog gi 'phreng ba mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje dri chab ma
344b5(rgyud 'grel): phyung ste oM badzra gaM d+he zhes pas dregs byed g.yo ba mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rta mgrin 'phangs mtho ma phyung ste oM badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas drag mo 'gugs pa can 'dul bar mdzad do/ /phag gdong zhags pa mo phyung ste oM badzra pA
344b6(rgyud 'grel): sha hUM zhes pas drag mo sdom pa mo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /rdo rje snang ba ma phyung ste oM badzra shaM kha le baM zhes bas gzung 'dzin dka' bzlog ma 'dul bar mdzad do/ /thal 'jig ro langs ma phyung ste oM badzra g+haN+De ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gtum
344b7(rgyud 'grel): mo thal phyed ma 'dul bar mdzad do/ /de ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor las sprul ba'i lha mo'i rigs rnams kyis dregs byed kyi gtso mo rnam par spyod zhing/ yang de'i rigs dang 'khor na gnas pa'i sde dang ris bsam gyi mi khyab 
345a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dag 'dul ba'i phyir/ lha mo re re las kyang dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i sgo nas don mdzad pas rdo rje sems dpa' i rigs su dkyil 'khor mi 'dra ba bdun cu rtsa gcig byung ba yin no/ /de ltar rigs kyi dkyil
345a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gzhan yang rnam par dbye ste/ de nas gong nas bshad pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbye ba grangs med par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gtso bo tsam gyi sgo nas bstan pa ni/ dbugs dbyung bsdus pa'i rim pa ste rgya cher spros pa
345a3(rgyud 'grel): ni rgyas pa'i tshul du shes par bya'o/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir drag po mun pa'i tshogs can la sogs pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi don du dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po la sangs
345a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku yab yum rnam pa gnyis phyung zhing/ oM b+huM khaM zhes brjod pas dregs byed kyi gtso bo de nyid 'dul bar mdzad do/ /yang 'khor gyi tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i don du sangs rgyas byang chub ma dang
345a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal mo dang kun tu bzang mo dang/ zad med kyi snong 'dzin ma dang/ sangs rgyas sku ldan ma dang/ mdzes pa mo dang/ sprin chen po dang nam mkha' i spyan ma rnams phyung ste so so'i sngags brjod pas ngor tshen sgrogs pa dang/ dpa' bo
345a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha ma dang/ mdzes pa'i phreng ba can dang/ yid mchog rgyal mo dang/ kun gzugs ma dang/ mdzes chen mo dang/ drag mo sgra chen mo dang/ 'gyur ba'i spyan can ma rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /yang 'khor lo'i
345a7(rgyud 'grel): pi wang ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis phyung zhing/ rang gi gsang sngags brjod pas me tog gsum 'dzin ma dang/ 'gro ba'i yid 'phrog ma dang/ rgyal mtshan gsum 'dzin ma dang/ rab tu gtum pa mo dang/ me tog gi /
345b1(rgyud 'grel): mda''dzin ma dang/ nag mo chu la spyod pa mo dang/ dmar mo'i phreng ba can dang/ dri mchog sna tshogs zab mo dang/ drag po'i gzugs kyis 'dren pa mo dang/ rab gtum yin mo dang/ keng rus sdom pa mo dang/ rmongs byed chen mo rnams
345b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dul bar mdzad do/ /gzhan yang dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyis don mdzad pa'i tshul ni/ ru tra la sogs pa'i gdul bya spyi dang khyad par gyi lam la rnams te/ de nyid kyi gnyen por rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku las/ dpal he ru ka'i
345b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po gnyis su med pa'i tshul du byung ste/ rang nyid sngags brjod pas de nyid kyi gtso bo 'dul bar mdzad do/ /gzhan yang gau rI dang/ tsau rI dang/ pra mo ha dang/ pa tA lI dang/ puk+ka sI dang/ tsaN+Da lI dang/ g+hasma rI dang/ sma shA
345b4(rgyud 'grel): ni rnams phyung ste/ rang rang gi sngags brjod pas tshig gsum drag me dang/ mche ba'i sde can dang/ mi sdug gzugs can dang/ gnas 'jom mtshon cha mo dang/ kun rgyu ma dang/ tshe 'phrog ma dang/ 'jigs pa'i las mkhan ma dang/  
345b5(rgyud 'grel): don byed pho nya mo rnams 'dul par mdzad pa'o/ /yang lha mo mda''dzin ma dang/ kha TwAM 'dzin ma dang/ 'khor lo 'dzin ma dang/ sna tshogs ba dan 'dzin ma mo phyung ste/ so so'i sngags brjod bas srin mo mi khrag 'thor ba mo dang/
345b6(rgyud 'grel): drag mo rtse gsum ma dang/ yid myur gcod pa mo dang/ sna tshogs mda''dzin ma rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /yang khro mo me tog la sogs pa brgyad phyung ste so so'i sngags brjod pas/ keng rus 'thor byed ma dang/ gdug pa'i
345b7(rgyud 'grel): dri ldan ma dang/ dbang po'i phreng ba ma dang/ srin mo khrag 'thung ma dang/ dur khrod kyi phreng 'dzin ma dang/ myur du 'ching ba mo dang/ rab sdom chen mo dang/ rgyud gsum rlag byed ma rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /gzhan yang dpal pad+ma
346a1(rgyud 'grel): gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgo nas dregs byed mdza' la gnas pa la sogs pa'i gdul bya sna tshogs kyi don du/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid las pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug yab yum thabs dang shes rab
346a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med pa'i sku phyung ste/ rang gi gsang sngags brjod pas bdud kyi rgyal po 'dul bar mdzad do/ /de nyid kyi 'khor rnams gdul ba'i phyir lha mo rnam par gzigs ma dang/ sgrol ma dang/ sa 'dzin ma dang/ khro gnyer
346a3(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ pad+ma gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma dang/ sna tshogs pad+ma mo dang/ pad+ma'i na bza' mo dang/ rdo rje padmo'i dbang phyug mo rnams phyung ste so so'i sngags brjod pas/ phyogs kun mthong ba mo dang/ dka' bzlog chen mo dang/
346a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas bdag mo dang/ 'jigs pa'i sgra 'byin ma dang/ me lce'i gshog pa can dang/ mi lpags kyi gos can ma dang/ kun tu 'khrug byed ma rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /pad+ma'i gling bu ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis phyung ste/
346a5(rgyud 'grel): so so'i sngags brjod pas glu mkhan ma dang/ nor bsrung ma dang/ 'joms ma dang/ kun byed ma dang/ me tog bdud 'dzin ma dang/ 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang/ kun tu spyod pa mo dang lam gyi gnas 'jig mo dang/ brtson
346a6(rgyud 'grel): 'grus 'khrug mdzad ma dang/ gnas kun sdom pa mo dang/ 'jigs pa'i las spyod ma dang/ 'jigs byed drag mo rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /gzhan yang dregs byed 'jungs pa can la sogs gdul bya rnams kyi don du/
346a7(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar snang pa ni dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po las/ rdo rje nyi ma yab yum gyi sku snang bar mdzad cing rang gi sngags brjod pas dregs byed kyi gtso bo de nyid 'dul bar byed de/ /de nyid kyi 'khor
346b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams gdul ba'i phyir lha mo dbang bskur ma dang/ gter ldan ma dang/ rgyal mtshan mchog ldan ma dang/ mchog chen ma dang/ mda''dzin mo dang/ kha TwAM 'dzin mo dang/ nyi ma mo dang/ rdo rje me mo ma rnams phyung ste/ so so'i sngags
346b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas ma mo rgyan can ma dang/ mi thub dpa' mo dang/ kun spyod ma dang/ kun za mo dang/ phyag brnyan mo dang/ g.yul las rgyal mo dang/ nyi ma'i mig can mo dang/ 'jig rten bsags byed ma rnams 'dul par mdzad do/ /phyi
346b3(rgyud 'grel): rol gyi lha mo rin po che gling bu ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis phyung ste so so'i sngags brjod pas/ yi dags lto mo che dang/ dgra 'dzin ma dang/ rlung gi shugs can mo dang/ gnod sbyin gyi mche ba can dang/ kun 'dzin dam byed mo
346b4(rgyud 'grel): dang mi mthun bsgyur ba mo dang/ rang 'od gsal ba mo dang/ dri ngan 'thor byed ma dang/ 'gugs pa mo dang/ 'ching ba mo dang/ drag mo nad bdag mo dang/ nag mo be con ma rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /gzhan yang dpal rta mchog
346b5(rgyud 'grel): rol pa'i sgo nas dregs byed sna tshogs 'khrul pa can la sogs pa gdul bya sna tshogs kyi don du/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid las rta mchog yab yum thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sku phyung ste rang gi sngags brjod pas
346b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyi rgyal po de nyid dang/ lha chen po drag byed kyi tshogs rnams 'dul bar mdzad do/ /de dag gi 'khor thams cad ni khyad par gyi lha mo gnyis dang/ thun mong gi lha mos sna tshogs kyi sgo nas 'dul bar mdzad de/ sna tshogs pad+ma ma dang/ sna tshogs
346b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ma dang/ phrin las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyi chags chen rgyal mo dang/ phrin las kun spyod ma dang/ de dang rigs mthun pa'i sde rnams 'dzoms par mdzad do/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul zhing de re re la snang ba'i dkyil
347a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyis kyang gdul bya'i tshogs grangs med pa 'dul par mdzad pas na/ 'di ni dbugs dbyung sna tshogs pa zhes bya'o/ /de dag gang las byung ba'i rang bzhin ni nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ rdo rje sems
347a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rab tu gnas/ /dper na til gyis 'brus bcer zhing de dag la mar gyis khyab pa dang 'dra bar snod bcud kyi dngos po thams cad lha'i dkyil 'khor gyis bar mtshams med par khyab cing/ de dag ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i
347a3(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin las phyung ba'o/ /gzhan yang mdzad pa'i tshogs 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i sgo nas/ grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed/ /so so'i phrin las kyi sgo nas las bya ba'i cho ga
347a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams rnam par spyod pas yon tan gyi snang ba thams cad gsal zhing rang bzhin gyi gnas la sbyor bar byed do/ /gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes pa ni sngon byung gi rjes 'jug gi tshul rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o// //
347a5(rgyud 'grel): le'u lnga pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o/ /gang zhig bdag dang gzhan gyi bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kyi lam du bya ba ni/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bya ba ste/ theg pa gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i don las gnyis
347a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs gcig tu spyod pa'i dus su yon tan thams cad kyi gnas la sbyor zhing sgo gsum gyi bya ba thams cad mthar phyin pa'i sgo nas lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa thams cad skye zhing nyid kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs
347a7(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa'o/ /de yang rtse ba'i rgyud las/ bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen po/ /rab tu sbyangs pa'i mthu dag gis/ /'bras bu thams cad rdzogs byed de/ /rang gi ye shes gnas la sbyor zhes so/ /
347b1(rgyud 'grel): des dang por tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par zhal gyi bzhes pa ni/ de nas gzhal yas thams cad du rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gyur pa'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bshad/ /mtshon cha'i
347b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang du 'gro ba'i yan lag phun sum tshogs pa'i rjes la/ tshogs kyi rim pa rtsom pa dang/ tshig gi dbang du le'u lnga pa'i rjes thogs su byung bas mtshams sbyar ba'o/ /de yang rnal 'byor pa gang gis spyod pa'i bye brag gis lam
347b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i phyir/ tshogs kyi cho ga sna tshogs pa la rang gi mos pa dang 'byor pa'i sgo nas 'jug par bya ste/ gnas dang dus la sogs pa'i bye brag bzhin du shes par byas la/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang tshogs kyi sgrub pa dang/
347b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi mchod pa dang/ he ru ka'i dus ston dang/ dpa' bo'i ston mo'i rim pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag so so'i cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du nyams su blang zhing sbyod pa'i mthus/ rgyu rkyen phun sum tshogs pa mchog tu
347b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i mthus/ lam sbyang zhing 'bras bu mchog tu gyur pa la sbyor bar byed de/ bla na med pa'i bde ba dang/ yid bde pa'i ngo bo nyid yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas su gyur pa 'dis sgrub par 'gyur pa'o/ /
347b6(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyir rtog pa bdun pa las/ gang zhig rnal 'byor las sbyor ba/ de nyid tshogs kyis 'grub par byed/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs sbyor bas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchog tu 'gyur/ /de sbyor thabs ni rnam lnga ste//
347b7(rgyud 'grel): bsten gnas dus gsum sngon 'gro dang/ /sgrub pa lnga yi cho ga ste/ /de spyod las rnams mthar phyin 'gyur/ /de phyir lam gyi yan lag mchog /bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen yin/ /gang sngon tshogs lam ma sbyor bar//
348a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub byas las kyi rim pa dag /rten dang bral ba'i sa bon bzhin/ /legs smin 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes so/ /de'i don ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshul gyis tshogs
348a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'bring gi las la mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gi tshul gyis spyod pas de nyid kyi don bshad pa'i phyir le'u drug par gsungs ba yin te// //grub pa'i rim pa dag ni so so'i cho ga
348a3(rgyud 'grel): las shes par bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /tshogs kyi dga' bde'i longs spyod kyis/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde ba sgrub/ /thams cad don phyir rnam sprul mchog /tshogs
348a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa dang/ /mchog tshogs ston mo rnam gnyis kyis/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i don sgrub mdzad/ /gsang ba gsang chen nyid kyi sku/ /rdo rje lta bu'i gnas la bzhugs/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i mchog /sgrub byed yan
348a5(rgyud 'grel): lag gnyis kyi tshul/ /gang thabs 'khor lo rab bshad bya/ /zhes so/ /de ltar bshad pa'i don bzhin du dkyil 'khor dngos bsgrub pa'i phyir/ dang por lha'i mtshan nyid bstan te/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems
348a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i bde byung ba/ /gsang ba mchog gis dgyes pa na/ thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ gang zhig lha mo'i tshogs kyis mi 'bral bar bskor ba ni dpal dang ldan pa'o/ /de nyid ni sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid/ /rdo rje
348a7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i sku/ thabs dang shes rab zhal sbyor gyi tshul du gnas pas/ mtshon bya dang mtshon byed du 'brel pa'i bde ba la longs spyod cing/ rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa bstan nas/ gdul bya'i
348b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas la longs spyod de/ gsang ba lnga'i dgongs pa mnga' zhing mchog tu gyur pa'i las rnam pa drug gis dgyes shing/ longs spyod bzhi'i dgyes pas 'khor lo thams cad kyi bdag nyid du 'phros 'dus mdzad pa'i las la rtag tu bzhugs
348b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de yang rtog pa bdun pa las thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' i sku/ /bde chen gsang ba'i gnas bzhugs te/ /gsang ba'i dgongs pa lnga dang ldan/ /las drug mchog tu gyur pa yis/ /dgyes
348b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad dgyes pa bzhi'i la spyod/ /'khor lo thams cad bdag nyid mchog /las mdzad 'gro 'dus rtag tu bzhugs/ /rigs drug dkyil 'khor sku yis ni/ /rigs mthun tshogs kyi gtso bo mdzad ces so/ /de ltar tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
348b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi las sgrub pa dag la ni dang por sngon du 'gro pa'i cho ga dgos te/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba bde/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog /rin chen rgyan la sogs
348b5(rgyud 'grel): pas smras?/ /dril bu rgya mtshan mchog ldan pa'i/ /bla re dam pa bres pa na/ /dngos su 'byor pa dang/ yid kyis sprul pa dang/ sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyis byin brlabs pa'i rin po che bai DUrya dang ka ti ka dang pad+ma rA ga dang/
348b6(rgyud 'grel): in+d+ra nA li dang/ pu sha ra ga? dang/ spug dang/ rdo rje dang/ rdo rje'i snying po dang/ aN+Da rI la dang/ ni mi kha dang/ shel dang/ gzi dang/ mu tig la sogs pa'i phreng ba dang/ chun 'phyang ba dang/ dra bas mdzes pa dang/ ras dang/ dar la sogs
348b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdugs dang rgya mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ bla re dang/ yol ba dang/ za ra chags la sogs pa dag ni rdo rje sems dpa' i snang ba las byung zhing bde ba de nyid ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ste/ yon tan gyi chags pa dang phrin las
349a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi snang ba mi 'bral bar gnas pa'o/ /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas rin po che'i rta babs la sogs pas rnam par brgyan pa'i khang pa chen po dril bu la sogs pa 'khrol ba'i sgra las zab pa dang
349a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya che ba'i rnam par sgrogs par mdzad pas/ rang rang gi de kho na nyid mtshon zhing gsal bar mdzad pa'o/ /gzhan yang mchod pa'i tshogs rgya chen po thams cad dgod pa'i phyir/ rdo rje tshig dang mchod la sogs/ /glu dang sil
349a3(rgyud 'grel): snyan rnam par sprul/ /me tog 'dug pa'i sbyor ba dag /mar me dri la sogs ldan par/ /mchod pa'i lha mo dang bcas pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs gzugs kyi bye brag rin po che sna bdun dang/ mchod pa'i dngos po brgya dang/ bum pa
349a4(rgyud 'grel): bzang po dang/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang/ 'dod 'jo'i ba dang/ yid bzhin nor bu la sogs pa'i 'dra 'bag gis bcos pa'i lha mo dag gi bzhag par bya'o/ /sgra'i bye brag gling bu dang/ pi wang dang/ rdza rnga dang/ rnga zlum dang/
349a5(rgyud 'grel): dung dang/ zangs dung dang/ mu tig ha ra dang/ dgu po rgyud mangs dang/ cha lang dang/ ? rdob pa la sogs pa dngos su sgra 'byin pa dang/ rol mo dang gzugs brnyan gyi bcas pa dag kyang bzhag par bya'o/ /dri'i tshogs a ka ru dang/
349a6(rgyud 'grel): spros la sogs pa'i rgyud las byung ba dang/ go risha Sha dang sbrul gyi snying po dang ga bur la sogs pa'i rdzas khyad par can dag kyang bzhag par bya'o/ /sbyar ba dang rang bzhin gyi rgyu las byung ba rnams kyang so so'i gnas su dgod par
349a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /ro'i tshogs mngar ba dang skyur ba la sogs pa'i ro drug dang sbyar ba'i rdzas ston mo'i g.yos kyi bye brag sna tshogs pa dag kyang dgod par bya'o/ /reg bya'i bye brag stong g.yogs dang/ smad g.yogs dang/ cod pan dang/ rna
349b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang/ do shal dang/ phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyang gdags par bya'o/ /gzhan yang bsrung ba'i rdzas thams cad kyang mda' dang phur bu dang/ ral gri dang/ yungs kar dang/ gu gul dang/ thal ba dang/ rang rang gi phyag mtshan
349b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bya ma dang/ dri chu rnams kyang so so'i gnas rnams su dgram par bya'o/ /mchod pa dang gtor ma'i rdzas mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa dang/ mchod pa thams cad kyi gtor ma'i phyag rgya shes pa las ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du
349b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar zhing dgod par bya'o/ /spyi'i mchod pa'i yan lag me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ mar me dang/ dri chab dang/ zhal zas dag kyang gnas brgyad du 'gram par bya'o/ /de dag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ni sgrub thabs las
349b4(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o/ /de ltar spyod pas las su bya ba ci zhig sgrub ce na/ sgrub pa'i don bshad pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog sgrub/ /rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas brtsam par bya
349b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rim bzhin pa'i sgo nas brtsam par bya ba dang/ rigs gcig gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas brtsam par bya'o/ /de yang dang por ni bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sgo nas sgrub cing/ de dag mthar phyin
349b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sgo nas bsgrub par bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor rgya chen dang/ /dkyil 'khor rim bzhin sgrub pa dang/ rigs gcig dpa' bo gcig pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor
349b7(rgyud 'grel): gang yang rung ba dag /sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyor/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen po'i/ /rim par 'dug pa bstan pa yin zhes so/ /de ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i don de dag kyang/ /rten gyi gang zag yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang
350a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su sgrub par bstan pa'i phyir/ yang na bde ba'i gnas dag gam/ /skyed mos tshal la sogs par sgrub/ /gang zhig rang gi sngon du brtsams pa'i gnas phun sum tshogs pa dang mi
350a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa dag gis ni rang gi mos pa'i gnas ji ltar bde ba dang skyed mos tshal la sogs par bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa'i don to/ /der sgrub par bya ba'i las bya ba la/ dang por bsod nams kyi tshogs la ni sngon du sa'i cho ga dang sta gon la
350a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i cho ga dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab cing bris nas/ so so'i gnas su rdul tshon ma bkye bar gdan tsam dgod pa'i phyir/ der ni dang por gdan bshams te/ 'jam zhing reg na bde gyur pa/ /sna tshogs pad+ma ras
350a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis g.yogs/ /de ni thams cad dag pa'i gdan/ /dkyil 'khor gang yang rung pa'i sgo nas lha'i grangs bzhin du rnal 'byor pa du yod pas so so'i gdan du yod pa la gnas par bya'o/ /stan de nyid kyang dngos su pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs
350a5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am/ ras de nyid la pad+mas mtshon par bya'o/ /de yang rnal 'byor pa'i grangs dkyil 'khor gyi lha grangs pas mang ba zhig na ni mchod pa'i lha dang/ phrin las kyi lha'i gnas su gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi'i grangs kyis lnga pa cing gal
350a6(rgyud 'grel): te grangs nyung ba zhig na ni 'dra 'bag gi bcos ma dag kyang bzhag par bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba bzhin/ /phyag rgya'i cha lugs gnas par bya/ /gang zhig rang gnas las lhag 'gyur/ /mchod dang
350a7(rgyud 'grel): phrin las lha mo yis/ /gnas su btang ste bzhag par bya/ /ma tshang ba dag brnyan mas bsab/ /de dag so so'i rnal 'byor gyi/ /pad+ma la gnas mtshan ma 'dzin zhes so/ /de ltar sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag dang ldan pa des ni tshogs kyi
350b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i rim pa la 'jug par bya ste/ dang por bsod nams kyi tshogs bsag pa'i phyir/ sgom pa'i rim pas dkyil 'khor 'khrul pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
350b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi lha/ /de nas rnam par 'phrul par mdzad/ /rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du lha nyis brgya drug cu rnams dang rigs so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa'i dbang du lha brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang cig rigs so so'i dkyil 'khor
350b3(rgyud 'grel): dang kha yar pa'i sgo nas lha nyi shu rtsa gcig dang/ rta mchog gi lha mo gnyis kyis lhag pa dang/ dpa' bo yab yum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas lha sum cu po dag rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /de nyid gang gi sgo nas she na/ sangs rgyas thams
350b4(rgyud 'grel): cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i don gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo las byung ba'o/ /tshul ji ltar zhe na/ sbyor ba'i dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo nas so/ /rkyen gang zhig gis zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha las byung ba'o/ /'bras
350b5(rgyud 'grel): bu ci zhig gis mdzad pa la spyod ce na/ dkyil 'khor gong ma dag gis gong ma'i so so'i bya ba grub par mdzad pa'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor rgya chen po dag kyang rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa drug tu 'dus te/ de las rdo rje sems dpa' 
350b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ji ltar 'phrul pa'i tshul ni/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi rang bzhin la snang ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' i sku dang/ dung dang kun da zla ba'i bzhin gyis mdzes pa ye shes kyi mdangs la rin po che sna lnga'i 'od zer 'phro zhing/ de las sangs
350b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rigs drug gi sku byung bas mdzes pa/ 'jo sgeg dgyes pa'i 'dzum mig dang bcas pas chags pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa dkar po dang mthing kha dang ser po dang dmar po'i zhal bzhis mtshan zhing rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang cod pan du
351a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa/ phyag g.yas g.yon gyi dang pos rdo rje rtse lnga pa thugs kar bsnyems pa'i tshul du gsor zhing kha TwAM ga dril bu dang bcas pas 'khrol ba'o/ /'og ma gnyis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa mtshan bzang po sum
351a2(rgyud 'grel): cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad brgyad cus spras shing phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes pa/ sku stong dar dkar gser gyi ris can stong g.yogs su bnabs shing/ sku smad tshe gu'i na bza' can/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i rked chings can mgur chu dang
351a3(rgyud 'grel): do shal dang/ dbung rgyan phyag zhabs kyi gdu bu dang/ se mo dos mtshan pa rang nyid kyi cha 'dra ba 'am/ lha mo bde mchog ma lta bu'i kun tu bzang mo zhal sbyor du bzhugs ba'o/ /de'i phyogs su gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi rang nyid kyi
351a4(rgyud 'grel): cha 'dra ba'i 'od kyi skyes bu bzhi la/ 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs te shar du lha mo bde mchog ma sku mdog dkar mo sna tshogs kyi gos dang rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ 'gyings pags gis phyag na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa ste pad+ma'i dkyil
351a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la gnas pa'o/ /lho phyogs su e ma bde ba mo gser gyi mdog can b+ha ga dang ling ka'i mtshan ma 'dzin cing rdo rje dang rin po ches brgyan pa'o/ /nub phyogs su lha mo snang mdzad ma dmar mdangs can phyag g.yas na sna
351a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin cing bdag po'i sku la 'khyud nas g.yon pas thod pa'i snod bdud rtsis bkang ba thogs te/ kha TwAM ga gru mor bcug pa'o/ /byang phyogs su slob ma mo in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can g.yas pas bdag po la 'khyud
351a7(rgyud 'grel): cing g.yon na sangs rgyas kyi skus mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /yang phyi rol shar gyi re'u mig la sangs rgyas byang chub ma dkar dmar gyi mdangs can tshangs pa'i mgo bzhis mtshan pa'i mda' gzhu dus gcig tu
351b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phen pa'o/ /lho phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo ma dkar ser gyi mdangs can phyag g.yas kyi gung mo la 'khor lo dmar po rtsibs brgyad pa dang/ sngon po rtsibs brgyad pa gnyis brtsegs pa'i tshul du brgyud shing 'degs pa'i tshul gyi stod pa/
351b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa 'gying bags gis tshul gyis khu tshur dku'i gnas su brten te bzhugs pa'o/ /nub phyogs su khams gsum rnam rgyal ma dmar skya'i mdog can g.yas na tri shul rtse gsum stod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing
351b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa thugs kar brten pa'o/ /byang phyogs su 'dod pa'i dbang mo ljang gu'i mdog can/ phyag gnyis na dpag bsam gyi shing lcug ma dang bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa 'dzin zhing gar mdzad pa'o/ /de ltar rtsa ba'i
351b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo de dag kun kyang rin po che'i rgyan dang cha byad kyis mdzes shing/ rang 'od kyi rig ma dang 'khril ba'i zhal sbyor te 'gying bags gi rnam pas bzhugs pa'o/ /me mtshams kyi re'u mig la rdo rje gling bu ma bai DUrya'i
351b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog can/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gling bu sgrogs pa'o/ /bden bral gyi re'u mig la rdo rje pi wang ma gser gyi mdog can/ rdo rjes mtshan ma'i pi wang glu dbyangs drug gi sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su rdo rje rnga chen ma pad+ma rA ga'i
351b6(rgyud 'grel): mdog can rdo rjes mtshan pa'i zlu ma brdung ba'o/ /dbang ldan gyi mtshams su rdo rje rdza lnga ma in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rdza rnga brdung ba'o/ /yang phyi rol gyi me mtshams su rdo rje me tog ma dmar ser rdo rjes mtshan ma'i
351b7(rgyud 'grel): me tog gi gzhong pa thogs pa'o/ /bden bral gyi mtshams su rdo rje spos me ma dkar sngon rdo rjes mtshan pa'i spos me thogs pa'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su rdo rje mar me ma dmar mo rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mar me 'degs pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi
352a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su rdo rje dri chab ma ljang gu rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dri chab 'thor ba'o/ /yang shar gyi sgor rdo rje rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma chu shel gyi mdog can/ g.yas na lcags kyu g.yon na thong pa'i bdud rtsi rta
352a2(rgyud 'grel): mgo dang bcas pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor phag mdog mo bai DUrya'i mdog can g.yas na mche ba g.yon na zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor snang ba mo dmar gsal gyi mdangs can phyag gnyis na lcags sgrog nyi zlas mtshan
352a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /byang gi sgor thal byed ma ljang gu g.yas na dril bu 'khrol zhing/ g.yon pa'i banda'i bdud rtsi nang nas sangs rgyas snang ba mdza' yas kyi sku byung ba'o/ /lha mo nyi shu po de dag kyang rgyan dang cha lugs dang 'od kyi dkyil
352a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyis mdzes par gyur to/ /bsdus pa'i dbang du ni lha mo kun kyang kha dog 'dra bar le'u dgu pa las gsungs pa'i don bzhin bstan pa'o/ /yang rnam par snang mdzad kyis dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyir/ rdo
352a5(rgyud 'grel): rje 'chang chen po nyid las snang ba'i sangs rgyas de nyid gser gyi mdog can nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od dang ldan pa'i gangs ri lhun po ltar bzhugs pa/ gser dang karti dang in+d+ra nI la dang/ pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can gyi zhal bzhi dang
352a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ phyag bzhi na chos gos dang lhung bzed dang khar sil dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam 'dzin pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha lugs can rin po che/ sna bdun dang 'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis nye bar
352a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa/ rang 'od kyi rig ma yum sangs rgyas spyan ma dang gnyis su med par zhal sbyor gyi tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /de nyid kyi shar du sangs rgyas kun tu brjod ma chu shel gyi mdog can rin po che'i rgyan kun gyis mdzes
352b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i pad+ma 'dzin par me lces mtshan pa'i pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs su dpa' mo shin tu rgyal ma gser gyi mdog can phyag gnyis na cha lang 'dzin pa'o/ /nub phyogs na kun tu bzang mo pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can phyag gnyis na rdo
352b2(rgyud 'grel): rje rtse lnga pa dang rin po che'i za ma tog 'dzin pa'o/ /byang phyogs ni mi bzad rin po che'i snod 'dzin ma/ sna tshogs kyi mdog can rin po ches bkang ba'i snod dang chos kyi dung 'dzin pa'o/ /yang phyi rol gyi shar phyogs kyi re'u cha la
352b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun 'dzin ma gur gum gyi mdog can sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i sku thugs kar 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs na lha mo zhal bzang ma me long gi mdog can phyag gnyis me long dang rnga yab 'dzin pa'o/ /nub phyogs su lha mo sprin chen
352b4(rgyud 'grel): ma bai DU rya'i mdog can phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje sprin gyi dkyil 'khor la ser ba 'bebs pa'o/ /byang phyogs su nam mkha' i spyan ma ser skya'i mdog can phyag gnyis pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la mig gis mtshan pa 'dzin pa'o/ /phyi rol gyi lha
352b5(rgyud 'grel): mo gling su ma la sogs pa bzhi dang/ me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi dang/ rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma la sogs pa bzhi po dag ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor las bstan pa dang 'dra bar gnas pa las/ cung zhig gi khyad
352b6(rgyud 'grel): par ni zhi ba'i cha lugs 'dzin cing rgyan dang phyag mtshan la 'khor lo'i rnam pas mtshan pa'o/ /yang dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid las snang ba'i 'bras bu'i he ru ka'i de nyid sku
352b7(rgyud 'grel): bai DUrya'i mdog can 'bar ba chen po'i 'od zer dang bcas pa/ zhal g.yas zhi ba'i rang bzhin dkar po/ /dbus mthing nag drag po'i cha lugs can/ /rgyab ma chags mdzad dmar po'i zhal/ /g.yon pa rmongs mdzad ser
353a1(rgyud 'grel): por bzhugs pa/ /smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer bcu 'gyur zhing spyan mig dmar po las 'jigs pa'i me stag 'phro ba dang/ dbu skra dangs ma ra ser nag tu 'khyil zhing gyen du brdzes pa spu rnams rdo rje'i
353a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis g.yas su 'khyil ba zhal gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsogs pa dang/ ljags 'dril ba dang/ rkan brdab pa dang/ 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis gnas pa dang/ sgeg pa dang/ dpa' ba dang/ 'jigs su rung ba dang/ rgod
353a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ gshe ba dang/ 'jigs par byed pa dang/ snying rje dang rngam pa dang/ zhi ba'i mdangs kyis gnas pa/ phyag g.yas g.yon gyi dang po na rdo rje kha TwAM ga dril bus mtshan pa 'dzin pa/ de'i 'og ma gnyis kyis 'jigs
353a4(rgyud 'grel): byed chen po'i pags pa rlung gi tshul du bskor pa/ gsum pa gnyis na mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa/ g.yas kyi bzhi pa na dung chen po'i khrag gis bkang zhing gsol ba'i stabs kyis gnas pa/ g.yon gyi bzhi pa na dung chen po'i
353a5(rgyud 'grel): snying gis bkang ba'o/ /yang la lar zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa la g.yas gnyis rdo rje dang dung khrag gis bkang ba/ g.yon gnyis na thod pa dang/ zhags pas mtshan pa/ rdo rje kha TwAM ga ser ral khang thogs pa'o/ /yang la
353a6(rgyud 'grel): la zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa la rdo rje dang dung chen po khrag gis bkang ba 'dzin zhing/ kha TwAM ga la rgyab brten mdzad pa'o/ /de dag kun gyi sku la glang chen gyi ko rlon dang/ sbrul gyi chun po dang/ stag gi pags pa dang/ lha
353a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i g.yang gzhi dang/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba dang/ khrag dang/ zhag dang/ thal ba'i ri mos mtshan zhing phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa/ nyi ma dang zla ba dang rin po che'i phreng bas snyan tshe byas la yum kro d+he shwa ri dang zhal sbyor
