443a4(rgyud 'grel): du sbyor bar bya'o/ /rgyu mtshan des na phung po lnga sangs rgyas thams cad dang dpa' o rnams sems dpa' thams cad dang/ longs sku rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du cha 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rtag pa dang po'i 'grel pa rdzogs so// //
443a5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar de kho na nyid gtso bor bstan pa'i ? pa bshad nas/ da ni rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin thabs mang bo bshad pa ni/ 'di ni rnal 'byor lha ga bAn/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa la sogs
443a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bshad zin to/ /rnal 'byor de ji lta bu zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas/ dbab pa thams cad 'grub bar 'gyur zhes sngos te/ bdag gis rtog pa drug gis lhar bskor la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas sku gsung thugs
443a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas cad kyi ye shes phob na/ gser 'gyur rtsi'i rnam pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na byin rlabs kyi lam gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba/ 'dis rgyu'i rgyud kyi rnal 'byor gyi  
443b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug chen po thabs kyi rgyud kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi lam gyis bde ba nyid kyis 'bras bu'i sangs rgyas kyi bde ba kun thob pa'o/ /de ltar bsgom pa bshad nas/ spyod pa bshad pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba zhes ba smos te/ mnyam par sbyor ba'i
443b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i sgoms nas thabs kyi rnal 'byor 'di la khrus dang sdom pa la sogs pa mi dgos so zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /lhag ma ni go sla'o/ /spyod pa bshad nas brtul zhugs bshad pa ni/ langs pa dang na 'dug pa dang/ zhes pa la sogs pa smos te
443b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyir la ma bzhi la rnal 'byor pa rnams rtog pa drug gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis rgyas btab nas lha'i brtul zhugs spyod pa ni mdun gyi shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs kyang/ rang gi lha'i bdag nyid du bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa bsod nams ? ?
443b4(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar brtul zhugs gsung nas de kho na nyid bshad pa ni de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni zhes pa la sogs te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las dbang bzhi pa thob nas/ de kho na nyid bsgom pa ni rnal 'byor pa spros mer gyi spyod pas
443b5(rgyud 'grel): dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lur? du ma bstan pa? thams? cad? ? chen po'i rang bzhin sgrub par byed ba ni nyes pa thams cad gyis gtses par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshan nyid theg pas bskal pa grangs med pa'i sa mi thob pa yang sar pa rgyas dang byang chub sems
443b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i lam rim? ma? ? gyi ? ? chen po? gang gis bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /de kho na nyid bsgom pa bshad nas/ da ni gdod rgyun gyon nas sgrub pa bsten pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor gnas pas sogs pa
443b7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs te/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs dang mnyam par sbyor gdang rgyan byon nas/ rtog pa rug gi lha'i 'khor lo bsgrubs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rlob cing 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /der sa na sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gdong rgyan
444a1(rgyud 'grel): gyon ba bshad nas/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshad pa'i phyir/ gang gis ldem dgongs 'di mthong nas/ rnam pa kun tu mchod byed na/ /zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/ bcos ma'i rnal 'byor gyi gzugs brnyan dang bcas pas
444a2(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa rang gi lha'i 'khor lo bsgom zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas rnam pa kun tu dad par byed pa ni/ rnal 'byor pa ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad par byas na des sangs rgyas mthong zhing/ pU dza byas par 'gyur ro/ /'di dang sangs rgyas thams
444a3(rgyud 'grel): cad la/ zhes pa rnal 'byor pa 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la mthong ba gzugs dang/ thos pa sgra dang/ snom pa dri dang/ myong bong dang reg bya la sogs pas pU dza pas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs kyang bde bas dar po'i ye shes mthong
444a4(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i phan yon bstan pa ni/ mthong ba dang ni reg pa rang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ grol ba'i lam pa'i rnal 'byor pas rgod pa dang bltas pa dang/ lag bcangs kyis kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /chags pa'i lam gsungs pa ni/
444a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad la zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'di ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la zhes pa ye shes sems dpa' dang rnal 'byor mnyam bar sbyir? ? bsangs
444a6(rgyud 'grel): byer ? la mo dang/ dbang gi dang/ dpa' bo'i dar/ bkas gnad ba'i lha mo dag kyang rnam par 'grol zhing byang chub la reg par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar chags pa'i lam bshad nas/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor pa bshad pa ni/ kun ? ? ?
444a7(rgyud 'grel): cad pu nas pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ spyod pas bzhi pa lha'i 'khor lo dngos bzhi dang/ mthun bar mtshan mthob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ gnas thams cad dus thams cad kyi bdag nyid rtag par bsgoms nas/ thams cad mis byang chub
444b1(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur ro/ /sbyor pa bshad nas/ rnal 'byor bzhi bsgom pa bshad pa ni/ 'di'i bdag nyid kun gnas pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' i rnal 'byor byas la/ gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang mi 'ong ba rnam pa
444b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang/ gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya yid du 'ong ba gsum lha mor bskyed pa'i pU dza'i sprin thams cad kyi pU dza na bde ba'i mchog thod par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rnal 'byor ba'i dgos pa bshad nas/ thams cad kyi rnal 'byor bshad pa ni/ rnal 'byor thams
444b3(rgyud 'grel): cad nyer sbyor bas/ zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ kham gsum pa thams cad lha'i rang bzhin du bskyed la/ rnal 'byor ma kun gyi longs spyod ba 'khyud pa dang/ 'o byed pa la sogs pa'i bde bas rab tu pU dza bar bya'o/ /rjes su rnal 'byor thabs
444b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo dang shes rab kyi 'khor lo mnyam par sbyor ba bde bas pU dza na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /shin tu rnal 'byor ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ bde ba la stong pa nyid kyi rgyus btab nas/ sangs rgyas thams
444b5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis sa ya na'i bde ba sgrub bas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde ba'i mchog 'grub pa brtag pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar thabs mad bshad pa nas/ zab pa bshad pa 'di ni/ rnal 'byor bcom
444b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ zab pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/ rdo rje sems dpa' i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba'i rgyu'i rgyud dang/ dpal ldan rab kyi dam tshig dge zhes pa phyag rgya dang
444b7(rgyud 'grel): mnyam? ba? sbyor? bas? zhi? gnas dang ltag mthong ma bon sum du bskyed pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor ba yis zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ gti mug gi rigs can gyi phyir/ rgya bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor bas rten ? tshogs pa'i
445a1(rgyud 'grel): mthu nyid kyis bde ba chen po so sor dang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /he ru ka'i dam tshig gi bshad pa ni/ kun tu bzang mo'i rang bzhin gyis/ phyag rgya bzhi rten 'brel gyi mthu nyid mu dra bzhi so so la bde bstong pa nyid kyi rgyas
445a2(rgyud 'grel): btab na bde ba stong pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi dam tshig gi bshad pa ni/ gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba stong nyid so sor sgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i dam tshig bshad pa ni/ mA ma kI'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya
445a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi la stong nyid kyi rgyas btab pas bde ba chen po so sor 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rta mchog gi dam tshig bshad pa ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba zhes bya ba bsam gtan dang zag med kyi sdom pa mngon sum du bskyad pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa'i mthu
445a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis sgrol ma'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya gnyis las bde ba chen po so sor grub nas 'jig rten gyi dngos grub drug rjes su rang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar lha so so'i phyag rgya bshad nas/ rigs drug thun mong gi chos kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa
445a5(rgyud 'grel): ni de'i dam tshig de 'byung ba zhes bya bar lungs? te thabs? drug po gang yin pa de'i dam tshig shes rab kyi rang bzhin gang yin bde 'byung ba'o/ /sdug pa'i dam tshig 'das? rjes 'brang zhes bya ba sdug pa ni lha mo'o/ /dam tshig ni rang snang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /bdag rjes 'brang zhes pa  
445a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang sku mdog mthun pa'o/ /shin tu sbyor ba ni sgyu ma lta bur shes pa'o/ /sbyor ba chen po ni 'od gsal/ gyi rang bzhin du shes pa'o thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can dang snang gi lha mo drug
445a7(rgyud 'grel): go /gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa zhes pa bsnyan sgrub bzhis lha dang lha mor bskyed pa'o/ /lhan cig spyod pa ni dga' ba gnyis so/ /rjes su sdug ces pas mchog dga' bo/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma mchog tu 'bad zhes pa lhan cig
445b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes dga' o/ /thams cad dga' ba ma lus pa'i/ phyag rgya thams cad bde ba che zhes bya ba ni/ bde ba chen po'i ye shes so/ /rtog pa dam tshig lha ma'i zhes pa sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa bud med kyi gzugs can gyi sprul sku'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba'ang?
445b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes? pa/ rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i dga' ba gsum dang/ bde ba stong pa nyid du shes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor ba'o/ /lha mo thams cad 'dus pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i lha mo'o/ /ma lus skal pa bzang po kun zhes pa ye shes las skyes pa dang
445b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing skyes dang sngags las skyes pa'o/ /bde ba so sor rjes 'grub pa zhes pa lha mo de rnams la zhi gnas lhag mthong sum du bskyed pa'o/ /de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya bshad nas/ phyag rgya chen po bshad pa ni/ phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas shes
445b4(rgyud 'grel): pa smos te/ rdo rje sems dpa' i rnal 'byor bas rang gi mu dra la bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab nas bsgoms na nam mkha' i khams kyis mthas klas pa'i lha mo thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar 'gyur snyam na/
445b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rnal 'byor bde bas myong zhes pa smos te/ skal pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ma thams cad la ye shes bsam pa'i bde bas myos nas snyoms par zhugs kyang sdig pa med cing/ stobs kyi ngo mthon du zhes bya ba ni de'i mthus mngon sum
445b6(rgyud 'grel): du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /rang bzhin brgyad cu dang drang? babs sdig pa med cing zhi gnas dang/ lhag mthong mngon sum skye bas na ngo mthon du'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rnal 'byor pas mchog gi dngos grub thob nas 'dod//
445b7(rgyud 'grel): //pa'i dbang phyug gi dngos grub kyi las byed par 'gyur ro/ /rnam snang gi phyag rgya chen por grub pa'i phan yon ni/ dbang po kun las byung ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'dod yon lngas pU dza ba dza'i? grub po//
446a1(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka'i phyag rgya chen po ni/ rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad ni zhes pa smos te/ bde ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas he ru ka chos kyi ngo bor ro gcig pa'i dbang bskur ba yin no/ /he nyid? bde chen las byung ba/ /ru ni rin chen chags dang
446a2(rgyud 'grel): bral/ /ka ni rab tu rmongs pa sbyangs/ /bde ba kun gyi dbang bskur ro/ /zhes bshad do/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi phyag rgya chen po ni lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la zhes pa smos te/ zhing dang sngags dang las las skyes pa'i lha mo'o/ /de rnams la dga' ba
446a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i tshul gyis ji lta bar bstan nas de stong pa nyid du bsgom pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor thams cad dang bde ba'i zhes gsungs te/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sbyor pas bde ba chen po kun tu rnal 'byor gnyis kyi
446a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis myong bar byed do/ /rta mchog gi phyag rgya chen po ni sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ dga' ba bzhi'i ra sa ya na'i bde ba des rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa 'gyur ro/ /de ltar phyag rgya chen po drug
446a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad nas/ de rnams kyi 'dir gsungs pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dang pU dza dang yon tan dang lnga ste/ lnga po de mdor bsdu na rdo rje 'dzin pa thugs dang 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung dang/ rin chen dbang phyug sku'i bdag nyid yin na/ de dag dang
446a6(rgyud 'grel): ni dga' ba spyad na zhes pa rigs lnga 'am gsum gi lha mo de rnams dang dga' ba gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin spyod na/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro ldib? zhes pa lha'i rgyal po'i dngos grub dang/ chos kyi dbyibs dang mnyam mi mnyam pa zhes pa sangs rgyas
446a7(rgyud 'grel): dang byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'di nyid la thob pa yin no/ /de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te/ skyed rim rdul tshon gyi maN+Dal mtshan ma thob nas dngos grub len pa 'am/ /rdzogs rim lus dang b+ha ga dang chos kyi dbyings kyi maN+Dal
446b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang zhing gi? btung ba dang/ pho nya'i gtsang sbra gnyis kyis dngos grub sgrub pa na sgrub pa'i thabs ni lam dang po de nyid snang ba/ gnyis pa thabs mang pa/ gsum ba zab pas dngos grub 'di blangs nas sems can gyi don phyin las zhes
446b2(rgyud 'grel): bya bar gsungs pa yin no/ /brtag pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar zab pa bstan nas dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa mchog gi dngos grub bshad pa ni/ 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te
446b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang po thon? po dbang du byas pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde mchog yin no/ /lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba zhes pa phyag rgya dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o/ /skal pa bzang mchog 'dod pa ste/ zhes dbang skur pa'i gang zag gi
446b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub 'dod pa'o/ /yang dag sbyor bas bde ba myong ba zhes pa rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin zag med kyi bde ba myong pa'o/ /'dod chags ther zug rtag pa can zhes pa 'dod chags ni zab med kyi bde ba'o/ /ther zug ni mngon sum gyi
446b5(rgyud 'grel): nyams su myong ba'i don de ltar 'ba' zhig rtogs pa 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa zhig pa dang/ ma? byung ba med pas na rtag pa'o/ /de'i spyod pa bshad pa ni sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen du zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ zag med kyi gzugs sgra?  dri ro reg bya la
446b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas pha rol byin grub pa zhes pa pha rol phyin pa dang gzungs dang sa rnams kyis bskal pa gsum gyis dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na/ lha dang mi'i ris su skyes pa'i bskal ba bzang po'i ye shes las skyes pa'i sngags dang zhing skyes la sogs smos kyang
446b7(rgyud 'grel): ca dgos/ /lha'i dngos grub dga' ba dang zhes pa'i 'jig rten gyi dngos grub/ sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po zhes pa mchog gi dngos grub bskal pa bzang po bde ba stong zhes pa/ zag med kyi bde ba 'dod pas phyag rgya'i bde ba
447a1(rgyud 'grel): so sor nges zag pa med pa'i ye shes grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni/ las dang po pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' spyod pa bstan pa ni dngos po thams cad las byung ba zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/
447a2(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang mo'i rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la spyad par bya'o/ /he ru ka'i spyod pa ni rdo rje can gyis mchog grub dang zhes pa ni khro mo dbyings kyi dbang ma'i rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi dang zag med kyi bde ba bskyed pa'o/ /pad+ma gar dbang
447a3(rgyud 'grel): gi spyod pa ni 'jig rten dbang po mchog gi dpa' zhes bya ba smos te/ gos dkar mo dang mthun pa phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o/ /rnam snang gi spyod pa ni sangs rgyas dag la bde ba dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ sangs rgyas phyag rgya'i rigs
447a4(rgyud 'grel): dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i spyod pa ni/ khams gsum dag na ma lus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ mA ma kI'i rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o/ /rta mchog gi spyod pa ni/ sangs
447a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi grub chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ sgrol ma dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba sgom pa'o/ /de ltar mchog gi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi lha mo bshad nas/ 'jig rten gyi dngos grub gyi bsam gtan gyi lha mo bshad
447a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ mthu chen la ni bkra shis brtan/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ mthu chen ni khyab 'jug go /bkra shis brtan ni de'i chung ma'o/ /'phrog las ni dbang phyug chen po'o/ /grub pa ni lha mo u ma'o/ /dran pa las ni 'dod pa'i lha'o/ /
447a7(rgyud 'grel): dga' zhes pa de'i chung ma'o/ /ngo mthon stobs kyis phrogs nas zhes pa mngon sum du bkug nas bdag nyid longs spyod pa dang/ sems 'dzin pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ tshogs 'khor byed pa'i dad pa la sbyin par bya'o/ /de ltar btsun mo rin
447b1(rgyud 'grel): po che bsgrub pa bstan nas/ rgyal srid bsgrub pa ni ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ khams gsum gyi bdag po la longs spyod thams cad phrogs nas bdag nyid kyang longs spyod cing dad pa la sbyin par byed do/ /rgyal srid
447b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa bstan nas/ bdag po sgrub pa bstan pa ni tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi bdag po phrogs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing dad pa yang sbyin par byed do/ /des 'jig rten gyi
447b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub bstan nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub ni/ sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab nas/ phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa las mi bya ba gang yang med do/ /sangs rgyas
447b4(rgyud 'grel): dang byang chub sems dpa' i ye shes kyang sngags kyang rgyud dang yan+ta'i thabs gsum gyis phrogs nas gzhan la sbyin par byed na/ 'jig rten gyi dngos grub lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab pa'i mthus dngos grub mchog
447b5(rgyud 'grel): thob pa dang/ bdud thams cad 'joms pa dang/ ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dngos grub chen po dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba yang rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sprul pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba bzhugs pa
447b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa ni la lar byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gdul bya btul ba'i thabs 'grub pa'o/ /longs sku'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni 'dis dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog ces bya ba la sogs
447b7(rgyud 'grel): pa smos te/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i lha'i gzugs dang bsam gyis mi khyab par yongs su sgyur ba sku'i tshe dang/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i kha dog dang/ stobs bcu la sogs pa'i stobs dang/ zag med kyi snang ba rdo rje sems pa'i rang bzhin dang/ 'gro
448a1(rgyud 'grel): ba bzang po thams cad kyi bsnyen pa bya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'o/ /longs sku de yang gcig tu nges pa zhig yin snyam na/ lha mo bzhi ka'i dbus na rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs pa dang/ rigs drug
448a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rgyas 'debs pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi lha dang nges par legs pa'i byang chub rnams kyang sems can rnams la sbyin par byed pa dang/ 'khor ba ji srid par gnas kyi bar du bskal pa mang
448a3(rgyud 'grel): por sems can gyi don du srid pa la rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/ /rtag pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so// //de ltar rtog pa thams cad thun mong du sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid bstan pa dang/ thabs mang ba dang zab pa dang/
448a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi le'u bshad nas/ nga ni gdul bya so so'i bye brag gi rtog pa gsungs pa ni/ 'di ni rnal 'byor b+ha ga bA na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ 'dod chags chen po'i
448a5(rgyud 'grel): gang zag 'dul pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' i rnal 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje dngos grub rtog pa lha nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma'i bde mchog
448a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa yin no/ /de yang gcig yin te/ /sngon 'dzam+bu'i gling du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i skur bshad pa dang/ rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pa'i dbang du byas na/ gzugs brnyan gyi 'khor lo bsgoms nas/ las
448a7(rgyud 'grel): dang po pa'i dngos ba grub dang/ mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa dngos grub len pa dang/ gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i gang zag la dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin no/ /sngon 'dzam+bu'i gling du gyur pa'i sprul sku'i lugs
448b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rim pa gsungs pa ni/ yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid ces gsungs te/ 'og min du byang chub pas chos sku bsnyes pa'o/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar zhes pa byang chub pa lnga pa la longs sku'i rgyu rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ rgyu'i rnam snang ngam/ rgyu'i rdo
448b2(rgyud 'grel): rje'i ?pa'am/ rgyu'i pad+ma gar dbang ngam/ rgyu'i he ru ka 'am/ rgyu'i rta mchog tu snang ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad la'o/ /grub pa dam pa mchog gi chos zhes pas sngon sangs rgyas kyi lam du grub pa zag med dam pa mchog gi lam ni de nyid du gsungs pa dang/
448b3(rgyud 'grel): kha sbyor thig le nas 'byung ba bzhin du zla ba dang/ zla ba gcig pa dang/ rdo rje dang/ khams zhugs pa dang/ sku gyur pas rtog pa drug po thams cad la 'og min du byang chub pa'i tshe bsgom par bya'o/ /sna tshogs lam gyi sbyor ba yis zhes bya bas 'og
448b4(rgyud 'grel): min du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bzhugs nas byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang ting nge 'dzin dang phrin las la bzhag pa'o/ /cho ga sna tshogs pa 'dod pa'i/ sems can rnam par gdul ba dang zhes pa rtog pa drug gi gdul bya 'dod chags
448b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang/ gti mug dang/ zhe sdang dang/ log par lta ba dang/ ser sna dang le lo chen po can 'dul ba'i phyir/ ye shes drug gi bde ba sgrub pa'i phyir/ b+ha ga bAn sngon bde ba can du sprul sku'i 'bras bu ni rdo rje 'chang drug po de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam
448b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul sems can gyi don du sprul nas/ phyag rgya bzhi la smos pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de yang thabs gang gis myur ba yin zhe na/ byin rlabs kyi lam gyis ye shes sems dpa' bcug pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar ston byung ba
448b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bshad nas rjes 'jug gsungs pa ni/ nyin re 'am yang na zla re 'am/ yang na de bzhin lo re na/ ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang/ /sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs te/ bsnyen bsgrub bzhi bsgoms pas
449a1(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa byas nas zhag gcig 'jog pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bri ba 'am/ zla ba gcig 'jog pa 'am/ lo gcig 'jog pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas zhes pa dkyil 'khor byed pa'i rnal
449a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bas bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa chung du dang 'bring dang chen po'i rim pas 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du bskyed na pU dza byas la sangs rgyas pa de mchog gi zlos gar bsgom par bya'o/ /yang na ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par mi 'dod na cha lugs
449a3(rgyud 'grel): byas nas sgrub pa bstan pa ni/ khams kyi ngo bo thams cad rang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa'o/ /de gzhin srog dang rtsa las byung/ /zhes pa srog chags las byung ba'i bso dang rwa las byas pa dang/ rtsa las
449a4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i shing la 'bur du bkos nas rang gi lha'i cha lugs su bya'o/ /de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu zhes smos te/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ rnam snang dang/ he ru ka dang/ rdo rje nyi ma dang/ pad+ma gar dbang dang/ rta mchog gzugs su bya'o/ /
449a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bstan pa/ sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis/ zhes bya ba smos te/ rigs drug gi rnal 'byor pa khyim pa 'am rab tu 'byung ba 'am skyes pa'am bud med kyi rtog pa drug gi 'khor lo gang dang gang ston pa'o/ /de yang gang
449a6(rgyud 'grel): zhig dang lhan cig bsgom zhen/ slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der/ mchod pa byas nas de 'grub po/ /zhes bya bas dbang bskur ba'i slob ma'i tshogs dang/ gdong rgyan byon la tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub par bya'o/ /de ltar sngon 'byung dang rjes 'jug
449a7(rgyud 'grel): gi rgyud bshad nas/ da ni rtog pa thams cad kyi sngon 'byung gi gling gzhi gsungs pa ni/ de nas gzhan yang rtog kun gyi/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam pa sprul pa yi rigs drug sprul par bya'o/ /gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /de yang
449b1(rgyud 'grel): ston pa su zhig la gnas gang zhig tu su zhig dang lhan cig tu dus nam gyi tshe thos zhe na/ ston pa sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba ste longs sku dang sprul sku'i ngo bo nyid do/ /gnas ni gsang ba'i mchog gi
449b2(rgyud 'grel): dgyis pa na'o/ /'khor ni thams cad bdag nyid do/ /dus ni rtag tu bzhugs pa'o/ /der bzhugs pa'i chos sku'i ngo bo ni/ /'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ rtag pa dam pa bstan pa ste/ rtag tu da ltar byung ba bzhin ngo bo nyid kyi 'da' dka' ba zhes gsungs so/ /
449b3(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i chos ni/ cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la/ /las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /gdul bya'i phyir ni byas pa yin zhes pa rigs drug gi 'khor lo'i gzugs kyi rnam rtog sprul pa dang/ sgra'i rnam rtog bshad pa'o/ /
449b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bas snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang dang/ bcud kyi 'jig rten ltar bskyed pa'o/ /sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams/ /sangs rgyas la sogs 'bul bas 'grub ces bya
449b5(rgyud 'grel): ba phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can gyis sems can gyi don du sprul bar bshad pa yin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dbugs 'byung ba'i 'grel pa'o// //de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te/ de ltar sprul sku mi yul du thabs pa'i thabs
449b6(rgyud 'grel): nyams su blang pa'i rim pa bshad nas da ni yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' dbugs byung ba'i yan lag gi don dang/ /brtog pa drug gi nyams su blang ba'i cho ga bshad pa yin no/ /da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbugs 'byung yan lag
449b7(rgyud 'grel): gi don mdzad par bya ste/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon 'byung ba zhes bya ba sngon sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku'i mdzad pa bskyed pa dang/ spro ba dang bsdu ba dang/ gnas pa dang brtan pa'i tshul lo/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las
450a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ sngon bcom ldan 'das rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi tshe/ bsam gtan bzhi'i yang thag tu/ rdo rje sems dpa' i tshul gyis sbyor nas dpal mchog la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i rgyud gsungs pa dang/ da bstan pas sems can
450a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams gzugs sku la sogs par zhen par sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ba dang/ 'khor ba 'jig dang/ gser thub dang/ 'od srungs la sogs pas dbu ma'i theg pa bstan pas sgro 'dogs gsal bar mdzad pa yin no/ de la sems can rmongs pas
450a3(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig la zhen pas sgro 'dogs pa dang/ skur ba 'debs pa las bzlog pa'i phyir thabs kyi bla na med pa dang/ shes rab kyi bla na med pa'i rgyud gsungs pa yin no/ /de yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i le'u dang po las go rim ji bzhin
450a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad pas the tshom mi bya'o/ /shes rab kyis bla na med pa'i mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud stong phrag bco brgyad pa'i dbang du byas nas bdag nyid chen po rtag pa chos kyis las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi don rgyu?  rnam
450a5(rgyud 'grel): snang gis byin gyis brlabs pa dang dbang skur dang ting nge 'dzin dang phrin las mdzad pa yin no/ /sngon rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi bskul pa dang po la bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yang thog dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas dang/ ri rab ri'i rtse mor
450a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal mchog de nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams 'dul ba'i don de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab kyi 'khor lo 'gro ba lha'i gzugs kyi rnam par rtog pa sngon byung ba dang 'dzam bu gling du bskal pa bzang po 'di la 'khor ba 'jig dang
450a7(rgyud 'grel): gser thub dang 'od bsrungs gi bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las 'dzam bu gling du 'gro ba dang mthun bar rab byung gi tshul du sngon byung nas sde snod gsungs so/ /de tshe sems can thams cad shin tu stong pa nyid la sogs pa?
450b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rgyun chad 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bar shes pa'i rgyun 'gags nas phung po lhag ma med pas mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /dor bar bya ba'i rnal 'byor de nyid mkhyen pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de bzhin gshegs
450b2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'gro ba stong pa nyid phyogs gcig la zhen pa de dag stong pa nyid las grol zhing/ phung po lhag ma med kyi mya ngan las 'das pa bzlog pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngal skyes kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad pa yin no/ /bai ro'i dkyil 'khor bas
450b3(rgyud 'grel): lta ba lhag na ci zhig ston snyam na/ stong pa 'am ma yin/ mi stong pa yang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ don dam pa sgyu ma lta bu dang/ rab tu mi gnas pa lta bu'i stong pa yang ma yin zhing/ rnam bcas dang rnam med lta bu'i mi
450b4(rgyud 'grel): stong pa yang ma yin la/ gnyis su med pa'i zung du 'jug pa dbu mar yang mi dmigs pas/ shes rab stong pa nyid dang/ thabs snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi chos sku rtog med las dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes yongs su brtags pa'o/ /rnam par mi rtog
450b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa la mos pa yang lha'i 'khor lo thams cad brag cha 'am/ sgra brnyan gyi tshul gyis brtag par bya'o/ /'gro ba rmongs pa lha'i skul zhe na pas sgro 'degs dang ldan? 'debs mi bya'o zhes pa'i dgongs pa bstan pa'i phyir
450b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang lha'i de nyid gsungs pa yin la/ ma 'ongs pa'i sgo gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa sbyar bar 'dod pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi theg pa chen po yon tan rgyas pa'i ? dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs
450b7(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad la bstod par bya'o/ /de yang mnyam pa nyid mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas mchog chos can zhes pa'i bar gyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sngogs bskor ba dang/ yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang zhes pa nas/ nges par gsol gyis bar
451a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang/ rtag tu dri med thugs zhes bya ba nas/ rtag tu rnam par zhes bya ba'i bar gyis so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang/ tshad med tshad dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas yongs
451a2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang/ e ma'o shin tu bzang po zhes pa nas bdag la sogs zhes bya ba'i bar gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa yin no/ /slob dpon klu sgrub ni
451a3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa'i dus su phra mo'i sa ma d+hi la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ /lha mo rnams kyi glus bskul bar bzhed do/ /in+d+ra b+hU d+hi rgyu'i rnam snang zhu ba las 'bras bu'i bai ro bskyed pa'i phyir lha mo bzhi'i glus bskul bar bzhed/ rab zhi bshes gnyen dang/
451a4(rgyud 'grel): kun dga' snying po ni dkyil 'khor sgom pa rdzogs nas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba nas bskul bar 'dod do/ /ye shes zhabs ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog la bstod par the tshom mi za'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la
451a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa ni go sla bas ma bshad do/ /de nas de'i sgrub pa dang zhes bya bas rjes 'jug gi don bshad pa yin te/ sgrub pa ni mtshan ma thob kyi bar du bsnyen bsgrub gnyis lha'i 'khor lo bsgom pa'o/ /shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub bdag ces pa
451a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mthob nas/ 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa'o/ /gang gi srid pa 'di nyid la/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag pa thob/ /ces pa ni/ mchog gi dngos grub bud+d+ha'i bo d+ha'i ye shes grub pa'o/ /de sgrub pa'i thabs
451a7(rgyud 'grel): gang yin zhe na/ rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ zhes gsungs te/ bai ro'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa byin gyis brlabs kyi lam ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa'o/ /thal mo legs par
451b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba yis/ /thal mo lan gsum nges par brdab ces pa ye shes sems dpa' 'byon pa la phyag byas nas snying gar bcug ste dbang bskur ba'i mthar pheb brdabs mnyes par bya'o/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur/ /de dang de yi ngo bor bya zhes pa/
451b2(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+ha'i dbang po dang rang gi mnyam par sbyor bar ro gcig par bsgom pa'o/ /ji ltar mos pa chags pa dang/ zhes pa lha la dang ba'i dad par mos par bsgoms na sha dza ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po dang/ sngags kyi glu len cing bstod par bya'o//
451b3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu gnas pa'o/ /kun nas ni dngos po'o/ /thams cad ni rnam pa'i bye brag go /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun zhes bya ba dus so/ /sangs rgyas kun dang dngos grub 'dzin/ /rab tu mthong zhing dngos grub po/ /ces bya ba rang gi lus dang lha tha mi dad mthong
451b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang reg pa dang/ thob pa'i mtshan ma thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe dngos grub ma thob na bskyur chos gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sngar bshad pa'i bstod pa'i rgyal pos rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas
451b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan thog thag lha la bstod na de kho na nyid bskul ba yin pa dngos grub grub par gdon mi za'o/ /bai ro'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar bai ro'i dbugs dbyung bshad nas/ he ru ka'i dbugs dbyung ni/ 'das pa'i
451b6(rgyud 'grel): dus na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'das pa'i dus nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad zin to/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni zhes bya ba 'od srungs gi bstan pa'i rjes la sems can thams cad gdug cing gtum par 'gyur ro/ /gdug par 'gyur
451b7(rgyud 'grel): du zad mod nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na/ shin tu khro zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/ de'i rnam smin gyis du 'bod du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe phos na 'byung po rtogs 'dod can gyi bu 'byung po dge ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de legs ldan byed
452a1(rgyud 'grel): nag por gyur nas/ des grong khyer sum rtseg 'jig pa'i phyir/ rims dug dbyig dug la sogs pa log 'dren gyi las byed pa dang/ 'jig rten gsum po 'jig par byed cing rig pa 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa po rnams la 'tshe ba dang/
452a2(rgyud 'grel): lha la sogs pa tshe 'pho bar byed pa dang/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang 'jig par byed do/ /de'i tshe drag po 'jigs byed kyis gdug pa de ma bzod nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha tshangs pa la skyabs su song ngo/ /tshangs pa yang khyab 'jug la
452a3(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su song ngo/ /khyab 'jug kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu chen po la skyabs su song ngo/ /lha chen po des bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba'i rang bzhin shes nas de nyid la skyabs su song ngo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba de nyid kyis
452a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje se gol brdabs nas rdo rje bsdu ba mdzad de/ sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin gang par gyur to/ /de rdo rje sems dpas gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can la zhi bas phan par mi
452a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bar gzigs nas/ shes rab thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thabs shes rab kyi snying po hUM gsungs pas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khros nas khro bo'i gzugs su mdzad pa yin no/ /de nas khro bo'i ched du
452a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa ni/ /khro bo'i tshul can khros pa ni/ /'jig rten gsum yang srog byed na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis/ /khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos/ /de nas sna yi rtse mo la/ /yid ni yang dag bstan par gzung zhes pa dpal he ru ka yab
452a7(rgyud 'grel): yum thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i yab yum gyi mkha' gsang du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhu ba'i thig le yi ge hUM gi gzugs su snang ba la sems gzung nas/ gsang ba'i rdo rje sna rtse'i dbugs yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis ring zheng dro? par
452b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las he ru ka'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ke ri ma la sogs pa mngal skyes kyis byung bar gyur pa yin no/ /de nyid ma 'ongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mngal skyes kyi rim pa bsgom par
452b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o zhes bstan pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid rnal 'byor pa zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i sku mdog ji lta bu zhig ce na/ sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/
452b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas zhi zhing dkar ba/ g.yon chags pas dmar ba/ dbus ma'i zhal drag pa/ rgyab ma rmongs par mdzad pa ser po/ phyag dang po gnyis na rdo rje dril bu/ 'og ma gnyis na 'jigs byed kyi pags pa brnabs pa/ gsum pa gnyis na mda' dang gzhu
452b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa gnyis na mdung dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /yang na zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa'o/ /des phrin las ci zhig mdzad ce na/ 'jigs pa chen po dus ltar drag ces pa nas thams cad pham nas slar yang ni/ thal bar gyur pa 'tsho bar byed pa po'i
452b5(rgyud 'grel): bar gsungs te/ ma rungs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad la sdug bsngal phab pas slar yang shi bas thal bar gyur pa las slar 'tsho bar mdzad pa yin no/ /slar yang ci zhig mdzad ce na/ de'i 'bar ba'i nyi ma las zhes gsungs te/ rang gi nyi ma'i
452b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'bar ba las byung ba'i dur khrod kyi zhing skyong du sprul nas/ grib ma bzhin du sprul pa'i gzugs su mdzad pa yin no/ /de nas ma lus pa'i bdud las grags pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i bar du gcod pa'i gdug pa la sogs pa'i
452b7(rgyud 'grel): khrag za bar nus pa dur khrod kyi rgyal po he ru ka dang/ lhan cig rol pa yin no/ /de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyangs nas 'gro ba thams cad byang chub la bkod de/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sbyangs pa yin no/ /he ru ka'i dbugs
453a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o// /de ltar he ru ka'i dbugs dbyung bshad nas/ da ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dbugs dbyung bshad par bya ste/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba zhes bya ba nas 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba'i
453a2(rgyud 'grel): bar du bshad zin to/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni zhes pa sangs rgyas 'od srungs gi bstan pa'i rjes la sems can thams cad rmongs pa'i dbang gis log par lta ba can du gyur to/ /de nas chag pa'i dbang gis ngu 'bod chen por skyes par
453a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur to/ /log lta can gyi shes rab de nyid sbyang ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di 'dam las skyes kyang 'dam gyis nyes pas mi gos pa bzhin te/ khams gsum pa'i sems can 'od gsal blo bur gyi dri ma'i nyes
453a4(rgyud 'grel): pas ma gos pa gzigs nas/ spyan ras gzigs kyi skur bskyed pa yin/ de yang su zhig yin zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba gsungs te/ rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor dang rdo rje sems dpa' nyid rtsa ba'i sprul sku yin zhes
453a5(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o/ /de bas na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' des log lta las byung ba'i 'dod chags 'dul ba'i phyir/ so sor rtog pa 'dod chags dag pa'i mchod sbyin te/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor
453a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mnga' skyes kyi rim pas pad+ma bar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyi sna tshogs pa 'dul ba la mos pa la kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyal po snang ba mdza' yas su gyur pa yin no/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dbugs dbyung
453a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar gar gyi dbang phyug gi 'grel pa bshad nas/ da ni rdo rje nyi ma'i dbugs dbyung bshad par bya ste/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i tshigs bcad gcig gshad zin to/ /de tshe sems
453b1(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad ni zhes bya ba ni bud+d+ha 'od srungs gi bstan pa'i rjes la ser sna'i sems kyis 'dug cing nor la shas cher brkam par gyur pa dang/ shin tu 'jungs par gyur pa'i dbang gis yi dags kyi gnas su lhung bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe 'phos nas
453b2(rgyud 'grel): mi dbul por skyes nas bkres pa dang skom pa dang/ phan tshun gsod par gyur pa dang/ shin tu gdug pa'i ser sna can gyi rnal 'byor de nyid sbyang ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas mnyam pa nyid kyi nor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam
453b3(rgyud 'grel): par thag nas rdo rje nyi ma'i gzugs su mdzad pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' i snying po rdo rje nyi ma des phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bud med rin po che la sogs pa'i char phab nas/ sems
453b4(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid ster ba yin no/ /gang gi phyir gdug cing ser sna can gyi nga rgyal gyis khro ba la zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir/ shes rab thab kyi rdo rje nyi ma las/ mjal skyes kyi rim pas nyi ma'i 'od
453b5(rgyud 'grel): zer gyis ser sna can rnams rab tu gdungs nas ser sna med pa'i lhar bsgrubs so bya ba dang/ zhes bya ba lus ngag sems kyi dbang du bya ba'o/ /zlog pa dang zhes bya ba srog dang rnam shes thim pa'o/ /dbrog pas kyang ni khyad par du zhes pa btsun mo longs
453b6(rgyud 'grel): spyad pa dang/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo longs spyad pa'o/ /de ltar gzhan las rgyal bar byas te/ sa 'og sa sla ste steng gyi gnas gsum po mdza' dag gi rang dbang yod pa'i nor gyi tshogs thams cad kun tu sdud par byed cing 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
453b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal pa yin no/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o// //da ni rta mchog gi dbugs dbyung pa bshad de/ 'das pa'i dus na zhes pa'i shlo ka ni bshad zin to/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni zhes pa'i 'od srungs gi bstan pa'i
454a1(rgyud 'grel): rjes la'o/ /brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar gyur pa zhes la/ le lo dang phrag dog dang bcas pa'o/ /le lo des cir 'gyur snyam na/ mnar med pa'i dmyal bar lhung zhes bya ba smos te/ mnar med pa ni nye bar mtshon pa ste brgyad
454a2(rgyud 'grel): do/ /de nas shi 'phos te mir skyes kyang byi bo dang/ chom po dang/ rkun po yis dge ba'i phyogs la bar du gcod pa'i las byed pa yin no/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom lan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mkhyen nas bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin
454a3(rgyud 'grel): drag shul gyi sbyor ba'i tshul rta mchog gi tshul du skyed par byed pa yin no/ /gdul bya sems can thams cad dag par mos pas sdig pa med pa'i thugs rje'i stobs kyis mngon sum kho nar ro/ /pha rol gnon pa'i rta la dag gis zhes pa
454a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang longs spyod pa thim pa'i mdzad pas zil gyis non par mdzad pa'o/ /ji ltar zil gyis non snyam na rta mchog yab yum mnyam par rab sbyor ba mnga' skyes kyi rim pas shin tu le los gdug cing phrag dog gis gtum pa'i sems
454a5(rgyud 'grel): can rnam pa mang po'i 'jig rten thams cad 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sprul pa yin no/ /des ci zhig mdzad ce na/ byi bo chom po rkun po yis zhes bya ba mos te/ byi bo ni gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro ba'o/ /rkun po ni ma mthong
454a6(rgyud 'grel): ba nor 'phrog pa'o/ /chom po ni mngon sum du nor 'phrog pa'o/ /brid pa dang ni sgyu dag dang/ zhes pa brid pa ni tshig gis so/ /sgyu ni rang gi nyes pa 'chab pa'i thabs sems gya gyu ba'o/ /thams cad rnam par sbyor bar byed ces pa/ gdul
454a7(rgyud 'grel): bya de dag sprul pa'i 'khor los sbyor ba'o/ /rdo mthon stobs kyis de bzhin du zhes pa mngon sum du brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis dbang du byas ba longs spyad pa thim pa'o/ /dgra cha nga yis brgal nas ni zhes bya ba/ rdo rje ral gri
454b1(rgyud 'grel): mda' gzhu mdung rtse gcig pa be con gyis btul nas/ de'i 'jig rten kun las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dbus kyi gtso bo rta mchog gi dbang du byas nas gdul bya rnams 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis rang gi rgyal srid skyong ba zhes gsungs
454b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yin no/ /khams kyi rta mchog gnyis kyi dbang du mdzad nas/ g.yem pa rnams 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir dang/ g.yem ba'i dbang gi sku dang/ khro bo rnams 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir/ khro ba sngon spyod kyi sku dang/ zhi ba 'dul ba'i phyir/ zhi ba'i sku dang grag
454b3(rgyud 'grel): shul can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir drag po rgyas pa'i sku bstan pa yin no/ /rta mchog de bzhir gang gtul ba yin zhe na/ sdig pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis mngon sum du mnan nas lha mo byi ma phrogs pa yin no/ /mthu'i tshe khyab
454b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug ma nam nas lha mo drug min phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin no/ /skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa mnan nas lha mo rab tu zhi ba phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin no/ /'dod pa'i lha mnan nas mi'i dbang phyug ma phrogs nas longs spyod pa
454b5(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /de ltar sngon byung gi dus su mi rungs pa thams cad mnan nas lus ngag sems dbang du byas te/ lha mo dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo thams cad phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin no/ /de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa 'gags nas srog
454b6(rgyud 'grel): thim pa dang/ mi rtog pa'i ye shes skyes nas ye shes thim pas na de la sogs pa mdza' yas mchog ces pa nas/ ro rje las chen rnams ston pa zhes pa'i bar du sprul pa'i skus sems can gyi don bya ba gsungs pa yin no/ /sems can
454b7(rgyud 'grel): de dag 'dul bar mdzad pa ni gang/ thabs ni gang gis thob par 'gyur/ 'bras bu ni gang thob snyam na/ nam mkha' kun gyi gnas skabs dang/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas zhes pa ston pa ni/ thabs dang rtsal gyi sgrub pa yis
455a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa dbang du bya ba'i thabs dang longs spyod pa'i rta la gyis mngon spyod kyi sbyor ba'i stobs kyis bsgrubs pas/ khams gsum pa'i rgyal srid ma lus pa la dbang rta mchog gi gzugs su rdo rje 'dzin pa de yis thob par
455a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad nas mngal skyes kyi rim pas rigs bsdus pa'i 'khor bzhis bskor ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mdza' yas mchog skal nas mngon spyod kyi drag shul gyi sbyor bas bsgrubs par mdzad pa ni thabs yin no/ /'bras bu thams cad
455a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag mos pa'i sa zhes pa nas/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel zhes pa'i bar gyis mchog gi dngos grub dang/ lha'i dngos grub dga' ba dang/ zhes pa nas 'jig rten gyi sid+d+hi grub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po zhes pa
455a4(rgyud 'grel): nas rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas shes pa'i bar gyis chos kyi sku bstan/ /sems can thams cad ni dri ma dag ces pa nas/ sems can khams la brtan par sbyin zhes pa'i bar gyis longs sku bstan pa dang/ rta mchog rnam par sprul pa
455a5(rgyud 'grel): yin zhes pa nas sems can gyi don ? byed ces bya ba'i bar gyis sprul sku bstan to/ /rta mchog gi dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar dbugs dbyung drur bshad nas/ de rnams kyi 'jug bsdu ba ni de la
455a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa mdza' yas mchog ces pa gsungs te/ dbang bskur pa'i 'khor lo ni rnam pa drug yin la/ dngos grub len pa'i 'khor lo ni lha brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ yang na dpa' bo gcig pu'i brgya rtsa brgyad sprul nas/ sngon byung gdul bya
455a7(rgyud 'grel): btul ba rnams rang byung gi gtam dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes rtogs pa yin no/ /dkyil 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad po de rnam dang po sbyor ba'i rtsa ba'i gang gis sprul zhe na/ nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu
455b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas zhes gsungs so/ /dngos grub len pa'i rnal 'byor pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyang grub pa'i dbang phyug rab tu grub pa ste/ 'jig rten thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub rnams so/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed ces pa/ /dngos grub thob pa'i rnal
455b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa phrin las thams cad la 'jug par byed do/ /gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes pa bskal pa dang por pa la mchog gi lo rgyus dang/ bar gyi bskal pa sangs rgyas gsum gyi lo rgyus dang/ bskal pa tha mar mnyam sbyor gyi dbugs dbyung dkyil 'khor
455b3(rgyud 'grel): drug gi brtag pa sprul pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa drug gi rjes 'jug bsgom pa gsungs pa'o/ /brtag pa lnga pa'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar sngon byung dang rjes 'jug gi dbungs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor drug bshad nas/
455b4(rgyud 'grel): da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba'i cho gas skal pa dang ldan par bstan pa'i phyir de nas gzhan yang thams cad du zhes pa la sogs pa gsung ste/ gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba med na dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur
455b5(rgyud 'grel): ba de'i phyir mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma'i mchog bshad ces bya bar sbyor/ gzhan yang zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor snga ma drug la bltos nas skal pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams smin par bya ba ni gzhan yang ngo/ thams cad du zhes pa phyogs thams cad du skal pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag rtogs
455b6(rgyud 'grel): pa drug pa la mos pa la'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byung ba ni rigs drug gi 'khor lo bshad pas gdul bya rnams btul ba'o/ /de thabs gang gis yin snyam na sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces smos te/ rigs drug
455b7(rgyud 'grel): gi sangs rgyas zag pa med pa'i ye shes dang/ so so'i skye bo'i rnal 'byor pa blo bur gyi dri ma dang bcas pa rnams mnyam par sbyor bas zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa ste/ de yang zhi gnas bde ba dang/ lhag mthong stong
456a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis rgyu rkyen tshogs pas bde mchog ste/ zag med kyi bde ba sgyu ma'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa bshad par bya'o/ /bde mchog de nas gang su grub/ dngos po gang zhig sgrub/ thabs ji lta bu zhig gis sgrub snyam na dpal ldan
456a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ de'i gnas ni phyi dang nang gcig yin la/ phyi'i gnas yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa 'am/ nang lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ b+ha ga dang chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gsum la yin no/ /phyi rol gyi gnas
456a3(rgyud 'grel): yid du 'ong brdal tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bris nas bum pa'i dbang bskur ba ni brtog pa bdun pa las ston par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i dbang du mdzad na lus kyi dkyil 'khor la gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba
456a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor la shes ra bye shes kyi dbang bskur ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bzhi pa bskur ba gsum bshad par bya'o/ /de la lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bzhed nas dpal
456a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde byung ba/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pas na/ zhes pas gnas gsungs pa yin no/ /zhi gnas bsam gnas kyi bde ba dang/ lhag mthong zag med kyi bde ba ni sangs rgyas thams
456a6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi dngos po rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /bde bde 'byung ba'i gnas ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na'o/ /sarbba bdag nyid ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid rlung gnyis
456a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa'i dus su dga' ba bzhi'i dus na rtag tu bzhugs so/ /de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ni ye shes lnga
456b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus rtag tu bzhugs so zhes byar ro/ /bsgrub pa'i dngos po gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'da' bar mi bya ba ni dpal stong pa nyid sgyu ma lta bu ro gcig pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' de ba snang ba'i bde ba'i ngo
456b2(rgyud 'grel): bo'o/ /thams cad kyi khyad par ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bzhi'i dpung brgyan do shal la sogs pas brgyan cing sra pa'o/ de yang bde mchog las/ dri sbyangs me tog spos kyis brgyan/ shin tu sgra snyan dril bu dkrol zhes gsungs so/
456b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa zhes pa ni dmangs rigs kyi bu mo bcu drug lon pa'i dpyid kyi dus kyi re ta dang ldan pa'o/ bla re dam pa bres pa na zhes pa gos sar pa bgos pa'o/ /rdo rje tshig dang mchod pa la sogs so zhes pa brda dang
456b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud pa dang/ 'o byed pa la sogs pa ka ra na'i mchod pas mchod pa'o/ /glu dang sel snyan rnam par 'phrul zhes pa glu bzhi len cing gling bu dang pi wang la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad bcus bskor ba'i gnas so/ /yang na sgra ji bzhin bshad
456b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste go sla'o/ /me tog bdug pa mar me dri ltar bshos la sogs pas brgyan cing gnas su lus dang b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor la sgyu ma'i bde mchog bsgrub par bya'o/ /yang na bde ba'i gnas skyed mos tshal la sogs par rdo rje sems dpa' i
456b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas nas gdan nyi shu rtsa gcig gshams te/ nang tshangs dang bcas pa'i 'jam pa reg na bde ba'i stan chogs pad+mas brgyan pa'i ras kyi g.yogs la de thams cad kyis gdan la bsnyen bsgrub zhi ba'i rim pa dang po rdo rje
456b7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bskyed la phyis bstan te thams cad la 'khor gyi lta skul par bya'o/ de yang dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma nyi shu tham pa mnga' skyes kyi rim pas so sor rang gi lha bsgom du gzhug go/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gzhal yas khang du ji
457a1(rgyud 'grel): ltar bsgom zhe na/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa zhes pa nas sgo srungs dang ni ldan par bya/ zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to/ /de rnams kha dog dang dbyibs ji lta bu zhe na/ rang gi lha dang 'dra ba'i zhes gsungs te/ bud med rnams ni
457a2(rgyud 'grel): legs pa zhes pa bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs nas/ rang rang gi lha mo bsgom pa 'am/ gdong rgyan dang bcas pas rang gi mu tras mtshan ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo brtag par bya'o/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang gsang ba'i dbang bskur pa'i rdzas ni mi'i
457a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshal ni grub pa la dmar chen zhes bya bar bshad ces gsungs te/ rang byung gi khrag go de ci dgos snyam nas/ ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang/ rang bzhin gyis mi de 'grub pa'o zhes gsungs te/ gtso bo rtsa ba dang tshe 'phel bar byed pa ka mata
457a4(rgyud 'grel): twa dang/ ba shAn+ta twa zhes bya ba ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dang/ de'i rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i dga' ba bzhi rtog pa med pa ni ni ra rdza? ta t+twa zhes pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa yin no/ de ji ltar myang snyam na/ rdo rje chu dang rdo rjer bcas zhes gsung te
457a5(rgyud 'grel): dri chen dri chu bcas pas/ byang chub sems dang mtshal chen po ste sha dang bcas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga rang bzhin gyi mthus nus pa dang ldan pa thod pa'i snod du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' i dam tshig ro rdo rje ma la sgyu ma lta bur
457a6(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa yin no/ /de ni gang zag gcig gis ma yin par/ rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi myang bar bya'o/ /zhi ba'i btung ba bstan pa ni/ de'i 'tshal dang khu ba dang zhes gsungs te/ 'tshal ni rang byung gi me tog go/ khu ba ni sa
457a7(rgyud 'grel): bon no/ /mtshal chen po sgrub pa ni bdud rtsi sgrub pa'o/ /ci'i phyir bdud rtsi lnga la mtshal chen po zhes khyad par gyi ming gang gis gdags shen/ bde ba stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i chags pa chen po las byung bas na dmar chen zhes
457b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bshad do/ de'i byang chub sems dang/ tsan dan dmar po ste sha chen bcas pa tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pas lha thams cad kyis myang ba'i ra sa ya na shi slong ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ ji ltar myang zhe na/ rang gi lha'i sbyor ldan pa zhes gsungs
457b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas srin lag dang/ mthe bo'i rtse mos zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na rtag par zag med kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /de yang rdo rje gdan
457b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi las/ mthe bos gzhir bskyed nas srin lag ri rab tu bsams te/ bdud rtsi rgya mtsho chen por bsgoms dkrugs te sprul pa ri bo ba di ra las btus pa'i rtsa so ma ni zhes pa gi bang yod pa'i ba ser mo'i ko bar rig byed kyi sngags zlos shing brdungs
457b4(rgyud 'grel): nas 'thungs pas sdig pa dgu par 'dod pa de bzhin du myang bar bya zhes gsungs so/ /de'i 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te zhes pa la sogs pa la gsungs te go sla'o/ /de ltar gsang ba'i dbang bshad nas shes rab ye shes kyi
457b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur gsungs pa ni de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus zhes smos te/ khrus byas shing lus dri zhim pos byugs la ci 'byor pa'i gos dang rgyan btags te/ me tog phreng ba gdags shing dri kha zhim pos bkad la rigs sna tshogs pa'i
457b6(rgyud 'grel): bud med skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa dang/ a ba d+hA tI'i sgo sbyar nas reg pa'i bde ba la stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi shes pa skyes nas/ sngon pa gnyid log pa'i tshul du gnas pa la dkyil 'khor gyi lha mos ye shes phab nas rnam rtag nub pa'i
457b7(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na slob dpon gyi sa 'og nas 'byung ba'i shi ba slong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis blang zhing/ btsun mo yum gyi b+ha ga'i gos kyis gsang ba'i rdo rje dag pa'i sbyor bas bdag gi byang chub sems bskul
458a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ste/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis ka'i nam mkha' rtsi'i dbus su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma zla ba zhes bya ba thabs shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems 'khor lo bzhi'i ri las 'das nas dung can ma'i nam mkha' i dbus su
458a2(rgyud 'grel): shar ba dag bla ma'i man ngag gi stobs kyis des shes drangs nas ma bying zhing nyams su myong bas/ sdig pa kun las grel bar 'gyur zhing bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid rgyas par bshad pa ni/ nges pa'i lam zhes pa
458a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa gsungs te/ des pa'i lam ni kun dang ldan zhes pa zhi gnas bde ba rtog med par nges pa lhag mthong bde ba stong pa nyid du nges pa'i lam dang ldan pa'o/ /rnam par 'das pas rnam par brgyan zhes pa rang bzhin brgyad cu las
458a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das pas na dga' ba bzhis brgyan ba'o/ /de ltar na bde ba chen po grub pa de las slong bar byed pa ni kun nas slong ba'i glu gsungs pas sad par byas ba yin no/ /de'i glu ni stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor pa zhes pa nas/ dpal khyod bdag ces
458a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar du bstan to/ /phan yon ni 'di dag nyid glur blangs nas zhes pa nas/ ci zhig smos zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to/ /slob ma shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob ba de lam du dang ldan pa yin snyam na/
458a6(rgyud 'grel): /lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pas/ rnam par 'das pas mdzes par byas zhes pa smos te/ dga' ba'i dus su stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang/ mchog dga' i dus su shin tu stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang/ lhan cig skyes dga' i
458a7(rgyud 'grel): dus su chen po'i stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang/ 'od gsal ba'i dus su rnam pa thams cad kyi stong pa nyid dang ldan pa ni lam bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /de yang rang bzhin brgyad cu las 'das pas gnyis su zhen pa rang gnyis su brtags pa nub nas
458b1(rgyud 'grel): kun brtags dang/ gzhan dbang gi rtog pa dang bral te gnyis su med pa rang bzhin du mdzes par byas pa yin no/ /de yang bde mchog las/ mchod pa de bzhin rnal 'byor ma/ dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi/ /snyoms par 'jug pa'ang de nyid 'dzin
458b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs pa dang/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro las kyang sems snang ba rnam pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin du 'jug par gsungs pa dang/ 'di nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las kyang/ sems can bsod nams cher 'phags shing/ /rnam gnyis mi g.yo
458b3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bdag/ sems kyi 'du byed g.yo ba ste/ /'dus byas thams cad nyid du snang/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dga' ba bzhi'i dus bshad pa ni/ /sna tshogs 'brang ba shin tu grub ces gsungs te/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rjes su 'brang bar rnam par smin/
458b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rnam par nyed pa dang/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /'jig rten gsum ni rab grub pa zhes pa ni/ sems snang ba gsum 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin du grub pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa zhes pa/ ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang
458b5(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du/ /rang gis rang? gi ye shes ni/ /'ding mthod gang yin 'dir phyag yin zhes bshad do/ /'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po ni sems kyi de kho na shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro//
458b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten kun la skyed sbyin pa zhes pa shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag lus ngag sems bde ba'o/ /'jig kun gyi skal bzang po/ /a ra li kun 'grub par 'gyur zhes pa/ rang bzhin du grub pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
458b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'byor pa/ /lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yin no/ /sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po/ /a ra li kun 'grub par 'gyur zhes pa/ chags lam pa las kyi phyag rgya dang sbyor ba dang/ /grol lam chos dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sbyor bas
459a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba gsum gyi rol pa a ra li kun tu grub par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' i khams kyi mdza' klas pa'i/ /lha mo kun dang bde mos pas/ /zhes pa phyag rgya chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin byang chub phyogs kyi chos sum cu
459a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsa dgu/ stong nyid kyi lha mo dang/ sgyu ma lta bu ci bde ba ro gcig par mos pas zag pa med pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi ye shes dang bzhi pas lan cig nyams su
459a3(rgyud 'grel): myong nas dus thams cad du stong pa nyid ji ltar shes par 'gyur snyam nas/ nyi ma gsal bar 'char ba yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag sbyor zhes gsungs te/ 'khor lo bzhi la byang chub sems nyi zla'i tshul du gsal nas a ba d+hU tI'i
459a4(rgyud 'grel): sgor 'char ba'i tshe/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gsungs zhes bya ste/ zhi gnas dang ltag mthong gi mkha' 'gro ma bde ba stong pa nyid kyi sgyu ma'i tshogs pa 'byung ba la/ lan cig bla ma'i man ngag gi stobs kyis ngas pa drangs shad
459a5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa la dus phyis dus thams cad dang/ dngos po thams cad dang/ rnam pa thams cad la bde ba'i dngos grub kun gsungs pa yin no/ /gal te bde ba stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig la dmigs nas srog a ba d+hU tId chud nas bstan
459a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing grub bar 'gyur ba'i tshe ji ltar bya snyam na slong bar byed ces gsungs te/ rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ rnam par smin pa dang/ rnam par nyed pa dang/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i glu ganDar? ba ste/ dri za can zhes bya ba dang/ /sardza ste drug ldan
459a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i 'og nas 'byung ba'i glu blangs pas bde 'chen po'i ting nge 'dzin slong ba yin no/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las ye shes phab nas nye bar bsdu ba bzhin du 'dir yang blta bar bya'o/ /rjes su chags pa rnam mang zhes
459b1(rgyud 'grel): pa nas/ bde ba grub bar mdzod ces pa'i bar du me long lta bu'i zung 'jug bshad do/ /kye mchog ces pa nas rol cig ho zhes pa'i bar du mnyam pa nyid kyi zung 'jug bshad do/ /kye ma mchog tu gsang bzhes pa nas/ gsal bar mkhyen zhes pa'i bar du
459b2(rgyud 'grel): so sor rtog pa'i zung 'jug bshad do/ /dam tshig thams cad ces pa nas/ rab tu bsgrubs la ston pa zhes pa'i bar du bya ba nan tan gyi zung 'jug bshad do/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho zhes pa nas/ yal la ho zhes pa'i bar gyi chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi
459b3(rgyud 'grel): zung 'jug bshad do/ /de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du sga brnyan lta bu'i glus bskul nas rnam par shes pa'i 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin dbang bzhi pa 'jug pa yin pa de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna
459b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis slob ma gzhug bar gsol zhes gsol ba 'debs ba yin na/ de ltar sgra brnyan lta bu'i glus bskul nas chos kyi dbyings dbang bzhi pas rang gi sems kyi chos nying rtogs pa dang/ chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid rtogs nas bde ba
459b5(rgyud 'grel): chen pos rgyas btab pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul ma lus shing lus ba med par snang ba zhes bya ba glu'i rgyal po gsungs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi gnas zhes pa/ sems 'od gsal ba'i ye shes so/ /sgyu ma kun gyi bde
459b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog ces pa/ rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor sgyu ma las snang srid lha'i 'khor lor rtogs pa'i bde mchog dang/ lus kyi dkyil 'khor las gsang ba'i dbang gi sgyu ma las snang srid sgyu mar rtogs pa'i bde mchog dang/ b+ha ga'i dkyil
459b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi sgyu ma las yum gyi stong pa nyid kyi bde mchog rtogs pa dang/ rang gi sems kyi dbyings kyi dbang bzhi pa'i sgyu ma las rnam par mi rtog pa zag pa med pa'i bde mchog rtogs pa yin no/ /de na chos
460a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la khyab pa'i sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'i kun tu 'gro ba'i bde mchog ston pa'i glu ni rnam pa mang po 'dod chags rgyud kyi zhes pa nas te na te te hUM zhes pa'i bar gyis snang srid me long lta bu'i zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes
460a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa yin no/ /rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud ces pa nas/ hUM hUM hUM zhes pa'i bar gyis snang srid mnyam pa nyid kyi zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes bshad do/ /rnam pa mang po khro bo'i rgyud ces pa nas/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+hyo hUM zhes pa'i bar gyis
460a3(rgyud 'grel): snang srid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi zung 'jug bstan to/ /rnam pa mang po srog gi rgyud ces pa nas/ hUM shi ya a be sha hUM zhes pa'i bar gyis snang srid thams cad bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi zung 'jug pa bstan to/ /gnas gtsang ma'i ris
460a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi lha'i skad kyis me long lta bu'i chos nyid ni 'dod chags kyi rgyud yin la/ mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid ni rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud yin zhing/ so sor rtog pa'i chos nyid ni khro bo'i rgyud yin te/ bya ba grub pa'i chos nyid ni srog gi rgyud ces bya ba/
460a5(rgyud 'grel): rang byung thams cad kyi la glu'i mu dra zhes grags so/ /de la sogs pa mdza' yas mchog ces pa chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa'i sgra brnyan lta bu'i glu mdza' yas pas gdul bya mdza' yas pa 'grub pa'i dbang phyug sems 'di gsal grub nas/
460a6(rgyud 'grel): snang srid thams cad 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin du grub pa'o/ /lha mo kun gyis rab bskul nas zhes pa sngar bshad pa'i glu gnyis so/ /de dag nyid bde mchog ma dang/ ngo mtshar bde ma dang/ snang mdzad ma dang/ slob ma mo dang bzhis glus bskul ba yin no//
460a7(rgyud 'grel): de ltar na rnal 'byor pa dag nyid kyis gsang ba shes rab ye shes dbang bzhi ba thob nas/ da ni slob ma rnams la dkyil 'khor drug gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo mi 'dra ba drug mdzad nas lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ b+ha ga chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
460b1(rgyud 'grel): drug la slob ma drug dbang bskur ba gsungs pa ni/ dbang po kun las byung ba'i zhes smos te/ rgyu ba'i he ru ka drug gi thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i kha gsang las byung ba'i mchod pa'i lha mo gling bu ma la sogs pa dang/ me tog ma la sogs pa brgyad kyis bkod?
460b2(rgyud 'grel): pas bdag nyid yab yum mchod la/ b+ha ga dang rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma'i bde mchog rigs bzhi'i dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid kyis lus su snang srid thams cad ma lus par 'grub
460b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yin no/ /de ltar rigs drug gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskyed pa mdor bstan nas/ rgyas par bshad pa ni ston pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yis zhes gsungs te/ /rigs drug gi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su bskyed la ye shes phab nas bsnyen bsgrub bzhis
460b4(rgyud 'grel): bud med dag lha mor bsgrub la/ rdo rje 'khor lo thod pa ma rin po che/ sna tshogs rdo rje bsnam pa'i lha mor 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang rang gi lha 'dra bar ye shes phab nas bsgrub pas ye shes babs pa dang/ sngon ma byung ba'i rol mo sil snyan gar dang rnam
460b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'phrul pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ye shes babs na sngon ma byung ba'i lha'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i bde ba gang yin pa yid la mos par rang nyid ltar mthong ba'i tshe mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i mchod pa mnyam sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i
460b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i rtog med skal pa bzang po mchog gi bde ba stong pa'i 'dod chags can/ slob ma kun la skal ba bzang po'i bde ba sgrub par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis sgyu ma'i byin gyis
460b7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pas zag med kyi rdo rje sems dpa' i bde ba dang mnyam par sbyor ba rtag pa drug gi dkyil 'khor kun gyi bde ba rnams/ dkyil 'khor drug gi mthong ba las dga' ba bzhi'i bde ba myong ba'i mthu nyid kyis dkyil 'khor drug gi lha brgya rtsa
461a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor skal pa bzang po brgya rtsa brgyad rang rang gi lha'i lus ngag yid kyi bde ba nyid kyis 'grub pa yin no/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i dga' bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bstan nas tshogs kyi yul chos kyi phyag rgya
461a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs can dang zhes gsungs te/ lha'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i yid du/ 'ong ba'i bdag nyid la dga' ba bzhi'i bde ba bsgoms pas dngos grub ma lus 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar cho gas 'khor rdzogs
461a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshe rnal 'byor ba brgya rtsa brgyad kyi ched du brjod pa ni/ oM sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog gsang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gar/ /rnam par rol pa mchog tu snang/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rang
461a4(rgyud 'grel): rang gi yum bzhi'i glus 'khor lo drug la bstod pa gsungs pa ni/ de nas yang dag rab gsang ba zhes gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor la bde mchog ma dang/ ngo mtshar bde ma dang/ snang mdzad ma dang/ slob ma ma'i bud med
461a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhis bstod par bsam mo/ /rnam snang gis dkyil 'khor la/ dbyangs can ma/ dpa' bo ma /kun bzang ma/ ming bzang dang bzhis bstod par bsam mo/ /he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor la/ gau rI/ tsau rI/ pra mo ha/ be thA lIs bstod par bsam mo//
461a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma gar gyi dkyil 'khor la/ sa chen ma/ sgrol ma/ rnam par gzigs ma/ khro nyer ma bzhis bskul bar bsam mo/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ma/ gter ldan ma/ rgyal mtshan ma/ las mchog ma bzhis bstod par bsam mo/ /rta
461a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi dkyil 'khor la/ zhi rgyas/ dbang mngon spyod kyi lha mo bzhis bskul bar bsam mo/ /de'i glu ni/ rab tu dga' ba zhes pa nas thams cad 'grub par mdzod/ ces pa'i bar gyis bshad do/ /glu de dag gis phan yon ni/ glu'i phyag rgya 'di
461b1(rgyud 'grel): yis las rab 'byams la/ 'byor ba'i yang bstod pa dang/ dngos grub 'grub par ma gyur pa'i tshe bstod pa dang/ yo byad ma 'byor ba'i tshe byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang slob ma 'jug pa'i tshe glu'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang/ sngar bshad pa'i lha mo bzhi
461b2(rgyud 'grel): po dag gis me tog la sogs pa lag tu thogs nas slob ma thams cad dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe mchod pa bya'o/ /de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor drug ni slob dpon gyi cho ga bshad nas// //da ni slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad do/ /
461b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa dngos grub 'dod pa'i rgyun bshags dang/ sdom pa bzung ba/ sems bskyed pa phyi rol du las thams cad pa'i bum pas dbang bskur nas ci rigs par rigs drug gi snyim pa'i gar kun nas bskor zhing bskyod pa 'ching
461b4(rgyud 'grel): du bcug la/ rigs drug gi kha dog gi ras kyis gdod g.yogs la bzhugs par bya'o/ /de ltar dngos grub thob par 'dod pa'i slob ma la ye shes phab nas phreng ba dor zhing bcing ba dang/ gdong g.yogs dgrol ba dang/ dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o//
461b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas yon gyi mchog blangs te/ chu dang/ cod pan rdo rje dril bu ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de ltar bum pa'i dbang bskur nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ni/ dmar chen po dang ga bur bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ slob dpon dang 'dra'o/ /shes
461b6(rgyud 'grel): rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsung te/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ mnyam bar sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma'i tshogs kyi b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /des kyang rgyas mi 'debs pa ni bde ba rtog
461b7(rgyud 'grel): med la rang bzhin brgyad cu'i zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /rmongs pa ni bde ba stong pa nyid rtog pa la gzung 'dzin gyi dri mas mi rmongs pa'o/ /de la gnod par mi 'gyur te zhes pas sems kyi stong pa nyid dbang bzhi pa rtogs pa la gnod par mi
462a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'o/ /de nas slob ma dbang bskur ba'i rjes la dbang bzhi pa'i man ngag bstan pa ni/ de nas man ngag ni bsgrag par bya zhes pa gsungs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa'i zhes pa nas/ snying la khrag chen 'thung ba
462a2(rgyud 'grel): zhig ces pa'i bar du man ngag bsgrag pa bstan to/ /dbugs dbyung ba bstan pa ni/ sems can khams ni ma lus don zhes pa nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' bka' stsol te/ zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te/ /de nas rigs bzhi'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab
462a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ston pa las rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni/ rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rnal 'byor bcas pa ni cho gas 'khor gsang bcas ni zhi ba'i btung ba'o/ /bdag gi phyag rgya sgrub ces pa po
462a4(rgyud 'grel): nya'i gtsang sbra'o/ /lha'i tshul bzhin gar byed pas/ slob ma rnams la bde ba sbyin/ zhes pa gtsang sbra gsum gyi man ngag bstan to/ /slob ma mchog gi rnal 'byor pa de/ de phyin chad sngags skyed zhing skyes ye shes las skyes pa'i phyag rgya bzung nas/
462a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam snang dang sangs rgyas spyan bzhin du sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/ de nas ro dang zhes pa nas bdag dang gzhan la 'dod dgur mchod ces pa'i bar gyis gal te dga' bral du song na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
462a6(rgyud 'grel): la mchod par bya'o/ /da yang bde mchog las/ rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bdag nyid gtsang sbra gsum bsgrubs nas kun gyi slob dpon du rab tu gnas nas
462a7(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba rtog med kyi bde ba stong pa nyid la ji lta bu'i tshul gyis slob ma 'jug pa la bden pa'i chos zhes brjod par bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i gtsang sbra gsum gyi phyag rgya sgrubs pa'o/ /da ni rnam snang gi gtsang sbra gsum
462b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyag rgya sgrub pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul zhes gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa' i gtsang sbra gsum gyis sgrub cing rtog pa kun gyi ltar sgoms pas tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po byed par 'dod pas bsnyen bsgrub bzhi sna tshogs kyi las kyi
462b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor pa dang/ chags las grol lam gyis 'dul ba'i bdag nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs pas/ sems can gyi mos pa mdza' yas pa 'dul ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor de las gzhan pa rnams snang gi dkyil 'khor bstan to//
462b3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' de nyid kyis zhi ba'i snyas 'dul ba'i thar pa thams cad sbyangs nas/ grol ba'i mkha' 'gro rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas rnal 'byor pho mo rang gi lnga dang 'dra bar byin gyis brlabs ste/ mkha' gsang
462b4(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs nas/ rang gi phyag rgya dang ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i cho gas 'khor dang/ zhi ba'i btung pa pho nya'i gtsang sbra sgrub par bya'o/ /he ru ka'i gtsang sbra gsum bstan pa ni/ /gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan
462b5(rgyud 'grel): 'das zhes gsungs te/ zhe sdang sbyangs pa'i phyir he ru ka'i gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa yin no/ /pad+ma gar gyi gtsang sbra ni gzhan ni shin tu rnal 'byor ma zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ log ltas kun nas bslang ba'i 'dod chags sbyang ba'i phyir
462b6(rgyud 'grel): skal pa gzang po mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ba la pad+ma gar dbang gi gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i gtsang sbra gsungs pa ni gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs te/ ser sna can sbyangs pa'i phyir rdo rje
462b7(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa yin no/ /rta mchog gi gtsang sbra ni rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs te/ /drag shul can gyi gang zag sbyang ba'i phyir rta mchog gi gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa yin no/ /de ltar gtsang sbra
463a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad nas rtag pa drug gi rnal 'byor pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyi dpa' bo gcig pa brgya rtsa brgyad bsgoms la rang gi las kyi phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad byin gyis brlabs nas bsgrubs par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir/ rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis/
463a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gis byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs pa/ /gzugs brnyan ngo bo sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba gar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs te/ lha brgya rtsa brgyad kyi nga rgyal byas nas rang gi lha brgya rtsa brgyad byin gyis brlab ste/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhi ba btung ba pho nya'i
463a3(rgyud 'grel): gtsang sbra'i dam tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi de ltar dga' bzhi spyod pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhin du rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'dod pas dbus
463a4(rgyud 'grel): su de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor shar du rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor/ nub du pad+ma gar dbang gi/ lhor rdo rje nyi ma'i/ byang du rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhag la sgrub pa 'am/ yang na he ru ka 'am/ pad+ma gar dbang ngam/ rdo rje nyi ma bzhag
463a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir/ kun tu kun nas thams cad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gnas kun tu dus thams cad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'khor thams cad bdag nyid thams cad kyis sgo nas
463a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa kun tu sangs rgyas la so so 'khor lo rten gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin dang/ g.yo ba lha'i rang bzhin gyis bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'o/ /mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni dbus su rnam snang gi dkyil
463a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bzhag pa ni dbus su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis so/ /lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba'i rnam snang gi bdag nyid kyi
463b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'phrul ston pa dang/ 'khor gyi lha mo gling bu ma dang/ me tog ma la sogs pa/ rtag gdong ma la sogs pa lha mo bcu gnyis kyis phyi rol gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa sangs rgyas sprul pa 'grub par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du shar phyogs kyis
463b2(rgyud 'grel): ka ba'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku ma rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor gyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba bzhag la/ 'khor gyi lha mo bcu gnyis ni thun mong du bzhag pa yin no/ /de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su pad+ma
463b3(rgyud 'grel): gar dbang sdul pa ni/ pad+ma sgyu ma rnam 'phrul bas zhes pa la sogs pa yin no/ /lho phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni khams gsum pa la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no/ /byang phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su rta mchog
463b4(rgyud 'grel): gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni/ khams gsum pa yis rgyal srid che/ bdag gdul spyod pas zhes gsungs so/ /de la sogs pa mdza' yas mchog ces pa brgya rtsa brgyad gang rung dbus su gtso bo byas pa ni sdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa yin no//
463b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal dgyes rol pa'i rnam 'phrul ba zhes pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor mdza' yas sprul pa'o/ /sna tshogs kun gyi rnam par rol zhes pa gdul byed kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs pa'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skal bzang po zhes pa gdul bya sna
463b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs bgo/ rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog gis zhes pa gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum sna tshogs pa'o/ /gdul bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ sems can khams ni rab tu bsgrubs zhes pas mchog tu grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa mdza' yas pas rtog med du/
463b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgrubs pa'o/ /de la sogs pa mdza' yas mchog ces pa bla ma gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rims pas rtog pa drug gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang/ dpa' bo re re bsgom pa dang/ rtog pa bsngas pa'i dkyil 'khor mdza' yas bsgom pas
464a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi bdag nyid grub pa gsungs so/ /brtag pa drug pa'i 'grel pa'o// //de ltar gleng gzhi de kho na nyid snang ba'i yul la 'jug pas zhes pas gnas lugs bstan nas/ thams cad mang ba dang/ zab pa dang/ dbang
464a2(rgyud 'grel): po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'i le'u gsum pa bskyed pa'i rim pa dang/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i thabs kyis/ mtshan ma thob par byas nas/ dbugs dbyung ba rtog pa drug gi sngon 'byung sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku'i mdzad pa dang/ mthun par rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pa
464a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms la/ las dang po bsgrub par 'dod pa 'ang rung mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'ang rung/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'ang rung ste/ dbugs dbyung drug gi grangs dang/
464a4(rgyud 'grel): dus dang mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa bya ba bstan nas/ bsnyen pa 'grub pa'i rjes la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang/ rnal 'byor ma lha'i cha byang du byas pas las sgrub par bya ba dang/ dngos grub len pa dang/ gzhan la phan 'dogs pa bstan pa yin no/
464a5(rgyud 'grel): da ni gzugs brnyan lugs su blugs pa 'am/ 'bur du bskos pa 'am ri mor bris pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la mos pa'i ngor dbugs dbyung ba drug gi bsnyen pa byas nas/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba gsungs pa ni/ de nas gzhan
464a6(rgyud 'grel): yang bshad bya ba zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa' sna tshogs kun gyi mchog gi 'khor lo drug gi gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor sprul par bzhed pas/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes ba rdul tshon gyi bdag nyid du bstan pa yin no//
464a7(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba dpal he ru ka mchog ni pad+ma gar dbang phyug dgyes pa rdo rje nyi ma ste/ bdag gi rta mchog gi brtag pa rnam par snang mdzad de/ rjes su sgrub pa rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gsungs pas/ rdul tshon drug gi bsgrubs pa yin no/ /de la yang bye brag gi
464b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs gnas gsungs pa ni/ dben pa bzhes pa nas ci bde bar ni bsgrubs par bya zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' i gnas gsungs pa yin no/ /rten dang dgon pa zhes pa nas bsgrubs par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam snang gi gnas gsungs pa'o/ /dur khrod ces pa nas bsgrubs
464b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis/ he ru ka'i gnas gsungs pa'o/ /pad+ma zhes pa nas grub par 'gyur zhes pa'i gar gyis pad+ma gar dbang gi gnas gsungs so/ /rgyal po zhes pa nas bsgrubs par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje nyi ma'i gnas gsungs pa'o/ /'khor ni zhes pa
464b3(rgyud 'grel): nas bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis rta mchog gi gnas gsungs pa'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bzhi'i gnas bshad nas rnal 'byor pa'i cha lugs dang rdzas bsags pa bstan pa ni/ cha lugs zhes pa nas/ rta mchog rdo rje can gyis so zhes pa'i
464b4(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis ston to/ /gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra ba zhes pa gnas gyi rten gyi 'khor lo drug go /'khor gyi rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor ba rigs su bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ma byas na rigs drug la lha brgya rtsa brgyad yin no/ /rigs bsdus byas nas
464b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhi gtso bo dgu dgu sum cu rtsa drug yin la/ 'khor gling bu ma la sogs pa dang/ me tog ma la sogs pa dang/ rta gdong ma la sogs pa bzhis yang drug drug dgod pas lha bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha brgya rtsa brgyad 'phel ba yin no//
464b6(rgyud 'grel): phrin las bzhi'i rta mchog dang/ yab yum gsum so so bgrangs pa'i brtsi bar mi bya'o/ /bkod par ni dbyibs yin te/ gzhal yas khang gi dbyibs dang lha'i sku mdog dang/ phyag mtshan gyi dbyibs yin no/ /bkod pa rigs drug gi gtso bo ste/
464b7(rgyud 'grel): ci 'dra ba zhes pa dang sbyar na bde bar pa/ gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /'khor nas ni sngon byung gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog mdzad ces pa gzugs brnyan bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad do/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i
465a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo sprul pa'i sku mthong pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par bris pa'i dkyil 'khor yang bsod nams su 'gyur zhes pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dgos pa bshad pa'o/ /de ltar dgos pa
465a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad nas/ thig gi chog gi dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa smos pa te/ gang gis gdab ce na dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab ces gsungs te drug gi'o/ /su zhig gis she na/ shes rab can gyis so/ /ji ltar bsam pas she na/ phyogs kun
465a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pas so/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cha ru bya zhe na/ shar dang nub dang/ byang dang lhor/ thig bzhi btab nas dkyil 'khor brgyad ces gsungs te/ ka ba brgyad kyi thig gtab pas/ cha brgya dang dbus ma dang dgur 'gyur ro//
465a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi tshad tsam zhe na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i snang ba'i sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ni ci 'dra ba yin brtag par mi nus so/ /gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor drug ni rang gi lha yang mang nyung gi bye brag gis de ni chad kyi dkyil
